title: Winter is Coming
Name: waymar
text: waymar: What do you expect? They're savages. One lot steals a goat from another lot and before you know it, they're ripping each other to pieces.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: will
text: will: I've never seen wildlings do a thing like this. I've never seen a thing like this, not ever in my life.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: waymar
text: waymar: How close did you get?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: will
text: will: Close as any man would.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: gared
text: gared: We should head back to the wall.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: royce
text: royce: Do the dead frighten you?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: gared
text: gared: Our orders were to track the wildlings. We tracked them. They won't trouble us no more.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: royce
text: royce: You don't think he'll ask us how they died? Get back on your horse.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: will
text: will: Whatever did it to them could do it to us. They even killed the children.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: royce
text: royce: It's a good thing we're not children. You want to run away south, run away. Of course, they will behead you as a deserter … If I don't catch you first. Get back on your horse. I won't say it again.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: royce
text: royce: Your dead men seem to have moved camp.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: will
text: will: They were here.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: gared
text: gared: See where they went.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: royce
text: royce: What is it?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: gared
text: gared: It's …

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Go on. Father's watching.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: And your mother.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: septa
text: septa: Fine work, as always. Well done.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Thank you.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: septa
text: septa: I love the detail that you've managed to get in this corners. … Quite beautiful … the stitching …

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Don't think too much, Bran.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: Relax your bow arm.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jonrobb
text: jonrobb: Quick, Bran, faster!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cassel
text: cassel: Lord Stark. My lady. A guardsman just rode in from the hills. They've captured a deserter from the Night's Watch.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Get the lads to saddle their horses.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Do you have to?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He swore an oath, Cat.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cassel
text: cassel: The law is law, my lady.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Tell Bran he's coming, too.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He won't be a boy forever. And winter is coming.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: Lad, go run back and get the rest.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: will
text: will: White Walkers. I saw the White Walkers. White Walkers. The White Walkers, I saw them.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: will
text: will: I know I broke my oath. And I know I'm a deserter. I should have gone back to the Wall and warned them. But I saw what I saw. I saw the White Walkers. People need to know. If you can get word to my family, tell them I'm no coward. Tell them I'm sorry.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: nods yes, and WILL is positioned on the tree limb that serves as a block.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: will
text: will: Forgive me, lord.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Don't look away.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: King of the Andals and the First Men …

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Father will know if you do.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: You did well.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You understand why I did it?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: Jon said he was a deserter.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: But do you understand why I had to kill him?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: Our way is the old way?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: Is it true he saw the White Walkers?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: So he was lying?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: A madman sees what he sees.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: What is it?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: theon
text: theon: Mountain lion?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: There are no mountain lions in these woods.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: theon
text: theon: It's a freak.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: It's a direwolf.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Tough old beast.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: There are no direwolves south of the Wall.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Now there are five.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: You want to hold it?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: Where will they go? Their mother's dead.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cassel
text: cassel: They don't belong down here.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Better a quick death. They won't last without their mother.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: theon
text: theon: Right. Give it here.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: NO!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: Put away your blade.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: theon
text: theon: I take orders from your father, not you.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: Please, father!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'm sorry, Bran.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Lord Stark? There are five pups. One for each of the Stark children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. They were meant to have them.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You will train them yourselves. You will feed them yourselves. And if they die, you will bury them yourselves.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: What about you?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm not a Stark. Get on.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: What is it?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: theon
text: theon: The runt of the litter. That one's yours, Snow.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: As your brother, I feel it's my duty to warn you

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And you never worry about anything. When we were seven, you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock. One hundred foot drop into the water. And you were never afraid.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We're Lannisters. Lannisters don't act like fools.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What if Jon Arryn told someone?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: But who would he tell?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My husband.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now. Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn't know, it died with him. And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king, someone to do his job while he's off fucking boars and hunting whores. Or is it the other way around? And life will go on.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You should be the Hand of the king.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: That's an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You have five northern children. You're not an outsider.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I wonder if the old gods agree.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: It's your gods with all the rules.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I am so sorry, my love.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Tell me.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your sister. The boy …

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He's coming this far North, there's only one thing he's after.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You can always say no, Ned.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion's chamber. I'm told he reads all night.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: maester
text: maester: I'm told he drinks all night.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: How much could he possibly drink? A man of his … stature.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: luwin
text: luwin: We've brought up eight barrels of ale from the cellar. Perhaps we'll find out.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: In any case, candles.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Why's your mother so dead-set on us getting pretty for the king?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: theon
text: theon: It's for the queen, I bet. I hear she's [sleek as a mink?]

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: I hear the prince is a right royal prick.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: theon
text: theon: Think of all those southern girls he gets to stab with his right royal prick.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: Go on, Tommy, shave him good. He's never met a girl he likes better than his own hair.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Gods, but they grow fast. [Seeing BRAN on the wall] Brandon!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: I saw the king! He's got hundreds of people!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: How many times have I told you

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: But he's coming right now! Down our road!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I want you to promise me

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: I promise.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: D'you know what?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: What?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You always look at your feet before you lie. Run and find your father. Tell him the king is close.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Where's Arya? Sansa, where's your sister?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Hey,, hey, hey, hey. What are you doing with that on? [Pulls off ARYA's helm]

title: Winter is Coming
Name: arya
text: arya: Move!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your Grace.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: You've got fat.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Cat!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Your Grace.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Nine years. Why haven't I seen you? Where the hell have you been?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Guarding the North for you, Your Grace. Winterfell is yours.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: arya
text: arya: Where's the Imp?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Will you shut up?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Who have we here? You must be Robb. My, you're a pretty one. Your name is?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: arya
text: arya: Arya.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Ooh. Show us your muscles. You'll be a soldier.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: arya
text: arya: That's Jaime Lannister. The queen's twin brother.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Would you please shut up.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: My queen.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: My queen.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Take me to your crypt. I want to pay my respects.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We've been riding for a month, my love. Surely the dead can wait.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Ned.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Where is our brother? Go find the little beast.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Tell me about Jon Arryn.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: One minute he was fine, and then … Burned right through him, whatever it was. I loved that man.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: We both did.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: He never had to teach you much, but me … You remember me at 16? All I wanted to do was crack skulls and fuck girls. He showed me what was what.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Aye.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Don't look at me like that. Not his fault I didn't listen. I need you, Ned. Down at Kings Landing. Not up here, where you're no damn use to anybody. Lord Eddard Stark, I would name you the Hand of the king.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'm not worthy of the honor.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: I'm not trying to honor you. I'm trying to get you to run my kingdom while I eat, drink, and whore my way to an early grave. Damn it, Ned, stand up. You helped me win the Iron Throne, now help me keep the damn thing. We were meant to rule together. If your sister had lived, we would have been bound by blood. Well, it's not too late. I have a son, you have a daughter. We'll join our Houses.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Mmh. It is true what they say about the Northern girls.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: ros
text: ros: Did you hear the king's in Winterfell?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I did hear something about that.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: ros
text: ros: And the queen. And her twin brother. They say that he is the most handsome man in the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And the other brother?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: ros
text: ros: The queen has two brothers?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There's the pretty one. And there's the clever one.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: ros
text: ros: I hear they call him the Imp.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I hear he hates that nickname.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: ros
text: ros: Oh? I hear he's more than earned it. I hear he's a drunken little lecher into all manner of perversions.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Clever girl.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: ros
text: ros: We've been expecting you, Lord Tyrion.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Have you?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The gods gave me one blessing.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Don't get up.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: ros
text: ros: M'lord.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Should I explain to you the meaning of a closed door in a whorehouse, brother?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You've much to teach me, no doubt. But our sister craves your attention.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She has odd cravings, our sister.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: A family trait. Now, the Starks are feasting us at sundown. Don't leave me alone with these people.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm sorry, I've begun the feast a bit early. And this is the first of many courses.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I thought you might say that. But since we're short on time, Come on, girls. See you at sundown.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Close the door!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Did you have to bury her in a place like this? She should be on a hill somewhere with the sun and the clouds above her.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: She was my sister. This is where she belongs.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: She belonged with me.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: In my dreams, I kill him every night.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: It's done, Your Grace. The Targaryens are gone.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Not all of them.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Daenerys!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Daenerys! There's our bride to be! Look – a gift from Illyrio. Touch it. Come on. Feel the fabric. Mmmm. Isn't he a gracious host?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We've been his guests for over a year and he's never asked us for anything.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Illyrio is no fool. He knows I won't forget my friends when I come into my throne. You still slouch. Let me see. You have a woman's body now. I need you to be perfect today. Can you do that for me? You don't want to wake the dragon, do you?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: When they write the history of my reign, sweet sister, they will say it began today.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: maid
text: maid: It's too hot, my lady.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Where is he?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: The Dothraki are not known for their punctuality.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: May I present my honored guests? Viserys of House Targaryen, the third of his name. The rightful King of the Andals and the First Men. And his sister, Daenerys, of the House Targaryen.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Do you see how long his hair is? When Dothraki are defeated in combat, they cut off their braid so the whole world can see their shame. Khal Drogo has never been defeated. He's a savage, of course, but he's one of the finest killers alive. And you will be his queen.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: Come forward, my dear.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Where's he going?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: The ceremony is over.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: But he didn't say anything. Did he like her?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: Trust me, Your Grace. If he didn't like her, we'd know.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: It won't be long now. Soon you will cross the Narrow Sea and take back your father's throne. The people drink secret toasts to your health. They cry out for their true king.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: When will they be married?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: Soon. The Dothraki never stay still for long.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Is it true they lie with their horses?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: I wouldn't ask Khal Drogo.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Do you take me for a fool?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: I take you for a king. Kings lack the caution of common men. My apologies if I've given offense.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: I know how to play a man like Drogo. I give him a queen and he gives me an army.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I don't want to be his queen. I want to go home.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: So do I. I want us both to go home. But they took it from us. So tell me, sweet sister, how do we go home?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I don't know.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: We go home with an army. With Khal Drogo's army. I would let his whole tribe fuck you, all 40,000 men and their horses too, if that's what it took.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Do you think Joffrey will like me? What if he thinks I'm ugly?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's so handsome.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: When would we be married? Soon or do we have to wait?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Hush now. Your father hasn't even said yes.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why would he say no? He'd be the second most powerful man in the kingdoms.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: He'd have to leave home. He'd have to leave me. And so would you.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You left your home to come here. And I'd be queen someday. Please make father say yes.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Sansa…

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Please, please. It's the only thing I ever wanted.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Is he dead yet?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Uncle Benjen!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: You got bigger. I rode all day. Didn't want to leave you alone with the Lannisters. Why aren't you at the feast?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family to seat a bastard in their midst.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Well, you're always welcome on the wall. No bastard was ever refused a seat there.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: So take me with you when you go back.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Jon…

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Father will let me if you ask him, I know he will.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: The Wall isn't going anywhere.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm ready to swear your oath.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: You don't understand what you'd be giving up. We have no families. None of us will ever father sons.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: I don't care about that.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: You might, if you knew what it meant. … I'd better get inside. Rescue your father from his guests. We'll talk later.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Your uncle's in the Night's Watch.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: What're you doing back there?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Preparing for a night with your family. I've always wanted to see the Wall.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: You're Tyrion Lannister. The queen's brother?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My greatest accomplishment. You – you're Ned Stark's bastard, aren't you?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Did I offend you? Sorry. You are the bastard, though.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: Lord Eddard Stark is my father.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And Lady Stark is not your mother. Making you a bastard. Let me give you some advice, bastard. Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor. Then it can never be used to hurt you.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jon
text: jon: What the hell do you know about being a bastard?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: All dwarves are bastards in their fathers' eyes.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: You at a feast -- It's like a bear in a trap.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The boy I beheaded. Did you know him?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Of course I did. Just a lad. But he was tough, Ned. A true Ranger.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He was talking madness. Said the Walkers slaughtered his friends.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: The two he was with are still missing.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: A wildling ambush.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Maybe. Direwolves south of the wall. Talk of the Walkers. My brother might be the next Hand to the king. Winter is coming.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Winter is coming.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: Uncle Benjen.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Robb boy. How are ye?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: I'm good.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Is this your first time in the North, Your Grace?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Yes. Lovely country.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I'm sure it's very grim, after Kings Landing. I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Hello, little dove. But you are a beauty. How old are you?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Thirteen, Your Grace.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're tall. Still growing?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I think so, Your Grace.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And have you bled yet?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, Your Grace.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And your dress. Did you make it?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Such talent. You must make something for me.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I hear we might share a grandchild someday.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I hear the same.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Your daughter will do well in the capital. Such a beauty shouldn't stay hidden up here forever.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your pardon.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I hear we might be neighbors soon. I hope it's true.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Yes, the king has honored me with his offer.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm sure we'll have a tournament to celebrate the new title, if you accept. It would be good to have you in the field. The competition has become a bit stale.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I don't fight in tournaments.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No? Getting a little old for it?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I don't fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don't want him to know what I can do.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Well said.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Arya!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robb
text: robb: Time for bed.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'm a Northman. I belong here with you, not down south in that rat's nest they call a capital.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I won't let him take you.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The king takes what he wants. That's why he's king.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I'll say, ‘Listen, fat man, you are not taking my husband anywhere. He belongs to me now.'

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: How did he get so fat?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: He only stops eating when it's time for a drink.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: a
text: a: It's Maester Luwin, my lord.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Send him in.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Pardon, my lord, my lady. A rider in the night from your sister.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Stay.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: This was sent from the Eyrie. What's she doing at the Eyrie? She hasn't been back there since her wedding.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What news?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: She's fled the capital. She says Jon Arryn was murdered. By the Lannisters. She says the king is in danger.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: She's fresh widowed, Cat. She doesn't know what she's saying.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Lysa's head would be on a spike right now if the wrong people had found that letter. Do you think she would risk her life, her son's life, if she wasn't certain her husband was murdered?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: luwin
text: luwin: If this news is true, and the Lannisters conspire against the throne, who but you can protect the king?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: They murdered the last Hand. Now you want Ned to take the job.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: luwin
text: luwin: The king rode for a month to ask Lord Stark's help. He's the only one he trusts. You swore the king an oath, my lord.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: He spent half his life fighting Robert's wars. He owes him nothing. Your father and brother rode south once on a king's demand.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: luwin
text: luwin: A different time. Different king.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: When do I meet with the Khal? We need to begin planning the invasion.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: If Khal Drogo has promised you a crown, you shall have it.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: When?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: When their omens favor war.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: I piss on Dothraki omens. I waited 17 years to get my throne back.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: A Dothraki wedding without at least three deaths is considered a dull affair.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jorah
text: jorah: A small gift for the new Khaleesi. Songs and histories from the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Thank you, ser. Are you from my country?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Ser Jorah Mormont of Bear Island. I served your father for many years. Gods be good, I hope to always serve the rightful king.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: Dragons' eggs, Daenerys. From the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai. The ages have turned them to stone, but they will always be beautiful.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Thank you, Magister.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: She's beautiful. … Ser Jorah, I don't know how to say ‘thank you' in Dothraki.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jorah
text: jorah: There is no word for ‘thank you' in Dothraki.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Make him happy.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: khal
text: khal: No.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Do you know the Common Tongue?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Is ‘no' the only word that you know?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Rough night, Imp?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If I get through this without squirting from one end or the other, it will be a miracle.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I didn't pick you for a hunter.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The greatest in the land. My spear never misses.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: sandor
text: sandor: It's not hunting if you pay for it.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: Are you as good with a spear as you used to be?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: No, but I'm still better than you.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: I know what I'm putting you through. Thank you for saying yes. I only ask you because I need you. You're a loyal friend. You hear me? A loyal friend. The last one I've got.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I hope I'll serve you well.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: robert
text: robert: You will. And I'll make sure you don't look so fucking grim all the time. Come on, boys, let's go kill some boar!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: Come on, you.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Stop. STOP.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Are you completely mad?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He saw us.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It's all right. It's all right.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He saw us!

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I heard you the first time. Quite the little climber, aren't you? How old are you, boy?

title: Winter is Coming
Name: bran
text: bran: Ten

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Ten.

title: Winter is Coming
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The things I do for love.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You need to drink, child... And eat.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Isn't there anything else?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The Dothraki have two things in abundance

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Khaleesi!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: irri
text: irri: Your hands.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We're still not far from Pentos, your Grace. Magister Illyrio has extended his hospitality. You'd be more comfortable there.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: viserys
text: viserys: I have no interest in hospitality or comfort. I'll stay with Drogo until he fulfils his end of the bargain and I have my crown.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jorah
text: jorah: As you wish, your Grace.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Well, Mormont, as brutish as this life is, I suppose it is preferable to beheading. What did Ned Stark want you for? Buying from a slaver?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Selling to one... Some poachers I caught on my land.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Under my reign, you won't be punished for such nonsense. You can rest assured of that.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Better-looking bitches than you're used to, Uncle. My mother's been looking for you. We ride for King's Landing today.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Before you go, you will call on Lord and Lady Stark and offer your sympathies.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What good will my sympathies do them?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: None. But it is expected of you. Your absence has already been noted.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: The boy means nothing to me. And I can't stand the wailing of women.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: One word and I'll hit you again.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I'm telling mother!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Go! Tell her. But first you will get to Lord and Lady Stark and you will fall on your knees in front of them and tell them how very sorry you are, that you are at their service, and that all your prayers are with them. Do you understand?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: You can't...

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do you understand?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sandor
text: sandor: The Prince will remember that, little lord.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I hope so. If he forgets, be a good dog and remind him. Time for breakfast...

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Bread. And two of those little fish. And a mug of dark beer to wash it down. And bacon, burnt black.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Little brother.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Beloved siblings.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: Is Bran going to die?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Apparently not.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What do you mean?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Maester says the boy may live.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It's no mercy, letting a child linger in such pain.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Only the gods know for certain. All the rest of us can do is pray. The charms of the north seem entirely lost on you.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I still can't believe you're going. It's ridiculous even for you.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Where's your sense of wonder? The greatest structure ever built, the intrepid men of the Night's Watch, the wintry abode of the White Walkers.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Tell me you're not thinking of taking the black.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And go celibate? The whores would go begging from Dorne to Casterly Rock. I just want to stand on top of the Wall and piss off the edge of the world.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The children don't need to hear your filth. Come.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Even if the boy lives, he'll be a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death any day.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Speaking for the grotesques, I'd have to disagree. Death is so final, whereas life... Life is full of possibilities. I hope the boy does wake. I'd be very interested to hear what he has to say.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: My dear brother, there are times you make me wonder whose side you're on.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My dear brother, you wound me. You know how much I love my family.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Please.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I would have dressed, your Grace.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: This is your home. I'm your guest. Handsome one, isn't he? I lost my first boy, a little black-haired beauty. He was a fighter too... Tried to beat the fever that took him. Forgive me. It's the last thing you need to hear right now.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I never knew.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It was years ago. Robert was crazed, beat his hands bloody on the wall, all the things men do to show you how much they care... The boy looked just like him. Such a little thing... A bird without feathers. They came to take his body away and Robert held me. I screamed and I battled, but he held me. That little bundle. They took him away and I never saw him again. Never have visited the crypt, never. I pray to the Mother every morning and night that she return your child to you.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I am grateful..

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Perhaps this time she'll listen.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: A sword for the wall?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: I already have one.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Good man. Have you swung it yet?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Of course I have.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: At someone, I mean. It's a strange thing, the first time you cut a man. You realize we're nothing but sacks of meat and blood and some bone to keep it all standing. Let me thank you ahead of time for guarding us all from the perils beyond the Wall... Wildlings and White Walkers and whatnot. We're grateful to have good, strong men like you protecting us.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: We've guarded the Kingdoms for 8 000 years.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Is it "we" already? Have you taken your vows then?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Soon enough.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Give my regards to the Night's Watch. I'm sure it will be thrilling to serve in such an elite force. And if not, It's only for life.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Thank you, Nymeria. Septa Mordane says I have to do it again. "My things weren't properly folded", she says. Who cares how they're folded?! They're going to get all messed up anyway.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: It's good you've got help.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Watch. Nymeria, gloves.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Impressive.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Shut up. Nymeria, gloves!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: I have something for you. And it has to be packed very carefully.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: A present?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Close the door. This is no toy. Be careful you don't cut yourself.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: It's so skinny.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: So are you. I had the blacksmith make it for you special. It won't hack a man's head off, but it can poke him full of holes if you're quick enough.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: I can be quick.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: You'll have to work at it every day. How does it feel? Do you like the balance?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: I think so.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: First lesson

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: I know which end to use.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm going to miss you... Careful... All the best swords have names, you know.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Sansa can keep her sewing needles. I've got a needle of my own.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: I came to say goodbye to Bran.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You've said it.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: I wish I could be here when you wake up. I'm going north with Uncle Benjen. I'm taking the black. I know we always talked about seeing the Wall together, but you'll be able to come visit me at Castle Black when you're better. I'll know my way around by then. I'll be a sworn brother of the Night's Watch. We can go out walking beyond the Wall, if you're not afraid.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I want you to leave.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: 17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I have no choice.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You can. You must.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: You've said goodbye to Bran? He's not going to die. I know it.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: You Starks are hard to kill.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: My mother?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: She was very kind.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: It was always my color.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: Farewell, Snow.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: And you, Stark.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch. The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years. And you are a Stark. You might not have my name, but you have my blood.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Is my mother alive? Does she know about me? Where I am, where I'm going? Does she care?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The next time we see each other, we'll talk about your mother. I promise.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: Gods, this is country! I've half a mind to leave them all behind and keep going.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I've half a mind to go with you.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: What do you say, just you and me on the Kingsroad, swords at our sides, a couple of tavern wenches to warm our beds tonight.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You should have asked me 20 years ago.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: There were wars to fight, women to marry... We never had the chance to be young.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I recall a few chances.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: There was that one... Oh, what was her name? That common girl of yours? Becca? With the great big tits you could bury your face in.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Bessie. She was one of yours.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: Bessie! Thank the gods for Bessie and her tits. Yours was... Aleena? No. You told me once. Meryl? Your bastardo s mother?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Wylla.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: That's it. She must have been a rare wench to make Lord Eddard Stark forget his honor. You never told me what she looked like.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Nor will I.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: We were at war. None of us knew if we were gonna go back home again. You're too hard on yourself. You always have been. I swear if I weren't your King, you'd have hit me already.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The worst thing about your coronation... I'll never get to hit you again.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: Trust me, that's not the worst thing. There was a rider in the night.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord. What of it? Should we send her a wedding gift?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: A knife perhaps, a good sharp one, and a bold man to wield it.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: She's little more than a child.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: Soon enough that child will spread her legs and start breeding.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Tell me we're not speaking of this.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: Oh, it's unspeakable to you? What her father did to your family... That was unspeakable. What Rhaegar Targaryen did to your sister... the woman I loved. I'll kill every Targaryen I get my hands on.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: But you can't get your hands on this one, can you?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: This Khal Drogo, it's said he has 100,000 men in his horde.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Even a million Dothraki are no threat to the realm, as long as they remain on the other side of the Narrow Sea. They have no ships, Robert.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: There are still those in the Seven Kingdoms who call me Usurper. If the Targaryen boy crosses with a Dothraki horde at his back, the scum will join him.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He will not cross. And if by chance he does, we'll throw him back into the sea.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: There's a war coming, Ned. I don't know when, I don't know who we'll be fighting, but it's coming.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Sit. You'll be fed. Untie them.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Rapers. They were given a choice no doubt... Castration or the Wall. Most choose the knife. Not impressed by your new brothers? Lovely thing about the Watch... You discard your old family and get a whole new one.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Why do you read so much?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Look at me and tell me what you see.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Is this a trick?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What you see is a dwarf. If I'd been born a peasant they might've left me out in the woods to die. Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me. My father was the Hand of the King for 20 years.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Until your brother killed that King.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, until my brother killed him. Life is full of these little ironies. My sister married the new King and my repulsive nephew will be King after him. I must do my part for the honor of my house, wouldn't you agree? But how? Well, my brother has his sword and I have my mind. And a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone. That's why I read so much. And you? What's your story, bastard?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: Ask me nicely and maybe I'll tell you, dwarf.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A bastard boy with nothing to inherit, off to join the ancient order of the Night's Watch, alongside his valiant brothers-in-arms.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jon
text: jon: The Night's Watch protects the realm from...

title: The Kingsroad
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes yes, against grumpkins and snarks and all the other monsters your wet nurse warned you about. You're a smart boy. You don't believe that nonsense... Everything's better with some wine in the belly.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: maester
text: maester: It's time we reviewed the accounts, my lady. You'll want to know how much this royal visit has cost us.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Talk to Poole about it.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: maester
text: maester: Poole went south with Lord Stark, my lady. We need a new steward, and there are several other appointments that require our immediate attention...

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I don't care about appointments!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: I'll make the appointments. We'll talk about it first thing in the morning.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: maester
text: maester: Very good, my Lord. My Lady.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: When was the last time you left this room?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I have to take care of him.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: What if he's wrong? Bran needs me.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Close the windows! I can't stand it! Please make them stop!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: Fire. You stay here. I'll come back.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: assassin
text: assassin: You're not supposed to be here. No one is supposed to be here. It's a mercy. He's dead already.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: No!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Have you ever seen a dragon?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: irri
text: irri: Dragon gone, Khaleesi.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Everywhere? Even in the east?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: irri
text: irri: No dragon. Brave men kill them. It is known.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jhiqui
text: jhiqui: It is known.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: A trader from Garth told me that dragons come from the moon.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The moon?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: He told me the moon was an egg, Khaleesi, that once there were two moons in the sky. But one wandered too close to the sun and it cracked from the heat. Out of it poured a thousand thousand dragons and they drank the sun's fire.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: irri
text: irri: Moon is no egg. Moon is goddess... wife of sun. It is known.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Leave me with her. Why did the trader from Garth tell you these stories?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Men like to talk when they're happy. Before your brother bought me for you, it was my job to make men happy.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How old were you?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: I was nine when my mother sold me to the pleasure house.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Nine?!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: I did not touch a man for three years, Khaleesi. First you must learn.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Can you teach me how to make the Khal happy?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Yes.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Will it take three years?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: No.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Welcome.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: What I am about to tell you must remain between us. I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: maester
text: maester: The boy was always sure-footed before.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Someone tried to kill him twice. Why? Why murder an innocent child? Unless he saw something he wasn't meant to see.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: theon
text: theon: Saw what, my lady?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I don't know. But I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved. We already have reason to suspect their loyalty to the crown.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: rodrick
text: rodrick: Did you notice the dagger the killer used? It's too fine a weapon for such a man. The blade is Valyrian steel, the handle dragonbone. Someone gave it to him.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: They come into our home and try to murder my brother? If it's war they want...

title: The Kingsroad
Name: theon
text: theon: If it comes to that, you know I'll stand behind you.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: maester
text: maester: What, is there going to be a battle in the Godswood? Too easily words of war become acts of war. We don't know the truth yet. Lord Stark must be told of this.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I don't trust a raven to carry these words.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: I'll ride to King's Landing.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: Mother, you can't.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I must.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: rodrick
text: rodrick: I'll send Hal with a squad of guardsmen to escort you.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Too large a party attracts unwanted attention. I don't want the Lannisters to know I'm coming.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: rodrick
text: rodrick: Let me accompany you at least. The Kingsroad can be a dangerous place for a woman alone.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robb
text: robb: What about Bran?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: No, Khaleesi. You must look in his eyes always. Love comes in at the eyes. It is said that Irogenia of Lys could finish a man with nothing but her eyes.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Finish a man?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Kings traveled across the world for a night with Irogenia. Magisters sold their palaces. Khals burned her enemies just to have her for a few hours. They say a thousand men proposed to her and she refused them all.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Well, she sounds like an interesting woman. I don't think that Drogo will like it with me on top.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: You will make him like it, Khaleesi. Men want what they've never had. And the Dothraki take slaves like a hound takes a bitch. Are you a slave, Khaleesi? Then don't make love like a slave. Very good, Khaleesi. Out there he is the mighty Khal, but in this tent, he belongs to you.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I don't think that this is the Dothraki way.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: doreah
text: doreah: If he wanted the Dothraki way, why did he marry you?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No. No. Tonight I would look upon your face.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Pardon me, Ser.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Do I frighten you so much, girl? Or is it him there making you shake? He frightens me too. Look at that face.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm sorry if I offended you, Ser. Why won't he speak to me?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sandor
text: sandor: He hasn't been very talkative these last 20 years. Since the mad King had his tongue ripped out with hot pincers.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: He speaks damn well with his sword though. Ser Ilyn Payne, the King's justice. The royal executioner. What is it, sweet lady? Does the hound frighten you? Away with you, dog. You're scaring my lady. I don't like to see you upset. The sun is finally shining. Come walk with me.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: My princess can drink as much as she wants. Don't worry... You're safe with me.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: mycah
text: mycah: I'll get you!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Arya!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: What are you doing here? Go away.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Your sister? And who are you, boy?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: mycah
text: mycah: Mycah, my Lord.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He the butcher's boy.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: He's my friend.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: A butcher's boy who wants to be a Knight, eh? Pick up your sword, butcher's boy. Let's see how good you are.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: mycah
text: mycah: She asked me to, my Lord. She asked me to.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I'm your prince, not your lord, and I said pick up your sword.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: mycah
text: mycah: It's not a sword, my prince. It's only a stick.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: And you're not a Knight. Only a butcher's boy. That was my lady's sister you were hitting, do you know that?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Stop it!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Arya, stay out of this.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I won't hurt him... Much. Filthy little bitch!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I'll gut you, you little cunt!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Nymeria!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Please don't.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Then go! Don't touch me.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: soldier
text: soldier: The wolf's not here. Look down by the stream.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: You've got to go. They'll kill you for what you did to Joffrey. Go on... run. Go! Leave now!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: soldier
text: soldier: It's a direwolf.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: soldier
text: soldier: I'll check down here.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: soldier
text: soldier: I think I heard a noise.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Go!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jory
text: jory: My lord! My lord! They found her. She's unharmed.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Where is she?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jory
text: jory: She's been taken directly before the King.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Who took her?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jory
text: jory: The Lannisters found her.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Right, get back.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: jory
text: jory: The Queen ordered them to bring her straight to him.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Back! Back to the inn. All back!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm sorry.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Are you hurt?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: No.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: It's all right. What is the meaning of this? Why was my daughter not brought to me at once?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: How dare you speak to your King in that manner?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: Quiet, woman. Sorry, Ned. I never meant to frighten the girl. But we need to get this business done quickly.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Your girl and that butcher's boy attacked my son. That animal of hers nearly tore his arm off.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: That's not true! She just... Bit him a little. He was hurting Mycah.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Joffrey told us what happened. You and that boy beat him with clubs while you set your wolf on him.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: That's not what happened!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Yes it is! They all attacked me and she threw my sword in the river.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Liar!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Shut up!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: Enough! He tells me one thing, she tells me another. Seven hells! What am I to make of this? Where's your other daughter, Ned?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: In bed asleep.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: She's not. Sansa, come here, darling.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: Now, child... Tell me what happened. Tell it all and tell it true. It's a great crime to lie to a King.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I don't know. I don't remember. Everything happened so fast. I didn't see.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Liar! Liar liar liar!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Stop it! That's enough of that.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Liar liar liar!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Stop! Arya!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: She's as wild as that animal of hers. I want her punished.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: What would you have me do, whip her through the streets? Damn it, children fight. It's over.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Joffrey will bear these scars for the rest of his life.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: You let that little girl disarm you? See to it that your daughter is disciplined. I'll do the same with my son.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Gladly, your Grace.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And what of the direwolf? What of the beast that savaged your son?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: I'd forgot the damned wolf.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: soldier
text: soldier: We found no trace of the direwolf, your Grace.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: So be it.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We have another wolf.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: As you will.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You can't mean it.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: robert
text: robert: A direwolf's no pet. Get her a dog. She'll be happier for it.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He doesn't mean Lady, does he? No no, not Lady! Lady didn't bite anyone! She's good!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: arya
text: arya: Lady wasn't there! You leave her alone!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please! It wasn't Lady!

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: s this your command... your Grace?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Where is the beast?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Chained up outside, your Grace.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Ser Ilyn, do me the honor.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: No. Jory... Take the girls to their rooms. If it must be done, then I'll do it myself.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Is this some trick?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The wolf is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher.

title: The Kingsroad
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The butcher's boy... You rode him down?

title: The Kingsroad
Name: sandor
text: sandor: He ran... Not very fast.

title: Lord Snow
Name: kings
text: kings: Welcome, Lord Stark. Grand Maester Pycelle has called a meeting of the Small Council. The honor of your presence is requested.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Get the girls settled in. I'll be back in time for supper. And, Jory, you go with them.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jory
text: jory: Yes, my Lord.

title: Lord Snow
Name: kings
text: kings: If you'd like to change into something more appropriate…

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Thank the gods you're here, Stark. About time we had some stern northern leadership.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Glad to see you're protecting the throne.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Sturdy old thing. How many kings' asses have polished it, I wonder? What's the line? The King shits and the Hand wipes.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Very handsome armor. Not a scratch on it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I know. People have been swinging at me for years, but they always seem to miss.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You've chosen your opponents wisely then.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I have a knack for it. It must be strange for you coming into this room. I was standing right here when it happened. He was very brave, your brother. Your father too. They didn't deserve to die like that. Nobody deserves to die like that.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: But you just stood there and watched.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: 500 men just stood there and watched. All the great knights of the Seven Kingdoms. You think anyone said a word, lifted a finger? No, Lord Stark. 500 men and this room was silent as a crypt. Except for the screams, of course, and the Mad King laughing. And later... When I watched the Mad King die, I remembered him laughing as your father burned... It felt like justice.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Is that what you tell yourself at night? You're a servant of justice? That you were avenging my father when you shoved your sword in Aerys Targaryen's back?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Tell me... If I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back, would you admire me more?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You served him well, when serving was safe.

title: Lord Snow
Name: varys
text: varys: Lord Stark.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Lord Varys.

title: Lord Snow
Name: varys
text: varys: I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad. We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: A shame you didn't say a prayer for the butcher's son. Renly! You're looking well.

title: Lord Snow
Name: renly
text: renly: And you look tired from the road. I told them this meeting could wait another day, but...

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: But we have a Kingdom to look after. I've hoped to meet you for some time, Lord Stark. No doubt Lady Catelyn has mentioned me.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: She has, Lord Baelish. I understand you knew my brother Brandon as well.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: All too well. I still carry a token of his esteem from navel to collarbone.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Perhaps you chose the wrong man to duel with.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: It wasn't the man that I chose, my Lord. It was Catelyn Tully. A woman worth fighting for, I'm sure you'll agree.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grand
text: grand: I humbly beg your pardon, my Lord Stark.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Grand Maester.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grand
text: grand: How many years has it been? You were a young man.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And you served another King.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grand
text: grand: How forgetful of me. This belongs to you, now. Should we begin?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Without the King?

title: Lord Snow
Name: renly
text: renly: Winter may be coming, but I'm afraid the same cannot be said for my brother.

title: Lord Snow
Name: varys
text: varys: His Grace has many cares. He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: We are the lords of small matters here.

title: Lord Snow
Name: renly
text: renly: My brother instructs us to stage a tournament in honor of Lord Stark's appointment as Hand of the King.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Mmm, how much?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: 40,000 gold dragons to the champion, 20,000 to the runner-up, 20,000 to the winning archer.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grand
text: grand: Can the treasury bear such expense?

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'll have to borrow it. The Lannisters will accommodate, I expect. We already owe Lord Tywin 3 million gold. What's another 80,000?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Are you telling me the Crown is three million in debt?

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'm telling you the Crown is six million in debt.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: How could you let this happen?

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The Master of Coin finds the money. The King and the Hand spend it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I will not believe Jon Arryn allowed Robert to bankrupt the realm.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grand
text: grand: Lord Arryn gave wise and prudent advice, but I fear His Grace doesn't always listen.

title: Lord Snow
Name: renly
text: renly: Counting coppers," he calls it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'll speak to him tomorrow. This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: As you will. But still, we'd best make our plans.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: There will be no plans until I speak to Robert. Forgive me, my Lords. I had a long ride.

title: Lord Snow
Name: varys
text: varys: You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Please, it's nearly healed.

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: It's ugly.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: A King should have scars, you fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I'm not like him. I didn't fight off anything. It bit me and all I did was scream. And the two Stark girls saw it, both of them.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's not true. You killed the beast. You only spared the girl because of the love your father bears her father. When Aerys Targaryen sat on the Iron Throne, your father was a rebel and a traitor. Someday you'll sit on the throne and the truth will be what you make it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Do I have to marry her?

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Yes. She's very beautiful and young. If you don't like her, you only need to see her on formal occasions and when the time comes, to make little princes and princesses. And if you'd rather fuck painted whores, you'll fuck painted whores. And if you'd rather lie with noble virgins, so be it. You are my darling boy and the world will be exactly as you want it to be. Do something nice for the Stark girl.

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I don't want to.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No, but you will. The occasional kindness will spare you all sorts of trouble down the road.

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: We allow the northerners too much power. They consider themselves our equals.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: How would you handle them?

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I'd double their taxes and command them to supply 10,000 men to the royal army.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: A royal army?

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Why should every lord command his own men? It's primitive, no better than the hill tribes. We should have a standing army of men loyal to the Crown, trained by experienced soldiers... Instead of a mob of peasants who've never held pikes in their lives.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And if the northerners rebel?

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I'd crush them. Seize Winterfell and install someone loyal to the realm as Warden of the North. Uncle Kevan, maybe.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And these 10,000 northern troops, would they fight for you or their lord?

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: For me. I'm their King.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: But you've just invaded their homeland, asked them to kill their brothers.

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I'm not asking.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The North cannot be held... not by an outsider. It's too big and too wild. When the winter comes, the Seven gods together couldn't save you and your royal army. A good King knows when to save his strength... And when to destroy his enemies.

title: Lord Snow
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: So you agree... The Starks are enemies?

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Everyone who isn't us is an enemy.

title: Lord Snow
Name: septa
text: septa: Enough of that, young lady. Eat your food.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm practicing.

title: Lord Snow
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Practicing for what?

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: The Prince.

title: Lord Snow
Name: septa
text: septa: Arya, stop!

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: He's a liar and a coward and he killed my friend.

title: Lord Snow
Name: sansa
text: sansa: The Hound killed your friend.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: The Hound does whatever the Prince tells him to do.

title: Lord Snow
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're an idiot.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: You're a liar. And if you told the truth, Mycah would be alive.

title: Lord Snow
Name: septa
text: septa: Enough!

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What's happening here?

title: Lord Snow
Name: septa
text: septa: Arya would rather act like a beast than a lady.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Go to your room. We'll speak later. That's for you, love…

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The same dollmaker makes all of Princess Myrcella's toys. Don't you like it?

title: Lord Snow
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I haven't played with dolls since I was eight. May I be excused?

title: Lord Snow
Name: septa
text: septa: You've barely eaten a thing.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: It's all right. Go on.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: War was easier than daughters.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: Go away!

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Arya, open the door. May I come in? Whose sword is that?

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: Mine.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Give it to me. I know this maker's mark. This is Mikken's work. Where did you get this? This is no toy. Little ladies shouldn't play with swords.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: I wasn't playing. And I don't want to be a lady.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Come here. Now what do you want with this?

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: It's called Needle.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: A blade with a name. And who were you hoping to skewer with Needle? Your sister? Do you know the first thing about sword fighting?

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: Stick 'em with the pointy end.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: laughs] That's the essence of it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: I was trying to learn. I asked Mycah to practice with me. I asked him. It was my fault.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: No, sweet girl. You didn't kill the butcher's boy.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: I hate them! I hate all of them. The Hound, the Queen and the King and Joffrey and Sansa.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Sansa was dragged before the King and Queen... And asked to call the Prince a liar.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: So was I! He is a liar.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Darling, listen to me. Sansa will be married to Joffrey someday. She cannot betray him. She must take his side even when he's wrong.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: But how you can let her marry someone like that?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Well… Look at me. You're a Stark of Winterfell. You know our words.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: Winter is coming.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You were born in the long summer. You've never known anything else. But now winter is truly coming. And in the winter, we must protect ourselves, look after one another. Sansa is your sister.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't hate her. Not really.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I don't want to frighten you, but I won't lie to you either. We've come to a dangerous place. We cannot fight a war amongst ourselves. All right? Go on. It's yours.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: I can keep it?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Try not to stab your sister with it. If you're going to own a sword, you'd better know how to use it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: old
