text: old: Don't listen to it. Crows are all liars. I know a story about a crow.

title: Lord Snow
Name: bran
text: bran: I hate your stories.

title: Lord Snow
Name: old
text: old: I know a story about a boy who hated stories. I could tell you about Ser Duncan the Tall. Those were always your favorites.

title: Lord Snow
Name: bran
text: bran: Those weren't my favorites. My favorites were the scary ones.

title: Lord Snow
Name: old
text: old: Oh, my sweet summer child. What do you know about fear? Fear is for the winter, when the snows fall a hundred feet deep. Fear is for the long night, when the sun hides for years and children are born and live and die all in darkness. That is the time for fear, my little Lord, when the White Walkers move through the woods. Thousands of years ago there came a night that lasted a generation. Kings froze to death in their castles, same as the shepherds in their huts. And women smothered their babies rather than see them starve, and wept and felt the tears freeze on their cheeks. So is this the sort of story that you like? In that darkness, the White Walkers came for the first time. They swept through cities and kingdoms, riding their dead horses, hunting with their packs of pale spiders big as hounds…

title: Lord Snow
Name: robb
text: robb: What are you telling him now?

title: Lord Snow
Name: old
text: old: Only what the little Lord wants to hear.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robb
text: robb: Get your supper. I want some time with him. One time she told me the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant named Macumber.

title: Lord Snow
Name: bran
text: bran: Maybe we do.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robb
text: robb: How do you feel? You still don't remember anything? I've seen you climb a thousand times. In the wind, in the rain... A thousand times. You never fall.

title: Lord Snow
Name: bran
text: bran: I did though. It's true, isn't it... what Maester Luwin says about my legs? I'd rather be dead.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robb
text: robb: Don't ever say that.

title: Lord Snow
Name: bran
text: bran: I'd rather be dead.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rodrick
text: rodrick: Fewer eyes back here, my Lady. But still too many.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: It's nine years since I've set foot in the capital. And no one knew who I was the last time I came either.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rodrick
text: rodrick: My Lady.

title: Lord Snow
Name: guard
text: guard: Welcome to King's Landing, Lady Stark. Would you mind following us?

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I would. We've done nothing wrong.

title: Lord Snow
Name: guard
text: guard: We've been instructed to escort you into the city.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Instructed? I don't know who's providing your instructions, but...

title: Lord Snow
Name: guard
text: guard: Follow me, Lady Stark.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Cat! Go on. Go upstairs.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You little worm! You take me for some back-alley Sally you can drag into a…

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I meant no disrespect to you of all people.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: How dare you bring me here! Have you lost your mind?

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No one will come looking for you here. Isn't that what like you wanted? I'm truly sorry... about the locale.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: How did you know I was coming to King's Landing?

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: A dear friend told me.

title: Lord Snow
Name: varys
text: varys: Lady Stark.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Lord Varys.

title: Lord Snow
Name: varys
text: varys: To see you again after so many years is a blessing. Your poor hands.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: How did you know I was coming?

title: Lord Snow
Name: varys
text: varys: Knowledge is my trade, my Lady. Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance? My little birds are everywhere. Even in the north. They whisper to me the strangest stories. Valyrian steel.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Do you know whose dagger this is?

title: Lord Snow
Name: varys
text: varys: I must admit I do not.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Well well, this is an historic day. Something you don't know that I do. There's only one dagger like this in all of the Seven Kingdoms. It's mine.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Yours?

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: At least it was, until the tournament on Prince Joffrey's last nameday. I bet on Ser Jaime in the jousting, as any sane man would. When the Knight of the Flowers unseated him, I lost this dagger.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: To whom?

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Tyrion Lannister. The Imp.

title: Lord Snow
Name: alliser
text: alliser: If that were a real sword, you'd be dead. Lord Snow here grew up in a castle spitting down on the likes of you. Pyp. Do you think Ned Stark's bastard bleeds like the rest of us?

title: Lord Snow
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Next!

title: Lord Snow
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Lord Snow, it appears you're the least useless person here. Go clean yourselves up. There's only so much I can stomach in a day.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A charming man.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jeor
text: jeor: I don't need him to be charming. I need him to turn this bunch of thieves and runaways into men of the Night's Watch.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And how's that going, Commander Mormont?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Slowly. A raven came for Ned Stark's son.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Good news or bad?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Both.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grand
text: grand: Lord Stark. I meant to give you this earlier. So forgetful these days. A raven from Winterfell this morning.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Good news? Perhaps you'd like to share it with your wife?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: My wife is in Winterfell.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Is she?

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I thought that she'd be safest in here. One of several such establishments I own.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You're a funny man. A very funny man.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Ned! [poking her head out of a window]

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The Starks... Quick tempers, slow minds.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grenn
text: grenn: You broke my nose, bastard!

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: It's an improvement.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grenn
text: grenn: If we threw you over the Wall, wonder how long it'd take you to hit.

title: Lord Snow
Name: pyp
text: pyp: I wonder if they'd find you before the wolves did.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grenn
text: grenn: What're you looking at, halfman?

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm looking at you. You've got an interesting face. Very distinctive faces. All of you.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rast
text: rast: What do you care about our faces?

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's just I think they would look marvelous decorating spikes in King's Landing. Perhaps I'll write my sister, the Queen, about it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: grenn
text: grenn: We'll talk later, Lord Snow.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: Everybody knew what this place was and no one told me. No one but you. My father knew and left me to rot here at the Wall all the same.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Grenn's father left him too... Outside a farmhouse when he was three. Pyp was caught stealing a wheel of cheese. His little sister hadn't eaten in three days. He was given a choice

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: They hate me because I'm better than they are.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's a lucky thing none of them were trained by a master-at-arms like your Ser Rodrik. I don't imagine any of them have ever held a real sword before they came here. Your brother Bran. He's woken up.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The mere suggestion that the Queen's brother tried to kill your boy would be considered treason.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: We have proof. We have the blade.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Which Lord Tyrion will say was stolen from him. The only man who could say otherwise has no throat, thanks to your boy's wolf.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Petyr has promised to help us find the truth. He's like a little brother to me. He would never betray my trust.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'll try to keep you alive, for her sake. A fool's task, admittedly, but I've never been able to refuse your wife anything.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I won't forget this. You're a true friend.

title: Lord Snow
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Don't tell anyone. I have a reputation to maintain.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: How could you be so stupid?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Calm down.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He's a child... 10 years old. What were you thinking?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I was thinking of us. You're a bit late to start complaining about it now. What has the boy told them?

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Nothing. He's said nothing. He remembers nothing.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Then what are you raving about?

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What if it comes back to him? If he tells his father what he saw...

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming. We'll say whatever we like. I think we can outfox a 10-year-old.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And my husband?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'll go to war with him if I have to. They can write a ballad about us

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Let me go.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Never.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The boy won't talk. And if he does, I'll kill him. Him, Ned Stark, the King... the whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I wish I could see the girls.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: It's too dangerous.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Just for a moment.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Until we know who our enemies are...

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters. In my bones, I know it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Littlefinger's right. I can't do anything without proof.

title: Lord Snow
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And if you find the proof?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Then I bring it to Robert... And hope he's still the man I once knew. You watch yourself on the road, huh? That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He still loves you.

title: Lord Snow
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Does he?

title: Lord Snow
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Off with you.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robert
text: robert: It's been a long time. But I still remember every face. You remember your first?

title: Lord Snow
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Of course, your Grace.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robert
text: robert: Who was it?

title: Lord Snow
Name: barristan
text: barristan: A Tyroshi. Never learned the name.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robert
text: robert: How'd you do it?

title: Lord Snow
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Lance through the heart.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robert
text: robert: Quick one. Lucky for you. Mine was some Tarly boy at the Battle of Summerhall. My horse took an arrow so I was on foot, slogging through the mud. He came running at me, this dumb high-born lad, thinking he could end the rebellion with the single swing of his sword. I knocked him down with the hammer. Gods, I was strong then. Caved in his breastplate. Probably shattered every rib he had. Stood over him, hammer in the air. Right before I brought it down he shouted, "Wait! Wait!"... They never tell you how they all shit themselves. They don't put that part in the songs. Stupid boy. Now the Tarlys bend the knee like everyone else. He could have lingered on the edge of the battle with the smart boys and today his wife would be making him miserable, his sons would be ingrates, and he'd be waking three times in the night to piss into a bowl. Wine! Lancel. Gods, what a stupid name. Lancel Lannister. Who named you? Some halfwit with a stutter? What are you doing?

title: Lord Snow
Name: lancel
text: lancel: It's empty, your Grace.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robert
text: robert: What do you mean it's empty?

title: Lord Snow
Name: lancel
text: lancel: There's no more wine.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robert
text: robert: Is that what empty means?! So get more. Tell your cousin to get in here. Kingslayer! Get in here. Surrounded by Lannisters. Every time I close my eyes I see their blond hair and their smug, satisfied faces. It must wound your pride, huh? Standing out there like a glorified sentry. Jaime Lannister, son of the mighty Tywin... Forced to mind the door while your King eats and drinks and shits and fucks. So come on. We're telling war stories. Who was your first kill, not counting old men?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: One of the outlaws in the Brotherhood.

title: Lord Snow
Name: barristan
text: barristan: I was there that day. You were only a squire, 16 years old.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You killed Simon Toyne with a counter riposte. Best move I ever saw.

title: Lord Snow
Name: barristan
text: barristan: A good fighter, Toyne, but he lacked stamina.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robert
text: robert: Your outlaw... Any last words?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I cut his head off, so no.

title: Lord Snow
Name: robert
text: robert: What about Aerys Targaryen? What did the Mad King say when you stabbed him in the back? I never asked. Did he call you a traitor? Did he plead for a reprieve?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He said the same thing he'd been saying for hours... "Burn them all." If that's all, your Grace...

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The Dothraki don't believe in money. Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: From whom?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: If you rule a city and you see the horde approaching, you have two choices

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Tell them all to stop.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You want the entire horde to stop? For how long?

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Until I command them otherwise.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You're learning to talk like a Queen.

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Not a Queen. A Khaleesi.

title: Lord Snow
Name: viserys
text: viserys: You dare! You give commands to me? To me? You do not command the dragon. I am Lord of the Seven Kingdoms. I don't take orders from savages or their sluts. Do you hear me?

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: Rakharo ask if you want him dead, Khaleesi.

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No!

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: Rakharo say you should take ear, to teach respect.

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Please please, don't hurt him. Tell him I don't want my brother harmed.

title: Lord Snow
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Kill these Dothraki dogs! I am your King!

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Shall we return to the Khalasar, Khaleesi?

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: You walk. [to Viserys]

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: I wanted to be here when you saw it for the first time. I'm leaving this morning.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: You're leaving?

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: I'm the First Ranger. My job is out there. There have been disturbing reports.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: What kind of reports?

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: The kind I don't want to believe.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: m ready. I won't let you down.

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: You're not going. You're no ranger, Jon.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: But I'm better than every...

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Better than no one! Here... A man gets what he earns, when he earns it. We'll speak when I return.

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: A bear's balls.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're joking?

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: And his brains and his guts, his lungs and his heart all fried in his own fat. When you're a hundred miles north of the Wall and you ate your last meal a week ago, you leave nothing for the wolves.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And how do a bear's balls taste?

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: A bit chewy. And what about you, my Lord? What's the strangest thing you've eaten?

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do Dornish girls count? So you roam the Seven Kingdoms, collaring pickpockets and horse thieves and bringing them here as eager recruits?

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: But it's not all of 'em's done bad things. Some of 'em's just poor lads looking for steady feed. Some of 'em's high-born lads looking for glory.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: They have a better chance finding feed than glory.

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: The Night's Watch is a joke to you, is it? Is that what we are, Lannister? An army of jesters in black?

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You don't have enough men to be an army and aside from Yoren here, none of you are particularly funny.

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: I hope we've provided you with some good stories to tell when you're back in King's Landing. But something to think about while you're drinking your wine down there, enjoying your brothels... Half the boys you've seen training will die north of the Wall. Might be a wilding's axe that gets them, might be sickness, might just be the cold. They die in pain. And they do it so plump little lords like you can enjoy their summer afternoons in peace and comfort.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do you think I'm plump? Listen, Benjen... May I call you Benjen?

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Call me what you like.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm not sure what I've done to offend you. I have great admiration for the Night's Watch. I've great admiration for you as First Ranger.

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: You know, my brother once told me that nothing someone says before the word "but" really counts.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But... I don't believe that giants and ghouls and White Walkers are lurking beyond the Wall. I believe that the only difference between us and the wildlings is that when the Wall went up, our ancestors happened to live on the right side of it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: You're right. The wildlings are no different from us. A little rougher maybe. But they're made of meat and bone. I know how to track them and I know how to kill them. It's not the wildlings giving me sleepless nights. You've never been north of the Wall, so don't tell me what's out there.

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Are you going below? Keep well, keep warm.

title: Lord Snow
Name: benjen
text: benjen: Enjoy the capital, brother.

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: I always do.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I think he's starting to like me. "Going below"?

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Into the tunnel and out the other side. He'll be north of the Wall for a month or two.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So you're heading down to King's Landing too.

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Day after tomorrow. I get about half of my recruits from their dungeons.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Let's share the road. I could use some decent company.

title: Lord Snow
Name: yoren
text: yoren: I travel a bit on the grubby side, my Lord.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Not this time. We'll be staying at the finest castles and inns. No one turns away a Lannister.

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: Yes, Khaleesi.

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What are you doing?

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: When was last time you bleed, Khaleesi? You change, Khaleesi. It's a blessing from the Great Stallion.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing, easier to handle. It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan. But a man in full plate... the arakh won't get through the steel. That's where the broadsword has the advantage. Designed for piercing plate.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: Dothraki don't wear steel dresses.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Armor.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: Armor. Armor make a man... Vroz?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Slow.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: Slow.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It's true, but it also keeps a man alive.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: My father taught me how to fight. He taught me that speed defeats size.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I've heard that your father was a famous warrior.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: He was bloodrider to Khal Bharbo. And your father, Jorah the Andal? He was a warrior also?

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He still is. A man of great honor. And I betrayed him.

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: The Khaleesi wants to eat something different tonight. Kill some rabbits.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: There are no rabbits.

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: Find some ducks, she likes ducks.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: Have you seen any ducks, woman? No rabbits, no ducks. Do you have eyes in your head? Do you?

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: Dog then. I have seen many dogs.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I don't think she wants to eat dog.

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: The Khaleesi have baby inside her. It is true. She does not bleed for two moons. Her belly start to swell.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: A blessing from the Great Stallion.

title: Lord Snow
Name: irri
text: irri: She does not want to eat horse.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I'll have the boys butcher a goat for supper. I need to ride to Qohor.

title: Lord Snow
Name: rhakaro
text: rhakaro: We ride for Vaes Dothrak.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Don't worry. I'll catch you. The horde's easy to find.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: Don't stand so still. It's harder to hit a moving target. Except for you. You move too much. I could just hold my sword out and let you do the work for me.

title: Lord Snow
Name: maester
text: maester: How many winters have you seen, Lord Tyrion?

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Eight... no, nine.

title: Lord Snow
Name: maester
text: maester: All of them brief?

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: They say the winter of my birth was three years long, Maester Aemon.

title: Lord Snow
Name: maester
text: maester: This summer has lasted nine. But reports from the Citadel tell us the days grow shorter. The Starks are always right eventually

title: Lord Snow
Name: jeor
text: jeor: We've been capturing wildlings, more every month. They're fleeing south. The ones who flee... say they've seen the White Walkers.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, and the fishermen of Lannisport say they see mermaids.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jeor
text: jeor: One of our own rangers swore he saw them kill his companions. He swore it right up to the moment Ned Stark chopped his head off.

title: Lord Snow
Name: maester
text: maester: The Night's Watch is the only thing standing between the realm and what lies beyond. And it has become an army of undisciplined boys and tired old men. There are less than a thousand of us now. We can't man the other castles on the Wall. We can't properly patrol the wilderness. We've barely enough resources to keep our lads armed and fed.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Your sister sits by the side of the King. Tell her we need help.

title: Lord Snow
Name: maester
text: maester: When winter does come, gods help us all if we're not ready.

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It's a boy.

title: Lord Snow
Name: khal
text: khal: How do you know?

title: Lord Snow
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I know.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's either me or this cold. And it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: Will you stop at Winterfell on your way South?

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I expect I will. Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: If you see my brother Bran, tell him I miss him. Tell him I'd visit if I could.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Of course.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: He'll never walk again.

title: Lord Snow
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple. Take care, Snow.

title: Lord Snow
Name: jon
text: jon: Farewell, My Lord.

title: Lord Snow
Name: syrio
text: syrio: You are late, boy. Tomorrow you will be here at midday.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: Who are you?

title: Lord Snow
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Your dancing master, Syrio Forel.

title: Lord Snow
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Tomorrow you will catch it. Now pick it up. That is not the way, boy. This is not a great sword that is needing two hands to swing it.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: It's too heavy.

title: Lord Snow
Name: syrio
text: syrio: It is heavy as it needs to be to make you strong. Just so. One hand is all that is needed. Now you are standing all wrong. Turn your body side-face. So. You are skinny. That is good. The target is smaller. Now the grip... Let me see. The grip must be delicate.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: What if I drop it?

title: Lord Snow
Name: syrio
text: syrio: The steel must be part of your arm. Can you drop part of your arm? No. Nine years Syrio Forel was first sword to the Sealord of Braavos. He knows these things. You must listen to me, boy.

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm a girl.

title: Lord Snow
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Boy, girl... You are a sword, that is all. That is the grip. You are not holding a battle-axe. You are holding...

title: Lord Snow
Name: arya
text: arya: A needle.

title: Lord Snow
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Ahhh… Just so. Now we will begin the dance. Remember, child, this is not the dance of the Westeros we are learning... The knight's dance, hacking and hammering. This is the Bravo's dance... The water dance. It is swift and sudden. All men are made of water, do you know this? If you pierce them, the water leaks out and they die. Now you will try to strike me.

title: Lord Snow
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Up! Dead. Dead. Very dead. Come. Again, faster.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: old
text: old: The little Lordo s been dreaming again.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: We have visitors.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: bran
text: bran: I don't want to see anyone.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: Really? If I was cooped up all day with no one but this old bat for company, I'd go mad. Anyway, you don't have a choice. Robb's waiting.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: bran
text: bran: I don't want to go.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: Neither do I. But Robb's Lord of Winterfell, which means I do what he says and you do what I say. Hodor! Help Bran down the hall.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I must say I received a slightly warmer welcome on my last visit.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: robb
text: robb: Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Any man of the Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: robb
text: robb: I'm not your boy, Lannister. I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Then you might learn a lordo s courtesy.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So it's true. Hello Bran. Do you remember anything about what happened?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: maester
text: maester: He has no memory of that day.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Curious.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: robb
text: robb: Why are you here?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Would your charming companion be so kind as to kneel? My neck is beginning to hurt.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: bran
text: bran: Kneel, Hodor.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do you like to ride, Bran?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: bran
text: bran: Yes. Well, I mean I did like to.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: maester
text: maester: The boy has lost the use of his legs.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What of it? With the right horse and saddle, even a cripple can ride.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: bran
text: bran: I'm not a cripple.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Then I'm not a dwarf. My father will rejoice to hear it. I have a gift for you. Give that to your saddler. He'll provide the rest. You must shape the horse to the rider. Start with a yearling and teach it to respond to the reins and to the boy's voice.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: bran
text: bran: Will I really be able to ride?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You will. On horseback you will be as tall as any of them.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: robb
text: robb: Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: robb
text: robb: You've done my brother a kindness. The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Spare me your false courtesies, Lord Stark. There's a brothel outside your walls. There I'll find a bed and both of us can sleep easier.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: Couldn't resist some northern ass? If you like redheads, ask for Ros.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Come to see me off, Greyjoy? Kind of you. Your master doesn't seem to like Lannisters.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: He's not my master.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, of course not. What happened here? Where is lady Stark? Why didn't she receive me?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: She wasn't feeling well.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She's not in Winterfell, is she? Where did she go?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: My lady's whereabouts...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My lady? Your loyalty to your captors is touching. Tell me, how do you think Balon Greyjoy would feel if he could see his only surviving son has turned lackey? I still remember seeing my father's fleet burn in Lannisport. I believe your uncles were responsible?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: Must have been a pretty sight.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Nothing prettier than watching sailors burn alive. Yes, a great victory for your people. Shame how it all turned out.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: We were outnumbered 10 to one.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A stupid rebellion then. I suppose your father realized that when your brothers died in battle. Now here you are, your enemy's squire.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: theon
text: theon: Careful, Imp.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I've offended you. Forgive me, it's been a rough morning. Anyway, don't despair. I'm a constant disappointment to my own father and I've learned to live with it. Your next tumble with Ros is on me. I'll try not to wear her out.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Leg, shoulder, leg. Left foot forward. Good. Now pivot as you deliver the stroke. Put all your weight behind it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: What in seven hells is that?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: pyp
text: pyp: They'll need an eighth hell to fit him in.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Tell them your name.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Samwell Tarly, of Horn Hill. I mean, I was of Horn Hill. I've come to take the black.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: rast
text: rast: Come to take the black pudding.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Well, you couldn't be any worse than you look. See what he can do.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: I yield. Please, no more.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: On your feet. Pick up your sword. Hit him till he finds his feet. It seems they've run short of poachers and thieves down south. Now they send us squealing bloody pigs. Again, harder.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Enough! He yielded.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Looks like the bastardo s in love. All right then, lord Snow, you wish to defend your lady love, let's make it an exercise. You two. Three of you ought to be sufficient to make lady piggy squeal. All you've got to do is get past the bastard.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Are you sure you want to do this?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: No. Yield yield yield! I yield.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: We're done for today. Go clean the armory. That's all you're good for.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Well fought!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Piss off.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Did he hurt you?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: I've had worse.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: You can call me Sam... If you want. My mother calls me Sam.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: It's not going to get any easier, you know? You'll have to defend yourself.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Why didn't you get up and fight?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: I wanted to. I just couldn't.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Why not?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: I'm a coward. My father always says so.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: The Wall's no place for cowards.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: You're right. I'm sorry. I just... Wanted to thank you.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: A bloody coward. People saw us talking to him. Now they'll think we're cowards too.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: pyp
text: pyp: You're too stupid to be a coward.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: You're too stupid to be a...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Quick now, before summer's over.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Come on here!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Vaes Dothrak. The city of the horselords.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: A pile of mud. Mud and shit and twigs - best these savages can do.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: These are my people now. You shouldn't call them savages.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: I'll call them what I like, because they're my people. This is my army. Khal Drogo is marching the wrong way with my army.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: If my brother was given an army of Dothraki, could you conquer the Seven Kingdoms?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The Dothraki have never crossed the Narrow Sea. They fear any water their horses can't drink.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: But if they did?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: King Robert is fool enough to meet them in open battle, but the men advising him are different.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And you know these men?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I fought beside them once, long ago. Now Ned Stark wants my head. He drove me from my land.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You sold slaves.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Aye.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Why?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I had no money and an expensive wife.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And where is she now?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: In another place, with another man.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Your Grace?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Yes, my dear?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: They call you the last dragon...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: They do.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: You have dragon's blood in your veins?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: It's entirely possible.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: What happened to the dragons? I was told that brave men killed them all.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: The brave men didn't kill dragons. The brave men rode them. Rode them from Valyria to build the greatest civilization this world has ever seen. The breath of the greatest dragon forged the Iron Throne, which the Usurper is keeping warm for me. The swords of the vanquished, a thousand of them... melted together like so many candles.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: I have always wanted to see a dragon. There is nothing in the world that I would rather see.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Really? Why dragons?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: They can fly. And wherever they are, just a few flaps of their wings and they're somewhere else... Far away. And they can kill. Anyone or anything that tries to hurt them gets burned away to nothing... melted... like so many candles. Seeing a dragon would make me very happy.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Well, after 15 years in a pleasure house, I imagine just seeing the sky makes you happy.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: I was not locked in. I have seen things.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: What have you seen?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: I've seen... A man from Asshai with a dagger of real dragonglass. I've seen a man who could change his face the way that other men change their clothes. And I've seen a pirate who wore his weight in gold and whose ship had sails of colored silk. So... Have you seen one?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: A pirate ship?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: A dragon.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: No, the last one died many years before I was born. I'll tell you what I have seen

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: What happened to the skulls?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: I don't know. The Usurper had them smashed to powder, I expect. Scattered to the wind.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: That's very sad.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Yes, it is. What did I buy you for? To make me sad?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: No, your Grace. To teach your sister.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: To teach my sister how to be a better lover? You think I bought you to make Khal Drogo happy? You pretty little idiot. Go on then. Get on with it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Someday your husband will sit there and you will sit by his side. And one day, before too long, you will present your son to the court. All the lords of Westeros will gather here to see the little prince...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What if I have a girl?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Gods be good, you'll have boys and girls and plenty of them.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What if I only have girls?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: I wouldn't worry about that.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Jeyne Poole's mother had five children, all of them girls.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Yes, but it's highly unlikely.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: But what if?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: If you only had girls, I suppose the throne would pass to Prince Joffrey's little brother.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And everyone would hate me.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Nobody could ever hate you.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Joffrey does.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Nonsense. Why would you say such a thing? That business with the wolves? I've told you a hundred times... A direwolf is not...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Please shut up about it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Do you remember your lessons? Who built the Iron Throne?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Aegon the Conqueror.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: And who built the Red Keep?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Maegor the Cruel.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: And how many years did it take to build...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: My grandfather and uncle were murdered here, weren't they?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: They were killed on the orders of King Aerys, yes.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: The Mad King.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Commonly known as the Mad King.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why were they killed?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: You should speak to your father about these matters.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I don't want to speak to my father, ever.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: You will find it in your heart to forgive your father.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, I won't.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: janos
text: janos: It's the Hando s tournament that's causing all this trouble, my Lords.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The King's tournament. I assure you the Hand wants no part of it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: janos
text: janos: Call it what you will, Lord Stark Ser, the city is packed with people and more flooding in every day. Last night we had a tavern riot, a brothel fire, three stabbings and a drunken horse race down the Street of Sisters.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: varys
text: varys: Dreadful.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: renly
text: renly: If you can't keep the King's peace, perhaps the City Watch should be commanded by someone who can.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: janos
text: janos: I need more men.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You'll get 50. Lord Baelish will see it paid for.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I will?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You found money for a champion's purse, you can find money to keep the peace. I'll also give you 20 of my household guards till the crowds have left.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: janos
text: janos: Thank you, my Lord Hand Ser. They will be put to good use.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The sooner this is over, the better.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: varys
text: varys: The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: And every inn in the city is full and the whores are walking bow-legged.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'm sure the tourney puts coins in many a pocket. Now... If there's nothing else, my Lords?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: This heat. On days like this, I envy you northerners your summer snows. Until tomorrow my Lord.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I've been hoping to talk to you about Jon Arryn.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: Lord Arryn? His death was a great sadness to all of us. I took personal charge of his care, but I could not save him. His sickness struck him very hard and very fast. I saw him in my chambers just the night before he passed. Lord Jon often came to me for counsel.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Why?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: I have been Grand Maester for many years. Kings and Hands have come to me for advice since...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What did Jon want the night before he died?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: He came inquiring after a book.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: A book? What book?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: I fear it would be of little interest to you, my Lord. A ponderous tome.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'd like to read it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: The lineages and histories of the great houses of the Seven Kingdoms, with descriptions of many high lords and noble ladies and their children.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Harkon Umber, first of his name, born to lord Hother Umber and lady Amaryllis Umber in the 183rd year after Aegon's landing, at the last hearth. Blue of eye, brown of hair and fair complected, died in his 14th year of a wound sustained

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: As I said, my Lord, a ponderous read.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Did Jon Arryn tell you what he wanted with it?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: He did not, my Lord. And I did not presume to ask.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Jon's death...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: Such a tragedy.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Did he say anything to you during his final hours?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: Nothing of import, my Lord. There was one phrase he kept repeating

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The seed is strong"? What does that mean?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: The dying mind is a demented mind, Lord Stark. For all the weight they're given, last words are usually as significant as first words.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And you're quite certain he died of a natural illness?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: What else could it be?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Poison.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: A disturbing thought. I don't think it likely. The Hand was loved by all. What sort of man would dare...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I've heard it said that poison is a woman's weapon.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: Yes. Women, cravens... and eunuchs. Did you know that lord Varys is a eunuch?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Everybody knows that.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: Yes, yes, of course. How that sort of person found himself on the King's Council, I will never know.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I've taken enough of your time.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grand
text: grand: No trouble at all, my Lord. It's a great honor...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Thank you. I'll find my own way out.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: arya
text: arya: Syrio says a water dancer can stand on one toe for hours.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: It's a hard fall down these steps.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: arya
text: arya: Syrio says every hurt is a lesson and every lesson makes you better. Tomorrow I'm going to be chasing cats.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Cats? Syrio says…

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: arya
text: arya: He says every swordsman should study cats. They're quiet as shadows and as light as feathers. You have to be quick to catch them.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He's right about that.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: arya
text: arya: Now that Bran's awake will he come live with us?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He needs to get his strength back first.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: arya
text: arya: He wants to be a knight of the King's Guard. He can't be one now, can he?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: No. But someday he could be Lord of a holdfast or sit on the King's Council. Or he might raise castles like Brandon the Builder.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: arya
text: arya: Can I be Lord of a holdfast?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You will marry a high Lord and rule his castle. And your sons shall be knights and princes and lords.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: arya
text: arya: No. That's not me.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Hello. Ser Alliser said I'm to be your new watch partner. I should warn you, I don't see all that well.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Come stand by the fire. It's warmer.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: No, that's all right. I'm fine.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: You're not. You're freezing.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: I don't like high places.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: You can't fight. You can't see. You're afraid of heights and almost everything else probably. What are you doing here, Sam?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: On the morning of my 18th nameday, my father came to me. "You're almost a man now," he said, "but you're not worthy of my land and title. Tomorrow, you're going to take the black, forsake all claim to your inheritance and start north. If you do not," he said, "then we'll have a hunt and somewhere in these woods your horse will stumble and you'll be thrown from your saddle to die. Or so I'll tell your mother. Nothing would please me more." Ser Alliser's going to make me fight again tomorrow, isn't he?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Yes, he is.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: I'm not going to get any better, you know?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Well… You can't get any worse.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I hear you're reading a boring book.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Pycelle talks too much.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: He never stops. Do you know Ser Hugh of the Vale? Not surprising. Until recently, he was only a squire... Jon Arryn's squire. He was knighted almost immediately after his master's untimely death.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Knighted for what? Why are you telling me this?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I promised Cat that I'd help you.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Where is Ser Hugh? I'll speak to him.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: A singularly bad idea. Do you see that boy there? One of Varys's little birds. The Spider has taken a great interest in your comings and goings. Now look there. That one belongs to the Queen. And do you see that Septa pretending to read her book?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Varys or the Queen?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No. She's one of mine. Is there someone in your service whom you trust completely?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Yes.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The wiser answer was no, my Lord. Get a message to this paragon of yours... Discreetly. Send him to question Ser Hugh. After that, you might want him to visit a certain armorer in the city. He lives in a large house at the top of the street of Steel.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I have my observers, as I said, and it's possible that they saw Lord Arryn visit this armorer several times in the weeks before his death.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Lord Baelish, perhaps I was wrong to distrust you.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Distrusting me was the wisest thing you've done since you climbed off your horse.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: Ser Hugh? Ser Hugh!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: hugh
text: hugh: As you can see, I'm busy.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: I'm here on behalf of Lord Eddard Stark, the Hand of the king. I'm the captain of his guard.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: hugh
text: hugh: I'm sorry. I didn't catch your name, Ser...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: No "ser." I'm not a knight.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: hugh
text: hugh: I see. Well, it just so happens that I am.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: He said he'd be glad to talk to the Hand himself. He's a knight, you see.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: A knight. They strut around like roosters down here. Even the ones who've never seen an arrow coming their way.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: You shouldn't be out here, my Lord. There's no telling who has eyes where.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Let them look.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tobho
text: tobho: The former Hand did call on me, my Lord, several times. I regret to say he did not honor me with his patronage.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What did Lord Arryn want?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tobho
text: tobho: He always came to see the boy.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'd like to see him as well.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tobho
text: tobho: As you wish, my Lord. Gendry! Here he is. Strong for his age. He works hard. Show the Hand the helmet you made, lad.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: This is fine work.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: gendry
text: gendry: It's not for sale.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tobho
text: tobho: Boy, this is the King's Hand! If his lordship wants the helmet...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I made it for me.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tobho
text: tobho: Forgive him, my Lord.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: There's nothing to forgive. When Lord Arryn came to visit you, what would you talk about?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: gendry
text: gendry: He just asked me questions is all, my Lord.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What kind of questions?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: gendry
text: gendry: About my work at first, if I was being treated well, if I liked it here. But then he started asking me about my mother.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your mother?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Who she was, what she looked like.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What did you tell him?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: gendry
text: gendry: She died when I was little. She had yellow hair. She'd sing to me sometimes.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Look at me. Get back to work, lad. If the day ever comes when that boy'd rather wield a sword than forge one, you send him to me.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: Find anything?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: King Robert's bastard son.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: This is for the King from Lord Stark.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Listen. Do you hear them? How many do you think are in there with him? Guess.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: Three? Four?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He likes to do this when I'm on duty... He makes me listen as he insults my sister.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: Forgive me, my Lord...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Why do I have to forgive you? Have you wronged me?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: We've met before, you know.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Have we? Strange, I've forgotten.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: The siege of Pyke. We fought side by side one afternoon.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: That's where you got your scar?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: Aye. One of the Greyjoys nearly took my eye.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Vicious sons of whores.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: They like their bloodshed.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They stopped liking it at the end. That was a proper battle. D'you remember Thoros of Myr charging through the breach?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: With his burning sword? I'll remember that till the day I die.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I saw the youngest of the Greyjoy lads at Winterfell. It was like seeing a shark on a mountaintop.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: Theon? He's a good lad.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I doubt it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: robert
text: robert: I'll bet you smell of blackberry jam! Let me smell it. Come here.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: Can I leave this with you? The message from Lord Stark.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I don't serve Lord Stark.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Where have you been?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Watch duty. With Sam.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Prince Porkchop. Where is he?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: He wasn't hungry.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Impossible!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: That's enough. Sam's no different from the rest of us. There was no place for him in the world, so he's come here. We're not going to hurt him in the training yard anymore. Never again, no matter what Thorne says. He's our brother now and we're going to protect him.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: rast
text: rast: You are in love, Lord Snow. You girls can do as you please. But if Thorne puts me up against Lady Piggy, I'm gonna slice me off a side of bacon.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: No one touches Sam.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: What are you waiting for? Attack him! You, get in there.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Hit me. Go on, hit me! I yield! Yield yield. I yield.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: You think this is funny, do you? When you're out there beyond the Wall with the sun going down, do you want a man at your back? Or a sniveling boy?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: You send this whore to give me commands? I should have sent you back her head!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Forgive me, Khaleesi. I did as you asked.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Hush now. It's all right. Irri, take her and leave us.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: irri
text: irri: Yes, Khaleesi.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Why did you hit her?!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: How many times do I have to tell you? You do not command me.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I wasn't commanding you. I just wanted to invite you to supper.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: What's this?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It's a gift. I had it made for you.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Dothraki rags? Are you going to dress me now?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Please.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: This stinks of manure. All of it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Stop - stop it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: You would turn me into one of them, wouldn't you? Next you'll want to braid my hair.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You've no right to a braid. You've won no victories yet.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: You do not talk back to me!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: viserys
text: viserys: You are a horselordo s slut. And now you've woken the dragon...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I am a Khaleesi of the Dothraki! I am the wife of the great Khal and I carry his son inside me. The next time you raise a hand to me will be the last time you have hands.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: I know for a fact that some of the officers go to that brothel in Mole's Town.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: I wouldn't doubt it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Don't you think it's a little bit unfair? Making us take our vows while they sneak off for a little sally on the side?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Sally on the side?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: It's silly, isn't it? What, we can't defend the Wall unless we're celibate? It's absurd.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: I didn't think you'd be so upset about it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Why not? Because I'm fat? But I like girls just as much as you do. They might not like me as much. I've never... been with one. You've probably had hundreds.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: As a matter of fact, I'm the same as you.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: I find that hard to believe.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: I came very close once. I was alone in a room with a naked girl, but...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: You didn't know where to put it?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: I know where to put it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Was she... Old and ugly?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Young and gorgeous. A whore named Ros.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: What color hair?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Red.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: I like red hair. And her... Her...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: You don't want to know.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: That good?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: Better.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Oh no. So why exactly did you not make love to Ros with the perfect...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: What's my name?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Jon Snow?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: And why is my surname Snow?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: Because... You're a bastard from the north.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: I never met my mother. My father wouldn't even tell me her name. I don't know if she's living or dead. I don't know if she's a noblewoman or a fisherman's wife... Or a whore. So I sat there in the brothel as Ros took off her clothes. But I couldn't do it. Because all I could think was what if I got her pregnant and she had a child, another bastard named Snow? It's not a good life for a child.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: So... You didn't know where to put it?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Enjoying yourselves? You look cold, boys.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sam
text: sam: It is a bit nippy.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: A bit nippy, yeah, by the fire, indoors. It's still summer. Do you boys even remember the last winter? How long has it been now? What, 10 years? I remember. Was it uncomfortable at Winterfell? Were there days when you just couldn't get warm, never mind how many fires your servants built?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jon
text: jon: I build my own fires.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: alliser
text: alliser: That's admirable. I spent six months out there, beyond the Wall during the last winter. It was supposed to be a two-week mission. We heard a rumor Mance Rayder was planning to attack Eastwatch. So we went out to look for some of his men... Capture them, gather some knowledge. The Wildlings who fight for Mance Rayder are hard men. Harder than you'll ever be. They know their country better than we do. They knew there was a storm coming in. So they hid in their caves and waited for it to pass. And we got caught in the open. Wind so strong it yanked 100-foot trees straight from the ground, roots and all. If you took your gloves off to find your cock to have a piss, you lost a finger to the frost. And all in darkness. You don't know cold. Neither of you do. The horses died first. We didn't have enough to feed them, to keep them warm. Eating the horses was easy. But later when we started to fall... That wasn't easy. We should have had a couple of boys like you along, shouldn't we? Soft, fat boys like you. We'd have lasted a fortnight on you and still had bones leftover for soup. Soon we'll have new recruits and you lot will be passed along to the Lord Commander for assignment and they will call you men of the Night's Watch, but you'd be fools to believe it. You're boys still. And come the winter you will die... Like flies.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I hit him. I hit the dragon.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Your brother Rhaegar was the last dragon. Viserys is less than the shadow of a snake.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He is still the true King.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The truth now

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No. But the common people are waiting for him. Illyrio said they're sewing dragon banners and praying for his return.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The common people pray for rain, health and a summer that never ends. They don't care what games the high Lords play.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What do you pray for, Ser Jorah?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Home.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I pray for home too. My brother will never take back the Seven Kingdoms. He couldn't lead an army even if my husband gave him one. He'll never take us home.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Lover's quarrel?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm sorry. Do I...?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Sansa dear, this is Lord Baelish. He's known...

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: An old friend of the family. I've known your mother a long long time.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: arya
text: arya: Why do they call you Littlefinger?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Arya!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: septa
text: septa: Don't be rude!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No, it's quite all right. When I was a child I was very small and I come from a little spit of land called The Fingers, so you see, it's an exceedingly clever nickname.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: robert
text: robert: I've been sitting here for days! Start the damn joust before I piss myself!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Gods, who is that?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Ser Gregor Clegane. They call him the Mountain. The Houndo s older brother.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And his opponent?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Ser Hugh of the Vale. He was Jon Arryn's squire. Look how far he's come.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: robert
text: robert: Yes, yes. Enough of the bloody pomp. Have at it!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Not what you were expecting? Has anyone ever told you the story of the Mountain and the Hound? Lovely little tale of brotherly love. The Hound was just a pup, six years old maybe. Gregor a few years older, already a big lad, already getting a bit of a reputation. Some lucky boys just born with a talent for violence. One evening... Gregor found his little brother playing with a toy by the fire... Gregor's toy, a wooden knight. Gregor never said a word, he just grabbed his brother by the scruff of his neck and shoved his face into the burning coals. Held him there while the boy screamed, while his face melted. There aren't very many people who know that story.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I won't tell anyone. I promise.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No, please don't. If the Hound so much as heard you mention it, I'm afraid all the knights in King's Landing would not be able to save you.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: jory
text: jory: My Lord, Her Grace the Queen.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your Grace.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're missing your tournament.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Putting my name on it doesn't make it mine.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I thought we might put what happened on the Kingsroad behind us – the ugliness with the wolves. And forcing you to kill the beast was extreme. Though sometimes we go to extremes where our children are concerned. How is Sansa?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: She likes it here.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The only Stark who does. Favors her mother, not much of the north in her.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What are you doing here?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I might ask the same of you. What is it you hope to accomplish?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The King called on me to serve him and the realm, and that's what I'll do until he tells me otherwise.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You can't change him. You can't help him. He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done. You'll try your best to pick up the pieces.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: If that's my job, then so be it.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're just a soldier, aren't you? You take your orders and you carry on. I suppose it makes sense. Your older brother was trained to lead and you were trained to follow.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I was also trained to kill my enemies, Your Grace.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: cersei
text: cersei: As was I.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: marillion
