text: marillion: Seven blessings to you, goodfolk!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And to you.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: rodrick
text: rodrick: Boy! Bread, meat and beer, quickly.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: marillion
text: marillion: Good idea, grandfather. I'm starving. A song while we wait or?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: rodrick
text: rodrick: I'd rather throw myself down a well.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: marillion
text: marillion: Grandfather, may be your last chance if you're heading north. The only music the northerners know is the howling of wolves!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: masha
text: masha: I'm sorry, my Lord, we're full up. Every room.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My men can sleep in the stable. As for myself, I don't require a large room.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: masha
text: masha: Truly, my lord, we have nothing.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Is there nothing I can do... to remedy this?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You can have my room.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There's a clever man. You can manage food, I trust? Yoren, dine with me.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Aye, my Lord.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: marillion
text: marillion: My Lord of Lannister! Might I entertain you while you eat? I can sing of your father's victory at King's Landing!

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Nothing would more likely ruin my supper. Lady Stark! What an unexpected pleasure. I was sorry to have missed you at Winterfell.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: masha
text: masha: Lady Stark.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I was still Catelyn Tully the last time I stayed here. You, Ser... Is that the black bat of Harrenhal I see embroidered on your coat?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: knight
text: knight: It is, my Lady.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And is Lady Whent a true and honest friend to my father... Lord Hoster Tully of Riverrun?

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: knight
text: knight: She is.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: The red stallion was always a welcome sight at Riverrun. My father counts Jonas Bracken amongst his oldest and most loyal bannermen.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: knight
text: knight: Our lord is honored by his trust.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I envy your father all his fine friends, but I don't quite see the purpose of this.

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Knight of House Frey

title: Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: This man... Came into my house as a guest and there conspired to murder my son, a boy of 10. In the name of King Robert and the good Lords you serve, I call upon you to seize him and help me return him to Winterfell to await the king's justice.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Does Ser Hugh have any family in the capital?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: barristan
text: barristan: No. I stood vigil for him myself last night. He had no one else.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He'd never worn this armor before.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Bad luck for him... Going against the Mountain.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Who determines the draw?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: barristan
text: barristan: All the knights draw straws, Lord Stark.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Aye... But who holds the straws? You've done good work, Sisters.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Life is strange. Not so many years ago we fought as enemies at the Trident.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'm glad we never met on the field, Ser Barristan... as is my wife. I don't think the widow's life would suit her.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: barristan
text: barristan: You're too modest. I've seen you cut down a dozen great knights.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: My father once told me you were the best he'd ever seen. I never knew the man to be wrong about matters of combat.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: barristan
text: barristan: He was a fine man, your father. What the Mad King did to him was a terrible crime.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And that lad... He was a squire until a few months ago. How could he afford a new suit of armor?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Perhaps Lord Arryn left him some money? I hear the King wants to joust today.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Yes. That will never happen.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Robert tends to do what he wants.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: If the King got what he wanted all the time, we'd still be fighting a damned rebellion.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lancel
text: lancel: It's made too small, Your Grace. It won't go.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Your mother was a dumb whore with a fat arse. Did you know that? Look at this idiot! One ball and no brains. He can't even put a man's armor on him properly.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You're too fat for your armor.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Fat? Fat, is it? Is that how you speak to your King? That was funny, is it?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Oh, it's funny, is it?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lancel
text: lancel: No, Your Grace.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: No? You don't like the Hando s joke?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You're torturing the poor boy.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: You heard the Hand. The King's too fat for his armor! Go find the breastplate stretcher, now!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The breastplate stretcher?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: How long before he figures it out?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Maybe you should have one invented.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: All right, all right. But you watch me out there. I still know how to point a lance.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You have no business jousting. Leave that for the young men.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Why? Because I'm king? Piss on that. I want to hit somebody!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And who's going to hit you back?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Anybody who can. And the last man in his saddle... will be you!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: There's not a man in the Seven Kingdoms would risk hurting you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Are you telling me those cowards would let me win?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Aye.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Drink.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'm not thirsty.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Drink. Your King commands it. Gods! Too fat for my armor.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your squire... A Lannister boy?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Hmm... A bloody idiot... But Cersei insisted. I have Jon Arryn to thank for her. "Cersei Lannister will make a good match", he told me. "You'll need her father on your side." I thought being King meant I could do whatever I wanted. Enough of this! Let's go watch 'em ride. At least I can smell someone else's blood.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Robert?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: What? Oh! An inspiring sight for the people, eh? Come! Bow before your King! Bow, you shits!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Where's Arya

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: sansa
text: sansa: At her dancing lessons. The Knight of the Flowers.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Thank you, Ser Loras.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Don't let Ser Gregor hurt him.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Hey.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I can't watch.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: 100 gold dragons on the Mountain.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: I'll take that bet.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Now what will I buy with 100 gold dragons? A dozen barrels of Dornish wine? Or a girl from the pleasure houses of Lys?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Or you could even buy a friend.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's going to die.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Ser Loras rides well.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Such a shame, Littlefinger. It would have been so nice for you to have a friend.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: And tell me, Lord Renly, when will you be having your friend?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Loras knew his mare was in heat. Quite crafty, really.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Ser Loras would never do that! There's no honor in tricks.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No honor but quite a bit of gold.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Stop this madness in the name of your King!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: I owe you my life, Ser.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I'm no Ser.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Remove his hood.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: marillion
text: marillion: On that eve, the captive Imp down-wards from his horse did limp, no more would he preen and primp, in garb of red and gold.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: This isn't the Kingsroad. You said we were riding for Winterfell.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I did... often and loudly.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Very wise. They'll be out in droves, looking for me in the wrong place. Wordo s probably gotten to my father by now. He'll be offering a handsome reward. Everyone knows a Lannister always pays his debts. Would you be so good as to untie me?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And why would I do that?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why not? Am I going to run? The hill tribes would kill me for my boots. Unless a Shadowcat ate me first.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Shadowcats and hill tribes are the least of your concerns.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Ah... the Eastern Road. We're going to The Vale. You're taking me to your sister's to answer for my imagined crimes. Tell me, Lady Stark. When was the last time you saw your sister?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Five years ago.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She's changed. She was always a bit touched, but now... you might as well kill me here.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I am not a murderer, Lannister.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Neither am I! I had nothing to do with the attempt on your son's life!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: The dagger found

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What sort of imbecile arms an assassin with his own blade?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik: Should I gag him?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why? Am I starting to make sense?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik: My Lady, this way.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Untie me. If I die, what's the point?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Rodrik?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik: I'll be fine, my Lady. There's no need to bloody yourself.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Your first? You need a woman. Nothing like a woman after a fight.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, I'm willing if she is.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Bran...

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: The Iron Islands. Sigil - a Kraken. Words - "We do not sow".

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Lords?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: The Greyjoys.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: Famed for their skills at archery, navigation and lovemaking.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: And failed rebellions.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Sigil - a stag. - A crowned stag now that Robert's King.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Good.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Words - "Ours is the fury". Lords - the Baratheons.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: The Westerlands - sigil - a lion.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Hmm...

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Words - "A Lannister always pays his debts."

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: No. A common saying, but not their official motto.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Lords - the Lannisters.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: We're still on their words.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: I don't know them.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: You do know them. Think.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Unbowed, unbent, unbroken".

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: That's House Martell.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Righteous in wrath".

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: House Hornwood.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Family, duty, honor".

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Those are Tully words... Your mother's. Are we playing a game?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Family, duty, honor"... Is that the right order?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: You know it is.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Family comes first?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Your mother had to leave Winterfell to protect the family.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: How can she protect the family, if she's not with her family?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Your mother sat by your bed for three weeks while you slept.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: And then she left!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: When you were born, I was the one who pulled you from your mother. I placed you in her arms. From that moment until the moment she dies, she will love you. Absolutely. Fiercely.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Why did she leave?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: I still can't tell you, but she will be home soon.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Do you know where she is now? Today?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: No, I don't.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Then how can you promise me she'll be home soon?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Sometimes I worry you're too smart for your own good.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: I'll never shoot another arrow.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: And where is that written?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: You need legs to work a bow.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Hmm... If the saddle Lord Tyrion designed actually works, you could learn to shoot a bow from horseback.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bran
text: bran: Really?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: maester
text: maester: Dothraki boys learn when they're four years old. Why shouldn't you?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: Shh... Keep it down. You're not supposed to be inside the castle walls.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: I thought you were supposed to be an important person around here.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: Important enough for the likes of you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: You're not the only nobleman in my life, you know.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: Who? the Imp? I'd call him half a nobleman.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: Jealous?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: Why should I be jealous?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: Anyone with a few coppers in his pocket can own you for the night. What's a dwarf like down below? I've always wondered.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: Might surprise you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: Hmm?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: He's good with his fingers too. And his tongue.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: Generous tipper. I guess gold is cheap for a Lannister.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: You are jealous.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm a Greyjoy. We've been Lords of the Iron Islands for 300 years. There's not a family in Westeros that can look down on us, not even the Lannisters.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: And what about the Starks?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: I've been Lord Stark's ward since I was eight years old.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: A “ward”, that's a nice word for it. Your father rebelled against King Robert and if he does it again…

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: My father fought for the freedom of his people! What did your father do? Fucked a cook and whelped a whore.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: You're a very serious boy.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm not a boy.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: Oh, yes you are. A serious boy, with a serious cock.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: theon
text: theon: I don't want to pay for it.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: ros
text: ros: Then get yourself a wife.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: Come on. I'm not gonna hurt you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: How is your son, my Lord?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He'll never walk again.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: But his mind is sound?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: So they say.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I've been in the capital a month. Why have you waited so long to tell me this?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: I didn't trust you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: So why do you trust me now?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What sort of doom does the King face?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Who gave it to him?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The squire, Ser Hugh?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: If Ser Hugh poisoned him, who paid Ser Hugh?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Someone who could afford it.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Jon was a man of peace. He was Hand for 17 years -- 17 good years. Why kill him?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: He started asking questions.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: He's found one bastard already. He has the book. The rest will come.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: And when he knows the truth, what will he do?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: The gods alone know. The fools tried to kill his son. What's worse, they botched it. The wolf and the lion will be at each other's throats. We will be at war soon, my friend.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: What good is war now? We're not ready. If one Hand can die, why not a second?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: This Hand is not the other.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: We need time. Khal Drogo will not make his move until his son is born. You know how these savages are.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Delay," you say. "Move fast, " I reply. This is no longer a game for two players.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: illyrio
text: illyrio: It never was.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You do move quietly.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: We all have our qualities.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You look a bit lonely today. You should pay a visit to my brothel this evening. First boy is on the house.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Am I? All those birds that whisper in your ear, such pretty little things. Trust me, we accommodate all inclinations.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Oh, I'm sure. Lord Redwyne likes his boys very young, I hear.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'm a purveyor of beauty and discretion, both equally important.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: All desires are valid to a man with a full purse.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Strictly speaking, such a thing would not be in accordance with the King's laws.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Strictly speaking.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Tell me. Does someone, somewhere, keep your balls in a little box? I've often wondered.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Since you last saw me or since I last saw you?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Saw me with your own eyes?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Eyes I own.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Council business. We all have so much to discuss with Ned Stark.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: One shudders at the thought.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Oh.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: But you know something? I do believe that I have seen you even more recently than you have seen me.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Have you?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Yes. Earlier today, I distinctly recall seeing you talking to Lord Stark in his chambers.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Was that you under the bed?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: And not long after that when I saw you escorting a certain foreign dignitary... Council business? Of course you would have friends from across The Narrow Sea. You're from there yourself, after all. We're friends, aren't we, Lord Varys? I'd like to think we are. So you can imagine my burden, wondering if the King might question my friendo s sympathies… To stand at a crossroads where turning left means loyalty to a friend, turning right, loyalty to the realm.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Oh, please.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: To find myself in a position where a simple word to the King --

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: What are you two conspiring about? Well, whatever it is, you'd best hurry up. My brother is coming.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: To a small council meeting?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Disturbing news from far away. Haven't you heard?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: guard
text: guard: Off with you. No begging.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm not a beggar. I live here.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: guard
text: guard: D'you want a smack on your ear to help you with your hearing?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: I want to see my father.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: guard
text: guard: I want to fuck the Queen, for all the good it does me.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: guard
text: guard: You want your father, boy? He's lying on the floor of some tavern, getting pissed on by his friends.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: My father is Hand of the King! I'm not a boy. I'm Arya Stark of Winterfell and if you lay a hand on me, my father will have both your heads on spikes! Now are you going to let me by or do I need to smack you on the ear to help with your hearing?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You know I had half my guard out searching for you? You promised me this would stop.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: They said they were going to kill you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Who did?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: I didn't see them, but I think one was fat.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Oh, Arya.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm not lying! They said you found the bastard and the wolves are fighting the lions and the savage... something about the savage.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Where did you hear this?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: In the dungeons, near the dragon skulls.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What were you doing in the dungeons?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: Chasing a cat.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: Pardon, my Lord. There's a Night's Watchman here begging a word. He says it's urgent.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your name, friend?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Yoren, if it please. This must be your son. He has the look.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm a girl!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Did Benjen send you?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: yoren
text: yoren: No one sent me, my Lord. I'm here to find men for The Wall, see if there's any scum in the dungeons that might be fit for service.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Ah, we'll find recruits for you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Thank you, my Lord. But that's not why I disturb you now. Your brother, Benjen... his blood runs black, makes him as much my brother as yours. It's for his sake I rode here so hard I damn near killed my horse! There are others riding too. The whole city will know by tomorrow.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Know what?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Best said in private, my Lord.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Go on. We'll talk more later.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Jory, take her safely to her room.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: Come along, my Lady. You heard your father.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: How many guards does my father have?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: Here in King's Landing? Fifty.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: arya
text: arya: You wouldn't let anyone kill him, would you?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: No fear on that count, little Lady.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Well?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: yoren
text: yoren: It's about your wife, my Lord. She's taken the Imp.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: vardis
text: vardis: You're far from home, Lady Stark.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: To whom do I speak?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: vardis
text: vardis: Ser Vardis Egen, Knight of The Vale. Is Lady Arryn expecting your visit?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: There was no time to send word.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: vardis
text: vardis: May I ask, my Lady, why he is with you?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: That's why there was no time. He is my prisoner.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: vardis
text: vardis: He doesn't look like a prisoner.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: My sister will decide what he looks like.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: vardis
text: vardis: Yes, my Lady. She will at that.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Eyrie. They say it's impregnable.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Give me 10 good men and some climbing spikes... I'll impregnate the bitch.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I like you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: steward
text: steward: Lord Stark, your presence has been requested in the small council chamber. A meeting has been called.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I need to see the King first -- alone.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: steward
text: steward: The King is at the small council meeting, my Lord. He has summoned you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Is it about my wife?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: steward
text: steward: No, my Lord. I believe it concerns Daenerys Targaryen.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: The whore is pregnant.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You're speaking of murdering a child.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: I warned you this would happen. Back in the North, I warned you, but you didn't care to hear. Well, hear it now. I want 'em dead, mother and child both. And that fool, Viserys as well. Is that plain enough for you? I want them both dead.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Honor?! I've got Seven Kingdoms to rule! One King, Seven Kingdoms. Do you think honor keeps them in line? Do you think it's honor that's keeping the peace? It's fear! Fear and blood!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Then we're no better than the Mad King.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Careful, Ned. Careful now.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You want to assassinate a girl... Because the Spider heard a rumor?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Based on whose information?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Mormont? You bring us the whispers of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor. Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land. We commit murder on the word of this man?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: And if he's right? If she has a son? A Targaryen at the head of a Dothraki army… What then?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The Narrow Sea still lies between us. I'll fear the Dothraki the day they teach their horses to run on water.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Do nothing? That's your wise advice? Do nothing til our enemies are on our shores? You're my council? Counsel! Speak sense to this honorable fool.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: varys
text: varys: I understand your misgivings, my Lord. Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing we must consider, a vile thing. Yet, we who presume to rule must sometimes do vile things for the good of the realm. Should the gods grant Daenerys a son, the realm will bleed.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: grand
text: grand: I bear this girl no ill will, but should the Dothraki invade, how many innocents will die? How many towns will burn? Is it not wiser, kinder even, that she should die now so that tens of thousands might live?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: We should have had them both killed years ago.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, best close your eyes, get it over with. Cut her throat. Be done with it.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I followed you into war - twice, without doubts, without second thoughts. But I will not follow you now. The Robert I grew up with didn't tremble at the shadow of an unborn child.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: She dies.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I will have no part in it.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: You're the King's Hand, Lord Stark. You'll do as I command or I'll find me a Hand who will.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And good luck to him. I thought you were a better man.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Out! Out, damn you! I'm done with you. Go! Run back to Winterfell! I'll have your head on a spike! I'll put it there myself, you fool! You think you're too good for this? Too proud and honorable? This is a war!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'll go ahead with my daughters. Get them ready. Do it yourself. Don't ask anyone for help.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: Right away, my Lord. Lord Baelish is here for you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: His Grace went on about you at some length after you took your leave. The word "treason" was mentioned.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What can I do for you?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: When do you return to Winterfell?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Why? What do you care?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: If you're still here come nightfall, I'll take you to see the last person Jon Arryn spoke with before falling ill. If that sort of thing still interests you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I don't have the time.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: It won't take more than an hour. But as you please.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Round up all the men we have and station them outside the girls' chambers. Who are your best two swords?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: Heward and Wyl.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Find them and meet me at the stables.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lysa
text: lysa: You bring him here without permission? You pollute my home with his presence? Your aunt has done a bad thing, Robin, a very bad thing. You remember her, don't you? Isn't he beautiful? And strong too. Jon knew it. His last words were, "the seed is strong." He wanted everyone to know what a good, strong boy his son would grow up to be. Look at him, the Lord of all the Vale.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Lysa, you wrote me about the Lannisters, warning me t-

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lysa
text: lysa: To stay away from them! Not to bring one here!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robin
text: robin: Mommy? Is that the bad man?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lysa
text: lysa: It is.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robin
text: robin: He's little.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lysa
text: lysa: He's Tyrion the Imp of House Lannister. He killed your father. He murdered the Hand of the King!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh? Did I kill him too? I've been a very busy man.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lysa
text: lysa: You will watch your tongue! These men are Knights of the Vale. Every one of the loved Jon Arryn. Every one of them would die for me.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If any harm comes to me, my brother, Jaime, will see that they do.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robin
text: robin: You can't hurt us! No one can hurt us here! Tell him, mommy! Tell him!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Shh... Shh... Shh, my sweet boy. He's just trying to frighten us. Lannisters are all liars. No one will hurt my baby.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robin
text: robin: Mommy... I want to see the bad man fly.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Perhaps you will, my little love.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: This man is my prisoner. I will not have him harmed.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Ser Vardis, my sister's guest is weary. Take him down below so he can rest. Introduce him to Mord.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: mord
text: mord: You go sleep, dwarf man. Sleep good, little dwarf. man!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Lord Stark's lucky he still has a head.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Robert will rant for a few days, but he won't do anything. He adores the man.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: You're jealous.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Are you sure this won't hurt?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Only if I slip.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: And you prefer me like this?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Mhmm.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: If you want hairless, maybe you should find a little boy.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: I want you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: My brother thinks that anyone who hasn't been to war isn't a man. He treats me as if I'm a spoiled child. Oh, and you're not? Loras Tyrell, the Knight of the Flowers? How many wars have you fought in? Oh, and how much did your father spend on that armor of yours?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Hold still.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: All I ever hear from Robert and Stannis is how I'm not tough enough, how I squirm at the sight of blood.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: You did vomit when that boy's eye was knocked out in the mêlée.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: His eye was dangling out of the damn socket!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: He shouldn't have entered the mêlée if he didn't know how to fight.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Easy for you to say. Not everyone is such a gifted swordsman.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: It's not a gift. No one gave it to me. I'm good because I work at it -- every day of my life since I could hold a stick.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: I could work at fighting all day, every day, and still never be as good as you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Yes well, I guess we'll never know.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Everywhere?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Everywhere. So how did it end up? The Targaryen girl will die?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: It needs to be done, unpleasant as it is. Robert's rather tasteless about it. Every time he talks about killing her, I swear the table rises six inches.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: It's a shame he can't muster the same enthusiasm for his wife.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: He does have a deep, abiding lust for her money. You have to give it to the Lannisters, they may be the most pompous, ponderous cunts the gods ever suffered to walk the world, but they do have outrageous amounts of money.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: I have an outrageous amount of money.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Not as much as the Lannisters.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: But a lot more than you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Robert's threatening to take me hunting with him. Last time we were out there for two weeks, tramping through the trees in the rain, day after day. All so he can stick his spear into something's flesh! Oh. but Robert loves his killing. And he's the King.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Hmm... How did that ever happen?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Because he loves his killing and he used to be good at it.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Do you know who should be King?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Be serious.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: I am. My father could be your bank. I've never fought in a war before, but I'd fight for you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: I'm fourth in line.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: And where was Robert in the line of royal succession? Joffrey is a monster. Tommen is eight.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: Stannis?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Stannis has the personality of a lobster.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: He's still my older brother.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: What are you doing?!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: Look at it.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: renly
text: renly: You cut me!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: It's just blood. We've all got it in us. Sometimes a little spills. If you become King, you're going to see a lot of this. You need to get used to it. Go on. Look. People love you. They love to serve you because you're kind to them. They want to be near you.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: loras
text: loras: You're willing to do what needs to be done, but you don't gloat over it. You don't love killing. Where is it written that power is the sole province of the worst? That thrones are only made for the hated and the feared. You would be a wonderful King.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I'm sorry your marriage to Ned Stark didn't work out. You seemed so good together.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: I'm glad I could do something to make you happy.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Without a Hand, everything will fall to pieces.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: I suppose this is where you tell me to give the job to your brother Jaime.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No. He's not serious enough. I'll say this for Ned Stark - he's serious enough. Was it really worth it? Losing him this way?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: I don't know. But I do know this, if the Targaryen girl convinces her horse-lord husband to invade and the Dothraki horde crosses The Narrow Sea... We won't be able to stop them.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Dothraki don't sail. Every child knows that. They don't have discipline. They don't have armor. They don't have siege weapons.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: It's a neat little trick you do, you move your lips and your father's voice comes out.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Is my father wrong?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Let's say Viserys Targaryen lands with forty thousand Dothraki screamers at his back. We hole up in our castles, a wise move. Only a fool would meet the Dothraki in an open field. They leave us in our castles. They go from town to town, looting and burning, killing every man who can't hide behind a stone wall, stealing all our crops and livestock, enslaving all our women and children. How long do the people of the Seven Kingdoms stand behind their absentee King, their cowardly King hiding behind high walls? When do the people decide that Viserys Targaryen is the rightful monarch after all.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We still outnumber them.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Which is the bigger number -- five or one?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Five.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Five... one. One army, a real army, united behind one leader with one purpose. Our purpose died with the Mad King. Now we've got as many armies as there are men with gold in their purse. And everybody wants something different. Your father wants to own the world. Ned Stark wants to run away and bury his head in the snow.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What do you want?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: We haven't had a real fight in nine years. Back-stabbing doesn't prepare you for a fight. And that's all the realm is now, back-stabbing and scheming and arse-licking and money-grubbing. Sometimes I don't know what holds it together.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Our marriage.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Ah, so here we sit, seventeen years later, holding it all together. Don't you get tired?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Every day.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: How long can hate hold a thing together?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Well, seventeen years is quite a long time.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: Yes, it is.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Yes, it tis. What was she like?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: You've never asked about her, not once. Why not?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: At first, just saying her name, even in private felt like I was breathing life back into her. I thought if I didn't talk about her, she'd just fade away for you. When I realized that wasn't going to happen, I refused to ask out of spite. I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask. And eventually it became clear that my spite didn't mean anything to you, as far as I could tell, you actually enjoyed it.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: So why now?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What harm could Lyanna Stark's ghost do to either of us that we haven't done to each other a hundred times over?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: You want to know the horrible truth? I can't even remember what she looked like. I only know she was the one thing I ever wanted... Someone took her away from me, and Seven Kingdoms couldn't fill the hole she left behind.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I felt something for you once, you know?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: I know.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Even after we lost our first boy -- for quite a while, actually. Was it ever possible for us? Was there ever a time, ever a... moment?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: robert
text: robert: No. Does that make you feel better or worse?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It doesn't make me feel anything.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: mhaegen
text: mhaegen: She looks like him, don't she, my Lord? She has his nose, his black hair.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: mhaegen
text: mhaegen: Tell him when you see him, my Lord. If it please you... Tell him how beautiful she is.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I will.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: mhaegen
text: mhaegen: And tell him I've been with no one else. I swear it, my Lord, by the old gods and new. I don't want no jewels or nothing, just him. The King was always good to me.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: When Jon Arryn came to visit you, what did he want?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: mhaegen
text: mhaegen: He wasn't that sort of man, my Lord. He just wanted to know if the child was happy, healthy.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: She looks healthy enough to me. The girl shall want for nothing.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Brothels make a much better investment than ship, I've found. Whores rarely sink.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What do you know of King Robert's bastards?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Well, he has more than you, for a start.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: How many?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Does it matter? If you fuck enough women, some of them will give you presents.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And Jon Arryn tracked them all down. Why?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: He was the King's Hand. Perhaps Robert wanted them looked after. He was overcome with fatherly love.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Come.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Jory!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: My Lord.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Such a small pack of wolves.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: Stay back, Ser! This is the Hand of the King!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Was!... the Hand of the King. Now I'm not sure what he is... Lord of somewhere very far away.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: What's the meaning of this, Lannister?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Get back inside where it's safe. I'm looking for my brother. You remember my brother, don't you, Lord Stark? Blond hair, sharp tongue, short man.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I remember him well.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It seems he had some trouble on the road. You wouldn't know what happened to him, would you?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He was taken at my command to answer for his crimes.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: petyr
text: petyr: My Lords! I'll bring the City Watch!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Come, Stark. I'd rather you die sword in hand.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jory
text: jory: If you threaten my Lord again...

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Threaten? As in, "I'm going to open your Lord from balls to brains and see what Starks are made of”?

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You kill me, your brother's a dead man.

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You're right. Take him alive! Kill his men!

title: The Wolf and the Lion
Name: jaime
text: jaime: My brother, Lord Stark... We want him back.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your pardon, your Grace.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you know what your wife has done?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: She did nothing I did not command.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Who'd have thought she had it in her?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: cersei
text: cersei: By what right dare you lay hands on my blood?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I am the King's Hand -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You were the King's Hand!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: trying to keep the peace -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You shall now be held accountable.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Oh, will both of you shut your mouths? Catelyn will release Tyrion and you'll make your peace with Jaime.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: He butchered my men.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Lord Stark was returning drunk from a brothel when his men attacked Jaime.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Quiet, woman.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Jaime has fled the city. Give me leave to bring him back to justice.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I took you for a king.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Hold your tongue.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He's attacked my brother and abducted the other. I should wear the armor and you the gown.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I shall wear this like a badge of honor.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Wear it in silence or I'll honor you again.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: See what she does to me? My loving wife. I should not have hit her. That was not… That was not kingly.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: If we don't act… there will be a war.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: So tell your wife to return that little shit of an Imp to King's Landing. She's had her fun, now put an end to it. You hear me? Send a raven and put an end to it.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And what about Jaime Lannister? What about Jaime?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: I'm half a kingdom in debt to his bloody father. I don't know what happened between you and those yellow-haired shits. I don't want to know. This is what matters - I can't rule the kingdoms if the Starks and the Lannisters are at each other's throats, so enough!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: As you command your Grace. With your leave, I will return to Winterfell and set matters straight.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Piss on that! Send a raven. I want you to stay. I'm the king, I get what I want… I never loved my brothers. A sad thing for a man to admit, but it's true. You were the brother I chose. We'll talk when I return from the hunt.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The hunt?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Killing things clears my head. You'll have to sit on the throne while I'm away. You'll hate it more than I do.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The Targaryen girl -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Seven hells! Don't start with her again! The girl will die and I'll hear no more of it. Put on the badge. And if you ever take it off again, I swear to the Mother I'll pin the damn thing on Jaime Lannister.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: irri
text: irri: Khaleesi?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: irri
text: irri: Oh, Khaleesi!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You're hurt.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: Not too fast.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bran
text: bran: Come on, Dancer.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: When are you gonna tell him?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: Not now.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: Blood for blood. You need to make the Lannisters to pay for Jory and the others.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: You're talking about war.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm talking about justice.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: Only the Lord of Winterfell can call in the bannermen and raise an army.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: A Lannister put his spear through your father's leg. The Kingslayer rides to Casterly Rock where no one can touch -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: You want me to march on Casterly Rock?!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: You're not a boy anymore. They attacked your father. They've already started the war. It's your duty to represent your House when your father can't.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: And it's not your duty, because it's not your House.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: Where's Bran?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: I don't know. It's not my House.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bran
text: bran: Robb?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: osha
text: osha: All alone in the deep dark woods.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bran
text: bran: I'm not alone, my brother is with me.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: wildling
text: wildling: I don't see him. Got him hidden under your cloak?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: osha
text: osha: Oh, that's a pretty pin. Silver.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: wildling
text: wildling: We'll take the pin. And the horse. Get down… Be quick about it.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bran
text: bran: I can't. The saddle, the straps.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: wildling
text: wildling: What's wrong with you? You some kind of cripple?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bran
text: bran: I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell and if you don't let me be, I'll have you all killed!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: wildling
text: wildling: Cut his little cock off and stuff it in his mouth.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: osha
text: osha: the boy's worth nothing dead. Benjen Stark's own blood. Think what Mance would give us.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: wildling
text: wildling: Piss on Mance rayder and piss on the North. We're going as far south as south goes. There ain't no white walkers down in Dorne.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: Drop the knife. Let him go and I'll let you live.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bran
text: bran: Robb!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: wildling
text: wildling: Shut up! Drop the blade!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bran
text: bran: No, don't.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: wildling
text: wildling: Do it.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: Are you all right?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bran
text: bran: Yes, it doesn't hurt.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: Tough little lad. In the Iron Islands, you're not a man until you've killed your first enemy. Well done.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: Have you lost your mind? What if you'd missed?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: He would have killed you and cut Bran's throat.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: You don't have the right -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: To what, to save your brother's life? It was the only thing to do, so I did it.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: What about her?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: osha
text: osha: Give me my life, my lord, and I'm yours.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robb
text: robb: We'll keep her alive.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Mord! Turnkey! Mord! Mord!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mord
text: mord: Dwarf man making noise!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How would you like to be rich?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mord
text: mord: Dwarf man still making noise.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My family is rich. We have gold, lots of gold. I'm prepared to give you lots of gold.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mord
text: mord: No gold!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, I don't have it here.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mord
text: mord: No gold! Fuck off.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't want to practice today.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: syrio
text: syrio: No?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: They killed Jory. My father is hurt. I don't care about stupid wooden swords.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: syrio
text: syrio: You are troubled.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: Yes -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Good! Trouble is the perfect time for training. When you are dancing in the meadow with your dolls and kittens, this is not when fighting happens.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't like dolls and k -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: syrio
text: syrio: You're not here. You're with your trouble. If you're with your trouble when fighting happens…

title: A Golden Crown
Name: syrio
text: syrio: More trouble for you. Just so… How can you be quick as a snake, or as quiet as a shadow, when you are somewhere else? You are fearing for your father, hmm? That is right. Do you pray to the gods?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: syrio
text: syrio: The old and the new.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: syrio
text: syrio: There is only one god. And his name is death. And there is only one thing we say to death - “Not today.”

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: She has to eat a whole heart? I hope that wasn't my horse.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: She's doing well.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: She'll never keep it down.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Tell me what she is saying.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The prince is riding. I have heard the thunder of the hooves. Swift as the wind he rides. His enemies will cower before him… and their wives will weep tears of blood.”

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: She's going to have a boy.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: He won't be a real Targaryen. He won't be a true dragon.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The stallion who mounts the world.” The stallion, is the khal of khals. He shall unite the people into a single khalasar. All the people of the world will be his herd.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: A prince rides inside me! And he shall be called Rhaego!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: They love her.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: She truly is a queen today.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Don't let them see you carrying a sword in Vaes Dothrak. You know the law.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: It's not my law.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They don't belong to you.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Whatever is hers is also mine.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Once, perhaps.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: If I sell one egg, I'll have enough to buy a ship. Two eggs - a ship and an army.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: And you have all three.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: I need a large army… I'm the last hope of a dynasty, Mormont. The greatest dynasty this world has ever seen, on my shoulders since I was five years old and no one has ever given me what they gave to her in that tent. Never. Not a piece of it… How can I carry what I need to carry without it? Hmm? Who can rule without wealth, or fear, or love? Oh, you stand there, all nobility and honor. You don't think I see you looking at my little sister, hmm? Don't think I know what you want? I don't care. You can have her. She can be queen of the savages and dine on the finest bloody horseparts, and you can dine on whichever parts of her you like. But let me go.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You can go, but you can't have the eggs.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: You swore an oath to me. Does loyalty mean nothing to you?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It means everything to me.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: And yet here you stand?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: And here I stand.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mord
text: mord: Noise again!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: About the gold -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Listen to me! Listen to me! Sometimes possession… is an abstract concept. When they captured me they took my purse, but the gold is still mine.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mord
text: mord: Where?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Where? I don't know where, but when they free me -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mord
text: mord: You want free? Go be free.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Have you ever heard the phrase “Rich as a Lannister”? Of course you have. You're a smart man. You know who the Lannisters are. I am a Lannister. Tyrion, son of Tywin! And of course, you have also heard the phrase, “a Lannister always pays his debts.” If you deliver a message from me to Lady Arryn, I will be in your debt. I will owe you gold. If you deliver the message and I live, which I very much intend to do.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mord
text: mord: What message?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Tell her I wish to confess my crimes.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: You wish to confess your crimes?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, my lady. I do, my lady.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Skycells always break them. Speak, Imp. Meet your gods as an honest man.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Where do I begin, my lords and ladies? I'm a vile man, I confess it. My crimes and sins are beyond counting. I have lied and cheated, gambled and whored. I'm not particularly good at violence, but I'm good at convincing others to do violence for me. You want specifics, I suppose. When I was seven, I saw a servant girl bathing in the river. I stole her robe. She was forced to return to the castle, naked and in tears. I close my eyes, I can still see her tits bouncing. When I was ten, I stuffed my uncle's boots with goatshit. When confronted with my crime, I blamed a squire. Poor boy was flogged and… I escaped justice. When I was twelve, I milked my eel into a pot of turtle stew. I flogged the one-eyed snake. I skinned my sausage. I made the bald man cry into the turtle stew, which I do believe my sister ate. At least I hope she did. I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Silence!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robin
text: robin: What happened next?!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: What do you think you're doing?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Confessing my crimes.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Lord Tyrion, you are accused of hiring a man to slay my son Bran in his bed, and of conspiring to murder my sister's husband; Lord Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh, I'm very sorry. I don't know anything about all that.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: You've had your little joke. I trust you enjoyed it. Mord, take him back to the dungeon. But this time find a smaller cell, with a steeper floor.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Is this how justice is done in the Vale? you accuse me of crimes, I deny them, so you throw me in a cell to freeze and starve? Where is the King's Justice? I'm accused and demand a trial.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: If you're tried and found guilty, then by the king's own laws you will pay with your life.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I understand the law.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: We have no executioner in the Eyrie. Life is more elegant here. Open the Moon Door.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: You want a trial, my Lord Lannister. Very well. My son will listen to whatever you have to say, and you will hear his judgement. Then you will leave, by one door or the other.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No need to bother Lord Robin. I demand a trial by combat.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: You have that right.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: knight
text: knight: My lady, I beg the honor. Let me be your champion.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: knight
text: knight: The honor should be mine. For the love I bore your lord husband let me avenge his death.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: knight
text: knight: I'll fight for you, my Lady.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: knight
text: knight: It'll be my honor.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: knight
text: knight: The honor should be mine.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robin
text: robin: Make the bad man fly!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Ser Vardis… You're quiet. Did you want to avenge my husband?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ser
text: ser: With all my heart, my Lady. But the Imp is half my size. It would be shameful to slaughter such a man and call it justice.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Agreed.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: You demanded a trial by combat.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Now I demand a champion. I have that right, same as you.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ser
text: ser: My Lady, I would gladly fight the Imp's champion for you.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I wouldn't be too glad, ser. I name my brother, Jaime Lannister.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: The Kingslayer is hundreds of miles from here.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Send a raven for him, I'm happy to wait.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: The trial will be today.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do I have a volunteer?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Anyone?... Anyone?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
text: lysa: I think that we can assume that no one is willing -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'll stand for the dwarf.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lancel
text: lancel: More wine, your Grace?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Oh, what was I saying?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: renly
text: renly: A simpler time.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: It was! It was. You're too young to remember. Wasn't it, Selmy?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: barriston
text: barriston: It was, your Grace.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: The enemy was right there in the open, vicious as you like, all but sending you a bloody invitation. Nothing like today.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: renly
text: renly: Sounds exhilarating.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Exhilarating, yes. Not as exhilarating as those balls and masquerades you like to throw. You ever fucked a Riverlands girl?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: renly
text: renly: Once, I think.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: You think? I think you'd remember. Back in our day, you weren't a real man until you fucked a girl from each of the Seven Kingdoms and the Riverlands. We called it “making the eight.”

title: A Golden Crown
Name: renly
text: renly: Those were some lucky girls.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: You ever make the eight, Barristan?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: barristan
text: barristan: I don't believe so, your Grace.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Those were the days!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: renly
text: renly: What days were those? The ones where half of Westeros fought the other half and millions died? Or before that, when the Mad King slaughtered women and babies because the voices in his head told him they deserved it? Or way before that when dragons burned whole cities to the ground?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robert
text: robert: Easy, boy. You might be my brother, but you're speaking to the King.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: renly
text: renly: I suppose it was all rather heroic. If you were drunk enough and had some poor Riverlands whore to shove your price inside and “make the eight.”

title: A Golden Crown
Name: man
text: man: They burned most everything in the Riverlands, our fields, our granaries, our homes. They took our women and then they took ‘em again. When they was done, they butchered them as if they was animals. They covered our children in pitch and lit them on fire.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: grand
text: grand: Brigands, most likely.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: man
text: man: They weren't thieves, they didn't steal nothing. They even left something behind, your Grace.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: grand
text: grand: It's the King's Hand you're addressing, not the king. The king is hunting.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Fish. The sigil of House Tully. Isn't that your wife's House - Tully - my Lord Hand?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: These men, were they flying a sigil? … A banner.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: man
text: man: None, your… Hand. The one who was leading them… Taller by a foot than any man I've ever met, saw him cut the blacksmith, saw him take the head off a horse with a single swing of his sword.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: petyr
text: petyr: That sounds like someone we know. The Mountain.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You're describing Ser Gregor Clegane.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: grand
text: grand: Why should Ser Gregor turn brigand? The man is an anointed knight.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I've heard him called “Tywin Lannister's mad dog.” I'm sure you have as well. Can you think of any reason the Lannisters might possibly have for being angry with your wife?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: grand
text: grand: If the Lannisters were to order attacks on villages under the king's protection, it would be -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: petyr
text: petyr: It would be almost as brazen as attacking the Hand of the King in the streets of the capital.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: grand
text: grand: Wel…

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I cannot give you back your homes or restore your dead to life. But perhaps I can give you justice in the name of our king, Robert. Lord Beric Dondarrion.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You shall have the command. Assemble 100 men and ride to Ser Gregor's keep.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: beric
text: beric: As you command.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, the First of his Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, I charge you to bring the king's justice to the false knight Gregor Clegane and all those who shared in his crimes. I denounce him and attaint him. I strip him of all ranks and titles of all lands and holdings, and sentence him to death.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: grand
text: grand: My lord… This… This is a drastic action. It would be better to wait for King Robert's return.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Grand Maester Pycelle.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: grand
text: grand: My Lord.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Send a raven to Casterly Rock. Inform Tywin Lannister that he has been summoned to court to answer for the crimes of his bannermen. He will arrive within the fortnight, or be branded an enemy of the crown and a traitor to the realm.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: petyr
text: petyr: A bold move, my Lord, and admirable. But is it wise to yank the lion's tail? Tywin Lannister is the richest man in all the Seven Kingdoms. Gold wins wars, not soldiers.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Then how come Robert is king and not Tywin Lannister?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robin
text: robin: Is it over?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: lysa
