text: lysa: You don't fight with honor!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: bronn
text: bronn: No. He did.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: robin
text: robin: Can I make the little man fly now?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Not this little man. This little man is going home. I believe you have something of mine.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A Lannister always pays his debts.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: You wear your hair like a real southern lady now.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Well, why shouldn't I? We're in the south.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: It's important to remember where you come from. I'm not sure your mother would like these new styles.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: My mother isn't from the North.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: I'm aware of that.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why do you care? Do you even have hair under there?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: Yes. I have hair.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I've never seen it.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: Would you like to?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No. Where are you from anyway, the north or the south?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: I come from a very small village in -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Oh, wait. I just realized… I don't care.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: Sansa -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Septa.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: Now you are being rude.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: mordane
text: mordane: My prince.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: My prince.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: My lady. I fear I have behaved monstrously the past few weeks. With your permission?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's beautiful. Like the one your mother wears.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: You'll be queen one day, it's only fitting that you should look the part. Will you forgive me for my rudeness?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: There's nothing to forgive.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: You're my lady. One day we'll be married in the throne room. Lords and ladies from all over the Seven Kingdoms will come, from the last hearth in the North, to the salt shore of the south. And you will be queen over all of them. I'll never disrespect you again. I'll never be cruel to you again. Do you understand me? You're my lady now, from this day, until my last day.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: Stop! Stop! What are you doing?!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ros
text: ros: Going to King's Landing.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: In a turnip cart?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ros
text: ros: I'll find a ship heading south in White Harbor.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: And you can afford that?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ros
text: ros: Some of my friends are more generous than others.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: There's a thousand girls like you in King's Landing.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ros
text: ros: I'll have lots of company…

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: Yes, you'll be very popular until some fat lord comes to visit with a big belly and a little prick and he can't get it up so he knocks all your teeth out.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ros
text: ros: And what will happen to me if I stay here? Will I become Lady Greyjoy, Mistress of the Iron Islands?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: Don't be a fool.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ros
text: ros: I hear Jaime Lannister attacked Lord Stark in the streets of King's Landing. Every man for a hundred miles will be marching off to war soon and most of them will never come back, there's nothing more for me here. Let's go, Steffon.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: Let me see it one more time?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ros
text: ros: See what?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm going to miss you!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: ros
text: ros: I know.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'm sending you both back to Winterfell.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What?!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Listen -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What about Joffrey?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: Are you dying because of your leg? Is that why you're sending us home?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What? No.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Please, Father. Please don't.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: You can't. I've got my lessons with Syrio. I'm finally getting good.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: This isn't a punishment. I want you back in Winterfell for your own safety.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: Can't we take Syrio back with us?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Who cares about your stupid dancing teacher? I can't go. I'm supposed to marry Prince Joffrey. I love him and I'm meant to be his queen and have his babies.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: Seven hells.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: When you're old enough, I'll make you a match with someone who's worthy of you, someone who's brave and gentle and strong -

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I don't want someone brave and gentle and strong. I want him! He'll be the greatest king that ever was, a golden lion, and I'll give him sons with beautiful blond hair.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: The lion's not his sigil, idiot. He's a stag, like his father.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He is not. He's nothing like that old drunk king.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Go on, girls. Get your septa and start packing your things.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Wait!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: arya
text: arya: Come on!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's not fair!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Lord Orys Baratheon, black of hair.” “Axel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Lyonel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Steffon Baratheon, black of hair.” “Robert Baratheon, black of hair.” “Joffrey Baratheon… golden-haired.”

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Daenerys! Where's my sister?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Stop him.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Where is she? I'm here for the feast. The whore's feast.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Come.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Get your hands off me! No one touches the dragon!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Khal Drogo! I'm here for the feast.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Khal Drogo says there is a place for you. Back there.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: That is no place for a king.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: khal
text: khal: You are no king.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Keep away from me!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Viserys, please.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: There she is.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Put the sword down. They'll kill us all.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: They can't kill us. They can't shed blood in their sacred city. But I can. I want what I came for. I want the crown he promised me. He bought you. But he never paid for you.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Tell him I want what was bargained for or I'm taking you back. He can keep the baby. I'll cut it out and leave it for him.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: What's he saying?

title: A Golden Crown
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He says yes. You shall have a golden crown, that men shall tremble to behold.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: That was all I wanted. W-what was promised.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: No! You cannot touch me! I am the dragon! I am the dragon! I want my crown! Ahh!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Look away Khaleesi.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: No. Dany! Dany, tell them, make them! You can't!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: viserys
text: viserys: Dany please!

title: A Golden Crown
Name: khal
text: khal: A crown for a king.

title: A Golden Crown
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Khaleesi…

title: A Golden Crown
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He was no dragon. Fire cannot kill a dragon.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Summoned to court to answer for the crimes of your bannerman Gregor Clegane, the Mountain

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Attacking him was stupid.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Lannisters don't act like fools.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Catelyn Stark took my brother.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Why is he still alive?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Tyrion?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Ned Stark.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: One of our men interfered, speared him through the leg before I could finish him.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It wouldn't have been clean.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Clean...

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You spend too much time worrying about what other people think of you.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I could care less what anyone thinks of me.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Now that's what you want people to think of you.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It's the truth.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: When you hear them whispering "Kingslayer" behind your back, doesn't it bother you?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Of course it bothers me.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I didn't realize you placed such a high value on my brother's life.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: He's a Lannister. He might be the lowest of the Lannisters, but he's one of us.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaime
text: jaime: So the lion does concern himself with the opinions of..

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: No, it's not an opinion, it's a fact!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Hmm.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're in pain.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I've had worse, my lady.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Perhaps it's time to go home.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The South doesn't seem to agree with you.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I know the truth Jon Arryn died for.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you, Lord Stark? Is that why you called me here, to pose me riddles?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Has he done this before?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Jaime would have killed him.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My brother is worth a thousand of your friend.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Your brother Or your lover?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Targaryens wed brothers and sisters for 300 years to keep bloodlines pure.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Jaime and I are more than brother and sister. We shared a womb. We came into this world together. We belong together.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: My son saw you with him.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you love your children?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: With all my heart.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No more than I love mine.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And they are all Jaime's.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Thank the Gods.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You've always hated him.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Hated him? I worshiped him.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: When the King returns from his hunt, I'll tell him the truth.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And what of my wrath, Lord Stark? You should have taken the realm for yourself.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I've made many mistakes in my life, but that wasn't one of them.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Oh, but it was.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: ros
text: ros: Come here.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No no no no! Is that what they teach you up in the North? And you-- wherever you're from, do you have any idea how ridiculous you sound? Either of you understand a thing that I'm saying?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: ros
text: ros: Yes, My Lord.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Let's start over, shall we? You be the man and you be the woman.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: ros
text: ros: Why don't you join us, My Lord?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'm saving myself for another.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: ros
text: ros: What she doesn't know won't hurt her.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: A stupid saying.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: ros
text: ros: She must be very beautiful.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No, not really. Impeccable bloodlines though.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: ros
text: ros: I do believe my lordo s in love.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: For many years. Most of my life really.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: ros
text: ros: Is she still married to him?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Oh no. He got himself killed before the wedding.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: ros
text: ros: And what do you want?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Oh, everything, my dear. Everything there is.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: You're a very lucky girl. Do you know that?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: Where is it you come from?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: The Iron Islands.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: They far away?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: You've never heard of the Iron Islands?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: Trust me, you've never heard where I'm from neither.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Trust me, My Lord. You're not living in the wilderness anymore.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: And what's that?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Lord.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: Why?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Why? What do you mean why? My father is Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: What's that got to do with you? If your father's lord, how can you be lord too?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: I will be lord after my father.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: So you're not lord now?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: No, you...You having a go at me? Is that it?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: I just don't understand how you Southerners do things.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm not a Southerner.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: You're from South of the wall. That makes you a Southerner to me.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: You're an impudent little wench, aren't you?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: Couldn't say, My Lord. Don't know what "impunent" means.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Impudent. It means rude. Disrespectful.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: Theon Greyjoy! The lady is our guest.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: theon
text: theon: I thought she was our prisoner.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: Are the two mutually exclusive in your experience?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: Chances are I won't be nearby the next time that happens.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: I'm used to worse than him.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: I'm used to men who could chew that boy up and pick their teeth with his bones.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: Why did you come here?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: Didn't mean to come here. Meant to get much further South than this.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: Why? What are you afraid of?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: There's things that sleep in the day and hunt at night.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: Owls and Shadowcats and...

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: I'm not talking about Owls and Shadowcats.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: The "things" you speak of-- they've been gone for thousands of years.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: osha
text: osha: They wasn't gone, old man. They was sleeping.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: I miss girls.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: Why is he alone?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: One blast for a Ranger returning, two for Wildlings, three for...

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: There's no rider.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: night
text: night: Whoa, boy, whoa.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: That's my Uncle Benjen's horse.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Ned! It's Robert.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: robert
text: robert: I should have spent more time with you, shown you how to be a man.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: robert
text: robert: My fault. Too much wine, missed my thrust.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Robert, my sweet...

title: You Win or You Die
Name: robert
text: robert: Out, all of you!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You damned fool.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: robert
text: robert: Paper and ink on the table, write down what I say.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: robert
text: robert: Give it to the council after I'm dead.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I will.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: robert
text: robert: And my son Help him, Ned. Make him better than me.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I'll, I'll do everything I can to honor your memory.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: robert
text: robert: My memory.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Give him milk of the poppy.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: barristan
text: barristan: He was reeling from the wine.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: No man could have protected him from himself.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: lord
text: lord: I wonder, Ser Barristan, who gave the king this wine?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: barristan
text: barristan: His squire, from the king's own skin.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: His squire? The Lannister boy?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: lord
text: lord: Such a dutiful boy to make sure his Grace did not lack refreshment.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: His Grace has had a change of heart concerning Daenerys Targaryen.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: lord
text: lord: I'm afraid those birds have flown.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: khal
text: khal: The stallion who mounts the world, has no need for iron chairs.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: According to the prophecy, the stallions will ride to the ends of the world.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: khal
text: khal: The earth ends at the black salt sea. No horse can cross the poison water.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The earth does not end at the sea, there are many dirts beyond the sea.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: khal
text: khal: Not dirt. Lands.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Lands, yes...

title: You Win or You Die
Name: khal
text: khal: Let's speak no more of wooden horses and iron chairs.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It's not a chair. It's a...

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: A chair for a King to sit upon, or a Queen.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: khal
text: khal: A King does not need a chair to sit upon. He only needs a horse.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Can't you help me make him understand?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The Dothraki do things in their own time, for their own reasons.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My brother was a fool, I know, but he was the rightful heir to the Seven Kingdoms.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Forgive me, Khaleesi, but your ancestor Aegon the Conqueror didn't seize six of the kingdoms because they were his right.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And because he had dragons.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Ah well, having a few dragons makes things easier.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You don't believe it.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Have you ever seen a dragon, Khaleesi? I believe what my eyes and ears report.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: deanerys
text: deanerys: Well, I'll come with you.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No no, don't trouble yourself. Enjoy the market. I'll rejoin you soon enough.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: little
text: little: Psst, Jorah the Andal.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: Virzetha gizikhven! Mra qora! Mra qora!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My son already has his name, but I'll try your summerwine.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: My Lady, you are from Westeros.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: doreah
text: doreah: You have the honor of addressing Daenerys of the House Targaryen.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: Princess.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Rise. I'd still like to taste that wine.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: That? Dornish swill.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You honor me, Ser.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: The honor...the honor is all mine.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: Huh-uh, huh-uh.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: You know there are many in your homeland that pray for your return, princess.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I hope to repay your kindness someday.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Rakharo.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: Huh.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Is something wrong?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I have a thirst. Open it.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: The wine is for the Khaleesi. It's not for the likes of you.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Open it.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Pour.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: It would be a crime to drink a wine this rich without at least giving it time to breathe.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Do as he says.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: As the princess commands.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: Sweet, isn't it? Can you smell the fruit, Ser? Taste it, My Lord.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You first.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: wine
text: wine: Me? I'm afraid I am not worthy of the vintage.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You will drink.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Khaleesi! Stop him!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Come.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Here you begin anew.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: I do, my lord.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: You'll want to take your vow before a heart tree as your Uncle did.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: Yes, my lord.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: You'll find a Weirwood a mile North of the Wall. And your old Gods too, maybe.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: my lord, might I go as well?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Does house Tarly keep the old Gods?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: No, my lord.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: The Night's Watch is my house now.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: As you wish, lad.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jaremy
text: jaremy: Rangers with me.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: othell
text: othell: Builders!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: Samwell, you will assist me in the rookery and library.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: Will I serve the Lord Commander's meals and fetch hot water for his bath.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: Certainly. And keep a fire burning in his chambers.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: Do you take me for a servant?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: We took you for a man of The Night's Watch.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: May I go?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: maester
text: maester: As you wish.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: Jon, wait! Don't you see what they're doing?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: I see Ser Alliser's revenge, that's all.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: pypar
text: pypar: Fair? I was singing for a high lord at Acorn Hall when he put his hand on my leg and he wanted to see my cock.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: I thought you were caught stealing a wheel of cheese for your starving sister?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: pypar
text: pypar: You think I was gonna tell a bunch of strangers that a high lord tried to grab my cock?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: Could you sing me a song, Pyp? I'd like to hear a song.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: Now listen to me. The old man is the Lord Commander of The Night's Watch.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: jon
text: jon: I just, I always wanted to be a Ranger.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: sam
text: sam: I always wanted to be a Wizard.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: renly
text: renly: She won't care.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And what should I do with a hundred swords?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Strike! Tonight while the castle sleeps.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What about Stannis?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Saving the Seven Kingdoms from Cersei and delivering them to Stannis?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Stannis is your older brother.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: renly
text: renly: This isn't about the bloody line of succession.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Stannis is a commander. He's led men into war twice.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Yes, he's a good soldier. Everyone knows that. So was Robert.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tell
text: tell: Do you still believe good soldiers make good kings?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I will not dishonor Robert's last hours by shedding blood in his halls and dragging frightened children from their beds.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You will sail to dragonstone tonight.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: tomard
text: tomard: Yes, My Lord.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Now leave us.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: My Lord protector.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The King has no true born sons.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: So when the King dies...

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The throne passes to his brother Lord Stannis.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: So it would seem. Unless...

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: There is no "unless".

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: And he cannot take the throne without your help.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Do you have a shred of honor?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You are now Hand of the King and Protector of the Realm.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: We?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You'll need someone to share these burdens. I assure you, my price would be modest.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What you suggest is treason.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Only if we lose.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Make peace with the Lannisters, you say. With the people who tried to murder my boy..

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: No. I won't do it.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: So it will be Stannis and war?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: There is no other choice. He is the heir.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: So why did you call me here? Not for my wisdom, clearly.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You promised Catelyn you would help me.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Look at you. You know what you want me to do.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I thought he'd leave me alone, now that my brother is gone.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He will not have my son.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: khal
text: khal: Moon of my life. Are you hurt?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: khal
text: khal: Jorah the Andal, I heard what you did.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: king
text: king: Liar!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You condemn yourself with your own mouth, Lord Stark.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Ser Barristan is a good man, a loyal man. Do him no harm.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You think he stands alone?

title: You Win or You Die
Name: king
text: king: Kill him! Kill all of them, I command it!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Commander! Take the Queen and her children into custody.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: janos
text: janos: Men of the Watch!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I want no bloodshed.

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Now!

title: You Win or You Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I did warn you not to trust me.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Yah! Left high, left low.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Right low, lunge right.

title: The Pointy End
Name: steward
text: steward: If you break anything, the Septa will have my head. What is...

title: The Pointy End
Name: septa
text: septa: Your sister knew perfectly well we were to leave today.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: She didn't forget. She's with her dancing master.

title: The Pointy End
Name: septa
text: septa: Hush! Go back to your room.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What is it? What's happening?

title: The Pointy End
Name: septa
text: septa: Do as I told you. Run!

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: This way! Left, right.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: You said right, but you went left.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: And now you are a dead girl.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: Only 'cause you lied.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: My tongue lied.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: I was so. I watched, but you...

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Watching is not seeing, dead girl.

title: The Pointy End
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Arya Stark, come with us.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: And why is it that Lord Eddard is sending Lannister men in place of his own? I am wondering.

title: The Pointy End
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Mind your place, dancing master.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: My father wouldn't send you.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: And I don't have to go with you if I don't want.

title: The Pointy End
Name: maryn
text: maryn: Take her.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Are you men or snakes, that you would threaten a child?

title: The Pointy End
Name: kings
text: kings: Get out of my way, little man.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: I am Syrio Forel.

title: The Pointy End
Name: kings
text: kings: Foreign bastard.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: And you will be speaking to me with more respect.

title: The Pointy End
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Kill the Braavosi. Bring the girl.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Arya child, we are done with dancing for the day.

title: The Pointy End
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Bloody oafs.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Be gone now, Arya.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: Come with me. Run.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: The first sword of Braavos does not run.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: What do we say to the God of death?

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: Not today.

title: The Pointy End
Name: syrio
text: syrio: Go.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: Not today. Not today.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Stay away from me.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Who do you think sent me?

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: Needle.

title: The Pointy End
Name: stable
text: stable: There she is.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: What do you want?

title: The Pointy End
Name: stable
text: stable: I want you, wolf girl. Come here.

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: Leave me be. My father's a lord. He'll reward you.

title: The Pointy End
Name: stable
text: stable: She'll reward me, the Queen!

title: The Pointy End
Name: arya
text: arya: Stay away!

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: Lord Stark, you must be thirsty.

title: The Pointy End
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Varys.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: I promise you it isn't poisoned.

title: The Pointy End
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What about my daughters?

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: The younger one seems to have escaped the castle.

title: The Pointy End
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And Sansa?

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: Still engaged to Joffrey.

title: The Pointy End
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You watched my men being slaughtered and did nothing.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: And would again, My Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The madness of mercy. That she might save her children.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: Ah, the children. It is always the innocents who suffer.

title: The Pointy End
Name: eddard
text: eddard: The Queen can't kill me. Cat holds her brother.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: The wrong brother sadly.

title: The Pointy End
Name: eddard
text: eddard: If that's true, then slit my throat and be done with it.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: Not today, My Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Tell me something, Varys.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: The Realm, My Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jeor
text: jeor: It's Othor, without a doubt.

title: The Pointy End
Name: othell
text: othell: The other one is Jafer Flowers, My Lord, less the hand the wolf tore off.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Any sign of Benjen or the rest of his party?

title: The Pointy End
Name: jon
text: jon: Just these two, My Lord. Been dead awhile, I'd say.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Mmm.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sam
text: sam: The smell.

title: The Pointy End
Name: othell
text: othell: What smell?

title: The Pointy End
Name: sam
text: sam: There is none.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jon
text: jon: We should burn them.

title: The Pointy End
Name: othell
text: othell: Snow's not wrong, My Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jeor
text: jeor: I want Maester Aemon to examine them first.

title: The Pointy End
Name: othell
text: othell: You heard him.

title: The Pointy End
Name: ser
text: ser: Lord Commander, Maester Aemon awaits you in his chambers. A raven from King's Landing.

title: The Pointy End
Name: nights
text: nights: Come on, move 'em out.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Bring me a horn of ale, Snow, and pour one for yourself.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jon
text: jon: Is there any word of my father?

title: The Pointy End
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Sit.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jeor
text: jeor: I hope you're not thinking of doing anything stupid.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jon
text: jon: My sisters were in King's Landing too.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jeor
text: jeor: I'm sure they'll be treated gently.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: Your father has proved to be an awful traitor, dear.

title: The Pointy End
Name: grand
text: grand: King Robert's body was still warm when Lord Eddard began plotting to steal Joffrey's rightful throne.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He wouldn't do that. He knows how much I love Joffrey.

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Sansa sweetling, you are innocent of any wrong.

title: The Pointy End
Name: grand
text: grand: A child born of a traitor's seed is no fit consort for our King.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, I'm not.

title: The Pointy End
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The girl is innocent, Your Grace.

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Little dove, you must write to Lady Catelyn and your brother, the eldest.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Robb.

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Word of your father's arrest will reach him soon, no doubt.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: If...if I could see my father, talk to him about...

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You disappoint me, child.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I only meant that...what will happen to him?

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That depends.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: On...on what?

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: On your brother. And on you.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: Treason? Sansa wrote this?

title: The Pointy End
Name: maester
text: maester: It is your sister's hand, but the Queen's words.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: Joffrey puts my father in chains, now he wants his ass kissed?

title: The Pointy End
Name: maester
text: maester: This is a royal command, My Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: I won't refuse. His Grace summons me to King's Landing, I'll go to King's Landing.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robin
text: robin: I'm hungry.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Hush now, darling. You just ate.

title: The Pointy End
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You will not support us then? Do I understand you correctly?

title: The Pointy End
Name: robin
text: robin: But I'm hungry!

title: The Pointy End
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Soon, love, soon.

title: The Pointy End
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: That is what I ask.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Go on, sweet. Time for your bath. I'll feed you after.

title: The Pointy End
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: If you fear for the safety of your son...

title: The Pointy End
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Of course I fear for the safety of my son!

title: The Pointy End
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And that is why we have to stop them.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lysa
text: lysa: The knights of the Vale will stay in the Vale where they belong, to protect their Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: From here it might be best if Bronn and I continue alone.

title: The Pointy End
Name: shagga
text: shagga: Best for Tyrion son of Tywin. Not best for me.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And feed it to the goats, yes.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Uncle. Father.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The rumors of your demise were unfounded.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Sorry to disappoint you.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: And who are these Companions of yours?

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: This is Shagga Son of Dolf, Chieftain of the Stone Crows.

title: The Pointy End
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You wouldn't know him.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: May I present My Lord Father, Tywin son of Tytos of House Lannister.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You left us no choice. The honor of the House was at stake.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We have our differences, Jaime and I.

title: The Pointy End
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He's been covering himself in glory.

title: The Pointy End
Name: kevan
text: kevan: Jaime smashed the River Lords at the Golden Tooth, and now lays siege to Riverrun, Catelyn Stark's homeland.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And the Starks? Lord Eddard?

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Is our hostage.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How did my sweet sister persuade the King to imprison his dear friend Ned?

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Robert Baratheon is dead.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My sister rules, you mean.

title: The Pointy End
Name: kevan
text: kevan: Stark's son has called his banners.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: A green boy.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Maybe. Though the boy does have a certain belligerence.

title: The Pointy End
Name: messenger
text: messenger: If it please My Lord, Ser Addam bids me report that the Northmen have crossed the neck.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws.

title: The Pointy End
Name: kevan
text: kevan: At once, My Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: tywin
text: tywin: It is said that the men of the Mountain clans are great warriors.

title: The Pointy End
Name: shagga
text: shagga: Only if the half man fights with us.

title: The Pointy End
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik: The scouts report Lord Tywin moves north.

title: The Pointy End
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: No, we need to get around him and break Jaime Lannister's siege of Riverrun.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: To do either we need to cross the river and the only crossing is at The Twins.

title: The Pointy End
Name: theon
text: theon: Lord Frey controls that bridge.

title: The Pointy End
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: The late Lord Frey" my father calls him.

title: The Pointy End
Name: theon
text: theon: Robb's right.

title: The Pointy End
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: So what's it gonna be? Do we move against Jaime or Lord Tywin?

title: The Pointy End
Name: stark
text: stark: Your pardon, my lords.

title: The Pointy End
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: Don't worry, lad.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: Where did you find him?

title: The Pointy End
Name: stark
text: stark: In the brush above the encampment.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: How high did you get?

title: The Pointy End
Name: lannister
text: lannister: 20,000. Maybe more.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: My father understands mercy, when there is room for it.

title: The Pointy End
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Robb.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: Tell Lord Tywin, Winter is coming for him.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lannister
text: lannister: Yes, My Lord. Thank you, My Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: Are you touched, boy?! Letting him go?

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: You call me boy again.

title: The Pointy End
Name: robb
text: robb: Go on.

title: The Pointy End
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: Oi.

title: The Pointy End
Name: grand
text: grand: It is also the wish of His Grace, that his loyal servant Janos Slynt, Commander of the City Watch...

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Ser Aron.

title: The Pointy End
Name: grand
text: grand: Be at once raised to the rank of Lord.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Lord Gyles.

title: The Pointy End
Name: grand
text: grand: And granted the ancient seat of Harrenhal, and that his sons and grandsons shall hold this honor after him, until the end of time.

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Ser Barristan Selmy.

title: The Pointy End
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Your Grace, I am yours to command.

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Rise, Ser Barristan.

title: The Pointy End
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Your Grace, the Kingsguard is a sworn brotherhood.

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Whose death, Ser Barristan? Yours or your King's?

title: The Pointy End
Name: king
text: king: You let my father die.

title: The Pointy End
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Your Grace...

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Council has determined that Ser Jaime Lannister will take your place as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

title: The Pointy End
Name: barristan
text: barristan: The man who profaned his blade with the blood of the King he had sworn to defend!

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Careful, Ser.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: We have nothing but gratitude for your long service, good Ser.

title: The Pointy End
Name: barristan
text: barristan: A hall to die in and men to bury me.

title: The Pointy End
Name: petyr
text: petyr: A naked Knight, apparently.

title: The Pointy End
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Even now I could cut through the five of you like carving a cake!

title: The Pointy End
Name: kings
text: kings: If any man in this hall has other matters to set before His Grace, let him speak now or go forth and hold his silence.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Your Grace.

title: The Pointy End
Name: king
text: king: Come forward, My Lady.

title: The Pointy End
Name: kings
text: kings: The Lady Sansa of House Stark.

title: The Pointy End
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you have some business for the King and the Council, Sansa?

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I do.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: As it please Your Grace, I ask mercy for my father, Lord Eddard Stark, who was Hand of the King.

title: The Pointy End
Name: grand
text: grand: Treason is a noxious weed.

title: The Pointy End
Name: king
text: king: Let her speak.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Thank you, Your Grace.

title: The Pointy End
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Do you deny your father's crime?

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, My Lords. I know he must be punished.

title: The Pointy End
Name: king
text: king: He said I wasn't the King. Why did he say that?

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He was badly hurt.

title: The Pointy End
Name: lord
text: lord: A childo s faith Such sweet innocence.

title: The Pointy End
Name: grand
text: grand: Treason is treason!

title: The Pointy End
Name: king
text: king: Anything else?

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: If you still have any affection in your heart for me, please do me this kindness, Your Grace.

title: The Pointy End
Name: king
text: king: Your sweet words have moved me.

title: The Pointy End
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He will.

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: You've seen better days, my lord.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Another visit? lt seems you're my last friend.

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: No, no, many still love you. Sansa came to court this morning to plead for your life.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: On her knees begging for me. Hm! Did you laugh with the others?

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: You do me wrong, my lord. Your blood is the last thing l want.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: l don't know what you want. l've given up trying to guess.

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: When l was still a boy - before they cut my balls off with a hot knife - l traveled with a group of actors through the free cities. They taught me that each man has a role to play. The same is true at court. l am the master of whisperers. My role is to be sly, obsequious and without scruples. l'm a good actor, my lord.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Huh. Can you free me from this pit?

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: l could. But will l? No. As l said, I'm no hero.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: What do you want? Tell me. No riddles, no stories. Tell me, what do you want?

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: Peace. Did you know that your son is marching south with an army of Northmen? Loyal lad. Fighting for his father's freedom.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Robb? He's just a boy.

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: Boys have been conquerors before. But the man giving Cersei sleepless nights is the king's the late king's brother. Lord Stannis has the best claim to the throne. He is a proven battle commander and he is utterly without mercy.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Stannis Baratheon is Robert's true heir. The throne is his by rights.

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: Sansa pleaded so sweetly for your life. lt would be a shame to throw it away. Cersei is no fool. She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You want me to serve the woman who murdered my king, who butchered my men, who crippled my son?

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: l want you to serve the realm! Tell the queen you will confess your vile treason, tell your son to lay down his sword and proclaim Joffrey as the true heir. Cersei knows you as a man of honor. lf you give her the peace she needs, and promise to carry her secret to your grave, l believe she will allow you to take the black and live out your days on the Wall with your brother and your bastard son.

title: Baelor
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You think my life is some precious thing to me? That l would trade my honor for a few more years of... of what? You grew up with actors. You learned their craft and you learnt it well. But l grew up with soldiers. l learned how to die a long time ago.

title: Baelor
Name: varys
text: varys: Pity. Such a pity. What of your daughter's life, my lord? ls that a precious thing to you?

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: lt's a birthday message to his grand-niece Walda.

title: Baelor
Name: theon
text: theon: Or so Walder Frey would have you think.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Keep shooting them down. We can't risk Lord Walder sending word of your movements to the Lannisters.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: He's Grandfather's bannerman. We can't expect his support?

title: Baelor
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: Expect nothing of Walder Frey and you'll never be surprised. Look.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: Father rots in a dungeon. How long before they take his head? We need to cross the Trident and we need to do it now.

title: Baelor
Name: theon
text: theon: Just march up to his gates and tell him you're crossing. We've got five times his numbers. You can take the Twins if you have to.

title: Baelor
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: Not in time. Tywin Lannister marches north as we speak.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: The Freys have held the crossing for 600 years, and for 600 years they have never failed to exact their toll.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: Have my horse saddled and ready.

title: Baelor
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: Enter the Twins alone and he'll sell you to the Lannisters as he likes.

title: Baelor
Name: theon
text: theon: Or throw you in a dungeon. Or slit your throat.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: My father would do whatever it took to secure our crossing. Whatever it took. lf l'm going to lead this army, l can't have other men doing my bargaining for me.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: l agree. l'll go.

title: Baelor
Name: everyone
text: everyone: You can't!

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: l have known Lord Walder since l was a girl. He would never harm me.

title: Baelor
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: Unless there was a profit in it.

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: What do you want?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: lt is a great pleasure to see you again after so many years, my lord.

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: Oh, spare me. Your boy's too proud to come before me himself. What am l supposed to do with you?

title: Baelor
Name: stevron
text: stevron: Father, you forget yourself. Lady Stark is –

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: Who asked you? You're not Lord Frey yet, not until l die. Do l look dead to you?

title: Baelor
Name: ryger
text: ryger: Father, please –

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: l need lessons in courtesy from you, bastard? Your mother would still be a milkmaid if l hadn't squirted you into her belly.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: ls there somewhere we can talk?

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: We're talking right now. Fine. Out! All of you!

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: l'm sure she will give you many sons.

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: Huh. Your father didn't come to the wedding.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: He is quite ill, my lord.

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: Huh. Didn't come to the last one, either. Or the one before that. Your family has always pissed on me.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: My lord, l –

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: Don't deny it. You know it's true. The fine Lord Tully would never marry any of his children to mine.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: l'm sure there were reasons –

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: l didn't need reasons. l needed to get rid of sons and daughters. You see how they pile up? Why are you here?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: To ask you to open your gates, my lord, so my son and his bannermen may cross the Trident and be on their way.

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: Why should l let him?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: lf you could climb your own battlements, you would see that he has 20,000 men outside your walls.

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: There will be 20,000 corpses when Tywin Lannister gets here. Don't try and frighten me, Lady Stark. Your husbando s in a cell beneath the Red Keep and your son's got no fur to keep his balls warm.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You swore an oath to my father.

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: Oh, yes, l said some words. And l swore oaths to the crown too, if l remember right. Joffrey's king now, which makes your boy and his corpses-to-be nothing but rebels, it seems to me. lf l had the sense the gods gave a fish, l'd hand you both over to the Lannisters.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Why don't you?

title: Baelor
Name: walder
text: walder: Stark, Tully, Lannister, Baratheon. Give me one good reason why l should waste a single thought on any of you?

title: Baelor
Name: voices
text: voices: And engage!

title: Baelor
Name: jeor
text: jeor: When does Aemon think you'll be able to use that hand?

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: Soon, he says.

title: Baelor
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Good. You'll be ready for this, then. l thought a wolf was more appropriate for you than a bear so l had a new pommel made. lt's called Longclaw. Works as well for a wolf as a bear, l think.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: This is Valyrian steel.

title: Baelor
Name: jeor
text: jeor: lt was my father's sword, his father before him. The Mormonts have carried it for five centuries. lt was meant for my son Jorah. He brought dishonor to our House, but he had the grace to leave the sword before he fled from Westeros.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: My lord, you honor me, but l can't –

title: Baelor
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Oh, you can. And you will. l wouldn't be standing here if it wasn't for you and your beast. A bloody dead man tried to kill me, so you'll take it. l'll hear no more about it. ls that understood?

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: Yes, my lord.

title: Baelor
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Right. Now, don't think this means l approve of this nonsense with you and Alliser Thorne. That's a man's sword. lt'll take a man to wield it.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: l'll apologize to Ser Alliser tonight.

title: Baelor
Name: jeor
text: jeor: No, you won't. l sent him to King's Landing yesterday. The hand that your wolf tore off that thing's wrist – l've ordered Thorne to lay it at the feet of this boy king. That should get young Joffrey's attention. And it, uh, puts a thousand leagues between you and Thorne. Now go and put your sword somewhere safe and bring me my supper.

title: Baelor
Name: unidentified
text: unidentified: Well done. Well done.

title: Baelor
Name: nights
text: nights: You earned that, Snow.

title: Baelor
Name: nights
text: nights: Well done.

title: Baelor
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Go on, let's have a look.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: At what?

title: Baelor
Name: grenn
text: grenn: The sword! Show us the sword.

title: Baelor
Name: all
text: all: Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword!

title: Baelor
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Let's have a look.

title: Baelor
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Piss off.

title: Baelor
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Come on, l want to have a look at it in the light. Give it here!

title: Baelor
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Look at its eyes.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: What is it?

title: Baelor
Name: sam
text: sam: l - l can't.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: You can't what?

title: Baelor
Name: sam
text: sam: l'm really not supposed to say.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: And yet you really want to say. You want to say that…

title: Baelor
Name: sam
text: sam: There was a raven. l read the message to Maester Aemon. lt's your brother Robb.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: What? What about him?

title: Baelor
Name: sam
text: sam: He's heading south. To war. All his bannermen have rallied to his side, they'll keep him safe.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: l should be there. l should be with him.

title: Baelor
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: lf we do that, they'll never get back across.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: Well? What did he say?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Lord Walder has granted your crossing. His men are yours, as well.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: Huh.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Less the 400 he will keep here to hold the crossing against any who would pursue you.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: What does he want in return?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You will be taking on his son Olyvar as your personal squire. He expects a knighthood in good time.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: Fine, fine. And?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And Arya will marry his son Waldron when they both come of age.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: She won't be happy about that. And?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And when the fighting is done you will marry one of his daughters. Whichever you prefer. He has a number he thinks will be suitable.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: l see. Did you get a look at his daughters?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: l did.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: And?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: One was – Do you consent?

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: Can l refuse?

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Not if you want to cross.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: Then l consent.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: Sam said you wanted to see me?

title: Baelor
Name: maester
text: maester: l did indeed. Perhaps you would be kind enough to assist me. Tell me, did you ever wonder why the men of the Night's Watch take no wives and father no children?

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: No.

title: Baelor
Name: maester
text: maester: So they will not love. Love is the death of duty. lf the day should ever come when your lord father was forced to choose between honor on the one hand and those he loves on the other, what would he do?

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: He would do whatever was right, no matter what.

title: Baelor
Name: maester
text: maester: Then Lord Stark is one man in 10,000. Most of us are not so strong. What is honor compared to a woman's love? And what is duty against the feel of a newborn son in your arms? Or a brother's smile?

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: Sam told you.

title: Baelor
Name: maester
text: maester: We're all human. Oh, we all do our duty when there's no cost to it. Honor comes easy then. Yet sooner or later in every man's life there comes a day when it is not easy. A day when he must choose.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: And this is my day? ls that what you're saying?

title: Baelor
Name: maester
text: maester: Oh, it hurts, boy. Oh, yes. l know.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: You do not know. No one knows. l may be a bastard, but he is my father and Robb is my brother.

title: Baelor
Name: maester
text: maester: The gods were cruel when they saw fit to test my vows. They waited till l was old. What could l do when the ravens brought the news from the South

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: Who are you?

title: Baelor
Name: maester
text: maester: My father was Maekar, the first of his name. My brother Aegon reigned after him when l had refused the throne. And he was followed by his son Aerys whom they called the Mad King.

title: Baelor
Name: jon
text: jon: You're Aemon Targaryen.

title: Baelor
Name: maester
text: maester: l'm a maester of the Citadel, bound in service to Castle Black and the Night's Watch. l will not tell you to stay or go. You must make that choice yourself and live with it for the rest of your days. As l have.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My lord… My sun and stars… Drogo.

title: Baelor
Name: khal
text: khal: My horse…

title: Baelor
Name: cohollo
text: cohollo: Blood of my blood…

title: Baelor
Name: khal
text: khal: No, l must ride.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: He fell from his horse. A Khal who cannot ride is no Khal.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He's tired, that's all. He needs to rest. We've ridden far enough today. We'll camp here.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: This is no place to camp. A woman does not give us orders. Not even a Khaleesi.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We'll camp here. Tell them Khal Drogo commanded it.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: You do not command me, Khaleesi.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Find Mirri Maz Duur. Bring her to me.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: The witch? l'll bring you her head, Khaleesi.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Bring her to me unharmed or Khal Drogo will hear why you denied me.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: Hyah! Hyah!

title: Baelor
Name: kevan
text: kevan: Our scouts tell us the Stark host has moved south from the Twins with Lord Frey's levies in tow. They're a day's march north.

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The boy may lack experience and sense, but he does have a certain mindless provincial courage.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh, do continue. Didn't mean to interrupt.

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: l do hope your savages are going to be of some use, otherwise we've wasted good steel on them.

title: Baelor
Name: kevan
text: kevan: The great hairy one insisted he must have two battleaxes. Heavy black steel, double-sided.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Shagga likes axes.

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: When the battle commences, you and your wildlings will be in the vanguard.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The vanguard? Me and the tribesmen on the front lines?

title: Baelor
Name: kevan
text: kevan: They do seem rather ferocious.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Ferocious? Last night a Moon Brother stabbed a Stone Crow over a sausage. Three Stone Crows seized the Moon Brother and opened his throat. Bronn managed to keep Shagga from chopping off the dead man's cock, which was fortunate, but even still, Ulf is demanding blood money, which Shagga and Gunthor refuse to pay.

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: When soldiers lack discipline, the fault lies with their commander.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Surely there are ways to have me killed that would be less detrimental to the war effort.

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: There'll be no more discussion on the matter.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: lt appears l'm not hungry after all. Excuse me, my lords.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Where did you find one so pretty at this hour?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: l took her.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Took her? From whom?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: From, uh, Ser What's-his-name? l don't know. Ginger cunt, three tents down.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And he didn't have anything to say about it?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: He said something.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, the odds of me living long enough for him to retaliate have just dropped drastically. We'll be at the vanguard tomorrow.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Oh, well. l, uh, think l'll go and find myself one.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Who are you?

title: Baelor
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute: Who would you like me to be?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What did your mother call you?

title: Baelor
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute: Shae. What did your mother call you?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My mother died giving birth to me.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: ls that why l'm here? So we can talk about our mothers?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What sort of accent is that?

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Foreign.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: For-

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: What do you want from me?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What do l want from you? l want you to share my tent. l want you to pour my wine, laugh at my jokes, rub my legs when they're sore after a day's ride. l want you to take no other man to bed for as long as we're together. And l want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world. Which it may well be.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: And what do l get?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: One - safety. No one will hurt you for as long as you're mine. Two - the pleasure of my company, which l have heard is spectacular.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Who told you this? Women you paid?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And three - more gold than you can spend if you lived a thousand years. Do you accept my proposal?

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Let's start with your last night in this world.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Khaleesi.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Come. He's very strong. No one understands how strong he is.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He will die tonight, Khaleesi.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He can't. He can't. l won't let him.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Even a queen doesn't have that power. We must go quickly. l've heard there's a good port in Asshai.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l won't leave him.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He's already gone, Khaleesi.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Even if he dies, why would l run? l am khaleesi, and my my son will be khal after Drogo.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: This isn't Westeros, where men honor blood. Here they only honor strength. There will be fighting after Drogo dies. Whoever wins that fight will be the new khal. He won't want any rivals. Your boy will be plucked from your breast and given to the dogs.

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: The wound has festered.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: You did this, witch.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Stop it! l don't want her hurt.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: No? No? You don't want her hurt? Pray we don't hurt you, too. You let this witch put her hands on our Khal.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Rein in your tongue. She is still your Khaleesi.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: Only while the blood of my blood lives. When he dies, she is nothing.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l have never been nothing. l am the blood of the dragon.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: The dragons are all dead, Khaleesi.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l think you should wear your armor tonight, ser.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: l think you're right.

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: You've saved me once more.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And now you must save him.

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: He's beyond the healer's skills. All l can do is ease his path.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Save him and l will free you. l swear it. You must know a way. Some – some magic.

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: There is a spell. Some would say death is cleaner.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Do it. Save him.

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: There is a price.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You'll have gold, whatever you want.

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: lt's not a matter of gold. This is blood magic. Only death pays for life.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My death?

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: No, not your death, Khaleesi. Bring me his horse.

title: Baelor
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: Khaleesi, do not do this thing. Let me kill this witch.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Kill her and you kill your khal.

title: Baelor
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: This is blood magic. lt is forbidden.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l am your khaleesi. l tell you what is forbidden.

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: Go. Now.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Take her and leave. Take her!

title: Baelor
Name: mirri
text: mirri: You must go also, lady. Once l begin to sing, no one must enter the tent. The dead will dance here tonight.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No one will enter.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Bring him back to me.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l have to save him.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: This must not be.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: This must be.

title: Baelor
Name: qotho
text: qotho: Witch.

title: Baelor
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: Nothing good will come of this.

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No, you can't.

title: Baelor
Name: irri
text: irri: Khaleesi!

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No further, horselord.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Are you hurt?

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The baby –

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Hmm?

title: Baelor
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: is coming.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Fetch the midwives.

title: Baelor
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: They will not come. They say she is cursed.

title: Baelor
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They'll come or l'll have their heads.

title: Baelor
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: The witch - she can bring baby. l hear her say so.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Are you in agony, my lion?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: You look like you're in agony. The fire is burning your pretty soft skin.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Ah! Damn you, woman. Are you immune to pain?

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Just used to it.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Drink.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Let's play a new game.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: There's a Braavosi knife game l could teach you.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Does it involve the potential for losing fingers?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Not if you win.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No! No fire games, no knife games. Let's do something l'm good at.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: What are you good at?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: l happen to be a great judge of character.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: This sounds like a boring game.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: lt's not. Here's how it works - l make a statement about your past. lf l'm right, you drink. lf l'm wrong, l drink. And no lying. l'll know if you're lying.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: l don't want to play this game.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Fine. Bronn first. Your father beat you.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: But my mother hit harder.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You killed your first man before you were 12.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: lt was a woman. She swung an axe at me.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You've been north of the Wall.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: What brought you up there?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Work.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And you once loved a woman many years ago, but it turned out badly so you've never let yourself love again. Oh, wait, that's me. Your turn, my mysterious foreign beauty.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: l don't want to play.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: lt's fun! Look at the fun we're having. Your mother was a whore.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Drink.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: All right. Your father left the family when you were very young, never to return.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And we've established the rules about lying?

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Drink!

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You wanted a different life. You came from somewhere and you wanted to be elsewhere.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: The whole shit-stained world could drink off that one.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So, specifics… You wanted to be elsewhere, but how would you get there? l don't believe the life of the Silent Sisters is for you. So, what's a lowborn girl to do?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Are you sure –

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Drink! And don't talk about my mother and father ever, or l will carve your eyes from your head.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My dear lady, if l have offended you, l apologize.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: My turn.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Fine, fine. Ask away. Try to penetrate the enigma that is me.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Who were you in love with?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That's not how the game works.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: l don't care the way the game works.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Our lord here used to be married.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Married?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How did you hear that?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You hear lots of things playing dice with Lannister soldiers.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Another night, perhaps.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Not another night. This night.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: lt's not a pleasant story.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: Oh, maybe l will cry.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: l'm guessing the lady and l can tell more unpleasant stories than your lordship.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So l was 16. My brother Jaime and l were riding, when we heard a scream. She ran out onto the road, clothes half torn off, with two men on her heels. Jaime scared away the men easily enough, while l wrapped her in my cloak. She was too scared to send off on her own, so while Jaime hunted down the rapers l took her to the nearest inn and fed her. Her name was Tysha. She was a wheelwright's orphan. And she was hungry. Together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine. lmpossible as it seems, there was a time when l was unaccustomed to wine. l forgot how afraid l was around girls. how l was always waiting for them to laugh at me or look away embarrassed, or ask me about my tall, handsome brother. l forgot about everything but Tysha. And somehow l found myself in her bed.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: For three chickens, l should hope so.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: lt didn't last long. l didn't know what the hell l was doing. But she was good to me. She kissed me afterwards and sang me a song. And by morning l was deep enough in love to ask for her hand. A few lies, a few gold coins, one drunken septon and there you have it - man and wife. For a fortnight anyway, until the septon sobered up and told my father.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Well, l imagine that was the end of all that.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Not quite. First, my father had Jaime tell me the truth. The girl was a whore, you see. Jaime had arranged the whole thing - the road, the rapers, all of it. He thought it was time l had a woman. After my brother confessed, my father brought in my wife and gave her to his guards. He paid her well - a silver for each man.
