How many whores command that kind of price? He brought me into the barracks and made me watch. By the end, she had so much silver that the coins were slipping through her fingers and rolling on to the floor.

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: l would have killed the man who did that to me.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: You should have known she was a whore.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Really? l was 16, drunk and in love.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: A girl who was almost raped doesn't invite another man into her bed two hours later.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: As l said, l was young and stupid.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: You are still young and stupid.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What is it? What do you want?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You're sleeping through the war.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: They stole a night's march on us. They're a mile north.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Get my squire!

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You don't have a squire.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: lf l die, weep for me.

title: Baelor
Name: shae
text: shae: You'll be dead. How will you know?

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: l'll know.

title: Baelor
Name: lannister
text: lannister: Watch out! Move!

title: Baelor
Name: lannister
text: lannister: Out of the way! Move aside!

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Stay low.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Stay low?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: lf you're lucky, no one will notice you.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: l was born lucky. Tribesmen of the Vale, gather round! Stone Crows! Black Ears! Burned Men! Moon Brothers! And Painted Dogs! Your dominion over the Vale begins now! Onward, to claim what is yours!

title: Baelor
Name: tribesmen
text: tribesmen: Half man! Half man! Half man! Half man! Half man! Half man!

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: To battle!

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You're a shit warrior.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: l'm alive?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You're alive.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Did we win?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: We wouldn't be having this conversation if we didn't.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How did our tribesmen do?

title: Baelor
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Yeah, good.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: lt's nice to see them getting along.

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You're wounded.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Good of you to notice. l hear we won.

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Huh! The scouts were wrong. There were 2,000 Stark bannermen, not 20 [thousand].

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Did we get the Stark boy, at least?

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: He wasn't here.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Where was he?

title: Baelor
Name: tywin
text: tywin: With his other 18,000 men.

title: Baelor
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And where are they?

title: Baelor
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik: We should go, my lady.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: No!

title: Baelor
Name: rodrik
text: rodrik: My lady!

title: Baelor
Name: stark
text: stark: Hyah! Hyah!

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: By the time they knew what was happening, it had already happened.

title: Baelor
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Lady Stark. l'd offer you my sword, but l seem to have lost it.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: lt is not your sword l want. Give me my daughters back. Give me my husband.

title: Baelor
Name: jaime
text: jaime: l've lost them too, l'm afraid.

title: Baelor
Name: theon
text: theon: Kill him, Robb. Send his head to his father. He cut down ten of our men. You saw him.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: He's more use to us alive than dead.

title: Baelor
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Take him away and put him in irons.

title: Baelor
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We could end this war right now, boy, save thousands of lives. You fight for the Starks, l fight for the Lannisters. Swords or lances, teeth, nails - choose your weapons and let's end this here and now.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: lf we do it your way, Kingslayer, you'd win. We're not doing it your way.

title: Baelor
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: Come on, pretty man.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: l sent 2,000 men to their graves today.

title: Baelor
Name: theon
text: theon: The bards will sing songs of their sacrifice.

title: Baelor
Name: robb
text: robb: Aye. But the dead won't hear them. One victory does not make us conquerors. Did we free my father? Did we rescue my sisters from the queen? Did we free the North from those who want us on our knees? This war is far from over.

title: Baelor
Name: arya
text: arya: Could l have one? A lemon one or any of them.

title: Baelor
Name: kings
text: kings: Three coppers.

title: Baelor
Name: arya
text: arya: How about a nice fat pigeon?

title: Baelor
Name: kings
text: kings: Oh, piss off now. Go on.

title: Baelor
Name: arya
text: arya: Do you have any stale ones from yesterday? Or any burnt ones?

title: Baelor
Name: kings
text: kings: Piss off!

title: Baelor
Name: arya
text: arya: Hey, where's everyone going? What's happening?

title: Baelor
Name: street
text: street: They're taking him to the Sept of Baelor.

title: Baelor
Name: arya
text: arya: Who?

title: Baelor
Name: street
text: street: The Hand of the King.

title: Baelor
Name: populace
text: populace: Traitor! Coward!

title: Baelor
Name: eddark
text: eddark: Baelor!

title: Baelor
Name: populace
text: populace: Traitor! Traitor!

title: Baelor
Name: eddark
text: eddark: I am Eddard Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Hand of the King. I come before you to confess my treason in the sight of Gods and men. I betrayed the faith of my King and the trust of my friend Robert. I swore to protect and defend his children, but before his blood was cold I plotted to murder his son and seize the Throne for myself. Let the High Septon and Baelor the Blessed bear witness to what I say

title: Baelor
Name: grand
text: grand: As we sin, so do we suffer. This man has confessed his crimes in sight of Gods and men. The Gods are just but beloved Baelor taught us they can also be merciful. What is to be done with this traitor, Your Grace?

title: Baelor
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: My mother wishes me to let Lord Eddard join The Night's Watch. Stripped of all titles and powers, he would serve the realm in permanent exile. And My Lady Sansa has begged mercy for her father. But they have the soft hearts of women. So long as I am your King, treason shall never go unpunished. Ser Ilyn, bring me his head!

title: Baelor
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, stop! Please, someone stop him!

title: Baelor
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My son, this is madness.

title: Baelor
Name: populace
text: populace: Put him down!

title: Baelor
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Don't look!

title: Baelor
Name: arya
text: arya: Let me go.

title: Baelor
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Shut your mouth. Look at me.

title: Baelor
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Stop him, stop!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Look at me. Look at me! Do you remember me now, boy, eh? Remember me? There's a bright boy. You'll be coming with me, boy, and you'll be keeping your mouth shut.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Keep your mouth shut, boy.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: arya
text: arya: l'm not a boy!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: yoren
text: yoren: You're not a smart boy, is that what you're trying to say? Do you want to live, boy?! North, boy, we're going north.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: bran
text: bran: lt had three eyes. lt told me to come with him, so l did. We went down into the crypts and my father was there.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: osha
text: osha: Your father's not down there, little lord. Not for many years yet.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: bran
text: bran: You're afraid. Just like Hodor.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: osha
text: osha: l'm not afraid of some hole in the ground.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: bran
text: bran: You've lived beyond the Wall. What are you scared of? l'm a crippled boy and l'm willing to go.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: bran
text: bran: That's my grandfather, Lord Rickard. He was burned alive by the Mad King, Aerys. That's Lyanna, my father's sister. King Robert was supposed to marry her, but Rhaegar Targaryen kidnapped her. Robert started a war to win her back. He killed Rhaegar, but she died anyway. That's where l saw Father.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: osha
text: osha: You see? He's not here.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: rickon
text: rickon: Here, Shaggydog.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: bran
text: bran: Rickon!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: osha
text: osha: That beast is supposed to be chained in the kennels!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: rickon
text: rickon: He doesn't like chains.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: bran
text: bran: What are you doing down here? Come back up with us.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: rickon
text: rickon: No, l came to see Father.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: bran
text: bran: How many times have l told you? He's in King's Landing with Sansa and Arya.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: rickon
text: rickon: He was down here. l saw him.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: bran
text: bran: Saw him when?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: rickon
text: rickon: Last night, when l was sleeping. Here, Shaggydog.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: osha
text: osha: You both miss him. lt's only natural he should be in your thoughts and dreams, but that doesn't mean that –

title: Fire and Blood
Name: maester
text: maester: Bran…

title: Fire and Blood
Name: several
text: several: My lady. My lady. My lady.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Robb. Robb! You've ruined your sword.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Shh! Shh! Shh!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: robb
text: robb: l'll kill them all. Every one of them. l will kill them all.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: My boy. They have your sisters. We have to get the girls back. And then we will kill them all.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Very amusing. lsn't it a funny song? Thank you for your rendition. l imagine it was even better received at that tavern.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: marillion
text: marillion: l'm so sorry, Your Grace. l'll never sing it again, l swear.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Tell me, which do you favor - your fingers or your tongue?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: marillion
text: marillion: Your Grace?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Fingers or your tongue? lf you got to keep one, which would it be? Or l could just cut your throat.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: marillion
text: marillion: Every man needs hands, Your Grace.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Good. Tongue it is.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: marillion
text: marillion: Your Grace, please. l won't sing, Your Grace.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Ser llyn, who better than you to carry out the sentence?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: marillion
text: marillion: l beg you! Please, no. No!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: marillion
text: marillion: Your Grace, please. l beg you, l will never sing again! No!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: l'm done for the day. l'll leave the rest of the matters to you, Mother.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: marillion
text: marillion: Your Grace, please!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: You look quite nice.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Thank you, my lord.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Your Grace. l'm King now.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: marillion
text: marillion: Stop! No!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Walk with me. l want to show you something.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Do as you're bid, child.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: And as soon as you've had your blood, l'll put a son in you. Mother says that shouldn't be long.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No! Please, no!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: This one's your father. This one here. Look at it and see what happens to traitors.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You promised to be merciful.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: l was. l gave him a clean death. Look at him.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Please let me go home. l won't do any treason, l swear –

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Mother says l'm still to marry you. So you'll stay here, and obey. Look at him!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Well?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How long do l have to look?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: As long as it pleases me. Do you want to see the rest?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sansa
text: sansa: lf it please Your Grace.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: That's your Septa there. l'll tell you what, l'm going to give you a present. After l raise my armies and kill your traitor brother, l'm going to give you his head as well.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Or maybe he'll give me yours.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Here, girl.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Will you obey now? Or do you need another lesson? l'll look for you in court.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Save yourself some pain, girl. Give him what he wants.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You'll be needing that again.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jonos
text: jonos: The proper course is clear - pledge fealty to King Renly and move south to join our forces with his.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: robb
text: robb: Renly is not the king.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jonos
text: jonos: You cannot mean to hold to Joffrey, my lord. He put your father to death.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: robb
text: robb: That doesn't make Renly king. He's Robert's youngest brother. lf Bran can't be Lord of Winterfell before me, Renly can't be king before Stannis.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jonos
text: jonos: Do you mean to declare us for Stannis?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: galbart
text: galbart: Renly is not right! lf we put ourselves behind Stannis…

title: Fire and Blood
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: My Lords. My Lords! Here is what l say to these two kings. Renly Baratheon is nothing to me, nor Stannis neither. Why should they rule over me and mine from some flowery seat in the South? What do they know of the Wall or the Wolfswood? Even their gods are wrong! Why shouldn't we rule ourselves again? lt was the dragons we bowed to and now the dragons are dead! There sits the only king l mean to bend my knee to - the King in the North!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: rickard
text: rickard: l'll have peace on those terms. They can keep their Red Castle and their iron chair too. The King in the North!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: theon
text: theon: Am l your brother, now and always?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: robb
text: robb: Now and always.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: theon
text: theon: My sword is yours in victory and defeat, from this day until my last day.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: greatjon
text: greatjon: The King in the North!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: all
text: all: The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: stark
text: stark: Lady Stark.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: l want to see him. Now! Leave us.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Leave us.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You look lovely tonight, Lady Stark. Widowhood becomes you. Your bed must be lonely. ls that why you came? l'm not at my best, but l think l could be of service. You slip out of that gown and we'll see if l'm up to it. Oh, l do like a violent woman.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: l will kill you tonight, Ser. Pack your head in a box and send it to your sister.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Let me show you how. Hit me again, over the ear. And again and again. You're stronger than you look, it shouldn't take long.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: That is what you want the world to believe, isn't it? That you don't fear death.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime: But l don't, my lady. The dark is coming for all of us. Why cry about it?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Because you are going to the deepest of the seven hells, if the gods are just.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What gods are those? The trees your husband prayed to? Where were the trees when his head was getting chopped off? lf your gods are real and if they are just why is the world so full of injustice?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Because of men like you.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime: There are no men like me. Only me.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: My son Bran. How did he come to fall from that tower?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime: l pushed him out the window.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Why?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I hoped the fall would kill him.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You should get some sleep. lt's going to be a long war.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: lancel
text: lancel: l can't believe we're actually at war. Was it this exciting last time, when you were young? What does it say? Have we captured Robb Stark yet? What's our next move?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Stop talking. Get back into bed.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tywin
text: tywin: They have my son.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Stark boy appears to be less green than we'd hoped.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: leo
text: leo: l've heard his wolf killed a dozen men and as many horses.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: addam
text: addam: ls it true about Stannis and Renly?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: kevan
text: kevan: Both Baratheon brothers have taken up against us. Jaime captured, his armies scattered. lt's a catastrophe. Perhaps we should sue for peace.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There's your peace. Joffrey saw to that when he decided to remove Ned Stark's head. You'll have an easier time drinking from that cup than you will bringing Robb Stark to the table now. He's winning – in case you hadn't noticed.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: kevan
text: kevan: l'm told we still have his sisters.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: leo
text: leo: The first order of business is ransoming Ser Jaime.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: addam
text: addam: Kevan Lannister

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tywin
text: tywin: They have my son! Get out, all of you. Not you. You were right about Eddard Stark. lf he were alive, we could have used him to broker a peace with Winterfell and Riverrun, which would have given us more time to deal with Robert's brothers. But now – madness. Madness and stupidity. l always thought you were a stunted fool. Perhaps l was wrong.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Half wrong. l'm new to strategy, but unless we want to be surrounded by three armies, it appears we can't stay here.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tywin
text: tywin: No one will stay here. Ser Gregor will head out with 500 riders and set the Riverland on fire from Godo s Eye to the Red Fork. The rest of us will regroup at Harrenhal. And you will go to King's Landing.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And do what?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Rule. You will serve as Hand of the King in my stead. You will bring that boy king to heel, and his mother too, if needs be. And if you get so much as a whiff of treason from any of the rest – Baelish, Varys, Pycelle…

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Heads, spikes, walls. Why not my uncle? Why not anyone? Why me?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You're my son. Oh, one more thing. You will not take that whore to court. Do you understand?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Ser Jorah?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Gently, gently.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My son – where is he? l want him. Where is he?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The boy did not live.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Tell me.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: What is there to tell?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How did my son die?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He never lived, my princess. The women say –

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What do the women say?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They say the child was –

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: Monstrous, twisted. l pulled him out myself. He was scaled like a lizard, blind, with leather wings like the wings of a bat. When l touched him the skin fell from his bones. Inside he was full of graveworms. l warned you that only death can pay for life. You knew the price.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Where is Khal Drogo? Show him to me. Show me what l bought with my son's life.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: As you command, lady. Come. l will take you to him.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Time enough for that later –

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l want to see him now.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The khalasar is gone.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: A khal who cannot ride is no khal. The Dothraki follow only the strong. l'm sorry, my Princess.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Drogo! My sun and stars. Why is he out here alone?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He seems to like the warmth, Princess.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: He lives. You asked for life, you paid for life.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: This is not life. When will he be as he was?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: When the sun rises in the west, sets in the east. When the seas go dry. When the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Leave us.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: l don't want you alone with this sorceress.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l have nothing more to fear from this woman. Go.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You knew what l was buying and you knew the price.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: lt was wrong of them to burn my temple. lt angered the Great Shepherd.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: This is not Godo s work. My child was innocent.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: lnnocent? He would have been The Stallion Who Mounts The World. Now he will burn no cities. Now his khalasar will trample no nations into dust.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l spoke for you. l saved you.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: Saved me? Three of those riders had already raped me before you saved me, girl. l saw my godo s house burn, there where l had healed men and women beyond counting. ln the streets l saw piles of heads, the head of the baker who makes my bread, the head of a young boy that l had cured of fever just three moons past. So tell me again exactly what it was that you saved?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Your life.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: Why don't you take a look at your khal. Then you will see exactly what life is worth when all the rest has gone.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: You can't!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: Get out of my way, Sam.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: They'll put out the word. They'll send out ravens. People will come after you. Do you know what happens to deserters?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: Better than you do.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: What are you going to do?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: l'm gonna find my brother and put a sword through King Joffrey's throat.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: You can't leave us now. We need you here.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: Move.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: l won't let you go.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: No.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: Hyah!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: shae
text: shae: Hand of the King?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So it would seem.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: shae
text: shae: And your father said you couldn't take anyone with you to King's Landing?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, he said l couldn't take with me to King's Landing. He was very specific on that point.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: shae
text: shae: He knew my name?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: shae
text: shae: He said, "Don't bring Shae with you to King's Landing"?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: l believe he used the word "whore".

title: Fire and Blood
Name: shae
text: shae: Are you ashamed of me? Are you afraid that l'm dancing around the court with my tits out?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm funny now? l'm Shae, the funny whore.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My father's probably the most powerful man in the country. Certainly the richest. He has all Seven Kingdoms in his pockets. Everyone everywhere always has to do exactly what my father says. He's always been a cunt. l believe the ladies of the court could learn a great deal from a girl like you. Why don't you come with me, be the Hando s lady? Because the King needs a Hand and the Hand –

title: Fire and Blood
Name: shae
text: shae: l know what a Hand needs.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: Ghost?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: Hyah! Hyah! Hyah! Hyah!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Samwell!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: pyp
text: pyp: ls he dead?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grenn
text: grenn: No, he's not dead.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: Did we get him?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Come on, help me get him up.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Lucky you've got plenty of padding. We're taking you back to where you belong.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: l belong with my brother.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: But we're your brothers now.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grenn
text: grenn: They'll kill you if they find out you've gone.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: They'll kill you if they know you came after me. Go back.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Sam told us everything. We're sorry about your father.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grenn
text: grenn: But it doesn't matter. You took the oath. You can't leave.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: l have to.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grenn
text: grenn: You can't. You said the words.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: I don't care about –

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: Hear my words and bear witness to my vow

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: To hell with all of you.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Night gathers and now my watch begins. lt shall not end until my death. l shall live and die at my post.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grenn
text: grenn: l am the sword in the darkness –

title: Fire and Blood
Name: sam
text: sam: l am the sword in the darkness, the watcher on the walls, the shield that guards the realms of men. l pledge my life and honor to the Night's Watch, for this night and all nights to come.”

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Do you remember our first ride, my sun and stars? lf you are in there, if you haven't gone away, show me. You're a fighter. You've always been a fighter. l need you to fight now. l know you're very far away, but come back to me, my sun and stars.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: When the sun rises in the west and sets in the east. Then you shall return to me, my sun and stars.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grand
text: grand: Kings? Oh, l can tell you all there is to know about kings. The thing you need to understand about kings is – For the past 67 years, l've known truly known more kings than any man alive. They're complicated men, but l know how to serve them. Yes, and keep on serving them. Aerys Targaryen. Of all the thousand thousand maladies the Gods visit on us, madness is the worst. He was a good man. Such a charmer. To watch him melt away before my eyes, consumed by dreams of fire and blood. Robert Baratheon was an entirely different animal – powerful man, great warrior, but alas - winning a kingdom and ruling a kingdom are rather different things. They say that if a man goes through life with his battle visor down, he can often be blind to the enemies at his side. Now l serve his son King Joffrey, may the Gods bless his reign.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grand
text: grand: He is a capable young man. Strong military mind. Stern. But sternness in defense of the realm is no vice. lt's far too soon to know what manner of king he will be, but l sense true greatness on the horizon for our new King. Mmm. True greatness.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: ros
text: ros: So what's the thing?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grand
text: grand: What thing?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: ros
text: ros: About kings. You said, "The thing you need to understand about kings".

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grand
text: grand: What? Things? What?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: ros
text: ros: When you started, you… Never mind.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grand
text: grand: Let me see you out, my dear.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: ros
text: ros: lt's all right. No need.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: grand
text: grand: Yes, yes. Till the next time. Right.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look? Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: lt's hard for them to simper and bow without heads.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: A man with great ambition and no morals… l wouldn't bet against you.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: And what would you do, my friend, if you found yourself sitting up there?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: l must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be King.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You must be one of the few men in the city who isn't a man.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: Oh, you can do better than that.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: When they castrated you, did they take the pillar with the stones? l've always wondered.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: Have you? Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: l picture a gash. Like a woman's. ls that about right?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: l am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Must be strange for you, even after all these years… a man from another land, despised by most, feared by all.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: Am l? That is good to know. Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: But you carry on whispering in one king's ear and then the next. l admire you.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: And l admire you, Lord Baelish. A grasper from a minor House with a major talent for befriending powerful men – and women.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: A useful talent, l'm sure you'd agree.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: So here we stand in mutual admiration and respect.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Playing our roles.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: Serving a new King.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Long may he reign. My king.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: varys
text: varys: My king.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: My lords. Shall we begin?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: yoren
text: yoren: You're Arry now, hear me? Arry the orphan boy. No one asks an orphan too many questions, ‘cause nobody gives three shits. What's your name?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: arya
text: arya: Arry.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: yoren
text: yoren: You've a long way to travel, and in bad company. l've 20 this time – men and boys all bound for the Wall. Your lord father gave me the pick of the dungeons, and l didn't find no little lordlings down there. This lot – half of them would turn you over to the King quick as spit for a pardon. And the other half would do the same, except they'd rape you first. So keep to yourself – and when you piss, do it in the woods alone. You stay with this lot, boy. And stay or l'll lock you in the back of the wagon with these three.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: hot
text: hot: Watch yourself, midget.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: lommy
text: lommy: He's got a sword, this one.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: hot
text: hot: What's a gutter rat like you doing with a sword?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: lommy
text: lommy: Maybe he's a little squire.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: hot
text: hot: He ain't no squire. Look at him. He looks like a girl. l bet he stole that sword.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: lommy
text: lommy: Let's have a look.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: hot
text: hot: l could use me a sword like that.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: lommy
text: lommy: Take it off him.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: hot
text: hot: Give it here, midget.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: lommy
text: lommy: Look at him! You'd better give Hot Pie the sword. l've seen him kick a boy to death.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: hot
text: hot: l knocked him down and l kicked him in the balls and l kept kicking him until he was dead. l kicked him all to pieces. You better give me that sword!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: arya
text: arya: You want it? l'll give it to you. l already killed one fat boy. l bet you never killed anyone. l bet you're a liar. But l'm not. l'm good at killing fat boys. l like killing fat boys.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Your like picking on the little ones, do you? l've been hammering an anvil these past 10 years. When l hit that steel, it sings. Are you gonna sing when l hit you? This is castle-forged steel. Where'd you steal it?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: arya
text: arya: lt was a gift.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: gendry
text: gendry: lt don't matter now. Where we're going, they don't care what you've done. They've got rapers, pickpockets, highwaymen, murderers.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: arya
text: arya: Which are you?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Armourer's apprentice. But my master got sick of me, so here l am.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Come on, you sorry sons of whores! lt's a thousand leagues from here to the Wall, and winter is coming!

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Ham. How many days in a row must a man be expected to start his day with ham? Bring me some beer at least. You look exhausted. Was your moonlight ride that tiring?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: My friends brought me back.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jeor
text: jeor: l didn't say it was your honor.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: They killed my father.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jeor
text: jeor: And you're gonna bring him back to life, are you? No? Good. We've had enough of that sort of thing. Beyond the Wall, the Rangers are reporting whole villages abandoned. At night they see fires blazing in the mountains from dusk until dawn. A captured wildling swears their tribes are uniting in some secret stronghold, to what ends the gods only know. Outside Eastwatch Cotter Pyke's men discovered four blue-eyed corpses. Unlike us, they were wise enough to burn them. Do you think your brother's war is more important than ours?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: No.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jeor
text: jeor: When dead men and worse come hunting for us in the night, do you think it matters who sits on the lron Throne?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Good. Because l want you and your wolf with us when we ride out beyond the Wall tomorrow.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jon
text: jon: Beyond the Wall?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jeor
text: jeor: l'll not sit meekly by and wait for the snows. l mean to find out what's happening. The Night's Watch will ride in force against the wildlings, the White Walkers and whatever else is out there. And we will find Benjen Stark, alive or dead. l will command them myself. So l'll only ask you once, Lord Snow, are you a brother of the Night's Watch or a bastard boy who wants to play at war?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: ls this your command, Khaleesi?

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Drogo will have no use for dragon eggs in the Night Lands. Sell them. You can return to the Free Cities and live as a wealthy woman for all your days.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They were not given to me to sell.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Khaleesi, my Queen, l vow to serve you, obey you, to die for you if need be, but let him go, Khaleesi. l know what you intend. Do not.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: l must. You don't understand.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Don't ask me to stand aside as you climb on that pyre. l won't watch you burn.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: ls that what you fear? You will be my khalasar. l see the faces of slaves. l free you. Take off your collars. Go if you wish, no one will stop you. But if you stay it will be as brothers and sisters, as husbands and wives.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Ser Jorah, bind this woman to the pyre. You swore to obey me.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: mirri
text: mirri: You will not hear me scream.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I will. But it is not your screams I want. Only your life.

title: Fire and Blood
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Blood of my blood.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Well struck… Well struck, Dog.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Did you like that?

title: The North Remembers
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It was well struck, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I already said it was well struck.

title: The North Remembers
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Who's next?

title: The North Remembers
Name: announcer
text: announcer: Lothor Brune, freerider in the service of Lord Baelish.

title: The North Remembers
Name: announcer
text: announcer: Ser Dontos the Red of House Hollard.

title: The North Remembers
Name: announcer
text: announcer: Ser Dontos the Red of House Hollard!

title: The North Remembers
Name: ser
text: ser: Here I am. . Here I am. . Sorry, Your Grace. . My deepest apologies. .

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Are you drunk?

title: The North Remembers
Name: ser
text: ser: No. Uh, no, Your Grace. I had - I had two cups of wine.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Two cups? . That's not much at all. . Please, have another cup.

title: The North Remembers
Name: ser
text: ser: Are you sure, Your Grace?

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Yes, to celebrate my name day. Have two, have as much as you like.

title: The North Remembers
Name: ser
text: ser: I would be honored, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Ser Meryn, help Ser Dontos celebrate my name day. See that he drinks his fill.

title: The North Remembers
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You can't!

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What did you say? Did you say I can't?

title: The North Remembers
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I only meant… it would be bad luck to kill a man on your name day.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What kind of stupid peasant's superstition...

title: The North Remembers
Name: sandor
text: sandor: The girl is right. What a man sows on his name day, he reaps all year.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Take him away. I'll have him killed tomorrow, the fool.

title: The North Remembers
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He is. A fool - you're so clever to see it. He'll make a much better fool than a knight. He doesn't deserve the mercy of a quick death.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Did you hear My Lady, Ser Dontos? . From this day, , you'll be my new fool.

title: The North Remembers
Name: ser
text: ser: Thank you, Your Grace. . And you, My Lady, thank you.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Beloved nephew.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We looked for you on the battlefield. . You were nowhere to be found.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I've been here, ruling the kingdoms.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What a fine job you've done. . Look at you. . More beautiful than ever. . And you! You, you're going to be bigger than the Hound, but much better looking. . This one doesn't like me.

title: The North Remembers
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Can't imagine why.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: We heard you were dead.

title: The North Remembers
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: I'm glad you're not dead.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Me, too, dear. Death is so boring, especially now with so much excitement in the world. . My Lady, I'm sorry for your loss.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Her loss? Her father was a confessed traitor!

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But still her father. Surely having so recently lost your own beloved father you can sympathize.

title: The North Remembers
Name: sansa
text: sansa: My father was a traitor. My mother and brother are traitors, too. I am loyal to my beloved Joffrey.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Of course you are.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, , enjoy your name day, Your Grace. Wish I could stay and celebrate, but there is work to be done.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What work? . Why are you here?

title: The North Remembers
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: The raven arrived from the Citadel this morning, Your Grace. The conclave has met, , considered reports from Maesters all over the Seven Kingdoms, and declared this great summer done, at last. The longest summer in living memory.

title: The North Remembers
Name: varys
text: varys: The peasants say, a long summer means an even longer winter.

title: The North Remembers
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: A common superstition.

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: We have enough wheat for a five-year winter. If it lasts any longer, , we'll have fewer peasants.

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: The city's drowning in refugees, Your Grace, fleeing the war. We have nowhere to house them, and with winter coming, it'll only get worse.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You command the City Watch, do you not, Lord Slynt?

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: I do, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And are you not a Lord at my command?

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: I owe my title and lands to your generosity, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Then do your job. Shut the gates to the peasants. They belong in the field, not our capital.

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: Yes, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Don't get up. More ravishing than ever, big sister. . War agrees with you. Forgive the interruption, carry on.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What are you doing here?

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's been a remarkable journey. I, , pissed off the edge of the Wall, I slept in a sky cell. . I fought with the hill tribes. So many adventures, so much to be thankful for.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What are you doing here? This is the small council.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes., well, I, do believe the Hand of the King is welcome at all small council meetings.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Our father is Hand of the King.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, but in his absence…

title: The North Remembers
Name: varys
text: varys: Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as Hand in his stead while he fights -

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Out! All of you out. . I would like to know how you tricked father into this.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If I were capable of tricking father, I'd be emperor of the world by now. You brought this on yourself. .

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I've done nothing.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Quite right. You did nothing when your son called for Ned Stark's head. Now the entire North has risen up against us.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I tried to stop it.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Did you? You failed. That bit of theater will haunt our family for a generation.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Robb Stark is a child.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Who's won every battle he's fought. Do you understand we're losing the war?

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What do you know about warfare?

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Nothing. But I know people. And I know that our enemies hate each other almost as much as they hate us.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Joffrey is King.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Joffrey is King.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You are here to advise him.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm only here to advise him. And if the King listens to what I say, the King might just get his Uncle Jaime back.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: How?

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You love your children. It's your one redeeming quality. That and your cheekbones. The Starks love their children as well. And we have two of them.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: One.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: One?

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Arya, little animal, she disappeared.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Disappeared? What, in a puff of smoke? We had three Starks to trade. You chopped one's head off and let another escape. Father will be furious. It must be odd for you to be the disappointing child.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: My Lord, may the Old Gods watch over your brother and all our northern sons.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: The walls of my Holdfast will not stand the winter. The stones were last mortared in the time of King Aerys, and I'm afraid the masons today are not fit to carry their fathers' hammers. When I was a boy, I remember seeing them put up a new tower at Torrhen's Square in a summer. Men worked back then. Today, my Holdfast looks like it was built by drunk children. At night you can hear the wind howling through the gaps. And the Gods forbid it rains. Why, I might as well sleep beneath a waterfall.

title: The North Remembers
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Maintenance of a Holdfast generally falls to the lord of that Holdfast.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: Generally, yes, but I've sent all the young men off to fight Robb Stark's war.

title: The North Remembers
Name: bran
text: bran: King Robb. And it's not his war. He didn't choose it.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: Maybe not, My Lord, but he called in his Banners, and took the men.

title: The North Remembers
Name: bran
text: bran: Joffrey killed my father, your liege lord. Do you remember your vows, Ser?

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: Of course I remember!

title: The North Remembers
Name: luwin
text: luwin: We can spare four masons for a week, My Lord. Will that be sufficient to repair your walls?

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: I - I believe it will.

title: The North Remembers
Name: luwin
text: luwin: We didn't want him here all day, did we?

title: The North Remembers
Name: bran
text: bran: I didn't like the way he was talking about Robb.

title: The North Remembers
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Nor did I. But listening to people you'd rather not listen to is one of your responsibilities as Lord of Winterfell. . Lord Portan.

title: The North Remembers
Name: portan
text: portan: My Lord, may the Old Gods watch over your brother and all our northern sons.

title: The North Remembers
Name: osha
text: osha: Boil this for an hour and drink the tea. Makes all your pain go away.

title: The North Remembers
Name: bran
text: bran: Don't have any pain.

title: The North Remembers
Name: osha
text: osha: Lucky for you.

title: The North Remembers
Name: bran
text: bran: That way.

title: The North Remembers
Name: osha
text: osha: You've been having those dreams again.

title: The North Remembers
Name: bran
text: bran: I don't dream.

title: The North Remembers
Name: osha
text: osha: Everyone dreams.

title: The North Remembers
Name: bran
text: bran: I don't. Heard some of the men talking about the comet. . They say it's an omen. They say it means Robb will win a great victory in the South.

title: The North Remembers
Name: osha
text: osha: Did they? . I heard some other fools say it's Lannister Red. Means the Lannisters will rule all Seven Kingdoms before long. I heard a stable boy say it's the color of blood, to mark the death of your father.

title: The North Remembers
Name: osha
text: osha: The stars don't fall for men. The red comet means one thing, boy. Dragons.

title: The North Remembers
Name: bran
text: bran: The dragons are all dead. They've been dead for centuries.

title: The North Remembers
Name: doreah
text: doreah: What did your brother say about them, Khaleesi?

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He said they ate meat.

title: The North Remembers
Name: doreah
text: doreah: He didn't tell you what kind of meat?

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My brother didn't know anything about dragons. He didn't know anything about anything.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: She was Drogo's first gift to me.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I remember.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I promised to protect them. Promised them their enemies would die screaming. How do I make starvation scream?

title: The North Remembers
Name: jorah
text: jorah: A trick I never learned, I'm afraid.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Does it ever end?

title: The North Remembers
Name: jorah
text: jorah: This is further east than I've ever been. But, yes, Khaleesi, everything ends, even the red waste.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And you're sure there's no other way?

title: The North Remembers
Name: jorah
text: jorah: If we go south to the land of the Lazarheen, the Lamb Men will kill us and take your dragons. If we go west to the Dothraki Sea, the first Khalasar we meet will kill us and take your dragons.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No one will take my dragons.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They are too weak to fight, as are your people. You must be their strength.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: As you are mine.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Rakharo, Aggo, Kovarro. Take our remaining horses. You will ride east, you southeast, and you northeast.

title: The North Remembers
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: What do we seek, Khaleesi?

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Cities, living or dead. Caravans and people. Rivers or lakes or the great salt sea. Find how far the Red Waste extends before us, and what lies on the other side.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Rokharo, you are my last hope, blood of my blood.

title: The North Remembers
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: I will not fail you, blood of my blood.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You never have.

title: The North Remembers
Name: rakharo
text: rakharo: This is… bad time to start.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jon
text: jon: Having a rough time of it?

title: The North Remembers
Name: sam
text: sam: Nothing's killed me yet.

title: The North Remembers
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Your ass killed the sledge.

title: The North Remembers
Name: sam
text: sam: You offered me a ride!

title: The North Remembers
Name: grenn
text: grenn: I just wanted you to shut up about your damn blisters.

title: The North Remembers
Name: edd
text: edd: I was born in a place like this. Later, I fell on hard times.

title: The North Remembers
Name: sam
text: sam: Are those girls?

title: The North Remembers
Name: edd
text: edd: Craster's daughters.

title: The North Remembers
Name: sam
text: sam: I haven't seen a girl in six months.

title: The North Remembers
Name: edd
text: edd: I'd keep on not seeing them if I were you.

title: The North Remembers
Name: grenn
text: grenn: What, he don't like people messing with his daughters?

title: The North Remembers
Name: edd
text: edd: He don't like people messing with his wives.

title: The North Remembers
Name: edd
text: edd: He marries his daughters, and they give him more daughters, and on, and on it goes.

title: The North Remembers
Name: sam
text: sam: That's foul.

title: The North Remembers
Name: grenn
text: grenn: It's beyond foul.

title: The North Remembers
Name: edd
text: edd: All the other wildlings for a hundred leagues have disappeared. Craster's still here. He must be doing something right.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jon
text: jon: What happens to the boys?

title: The North Remembers
Name: sam
text: sam: Hmm?

title: The North Remembers
Name: jon
text: jon: He marries his daughters. What does he do with his sons?

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: He said he planned to stop here on his way to the Frostfangs.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: People make all sorts of plans. I haven't seen Benjen Stark in three years. Haven't missed him. Always treated me like scum. . Haven't had any good wine for a long time. You Southerners make good wine, I'll give you that.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jon
text: jon: We're not Southerners.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: Who's this little girl? You're prettier than half my daughters. You got a nice wet twat between your legs? What's your name?

title: The North Remembers
Name: jon
text: jon: Jon Snow.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: Snow, eh? Listen to me, bastard. All you lot from south of the Wall, you're Southerners. But now you're in the North, the real North.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: The lad meant no harm.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: I catch that pretty little bastard talking to my daughters -

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: No one will talk to your daughters, you have my word. Now, sit down and shut your mouth.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: You bring any of that good wine with you?

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: We did. We passed through six villages on the way here. All six were abandoned. Where have all the wildlings gone?

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: I could tell you, but I'm thirsty.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: There's a barrel of Dornish wine on the sledge. Bring it in here.

title: The North Remembers
Name: watchman
text: watchman: Yes, commander.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: You want to know where they've all gone? North! To join up with Mance Rayder Your old friend.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: He's no friend of mine. He broke his vows, betrayed his brothers!

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: Oh, aye. But once he was just a poor black crow. And now he's King-Beyond-the-Wall.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: He's been calling himself that for years. What's he king of? A frozen lake somewhere?

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: That's a good-looking axe. Fresh forged?

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: Give it here.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: You'll have another one made at Castle Black. . Here.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: Oh, that's some lovely steel. . You want to know what Mance Rayder is doing? Gathering an army. What I hear, he's already got more men than any of your southern kings.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: And where does he plan marching this army?

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: When you're all the way north, there's only one direction to go.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: These are bad times to be living alone in the wild. The cold winds are rising.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: Let them come. My roots are sunk deep. Wife, tell the Lord Crow how content we are.

title: The North Remembers
Name: gilly
text: gilly: This is our place. Our husband keeps us safe. Better to live free than die a slave.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: Don't it make you jealous, old man, to see me with all these young wives and you with no one to warm your bed?

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: We chose different paths.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: Oh, aye, and you chose the path with no one but boys on it. . You'll be wanting to sleep beneath my roof, I suppose, and eat me out of pigs.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: A roof would be welcome. It's been hard riding. We've brought our own food and good steel for you.

title: The North Remembers
Name: craster
text: craster: Any man lays a hand on one of my wives, he loses the hand. And I see this one, , staring too long, I might just gouge his eyes out.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: Your roof, your rules.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: Who am I? Who am I?

title: The North Remembers
Name: jon
text: jon: Lord commander.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: And who are you?

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: Who are you?

title: The North Remembers
Name: jon
text: jon: Your steward.

title: The North Remembers
Name: lord
text: lord: You want to lead one day? . Then learn how to follow.

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Lord of Light, come to us in our darkness. We offer you these false Gods.

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Take them and cast your light upon us. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: The North Remembers
Name: group
text: group: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: After the long summer, darkness will fall heavy on the world. Stars will bleed.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cressen
text: cressen: We need to stop her!

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The cold breath of winter will freeze the seas.

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: Not now.

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: And the dead shall rise in the North.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cressen
text: cressen: All you men were named in the Light of the Seven! Is this how you treat the Gods of your fathers? Are you so eager to spit on your ancestors?

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You smell of fear, fear and piss and old bones. Do you want to stop me? Stop me.

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: In the ancient books, it's written that a warrior will draw a burning sword from the fire. And that sword shall be Lightbringer. Stannis Baratheon, warrior of light, your sword awaits you.

title: The North Remembers
Name: crowd
text: crowd: Lord, cast your light upon us!

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: The North Remembers
Name: stannis
text: stannis: For the night is dark and full of terror.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cressen
text: cressen: This woman will lead him into a war he cannot win.

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: Stannis is our king. We follow where he leads, even if we don't like the path.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cressen
text: cressen: King. Since that boar killed his brother, every lord wants a coronation.

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: I don't serve the others. I serve Stannis.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cressen
text: cressen: As do I, but loyal service means telling hard truths. He's surrounded by fools and fanatics, but he trusts you, Davos. . If you tell him the truth…

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: What's the truth?

title: The North Remembers
Name: matthos
text: matthos: And I declare upon the honor of my house that my beloved brother Robert le-”

title: The North Remembers
Name: stannis
text: stannis: He wasn't my beloved brother. . I didn't love him, he didn't love me.

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: A harmless courtesy, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: stannis
text: stannis: A lie. Take it out.

title: The North Remembers
Name: matthos
text: matthos: That my brother Robert left no trueborn heirs; the boy Joffrey, the boy Tommen, and the girl Myrcella, being born of incest between Cersei Lannister and her brother Jaime Lannister. By right of birth -"

title: The North Remembers
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Call him what he is.

title: The North Remembers
Name: matthos
text: matthos: And her brother Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. By right of birth and blood, I do this day lay claim -

title: The North Remembers
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Make it Ser Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Whatever else he is, the man's still a knight.

title: The North Remembers
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Ser Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. By right of birth and blood, I do this day lay claim to the Iron Throne of Westeros. . Let all true men declare their loyalty.”

title: The North Remembers
Name: stannis
text: stannis: When Eddard Stark learned the truth, he told only me. I'll not make the same mistake. Send copies of that letter to every corner of the Realm, from the Arbor to the Wall. The time has come to choose. Let no man claim ignorance as an excuse.

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: Your Grace, the Lannisters are the true enemy. If, for the time being, you could make peace with your brother -

title: The North Remembers
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I'll not make peace with Renly while he calls himself King.

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: Well, many have already declared for him; Mace Tyrell, Randyll Tarly.

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Stannis does not need to beg this lord or that lord for support. The Lord of Light stands behind him.

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: And how many ships has the Lord of Light got in his fleet?

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: He has no need for ships.

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: I'm sure he doesn't, but we do if we're going to war. If not Renly, Your Grace, join forces with Robb Stark.

title: The North Remembers
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Who would steal the northern half of my kingdom. I've always served thieves according to their desserts, as you well know, Ser Davos. Joffrey, Renly, Robb Stark, they're all thieves. They'll bend the knee or I'll destroy them.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cressen
text: cressen: I owe you an apology, my King. My duty is to serve. You have chosen the new God over the Old Gods. May the Lord of Light watch over us all. Shall we drink together?

title: The North Remembers
Name: davos
text: davos: Don't.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cressen
text: cressen: A cup of wine to honor the one true God.

title: The North Remembers
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The night is dark and full of terrors, old man, but the fire burns them all away. Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jaime
text: jaime: King in the North. I keep expecting you to leave me in one castle or another for safekeeping, but you drag me along from camp to camp. Have you grown fond of me, Stark? Is that it? I've never seen you with a girl.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: If I left you with one of my bannermen, your father would know within a fortnight, and my bannerman would receive a raven with a message, "Release my son and you'll be rich beyond your dreams. Refuse and your house will be destroyed, root and stem.”

title: The North Remembers
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You don't trust the loyalty of the men following you into battle?

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Oh, I trust them with my life. Just not with yours.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Smart boy. What's wrong? Don't like being called ‘boy'? Insulted?

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: You insult yourself, Kingslayer. You've been defeated by a boy.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: You're held captive by a boy. Perhaps you'll be killed by a boy. . Stannis Baratheon sent ravens to all the high lords of Westeros. King Joffrey Baratheon is neither a true king nor a true Baratheon. . He's your bastard son.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jaime
text: jaime: If that's true, Stannis is the rightful king. How convenient for him.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: My father learned the truth. That's why you had him executed.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I was your prisoner when Ned Stark lost his head.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Your son killed him so the world wouldn't learn who fathered him. And you... you pushed my brother from a window because he saw you with the queen.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You have proof? Or do you want to trade gossip like a couple of fishwives?

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: I'm sending one of your cousins down to King's Landing with my peace terms.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You think my father's going to negotiate with you? You don't know him very well.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: No, but he's starting to know me.

title: The North Remembers
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Three victories don't make you a conqueror.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: It's better than three defeats.

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: This city stinks Like dead bodies.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A bit corpsey, yes.

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: And shit.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I thought you wanted to come here.

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: I love it.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You love the smell of dead bodies and shit?

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: And cum and garlic and rum.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You can smell cum from the balcony?

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: I love the stink. I love the noise. Cities make me want to fuck.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And so did the country.

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: This is where I belong.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, well, you need to be careful. No one can know you're here.

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: No one will know.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You can't trust anyone in King's Landing. They're all liars; good liars, bad liars, one or two great liars.

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: What about you?

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Me? I'm not from here. I'm a slave to the truth.

title: The North Remembers
Name: shae
text: shae: Truth? You are the biggest little liar I have ever met.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why do you think I am so little? I'm being, , crushed beneath the weight of all that truth.

title: The North Remembers
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Ned Stark actually slept on this, as if the poor man didn't suffer enough. One of the many changes we'll have to make around here.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Lord Baelish.

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I wonder if I might ask you for a favor.

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Of course, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Ned Stark's youngest daughter Arya... we can't seem to locate her.

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: If she's escaped the capital, Winterfell seems the logical destination.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And yet my friends in the North report no sign of her.

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Curious.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If we choose to negotiate with the Starks, the girl has some value. Whoever finds her, well, you know what they say about Lannisters and debts.

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Well, you could ask Varys where she is. He'll have an answer for you. Whether you believe it,,, Myself, I have always had a hard time trusting eunuchs. Who knows what they want?

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: A mockingbird. . You created your own Sigil, didn't you?

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Yes.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Appropriate for a self-made man with so many songs to sing.

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'm glad you like it. Some people are fortunate enough to be born into the right family. Others have to find their own way.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I heard a song once about a boy of modest means who found his way into the home of a very prominent family. He loved the eldest daughter. Sadly, she had eyes for another.

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: When boys and girls live in the same home, awkward situations can arise. Sometimes, I've heard, even brothers and sisters develop certain affections. And when these affections become common knowledge, well, that is an awkward situation, indeed. Especially in a prominent family. But prominent families often forget a simple truth, I've found.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And which truth is that?

title: The North Remembers
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Knowledge is power.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Seize him. . Cut his throat. . Stop. Wait. I've changed my mind. Let him go. . Step back three paces. Turn around. Close your eyes. . Power is power. Do see if you can take some time away from your coins and your whores to locate the Stark girl for me. I would very much appreciate it.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: You're Ser Alton Lannister?

title: The North Remembers
Name: alton
text: alton: I am, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: I offer your cousins peace if they meet my terms. First, your family must release my sisters. Second, my father's bones must be returned to us so he may rest beside his brother and sister in the crypts beneath Winterfell. And the remains of all those who died in his service must also be returned. Their families can honor them with proper funerals.

title: The North Remembers
Name: alton
text: alton: An honorable request, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Third... Joffrey and the Queen Regent must renounce all claim to dominion of the North. From this time, till the end of time, we are a free and independent kingdom.

title: The North Remembers
Name: ser
text: ser: The King in the North.

title: The North Remembers
Name: others
text: others: King in the North.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Neither Joffrey nor any of his men shall set foot in our lands again. If he disregards this command, he shall suffer the same fate as my father, only I don't need a servant to do my beheading for me.

title: The North Remembers
Name: alton
text: alton: These are... Your Grace, these are...

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: These are my terms. If the Queen Regent and her son meet them, I'll give them peace. If not, I will litter the south with Lannister dead.

title: The North Remembers
Name: alton
text: alton: King Joffrey is a Baratheon, Your Grace.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Oh, is he? You'll ride at daybreak, Ser Alton. That will be all for tonight.

title: The North Remembers
Name: theon
text: theon: A word, Your Grace?

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: You don't have to call me ‘Your Grace' when no one's around.

title: The North Remembers
Name: theon
text: theon: It's not so bad once you get used to it.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: I'm glad someone's gotten used to it.

title: The North Remembers
Name: theon
text: theon: The Lannisters are going to reject your terms, you know?

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Of course they are.

title: The North Remembers
Name: theon
text: theon: We can fight them in the fields as long as you like, but we won't beat them until you take King's Landing. And we can't take King's Landing without ships. My father has ships and men who know how to sail them.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Men who fought my father.

title: The North Remembers
Name: theon
text: theon: Men who fought King Robert to free themselves from the yoke of the South, just like you're doing now. I'm his only living son. He'll listen to me. I know he will. I'm not a Stark. I know that. But your father raised me to be an honorable man. We can avenge him together.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You don't want Balon Greyjoy for an ally.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: I need his ships. They say he has 200.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: They say a million rats live in the sewers of King's Landing. Shall we rally them to fight for us?

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: I understand you don't trust Lord Greyjoy.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I don't trust Lord Greyjoy because he is not trustworthy. Your father had to go to war to end his rebellion.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Yes. And now I'm the one rebelling against the throne. Before me, it was father. You married one rebel and mothered another.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I mothered more than just rebels, a fact you seem to have forgotten.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: If I trade the Kingslayer for two girls, my bannermen will string me up by my feet.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You want to leave Sansa in the Queen's hands? And Arya, I haven't heard a word about Arya. What are we fighting for if not for them?

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: It's more complicated than that! You know it is.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: It's time for me to go home. I haven't seen Bran or Rickon in months.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: You can't go to Winterfell.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I beg your pardon?

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: I'll send Rodrik to watch over the boys, ‘cause tomorrow, you'll ride south to the Stormlands.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Why in the name of all the Gods -

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Because I need you to negotiate with Renly Baratheon. He's rallied an army of 100,000. You know him. You know his family.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I haven't seen Renly Baratheon since he was a boy. You have a hundred other lords -

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Which of these lords do I trust more than you? If Renly sides with us, we'll outnumber them two to one. When they feel the jaws beginning to shut, they'll sue for peace. We'll get the girls back. Then we'll all go home for good.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I will ride at first light.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: We will all be together again soon, I promise.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You've done so well. Your father would be proud.

title: The North Remembers
Name: robb
text: robb: Give Lord Renly my regards.

title: The North Remembers
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: King Renly. There's a king in every corner now.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What is all this?

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Returning this room to its proper appearance. Say what you will about the Targaryens, they were conquerors. That is a seat for a conqueror. It needs a room to match it, not vines and flowers.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
