text: cersei: We can't find Arya Stark.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: With luck, she's dead in a ditch somewhere.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Perhaps. But if not, we need her. They'll never give Jaime back to us for Sansa alone.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I think they might. They're weak. They put too much value on their women. .

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We need to set our armies to the task of finding her. Send out as many men as we can. I'm sure if you asked grandfather -

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: The King does not ask; He commands. And my grandfather's stupidity in the field of battle is the reason Robb Stark has Uncle Jaime in the first place.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: His life is in danger.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: We're at war. All our lives are in danger. I heard a disgusting lie about Uncle Jaime. And you.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Our enemies will say anything to weaken your claim to the throne.

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: It's not a claim. The throne is mine.

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Of course it is. No one believes this foul gossip -

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Someone believes it. Father had other children? Besides me and Tommen and Myrcella?

title: The North Remembers
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What are you asking?

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I'm asking if he fucked other women when he grew tired of you. How many bastards does he have running -

title: The North Remembers
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What you just did is punishable by death. You will never do it again. Never. . That will be all, Mother.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: No, no, no, no. Do you have any idea how ridiculous you sound? Ease into it. Slowly, with passion.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: Go wash yourselves. Put some clothes on. Both of you are working tonight.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: We do things differently here, Daisy. This isn't some five-copper bawdy house in Hayseed Hall.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daisy
text: daisy: Haystack Hall.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: Wherever you're from. Our establishment doesn't cater to ploughmen and goat herders. . Lord Olsen. Taste is everything here.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daisy
text: daisy: Littlefinger's a fancy man.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: Don't call him Littlefinger, he doesn't like it. Lord Baelish.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: She pretends she doesn't speak the common tongue so that people will think she's exotic. She grew up just down the road in flea bottom.

title: The North Remembers
Name: daisy
text: daisy: She's beautiful.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: She's a dumb slut, really, but a lid for every pot. . Lord Commander. Good to see you, again.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: You do realize this establishment is owned by Lord Petyr Baelish, the King's Master of Coin. Coin which goes in many pockets.

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: Orders.

title: The North Remembers
Name: roz
text: roz: Whose orders?

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: Someone who doesn't care what Littlefinger thinks.

title: The North Remembers
Name: mhaegan
text: mhaegan: No, you can't!

title: The North Remembers
Name: mhaegan
text: mhaegan: No! Please! No! Not my Barra! Please. Please.

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: Enough. Get it done. Kill the bastard.

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: Give it here.

title: The North Remembers
Name: gold
text: gold: Spread out! Search every house, every room. Look in every room.

title: The North Remembers
Name: blacksmith
text: blacksmith: Gendry! His name is Gendry.

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: Where is the bastard?

title: The North Remembers
Name: blacksmith
text: blacksmith: The Night's Watch! Please, stop!

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: Where?

title: The North Remembers
Name: blacksmith
text: blacksmith: They took him up the Kingsroad, heading north!

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: How will we know him?

title: The North Remembers
Name: blacksmith
text: blacksmith: He's got a bull's head helmet. He made it himself.

title: The North Remembers
Name: janos
text: janos: Find him.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cold
text: cold: OPEN

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What are you doing here?

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as hand in his stead.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You brought this on yourself.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I've done nothing.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do you understand we're losing the war?

title: The Night Lands
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Does it ever end?

title: The Night Lands
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Everything ends, even the red waste.

title: The Night Lands
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Rakharo, Aggo, Kovarro.. Take our remaining horses. Find out how far the Red Waste extends before us, and what lies on the other side.

title: The Night Lands
Name: edd
text: edd: All the other wildlings for a hundred leagues have disappeared. Craster's still here.

title: The Night Lands
Name: craster
text: craster: Any man lays a hand on one of my wives, he loses the hand.

title: The Night Lands
Name: edd
text: edd: He marries his daughters, and they give him more daughters.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: What happens to the boys? What does he do with his sons?

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: My brother Robert left no trueborn heirs, the boy Joffrey being born of incest between Cersei Lannister, and her brother Jaime Lannister. By right of birth, and blood, I do this day lay claim to the Iron Throne of Westeros.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Send copies of that letter to every corner of the realm.

title: The Night Lands
Name: robb
text: robb: I'm sending one of your cousins down to King's Landing with my peace terms.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You think my father's going to negotiate with you? You don't know him very well.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: We won't beat them until we take King's Landing, and we can't take King's Landing without ships. My father has ships, and men who know how to sail them.

title: The Night Lands
Name: robb
text: robb: Men who fought my father.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm his only living son. He'll listen to me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You don't want Balon Greyjoy for an ally.

title: The Night Lands
Name: robb
text: robb: I need his ships.

title: The Night Lands
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: He is not trustworthy!

title: The Night Lands
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I heard a disgusting lie about uncle Jaime… and you. Father had other children?

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What are you asking?

title: The Night Lands
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: How many bastards does he have running around?

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Where is the bastard?

title: The Night Lands
Name: blacksmith
text: blacksmith: The Night's Watch! Heading North!

title: The Night Lands
Name: end
text: end: COLD OPEN

title: The Night Lands
Name: title
text: title: SEQUENCE

title: The Night Lands
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Boy.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Lovely boy.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: What do you want?

title: The Night Lands
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: A man has a thirst. The man does not drink for a day and a night. A boy could make a friend.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: I have friends.

title: The Night Lands
Name: rorge
text: rorge: Give us a beer. Before I skin you.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: A man does not choose his companions. These two, they have no courtesy. A man must ask forgiveness. . You're called Arry. . This man has the honor to be Jaqen H'ghar. Once of the Free City of Lorath.

title: The Night Lands
Name: rorge
text: rorge: Hey, you little shit. Get us beer!

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: You should have asked nicely.

title: The Night Lands
Name: rorge
text: rorge: Come closer. And I'll shove that stick up your bunghole and fuck you bloody.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: The boy has more courage than sense.

title: The Night Lands
Name: rorge
text: rorge: Come here!

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Yoren said none of us were should go near of those three.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: They don't scare me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Hmm? Then you're stupid. They scare me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: What are gold cloaks doing this far from King's Landing?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: What are you doing?

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: They're looking for me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gold
text: gold: You're in command here?

title: The Night Lands
Name: yoren
text: yoren: You're a long way from home.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gold
text: gold: I asked you a question.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Aye, you did. You asked without manners. And I chose not to answer.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gold
text: gold: I have a royal warrant. For one of these gutter rats you're transporting.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yoren
text: yoren: Well the thing is, , these gutter rats belong to the Night's Watch now. That puts them beyond the reach of kings and queens.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yoren
text: yoren: It's a funny thing. People worry so much about their throats, they forget about what's down low. Now I sharpened this blade before breakfast. I could shave a spider's arse if I wanted to. Or, I could nick this artery in your leg and once it's nicked, there's no one around here who knows how to un-nick it.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yoren
text: yoren: We'll just keep that. Good steel is always needed on the wall. Seems you have a choice. You can die here at this crossroads a long way from home. Or you can go back to your city and tell your masters you didn't find what you were looking for.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gold
text: gold: We're looking for a boy named Gendry. . He carries a bull's head helmet. Anyone turning him over will earn the King's reward. We'll be back. With more men. And I'll be taking your head home along with that bastard boy.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: My lord.

title: The Night Lands
Name: shae
text: shae: You make me wait a long time, but your friend keeps me company.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: We were just speaking of your bravery in the victory against the Stark auxiliary forces.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It was quite a battle.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: I heard you suffered a terrible head wound. The northerners are such fearsome warriors.

title: The Night Lands
Name: shae
text: shae: And I tell him the story of how we meet.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: To find so lovely creature working in your father's kitchen. It almost beggars belief.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Strange things do happen. You should taste her fish pie.

title: The Night Lands
Name: shae
text: shae: I don't think Lord Varys likes fish pie.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: How can you tell?

title: The Night Lands
Name: shae
text: shae: I can always tell.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Men like Lord Varys and I can't let our disadvantages get the best of us. We'll make a fisherman of him yet. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: I am glad your new friend was able to accompany you to the capital. Friends are such an important part of life. Unfortunate that your father didn't want her to come. But rest easy my lord, I am very good at keeping secrets for my good friends.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Your discretion is legendary, where your friends are concerned.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: How unspeakable of me to go on and on, when all you want to do is rest. I will leave you. . Welcome to Kings Landing, my dear. The city is made brighter by your presence. We have a council meeting, my lord.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't like threats.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: Who threatened you?

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm not Ned Stark. I understand the way this game is played.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: Ned Stark was a man of honor.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And I am not. Threaten me again and I will have you thrown into the sea.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: You might be disappointed in the results. The storms come and go. The big fish eat the little fish. And I keep on paddling. Come, my lord. We shouldn't keep the queen waiting.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: From this time until the end of time, we are not part of your realm, but a free and independent Kingdom of the North.” . He has more spirit than his father, I'll give him that.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You've perfected the art of tearing up papers. Give him his father's bones back, at least, as a gesture of good faith.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You'll give the Starks our reply, cousin?

title: The Night Lands
Name: alton
text: alton: I will, Your Grace.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Did you see my brother when you were the Starks guest?

title: The Night Lands
Name: alton
text: alton: I did. They have not broken his spirit, Your Grace.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If you speak with him, tell him he's not been forgotten.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Safe travels, cousin.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You have a deft hand with diplomacy.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If that's everything?

title: The Night Lands
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: A raven flew in this morning from Castle Black.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: Trouble with the wildlings?

title: The Night Lands
Name: petyr
text: petyr: That's why they're called wildlings.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: Somewhat less wild these days. It seems they've stopped killing each other and started following this King-Beyond-the-Wall.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Another king? How many is that now, Five? I've lost count.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Lord Commander asks that we send more men to man The Wall.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Perhaps he's forgotten we're fighting a war. We have no men to spare.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Cold winds are rising, and the dead rise with them.

title: The Night Lands
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: The northerners are a superstitious people.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: According to the Commander, one of these dead men attacked him in his chambers. . Mormont doesn't lie.

title: The Night Lands
Name: varys
text: varys: How do you kill a dead man?

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Apparently you burn him.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: One trip to The Wall and you come back believing in grumpkins and snarks. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't know what I believe, but here's a fact for you. The Night's Watch is the only thing that separates us from what lies beyond the Wall.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I have every confidence the brave men of the Night's Watch will protect us all.

title: The Night Lands
Name: edd
text: edd: Then I said, if the gods wanted us to have dignity, wouldn't make us fart when we died.

title: The Night Lands
Name: grenn
text: grenn: We fart when we die?

title: The Night Lands
Name: edd
text: edd: My blessed mother was holding her own when she left this world. She farted so hard, the whole bed shook.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: Seems a bit greedy for one man to have so many wives. Wouldn't two, or three, be enough for him?

title: The Night Lands
Name: edd
text: edd: We were having a serious discussion.

title: The Night Lands
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Would you look at that.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: Nothing like the sight of a woman walking away.

title: The Night Lands
Name: grenn
text: grenn: I prefer watching them come towards me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: I'm sure that's nice too.

title: The Night Lands
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Well, there was a milkmaid named Violet on the next farm over from where I grew up. And we were wrestling together from the time we were six years old. And then we got older, the wrestling, uh, , changed.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: You were with her? How many times?

title: The Night Lands
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Well, as many times as I could.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: Wish I'd grew up on a farm.

title: The Night Lands
Name: edd
text: edd: We need more potatoes. And get another sack for the sludge. . Get the turnips too.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: No. Ghost, no. No. Ghost, away. Shoo. Shoo! . You all right? Did he frighten you?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You shouldn't touch me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: Oh, oh. Right. I'm sorry. I just wanted to make sure you weren't hurt. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You're very brave.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: What're you doing?

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: This is Gilly, she's one of Craster's daughters.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: Hello, Gilly. What're you doing?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Sam said you could help.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm sorry, Sam knows we're not supposed to -

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: She's pregnant. . We have to take her with us, when we leave.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: What? .

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: I know it sounds a bit mad.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: No it doesn't sound a bit mad, it's impossible.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: The Lord Commander, , we are sworn to protect -

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: Sam we can't take her -

title: The Night Lands
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Please sir, please. I can still run if I have to.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: It's just not possible.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I'm going to have a baby, if it's a boy I…

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: If it's a boy what? . You want us to risk our lives for you, and you won't even tell us why.

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: Why did you do that?

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: Do what, ask her a question?

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: You were cruel.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: Cruel! Sam are you in such a hurry to lose a hand?

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: I didn't touch her!

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: No you just want to steal her. What do you think Craster cuts off for that?

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: I can't steal her, she's a person not a goat.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: We're heading deeper and deeper into wildling territory. We can't take a girl with us. Mormont wouldn't have it. And even if he would, what would we do with her? Who's gonna deliver her baby? You?

title: The Night Lands
Name: sam
text: sam: I could try. . What? I've read about it. A bit.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm sorry Sam, we can't help her.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Khaleesi.

title: The Night Lands
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You don't need to see this.

title: The Night Lands
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He is blood of my blood.

title: The Night Lands
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Who did this?

title: The Night Lands
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Khal Pono perhaps, Khal Jhaqo They don't like the idea of a woman leading a Khalasaar.

title: The Night Lands
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They will like it far less when I'm done with them.

title: The Night Lands
Name: irri
text: irri: No! They killed his soul!

title: The Night Lands
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Shh. They cannot kill his soul.

title: The Night Lands
Name: irri
text: irri: They did! They butchered him like an animal. They did not burn his body. . He can never join his ancestors in the night lands.

title: The Night Lands
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Shh. We will build him a funeral pyre.

title: The Night Lands
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And I promise you, Rakharo will ride with his ancestors tonight.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: Is it as you remember my lord?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Looks smaller.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: Everything looks bigger when you're a child. I remember my father's cabin, felt like a palace when I was little. Now look at it.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: They'll be waiting for me on the docks.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: Who will?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Anyone who matters, , this is a big day for them. They haven't had much to get excited about since I left. It's a hard place the Iron Islands always has been. It's cold and it's wet.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: I love the cold and wet.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: They say hard places breed hard men, , and hard men rule the world.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: Then you'll be king before long.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Try smiling with your lips closed. . Hmm, better.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: My father doesn't trust you Iron islanders.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I don't blame him.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: He says that you're all reavers and rapers. And that no matter how many women you have, you'll never be satis-

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Quit talking about your father. He's right about us. Our wives from the Iron Islands, they're for breeding. That's not enough for us. That's why we take saltwives, from the women we capture.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: Capture me! Take me with you when you go ashore. Make me your saltwife.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Your place is on this ship.

title: The Night Lands
Name: woman
text: woman: Not after you leave. Father will punish me. He'll call me a whore.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I haven't paid you.

title: The Night Lands
Name: man
text: man: I barely touched her. And you charge twice as much as every other brothel. And this is what I get, crying.

title: The Night Lands
Name: petyr
text: petyr: One moment, my friend. A moment.

title: The Night Lands
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Please accept my sincerest apologies. Ramka will take good care of you.

title: The Night Lands
Name: roz
text: roz: I'm sorry, my lord.

title: The Night Lands
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Shhh. Did he hurt you?

title: The Night Lands
Name: roz
text: roz: No, my lord… It's Mhaegen.

title: The Night Lands
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Who?

title: The Night Lands
Name: roz
text: roz: She works for you. She's the one, the girl whose, they killed her baby.

title: The Night Lands
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Ah, yes, that was poorly handled. Sometimes those with the most power have the least grace.

title: The Night Lands
Name: roz
text: roz: Can't stop thinking about it, I can't sleep. Her poor little baby.

title: The Night Lands
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You know, you remind me of another girl. A lovely thing I once acquired from an Elysium pleasure house. Beautiful, like yourself, and intelligent as yourself. But she wasn't happy. She cried, often. I asked her why but, we didn't have the kind of rapport that you and I have. Yes, it was quite sad. Girls from Elysium pleasure houses are expensive. Extremely expensive. And this one wasn't making me any money. I hate bad investments. Really, I do. They haunt me. I had no idea how to make her happy, no idea how to mitigate my losses. A very wealthy patron, he offered me a tremendous amount of money to let him transform this lovely, sad girl. To use her in ways that never occur to most men. And you know what occurs to most men. I would not say he succeeded in making her happy but my losses were definitely mitigated. . Take tonight off to mourn Mhaegen's child. I'll see you tomorrow. But you'll be happy? . That makes me happy.

title: The Night Lands
Name: podrick
text: podrick: More wine?

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Damn it, boy!

title: The Night Lands
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Apologies, my lord.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Leave us, Podrick. I believe we know how to pour our own wine.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Is that your new squire? Could have found you a proper lad.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Myself, I prefer the improper ones.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Hmm, that's a good red. Dornish?

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You know your wines, my lord.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: That I do. A fine dinner, my lord.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Call me Tyrion, please. I'm sure you're getting used to fine dinners, now that you're a lord.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Maybe I'll hire this cook of yours.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Wars have been started for less.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I heard there was some trouble in Littlefinger's brothel the other night.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Hmm. Nasty business, had to be done.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, of course. City Watch must keep the peace. Only, I hadn't realized peace depended on killing babies.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Orders are orders.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Quite right. Especially the queen's orders.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: I never said they were the queen's orders.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, but who else would want to murder King Robert's bastards? She's always been a jealous woman.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: You know your sister better than I do.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You've heard the awful rumors about my brother and sister.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: I don't listen to filth.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That's good of you, but you have heard them. I suppose people who do believe that filth, consider Robert's bastards to be better claimants to the throne than Cersei's children.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Joffrey is my king, the rest doesn't interest me. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I appreciate your loyalty. Tell me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: I did. And I would again. The man was a traitor. He tried to buy my loyalty.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The fool! He had no idea you were already bought.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: Are you drunk? I'll not have my honor questioned by an Imp.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm not questioning your honor, Lord Janos. I'm denying its existence.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: You think I'll stand here and take this from you, dwarf.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Dwarf? You should have stopped at imp. And yes, you will stand here and take it from me, unless you'd like to take it from my friend here.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I intend to serve as Hand of the King until my father returns from the war, and seeing as you betrayed the last Hand of the King, well, I just wouldn't feel safe with you lurking about.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: What are you ta- My friends at court will not allow this. The queen herself -

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The queen regent. And you're a fool to believe she's your friend.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: We shall hear what Joffrey has to say about this.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, we shan't.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There's a ship leaving for East Watch by the sea tonight. From there, I'm afraid it's rather a long walk to Castle Black. I hope you enjoy the Wall. I found it surprisingly beautiful, in a brutal, horribly uncomfortable sort of way.

title: The Night Lands
Name: bronn
text: bronn: The lads will escort you. The streets aren't safe at night, my lord.

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: These men are under my command. . I command you to arrest this cutthroat.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: His name is Bronn... and he is the new commander of the City Watch.

title: The Night Lands
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Boys?

title: The Night Lands
Name: janos
text: janos: I have friends at court! Powerful friends! The king himself made me a lord!

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: To the new Commander.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If I told you to murder, an infant girl say, still at her mother's breast, would you do it without question?

title: The Night Lands
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Without question? No. I'd ask how much.

title: The Night Lands
Name: lommy
text: lommy: If they come back, I say we yield. Gendry's the one they want. I don't want to get caught in the middle of a battle.

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: I'm not afraid of no battles.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: If you got within a mile of a battle, you'd fill your pants.

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: I've seen lots of battles. I saw -

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: Liar.

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: I saw a man kill another man just outside a tavern in Flea Bottom. Stabbed him right in the neck.

title: The Night Lands
Name: lommy
text: lommy: Two men fighting isn't a battle.

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: They had armor on.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: So?

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: So, if they got armor on, it's a battle.

title: The Night Lands
Name: lommy
text: lommy: No, it isn't.

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: What's a dyer's apprentice know about battles anyway?

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: Gendry's an armorer's apprentice. Hot Pie, tell Gendry what makes it a battle.

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: It's when they've got armor on.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Now who told you that.

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: A knight?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: How'd you know he was a knight?

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: Well, cause he got armor on.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You don't have to be a knight to have armor. Any idiot can buy armor. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: hot
text: hot: How'd you know?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Cause I sold armor.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: What do the gold cloaks want with you?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: No idea.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: You're a liar.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You shouldn't insult people that are bigger than you.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: Then I wouldn't get to insult anyone. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Well, I don't care what any of them want. No goodo s ever come of their questions.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: No goodo s ever come? Who asked questions before?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: How can someone so small be such a huge pain in my ass?

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: Who asked questions?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: The Hand of the King. Er, hands of the King. Lord Arryn came first, a few weeks before he died. And then Lord Stark came, a few weeks before he died.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: Lord Stark.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: See? Asking me questions is bad luck. . You'll probably be dead soon.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: What did they ask about?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: My mom.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: Who's your mom?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Just my mom. Worked in a tavern. Died when I was little.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: And who was your father?

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: He could be one of those gold-hatted bastards, for all I know. What about you, anyway? You thought they were after you, why? Did you kill someone, or is it just because you're a girl?

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm not a girl!

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Yes you are. You think I'm as stupid as the rest of them?

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: Stupider. Night's Watch doesn't take girls, everyone knows that.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: That's true. You're still a girl.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: I am not!

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Well, pull your cock out and take a piss then.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't need to take a piss… Lommy and Hot Pie can't know. No one can know.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: They won't. Not from me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: My name's not Arry. It's Arya. Of House Stark. Yoren is taking me home to Winterfell.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: He was your father. The Hand. The traitor.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: He was never a traitor! Joffrey is a liar.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: So you're a highborn, then. You're a lady.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: No. I mean yes. My mother was a lady, and my sister -

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You were a lordo s daughter and you lived in a castle. Look, all that about cocks. I should never have said that. I've been pissing in front of you and everything. I should be calling you milady.

title: The Night Lands
Name: arya
text: arya: Do not call me milady.

title: The Night Lands
Name: gendry
text: gendry: As milady commands. . Well, that was unladylike.

title: The Night Lands
Name: man
text: man: What you carrying?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Pears and oranges. Wine from the Arbor. And the heir to Pyke of the Iron Islands. . The only living son of Balon Greyjoy. . Me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: man
text: man: Don't like wine. Woman's drink. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I need to get to Pyke.

title: The Night Lands
Name: man
text: man: I'll find you a horse.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: I'm heading that way. I can take you there.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I bet you can.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: You been at sea long? Or were there just no women where you came from?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: None like you.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: You don't know what I'm like.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: You don't know what you're like. You need someone to teach you. Know who I am?

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: You think I offer free rides to every man in jewelry. Lord Greyjoy.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Have my things sent up to the castle.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: You should give me the reins, I'm a better rider than you. I've been on horseback for the last nine years.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: Nine years. Do you still know your way around a ship? Have these hands ever touched a rope?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Don't you worry about my hands. . The sea's in my blood.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: Your blood will be in the sea if I don't watch where I'm going.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I have a proposal for my father. One that will make him king again. And me after him. You may stay at the castle tonight, if you're lucky.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: Is that an offer from my future king?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: An order, from your future king. You can tell your grandchildren about this night.

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: I don't imagine it will be a story fit for children.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Father.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: Nine years, is it? They took a frightened boy. What have they given back?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: A man. Your blood and your heir.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: We shall see. Stark had you longer than I did.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Lord Stark is gone.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: And how do you feel about that?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: What's done is done. I've brought you a proposal from Robb Stark.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: Who gave you those clothes? . Was it Ned Stark's pleasure to make you his daughter?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: If my clothes offend you, I will change them.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: It will. . That bauble around your neck. Did you pay the iron price for it or the gold? . I asked a question. Did you pull it from the neck of a corpse you made or did you buy it to match your fine clothes? Iron or gold?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Gold.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: I'll not have my son dressed as a whore. . My fears have come true. The Starks have made you theirs.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: My blood is salt and iron.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: Yet, , the Stark boy sends you to me like a trained raven, clutching his message.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: The offer he makes, is one I proposed.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: He heeds your counsel?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I've lived with him, hunted with him, fought at his side, he thinks of me as a brother.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: No, not here, , not in my hearing, you will not name him brother. This son of the man who put your true brothers to the sword. Or have you forgotten your own blood?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I forget nothing. I remember my brothers. And I remember when my father was a king.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: I see. I destroy Robb Stark's enemies for him and he will make me King of the Iron Islands once again.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I will lead the attack myself.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: Oh, you will?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm your son. Your only living heir. Who else?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: I told you to wait outside. . How did you get past the guards?

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: Anything with a cock is easy to fool.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: My dear.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: Yara?

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: So good to see you, brother. This is a homecoming I'll tell my grandchildren about.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: She can't lead an attack!

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: And why not?

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: You're a woman!

title: The Night Lands
Name: yara
text: yara: You're the one in skirts.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: This isn't Winterfell, boy. Your sister took over command of your eldest brother's ship after your new father killed him.

title: The Night Lands
Name: all
text: all: What's dead may never die.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: No man gives me a crown. I pay the iron price. I will take my crown. . That is who I am. That is who we have always been.

title: The Night Lands
Name: theon
text: theon: You won't stand a chance against the Lannisters on your own.

title: The Night Lands
Name: balon
text: balon: Who said anything about the Lannisters?

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: You'll have your gold when we take the treasury at King's Landing.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: All these kings fighting for the throne, and this Stannis has the smallest army. Why would I bet on the man with the worst chance?

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Because you're a smart gambler. Stannis has proved himself in war. Twice. His baby brother has never set foot on a battlefield. Neither has the false king, Joffrey.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: And yet, they both have larger armies.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Stannis has just begun the fight. His bannermen will rally to his cause. There's no man in the Seven Kingdoms more honorable than Stannis Baratheon. Or more worthy of loyalty.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: What is the world coming to when smugglers must vouch for the honor of kings.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Mind your words, pirate. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Matthos.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: You think I'm insulted? I am a pirate. I'm an excellent pirate. I don't sail for promises.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Of course you do. Every time you leave harbor, you're leaving on a promise. A promise that somewhere on the seas, somebody's got some gold and you can take it from them.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: That's a promise that always comes true.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: As is mine. You're not the young man, Salladhor. And correct me if I'm wrong

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: Only the clever ones.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: You want to spend your last few years on the sea, stealing from Pentoshi cheesemongers and Midanese silk merchants, then go. They're out there waiting for you. That's easy. What I'm offering you is hard. Come with me and plunder the greatest city in Westeros. You'll be the richest man in Lysene. And the most famous. They'll be singing songs about you as long as men have voices to sing.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: Salladhor Saan is a good name for songs.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: It is. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: One thing, I want the queen.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: The queen?

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: Cersei, I want her. I'll sail with your fleet, all 30 of my ships, and if we don't drown at the bottom of Blackwater Bay, I will fuck this blonde queen and I will fuck her well.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: This war isn't about you. We're not attacking King's Landing so that you can rape the queen.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: I'm not going to rape her, I'm going to fuck her.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: As if she would just let you!

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: You don't know how persuasive I am. I never tried to fuck you.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Stannis is the rightful king, and the Lord of Light. The one true god.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: I've been all over the world, my boy, and everywhere I go, people tell me about the true god. They all think they found the right one. The one true god is what's between a woman's legs, and better yet a queen's legs.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: I never thought you'd have a true believer for a son.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: He's young yet. I promise you the gold. I promise you the glory. I cannot promise you the queen.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: You believe your king can win?

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: He is the one true king.

title: The Night Lands
Name: saan
text: saan: You Westerosee are funny people. A man chops off your fingers and you fall in love with him. . I'll sail with you, Davos Seaworth. You are the most honest smuggler I ever met. Make me rich.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Get me to the gates of King's Landing and I will.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: When will the King have a sail?

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: As soon as his God wills it.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: He's my God too, and yours. But you were too blind to see. . Let me teach you how to read.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Oh you and your mother.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: It won't take long. You already know the letters. The holy books are much more persuasive than I can be.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: I wish I had a God, truly! I'm not mocking you, but I've seen men pray to every God there is. Pray for wind, pray for rain, pray for home. None of it works!

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: But you always came home.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: I wasn't praying.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: But I was. Every night that you were at sea, I lit a candle and I prayed, for you.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: You want me to have a god, fine. King Stannis is my god. He raised me up and blessed me with his trust. He gave you a future I could never have imagined. You know how to read, you'll be a knight someday. You think your fire god commanded all that? It was Stannis. Only Stannis.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Stannis is my king, but he's only a man.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Don't tell him that.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Lord Janos Slynt was Commander of the City Watch. You had no right to exile him.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I have every right. I am the King's Hand.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're serving as the King's Hand until father gets here. I am Queen Regent.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Listen to me, Queen Regent, you're losing the people. Do you hear me?

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Ha, the people. You think I care?

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You might find it difficult to rule over millions who want you dead. Half the city will starve when winter comes. The other half will plot to overthrow you. And your gold-plated thugs just gave them the rallying cry, “The Queen slaughters babies.” . You don't even have the decency to deny it.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It wasn't you who gave the order, was it? Joffrey didn't even tell you. Or did he tell you? I imagine that would be even worse.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He did what needed to be done. . You want to be the Hand of the King? You want to rule? This is what ruling is! Lying on a bed of weeds, ripping them out by the root one by one before they strangle you in your sleep.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm no king, but I think there's more to ruling that that.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I don't care what you think! You've never taken it seriously. You haven't, Jaime hasn't. . It's all fallen on me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: As has Jaime repeatedly, according to Stannis Baratheon.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're funny. . You've always been funny. But none of your jokes will ever match the first one, will they? You remember... back when you ripped my mother open on your way out of her and she bled to death.

title: The Night Lands
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She was my mother too.

title: The Night Lands
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Now they're gone, for the sake of you. There's no bigger joke in the world than that. .

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Your Grace.

title: The Night Lands
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Your Grace.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: How did it fare with your pirate?

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Salladhor Saan will join our fleet. 30 ships. His men know how to fight.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: In my experience, pirates prefer fighting unarmed men.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Does seem the wiser choice.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: It won't be a choice this time. Do you trust him?

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Salladhor Saan is an old friend, I've known him 30 years. I've never trusted him.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Well if he does his job, he'll have his share. Leave us.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: At once, Your Grace.

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The Lord of Light shines through you, young warrior.

title: The Night Lands
Name: davos
text: davos: Come.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: What did you say to him?

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I told him death by fire is the purest death.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Why?

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Because it is true. You're troubled my king.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Yeah.

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: These armies are but toys for the Lord of Light.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Tell your lord to burn them then.

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I tell him nothing! I pray for his commands and I obey.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: My little brother has a hundred thousand men according to the scouts. Men whose allegiance rightly belongs to me.

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You must have faith.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Faith? In a real war, the side with the greater number wins nine times out of ten.

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Then we must be the ten.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I cannot defeat my brother in the field, and I can't take King's Landing without the men he stole.

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I have seen the path to victory in the flames. At first, you must give yourself to the Lord of Light.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I've said the words, damn you! I burnt the idols.

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You must give... all of yourself.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I have a wife. I took a vow.

title: The Night Lands
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: She's sick. Weak. Shut away in the tower. And she disgusts you. And she's given you nothing. No sons. Only stillborns. Only death. . I will give you a son, my King.

title: The Night Lands
Name: stannis
text: stannis: A son?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: craster
text: craster: Out, all of you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: craster
text: craster: This bastardo s been meddling where he shouldn't!

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: craster
text: craster: I want you and your men gone. And you will make this right.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Wait outside.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jon
text: jon: Lord Commander-

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Now!

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sam
text: sam: Lord Commander-

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Leave us.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: What did you do?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jon
text: jon: I followed him. He took the baby into the woods, the newborn.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: What business is that of yours?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jon
text: jon: No, you don't understand. He's killing them, all the boys...

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jon
text: jon: You know.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Wildlings serve crueler gods than you or I. Those boys are Craster's offerings.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jon
text: jon: Offerings? He's murdering his own children. He's a monster.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Aye, many a time that monster has been the difference between life and death for our rangers, your uncle among them. We have other wars to fight, out there. Like it or not, we need men like Craster.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jon
text: jon: I... I saw it. I saw... something take that child.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Yeah. Whatever it was, I daresay you'll see it again. Now, ready my horse. We leave at dawn.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Don't lose it again.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sam
text: sam: Gilly.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You're leaving.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sam
text: sam: I, I wanted to give you something. It belonged to my mother.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I can't take it.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sam
text: sam: Please. I want you to. My mother used it for sewing. She'd let me sit with her in her chamber while she sewed and I'd read to her. My father put a stop to it when he found out. It's the only thing I have of hers. She gave it to me before I left for the Wall.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You, you shouldn't give it away.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sam
text: sam: I'm not giving it away. I'm giving it to you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sam
text: sam: Keep it safe for me. Til I come back.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: hodor
text: hodor: Hodor.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Hodor. Rouse Bran, will you? It's time for his lessons.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: bran
text: bran: Every night it's the same.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: bran
text: bran: I'm walking and running, but I'm not I'm not me. I'm running through the godswood, sniffing the dirt, tasting blood in my mouth when I've made a fresh kill, howling. Old Nan used to tell me stories about magical people who could live inside stags, birds, wolves.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: luwin
text: luwin: That's exactly what they are, Bran - stories.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: bran
text: bran: So she was lying? They don't exist?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Well, they may have done. But they're gone from the world, along with much else. These are dreams, Bran, nothing more.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: bran
text: bran: No, my dreams are different. Mine are true. I dreamt of my father dying. And Rickon had the same dream.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: luwin
text: luwin: What about all the dreams you had that didn't come true? Hmm? Right.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: luwin
text: luwin: This link is made of Valyrian steel. Only one maester in a hundred wears it on his chain. It signifies that I have studied the higher mysteries. And all who study these mysteries try their hand at spells. I was no different. I was young. And what boy doesn't secretly wish for hidden powers to lift him out of his dull life into a special one? But in the end, for all my efforts, I got no more out of it than a thousand boys before me. Come on.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: luwin
text: luwin: All right. Maybe magic once was a mighty force in the world. But not anymore. The dragons are gone. The giants are dead. And the Children of the Forest forgotten.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Loras! Highgarden!

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: man
text: man: Get him!

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: crowd
text: crowd: Oh!

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: Yield! I yield.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Well fought. Approach.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Rise. Remove your helm.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: You are all your father promised and more, my lady. I've seen Ser Loras bested once or twice, but never quite in that fashion.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Now, now, my love. My brother fought valiantly for you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: That he did, my queen. But there can only be one champion. Brienne of Tarth, you may ask anything of me you desire. If it is within my power, it is yours.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Your Grace, I ask the honor of a place in your Kingsguard.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: What?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I will be one of your seven, pledge my life to yours, and keep you safe from all harm.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Done. Rise, Brienne of the Kingsguard.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: colen
text: colen: Your Grace, I have the honor to bring you Lady Catelyn Stark, sent as an envoy by her son Robb, Lord of Winterfell.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Lord of Winterfell and King in the North.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Lady Catelyn. I'm pleased to see you. May I present my wife, Margaery of House Tyrell?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: margaery
text: margaery: You are very welcome here, Lady Stark. I'm so sorry for your loss.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You are most kind.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: My lady, I swear to you I will see the Lannisters answer for your husbando s murder. When I take King's Landing, I'll bring you Joffrey's head.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: It will be enough to know that justice was done, my lord.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Your Grace. And you should kneel when you approach the King.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: There's no need for that. Lady Stark is an honored guest.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: Has your son marched against Tywin Lannister yet?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I do not sit on my son's war councils. And if I did, I would not share his strategies with you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: If Robb Stark wants a pact with us, he should come himself, not hide behind his mother's skirts.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: My son is fighting a war, not playing at one.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Don't worry, my lady. Our war is just beginning.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: gerard
text: gerard: Your Grace.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Gerard. How's your foot?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: gerard
text: gerard: Better, Your Grace.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: gerard
text: gerard: They don't know their own size is all.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Good man.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: I have a hundred thousand men at my command. All the might of the Stormlands and the Reach.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And all of them young and bold like your Knight of Flowers? It's a game to you, isn't it? I pity them.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Why?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Because it won't last. Because they are the knights of summer and winter is coming.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Brienne, escort Lady Catelyn to her tent. She's tired from her journey.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: brienne
text: brienne: At once, Your Grace. Shall I return after?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: That won't be necessary. I would pray awhile. Alone.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: brienne
text: brienne: If you'll follow me, my lady.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You fought bravely today, Lady Brienne.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I fought for my king. Soon I'll fight for him on the battlefield. Die for him if I must. And, if it please you, Brienne's enough. I'm no lady.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: What are you doing here?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: I live here. Are you angry with me, brother?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: You lying bitch.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: It's not my fault you didn't recognize me.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Recognize you? How could I? The last time I saw you- you looked like a fat little boy.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: You were a fat little boy, too, but I recognized you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Why didn't you tell me?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: I wanted to see who you were first. And I did.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: balon
text: balon: The plans are made. It's time you heard them.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: Father.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Father.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: balon
text: balon: The wolf pup has gone south with the entirety of the Northern army at his back. While he's tangling with the lion in the Westerlands, the North is ripe for the taking. The Ironborn will reave and pillage, as it was in the old days, all along the northern coast. We'll spread our dominion across the green lands, securing the Neck and everything above. Every stronghold will yield to us, one by one. Winterfell may defy us for a year, but what of it? The rest shall be ours, forest, field, and hall.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: balon
text: balon: Yara, my daughter, you'll take thirty longships to attack Deepwood Motte.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: I've always wanted a castle.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: And what's my role in all this?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: balon
text: balon: You'll take a ship to raid the fishing villages on the Stoney Shore.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: A ship? You give her thirty and I get one?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: The Sea Bitch. We thought she'd be perfect for you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm to fight fishermen?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: Be careful of their nets.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Father, I fought with Robb Stark. I know his men. He won't give up the North so easily.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: They won't even know we're there until it's too late.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: What do you know of it, woman? I'm a proven warrior.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: balon
text: balon: Your brothers were warriors, both of them dead at the hands of those you seem so eager to protect.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm not protecting anyone. I just wonder if it's not wiser to wait. Why risk going against the North if they would be our allies? Rise up against them and they could destroy us. But if we pledge fealty to them, they'll give us Casterly Rock.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: balon
text: balon: What are our words? Our words?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: We do not sow.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: balon
text: balon: We do not sow. We are Ironborn. We're not subjects. We're not slaves. We do not plow the fields or toil in the mine. We take what is ours. Your time with the wolves has made you weak.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: You act as if I volunteered to go. You gave me away, if you remember. The day you bent the knee to Robert Baratheon. After he crushed you. Did you take what was yours then?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: You gave me away!

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: Your boy! Your last boy! You gave me away like I was some dog you didn't want anymore. And now you curse me because I've come home.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: You'd have our father bow down to your other family?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: theon
text: theon: I have no other family.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: yara
text: yara: Don't you? Make your choice, Theon, and do it quickly. Our ships sail with or without you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: You won't let me leave this room. You won't let me-

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Keep your voice down.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Why? You think your father can hear me? He's three hundred miles away!

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't intend for you to stay here. I might be able to bring you into the castle kitchens.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Again, only temporary.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Every man who has tasted my cooking has told me what a good whore I am.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But you wouldn't be a cook. You'd pose as a scullion.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Scullion? What is a scullion?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Kitchen wench.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: A kitchen wench?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, but-

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Cleaning pots? Is that how my lion wants to see me?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Your lion wants to see you alive. We've come to a dangerous place. My sister wants to hurt me. She'll look for any weakness she can find. She can't know about you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm the weakness?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's a compliment, my lady.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: How is being a weakness a compliment?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Language can be a bit tricky here.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Oh, I'm too stupid to understand. The stupid foreign girl. I am not a kitchen wench.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: When will Joffrey and Sansa be married?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Soon, darling, when the war is over.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: Mother says I'll have a new gown for the ceremony and another for the feast. But yours will be ivory, since you're the bride.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The princess just spoke to you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Pardon, Your Grace. I'm sure your dress will be beautiful, Myrcella. I'm counting the days until the fighting is done and I can pledge my love to the King in sight of the gods.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tommen
text: tommen: Is Joffrey going to kill Sansa's brother?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He might.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Would you like that?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tommen
text: tommen: No. I don't think so.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Even if he does, Sansa will do her duty. Won't you, little dove?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Come in.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Who are you?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm Shae, my lady. Your new handmaiden.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I didn't know I needed a new handmaiden. You're not from here.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: No.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What are you doing?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Waiting for you to tell me what to do.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I shouldn't have to tell you to do things. You should just do them.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: What things?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Change my linens, wash my clothing, scrub the floor, empty my chamber pot, brush my hair.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: You said to brush your-

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Not now.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Your chamber pot is empty.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Clean the table.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Have you ever been a handmaiden before?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Yes.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: For whom?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Lady Zuriff.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Lady Zuriff

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: There is no Lady Zuriff in this city.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: She wasn't in this city.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I don't know how they did things in that city, but in this city, handmaidens wait on ladies, not the other way around. And I don't have time to answer a thousand questions and teach you how to do your job.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: shae
text: shae: Do you want me to leave?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Just brush my hair.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh! Thank the gods. I haven't had a proper shit in six days.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: I've encountered this problem before, my lord. The stresses of power often have this insalubrious effect. Two drops with water, daily.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Right. I'm so grateful to have a man of your vast knowledge and wisdom on my side.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Please.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Thank you, my lord.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I can trust you, Pycelle, can I not?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Why, yes, of course, my lord.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: These are perilous times. And the crown must forge new alliances. And these alliances must often be sealed in matrimony.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Matrimony, huh? Yes.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm trusting the council with these plans, but the Queen mustn't know. We can't have her meddling in affairs that could determine the future of the realm. There's too much at stake.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Oh, yes, yes. Indeed, yes. I shall be silent as the grave.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm brokering an alliance with House Martell of Dorne. Princess Myrcella will wed their youngest son when she comes of age, ensuring their loyalty and their army, should we need it.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Myrcella sent away to Dorne?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But remember, the Queen mustn't know.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: varys
text: varys: Ooh. "The Queen mustn't know." I love conversations that begin this way.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I plan to marry Princess Myrcella off to Theon Greyjoy.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: varys
text: varys: Theon Greyjoy? Forgive me, my lord, but how? He grew up a ward of Winterfell. He fights for Robb Stark.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Precisely.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Theon's father loathes the Starks and will convince the boy to come to our side. Greyjoy can destroy the Northern army from within and we can have his father's ships.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But remember, you must tell no one.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Tell no one what?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I plan to wed Princess Myrcella to Robin Arryn of the Vale. Lysa is not fond of me. But perhaps the promise of a royal match will convince her to let bygones be bygones.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: She imprisoned you. She tried to execute you. And you offer her son a princess?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: For men in our position, holding grudges can be an encumbrance, don't you think?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: And I suppose you want me to broker this agreement?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Who better?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Yes, I could sing this song to Lysa, if I cared to. What's in it for me?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The gratitude of the people of Westeros for helping to end this war, the adoration of the King for bringing the Vale back into the fold... and Harrenhal.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Harrenhal is cursed.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Never took you for a superstitious man. By all means, tear it down and rebuild. You'll be able to afford it. I plan to make you Lord of the Riverlands.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: With a single stroke, you'd make me one of the greatest lords in the realm.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You served my family well in the matter of the succession.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: So did Janos Slynt, and he was given Harrenhal, too. Until you snatched it away.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I need you to deliver Lysa Arryn. I didn't need Janos Slynt. It's settled, then?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Good. Oh. And remember-

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The Queen mustn't know.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: That must hurt.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: What? What is it?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: A member of the Kingsguard? As if I wasn't humiliated enough already.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: Brienne is a very capable warrior.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: And she's devoted to me. You're jealous.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: Jealous? Of Brienne the Beauty? Don't make me laugh.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: I'll make it up to you.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: No, Your Grace. Not tonight. There's another Tyrell who requires your attention. You didn't win my father's support or his army on charm alone.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: Your vassals are starting to snigger behind your back. Brides aren't usually virgins two weeks after their wedding night.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: And Margaery's a virgin?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: loras
text: loras: Officially. Shall I bring her to you?

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: I should warn you, I've had quite a bit of wine.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: margaery
text: margaery: As is your right. You are a king.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: You look very beautiful.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Thank you, Your Grace.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: It's a lovely gown.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: margaery
text: margaery: You think so? I can't decide how I like it better. This way, or this way.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
text: renly: You certainly don't need it.

title: What Is Dead May Never Die
Name: renly
