text: ros: Don't forget me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Never.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I will hurt you for this. A day will come when you think you're safe and happy, and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth. And you will know the debt is paid.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Get out.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Shae!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae: I've been waiting all night. What is wrong?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're beautiful.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae: Then why do you look sad?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We have to be more careful.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae: Don't be afraid. I can take care of myself.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There are people who want to hurt me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae: I know. I won't let them. I'll cut off their faces. I will.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I would kill for you. Do you know that? I expect I'll have to before this is over. You're mine.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm yours.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Promise me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm yours and you are mine.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: Still no word?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose: We've sent a dozen ravens. None have returned. My bastard is only a few days from Winterfell. Once he captures the castle

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: Theon has my brothers. If we storm the castle

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose: He wouldn't dare hurt the boys. They're his only hope of escaping the North with his head.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: Send word to your son. Any Ironborn who surrender will be allowed to return safely to their homes.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose: A touch of mercy is a virtue, Your Grace. Too much-

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: Any Ironborn with the exception of Theon Greyjoy. He betrayed our cause. He betrayed me. And we will hunt him down no matter where he runs.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose: I expect his countrymen will turn on him the minute they hear the offer.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Your pardon, my lord. Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: roose
text: roose: My lady.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: How are you?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: How am I? I've had to arrest my mother. The Lannisters have my sisters. The man I considered my closest friend has seized my home and my brothers. I'm fighting a war and I don't know if I should march south or north.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I'm sorry. It was a stupid question. I'm sorry.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: No. Forgive me. You're being kind. I have no right.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: You have every right. You're a king.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: That's not the kind of king I want to be.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: What kind do you want to be?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: I don't know. The good kind. Most kings grew up as princes. They spend their whole lives preparing for the crown. I was raised to be Lord of Winterfell.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I was raised to be a proper little lady, to play the harp and dance the latest steps and recite Valyrian poetry.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: I'd like to hear you play the harp.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: No. No, you would not.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: How did you go from reciting Valyrian poetry to sawing off men's feet?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: When I was twelve, my mother and father went to a wedding. Weddings in Volantis last for days, you know. And they left me with my little brother. The second afternoon they were gone was the hottest day in the three-year summer. We couldn't bear to be inside, so we ran down to the Rhoyne. Every child in Volantis was in the Rhoyne that day. The rich, the poor, we were all there. Naked, screaming, racing to the little islands. Drummers were playing for coppers on the east bank. I was treading water, talking to a friend, when I realized I hadn't seen my brother. I called his name. Then I started screaming his name. And then I saw him floating face down. My heart just stopped. I was I dragged him from the water. My friend helped me, I think. I don't even remember. He was so little. Then we pulled him onto the riverbank. And I screamed at him and I shook him. And he was dead. Just dead. A man ran over. He had a fish tattoo on his face. In Volantis, the slaves have tattoos. So you know what they are without having to talk to them. And this man worked on a fishing boat. And he pushed me out of the way. You have to understand, for a slave to push a highborn girl, that's death for the man, a terrible death. But he pushed me out of the way, and he started pressing on my brother's chest again and again and again, until my brother spat out half of the Rhoyne and cried out. And the man cradled his head and told him to be calm. I decided two things that day. I would not waste my years planning dances and masquerades with the other noble ladies. And when I came of age, I would never live in a slave city again. I'm sorry, Your Grace. You told me of your problems and I've blathered on.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: robb
text: robb: I don't want to marry the Frey girl.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I don't want you to marry her. But you needed that bridge. I hope it's a very beautiful bridge.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot: The sour cherries was all crushed up and ready.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Shut up.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot: Probably in the piecrust by now. In the oven. The nice, warm oven.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya: Shut up. What did you bring?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: yara
text: yara: Shut up. What did you bring?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot: The cheese could be better. I did get some nice sausages.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry: What did he want us to do about those guards?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya: He didn't say. He just said, "Walk through the gates."

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry: What about the guards?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya: He didn't say anything about the guards.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry: What, he left that bit out? It's a pretty important part, don't you think?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya: We have to trust him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Trust him? You trusted him to fight with us when you set him free and he ran.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: hot
text: hot: I want to go back to the kitchens.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: arya
text: arya: Shut up. Stay here if you're afraid.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Arry, don't.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man: Away! Reset!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: If the wind holds, we'll reach King's Landing in a day.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Will it hold?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: Can't make promises for the wind, Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: man
text: man: Again, pull!

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I admire you, Ser Davos.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: I thank you, Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Pleased to hear it. Some highborn fools call you Onion Knight and think they insult you. So you take the onion for your sigil, sew it on your coat, fly the onion flag.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: My son wishes me to change it. Three mermen with tridents, something like that. I understand why the older families look down at me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Do you? Why?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: My father was a crabber.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: And?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: Well, sons of lords don't like to break bread with sons of crabbers. Our hands stink.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: And where were those lords when Storm's End starved?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: Many fought bravely for your brother. Many fought for the Mad King.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You defend these men who insult you behind your back.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: Some are happy to do it to my face.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: We were forgotten. Robert and Ned Stark, they were the heroes. The glorious rebels marching from battle to battle, liberating towns from the yoke of the Mad King, while I held Storm's End with five hundred men.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: No one has forgotten, Your Grace.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: No? Robert did. He gave Storm's End to Renly after the war. Renly never fought a day in his life.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: He was only a boy.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Then why'd he give him Storm's End?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: First, we ate the horses. We weren't riding anywhere, not with the castle surrounded. We couldn't feed them, so fine, the horses. Then the cats. Never liked cats. So fine. I do like dogs. Good animals. Loyal. But we ate them. Then the rats. The night before you slipped through, I thought my wife was dying. She couldn't speak anymore, she was so frail. And then you made it through the lines. Slipped right through in your little black sailboat with your onions.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: And potatoes. Some salted beef, I believe.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Every man in Storm's End wanted to kiss you that night.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: I was relieved they did not.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Robert told me to hold Storm's End, so I held it. Then he told me he was giving it to Renly, so I gave it up. Insult or no, I gave it up. Because Robert was my older brother, and he was the king and I've always done my duty. But now, I'm the rightful king by every law of Westeros. And when I sit the Iron Throne, you'll be my Hand.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: davos
text: davos: Your Grace, I pray I serve you well.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I expect you'll be the first crabber's son to wear the badge.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: You're the Master of Whisperers. You're supposed to know everything.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: No man can be in all rooms at all times. I have many little birds in the North, my lord, but I haven't heard their songs since Theon Greyjoy captured Winterfell.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: The Stark forces are distracted. Now is the time to strike.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: To strike? My dear nephew, you do see these men preparing the walls for siege? You do understand Stannis Baratheon sails this way?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: If my Uncle Stannis lands on the shores of King's Landing, I'll ride out to greet him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A brave choice, Your Grace. I'm sure your men will line up behind you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: They say Stannis never smiles. I'll give him a red smile from ear to ear.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Imagine Stannis' terror.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: I am trying.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're an intelligent man. I'd like to think I'm an intelligent man.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: Oh, no one disputes that, my lord, not even the multitudes who despise you.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I wish we could converse as two honest, intelligent men.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: I wish we could, too.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What do you want? Tell me.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: If we're going to play, you'll have to start.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My brother was the youngest Kingsguard in history. My sister became queen at the age of nineteen. When I reached manhood, my father put me in charge of all the drains and cisterns in Casterly Rock.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: A most highborn plumber.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The water never flowed better. And all the shit found its way to the sea. I never expected to have any real power. So when my father named me acting Hand

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: You're quite good at being Hand, you know? Jon Arryn and Ned Stark were good men. Honorable men. But they disdained the game and those who played. You enjoy the game.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I do. Last thing I expected.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: And you play it well.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'd like to keep playing it. If Stannis breaches the gates, the game is over.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: They say he burns his enemies alive to honor the Lord of Light.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Lord of Light wants his enemies burned, the Drowned God wants them drowned. Why are all the gods such vicious cunts? Where is the god of tits and wine?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: In the Summer Isles, they worship a fertility goddess with sixteen teats.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We should sail there immediately.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: This morning, I heard a song all the way from Qarth beyond the Red Waste. Daenerys Targaryen lives.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A girl at the edge of the world is the least of our problems.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: varys
text: varys: She has three dragons. But even if what they say is true, it'll be years before they are fully grown. And then there will be nowhere to hide.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: One game at a time, my friend.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Careful, Khaleesi. Xaro owns this city and the warlocks have a thousand eyes watching for you. I found one. A ship with a good captain. She leaves for Astapor tomorrow.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Astapor?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We cannot stay here.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They have my dragons. A mother does not flee without her children.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They're not your children. I know they call you the Mother of Dragons and I know you love them, but you didn't grow them in your womb. They didn't suckle at your breast. They are dragons, Khaleesi. And if we stay in Qarth, we'll die.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You should sail to Astapor. I'm sure you'll be safe there.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You know I would die for you. I will never abandon you. I'm sworn to protect you, to serve.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Then serve me. If my dragons are in the House of the Undying, then take me there.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah: That's what the warlock wants. He told you so himself. If you enter that place, you will never leave again. His magic is strong.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what of my magic? You saw me step into the fire. You watched the witch burn. What did the flames do to me? Do you remember?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Until my last breath, I will remember. After I have forgotten my mother's face.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They are my children. And they are the only children I will ever have. Take me to them.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon: We should bury them.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer: I'd leave 'em up a few more days. Sends a message.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon: If they haven't got the damn message yet, a few more days won't help. As you say. But it don't hurt to let 'em rot a while longer.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer: What's this?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: theon
text: theon: Gold for the farmer. For his trouble.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer: His troubles are done. He's feeding the crops now.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer: His wife, too. You want to keep a man silent, you silence him.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: osha
text: osha: Got as far as the farm and then doubled back. Walked through the stream to throw off the hounds. Hoped this would be the last place they'd think to look.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: luwin
text: luwin: You're right so far.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: osha
text: osha: Who was that out there hung up at the gates?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Must have been the farmer's boys.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: osha
text: osha: He killed them and burned them and passed them off as the little lords?

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: luwin
text: luwin: They mustn't know. Bran would blame himself.

title: The Prince of Winterfell
Name: osha
text: osha: They'll never hear it from me. The little lads have suffered enough.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: That's it. The tide's against us.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Aye, but we have the wind. She'll blow us straight to the gates.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: You're coming home.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: King's Landing hasn't been home for twenty years. I spent most of my life dodging the royal fleet. And now I'm sailing right at them.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: This is the royal fleet. And you're not a smuggler anymore, you're the high captain.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Of course, there are several royal fleets at the moment.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Not after tonight. When the sun rises, Stannis will sit on the Iron Throne and you will be his Hand.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Gods be good.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: God. Father, there is only one and he watches over us.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: But not over them?

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Over all of us. The people of King's Landing did not choose the false king, Joffrey Baratheon. They will be glad to see his head on a spike.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Well, first, we have to put it there.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Our ships outnumber theirs ten-to-one.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Our army outnumber theirs five-to-one. Those walls have never been breached, and the men guarding the walls, when they see you, they don't see a liberator, they see a stranger come to set their city on fire.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: I have faith in the Lord of Light. I have faith in our cause. And I have faith in my captain.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Are you afraid, my lion?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If the city falls, Stannis will burn every Lannister he can find. Of course I'm afraid.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: I won't let them hurt you.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm a Lannister. I don't have a choice in all this. But it's not your war.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: It is now.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You can't fuck your way out of everything.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: I have so far. Do you remember what you said when you met me in your tent? That I should make love to you like it was your last day on this earth.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: As you know, Your Grace, it is not only the sworn duty of a maester to carry out the wishes of the house he serves, but also to offer guidance and counsel in times of war.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Your words are always wise and measured.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: If you could - If anything, a maester's duties become more urgent in times of war and turmoil. I remember back in the days of King

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You brought me something?

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Yes. Essence of nightshade is as dangerous as it is efficacious. A single drop in a cup of wine suffices to soothe ragged nerves. Three drops will bring on a deep and dreamless sleep. Ten drops, however-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I know what ten drops will bring.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Your Grace, if I may ask-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You may not. You must have a lot of work to do. I'm sure many brave men will need your wisdom soon.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Yes. A siege is very-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Be careful on the stairs, Grand Maester. There are so many.

title: Blackwater
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: And so he spoke / That Lord of Castamere / But now the rains weep o'er his halls / With no one there to hear / Yes, now the rains weep o'er his halls / And not a soul to hear-

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: To the boys!

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Lannisters! Where'd you learn the Lannister song?

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Drunk Lannisters.

title: Blackwater
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute: You've got a pretty voice.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Thank you very much.

title: Blackwater
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute: And I like your nose. How many times you break it?

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Well, now let's see. First time, I was five. My mam smacked me with an iron poker.

title: Blackwater
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute: Oh.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: It wasn't me she was aiming at. She was trying for my little brother. Now he was a real pest.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Second time, I was nine. Got in a scrap with a few older boys. They won. Third time-

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Eh, you don't want to know about the third time.

title: Blackwater
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute: Poor nose.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Don't feel sorry for him. He'll be halfway up your arse before the night's through.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Welcome, friends. This roundo s on me.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I don't think he likes me.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You think you're a hard man?

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I know it.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: It's warm in here. We've got beautiful women and good brown ale. Plenty for everyone. And all you want is to put one of us in the cold ground with no women to keep us company.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Oh, there's women in the ground. I put some there myself. So have you. You like fucking and drinking and singing. But killing, killing's the thing you love. You're just like me.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Only smaller.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: And quicker. Eh?

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Your Lord Imp's going to miss you.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Aye I expect he will someday.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Here we are.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: One more drink before the war? Shall we?

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: I've always hated the bells. They ring for horror. A dead king, a city under siege.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A wedding.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: Exactly. Podrick, is that it?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Is that it?" Nice touch. As if you don't know the name of every boy in town.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: I'm not entirely sure what you're suggesting.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm entirely sure you're entirely sure what I'm suggesting.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: Do you trust him?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oddly enough, I do.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: Good.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: The map you asked for.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There must be twenty miles of tunnels beneath the city.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: Closer to fifty. The Targaryens built this city to withstand a siege and to provide escape if necessary.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm not escaping. Strange as it sounds, I'm the captain of the ship, and if the ship goes down, I go with her.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: That is good to hear. Though I'm sure many captains say the same while their ship is afloat. You look well suited for battle, my lord.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, I'm not.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: For all our sakes, I hope you are wrong. My little birds tell me that Stannis Baratheon has taken up with a red priestess from Asshai.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What of it?

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: You don't believe in the old powers, my lord?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Blood spells, curses, shape-shifting. What do you think?

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: I think you believe in what you see and in what those you trust have seen. You probably don't entirely trust me.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Mmm, don't take it personally. I don't entirely trust myself.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: And yet I have seen things and heard things, things you have not, things I wish I had not. I don't believe I've ever told you how I was cut.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, I don't believe you have.

title: Blackwater
Name: varys
text: varys: One day, I will. The dark arts have provided Lord Stannis with his armies and paved his path to our door. For a man in service to such powers to sit on the Iron Throne, I can think of nothing worse. And tonight, I believe you are the only man who can stop him.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: They're welcoming the new king.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: I've never known bells to mean surrender. They want to play music with us? Let's play. Drums.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: Drums!

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Remember, wait till the ships-

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: The ships are in the bay.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: They must be far enough in-

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I know what "in" means. Do you know how to use that?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I chopped wood once. No, I watched my brother chopping wood.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I saw you kill a man with a shield. You'll be unstoppable with an ax.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Don't get killed.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Nor you, my friend.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Oh, are we friends now?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Of course we are. Just because I pay you for your services doesn't diminish our friendship.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Enhances it, really.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh! "Enhances." Fancy word for a sellsword.

title: Blackwater
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Been spending time with fancy folks.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Lady Sansa and Sheila.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Shae.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Shae, yes. Surely my sister has asked you to join the other highborn ladies in Maegor's holdfast.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: She has, my lord, but King Joffrey sent for me to see him off.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Sansa.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Always been a great romantic, my nephew.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Sansa, come here.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I will pray for your safe return, my lord.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Will you?

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Just as I pray for the king's.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Stay safe, my lady.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: And you, my lion.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Your king rides forth to battle. You should see him off with a kiss.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: My new blade. Hearteater, I've named it. Kiss it.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: You'll kiss it again when I return and taste my uncle's blood.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Will you slay him yourself?

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: If Stannis is fool enough to come near me.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: So you'll be outside the gates fighting in the vanguard?

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: A king doesn't discuss battle plans with stupid girls.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm sorry, Your Grace. You're right, I'm stupid. Of course you'll be in the vanguard. They say my brother Robb always goes where the fighting is thickest. And he is only a pretender.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Your brother's turn will come. Then you can lick his blood off Hearteater, too.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Some of those boys will never come back.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Joffrey will. The worst ones always live.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Shh. Come, my lady.

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Where's our fleet?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: On the way.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Why isn't it here now? They're coming.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Hound, tell the Hand that his king has asked him a question.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: The king has asked you a question.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Ser Lancel, tell the Hound to tell the king that the Hand is extremely busy.

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: The Hand of the King would like me to tell you to tell the king-

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: If I tell the Hound to cut you in half, he'll do it without a second thought.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That would make me the quarterman. It just doesn't have the same ring to it. Cut me in half and I won't be able to give the signal. No signal, no plan. No plan and Stannis Baratheon sacks this city, takes the Iron Throne, puts your pinched little head atop a gate somewhere. It might be quite amusing, except that my head would be up there, too. I've never much liked my head, but I don't want to see it removed just yet.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Where are their ships?

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: It was wise to attack at night. We took them by surprise.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Lord Varys knows what you had for breakfast three days ago. There are no surprises here.

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: If it's true there is dissension in their ranks, maybe their sailors have mutinied.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Maybe.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I don't know why she wants me here. She's always saying how stupid I am. She hates me.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Maybe she hates you less than she hates everyone else.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I doubt it.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Maybe she's jealous of you.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why would she be jealous?

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Sansa.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I was wondering where our little dove had flown. You look pale, child. Is your red flower still blooming?

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Fitting, isn't it? The men will bleed out there and you will bleed in here. Pour Lady Sansa some wine.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm not thirsty, Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: So? I didn't offer you water.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What's he doing here?

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Ser llyn? He's here to defend us. When the axes smash down those doors, you may be glad to have him.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: But we have guards to defend us.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Guards we have paid. Should the city fall, they'll be the first ones out of the doors.

title: Blackwater
Name: gold
text: gold: The lads caught a groom and two maids trying to sneak away with a stolen horse and some gold cups.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The battle's first traitors. Have Ser llyn see to them. Put their heads on spikes outside the stables as a warning.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The only way to keep the small folk loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy. Remember that if you ever hope to become a queen.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You said he was here to protect us.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He is. Traitors are a danger to us all. More wine.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: There they are.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Archers to their marks.

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Archers, to your marks!

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Archers! Nock your arrows!

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Nock arrows!

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Hold fast.

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Hold fast!

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What are you doing? We need to attack them.

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Boulders ready!

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: There's only one ship. Where are the rest of them? Where are the rest of them?

title: Blackwater
Name: matthos
text: matthos: There's only one ship.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Archers, stand to! Man the below! Nock.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Nock and set!

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Draw! Hold.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Hold.

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: There's no one on board.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: More rocks coming up!

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Wildfire. Steer clear! Steer clear!

title: Blackwater
Name: davos
text: davos: Matthos! Get down!

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Prepare to land.

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: The dwarf has played his little trick.

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: The wildfire.

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: He can only play it once.

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: We're too far from the gates. The fire, their archers- Hundreds will die.

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Thousands.

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Come with me and take this city!

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Sansa, come here, little dove.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: My queen.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What are you doing?

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Praying.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're perfect, aren't you? Praying. What are you praying for?

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: For the gods to have mercy on us all.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Oh. On all of us?

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes, Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Even me?

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Of course, Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Even Joffrey?

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Joffrey is my-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Oh, shut up, you little fool. Praying to the gods to have mercy on us all. The gods have no mercy. That's why they're gods. My father told me that when he caught me praying. My mother had just died, you see. I didn't really understand the concept of death, the finality of it. I thought that if I prayed very, very hard, the gods would return my mother to me. I was four.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Your father doesn't believe in the gods?

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He believes in them, he just doesn't like them very much.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: One for her.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Here. Sit. Drink.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Not like that. Drink, girl.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I should have been born a man. I'd rather face a thousand swords than be shut up inside with this flock of frightened hens.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: They are your guests under your protection. You asked them here.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It was expected of me, as it will be of you if you ever become Joffrey's queen. If my wretched brother should somehow prevail, these hens will return to their cocks and crow of how my courage inspired them, lifted their spirits.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And if the city should fall?

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You'd like that, wouldn't you? The Red Keep should hold for a time, long enough for me to go to the walls and yield to Lord Stannis in person. If it were anyone else outside those gates, I might have hoped for a private audience, but this is Stannis Baratheon. I'd have a better chance of seducing his horse.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Have I shocked you, little dove? Tears aren't a woman's only weapon. The best one's between your legs. Learn how to use it. Drink.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you have any notion of what happens when a city is sacked? No, you wouldn't, would you? If the city falls, these fine women should be in for a bit of a rape. Half of them will have bastards in their bellies come the morning. You'll be glad of your red flower then. When a man's blood is up, anything with tits looks good. A precious thing like you will look very, very good. A slice of cake just waiting to be eaten.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: More pressure! Pull! Pull! That's it, men! Pull! Pull!

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: He's a serious man, Stannis Baratheon.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: They're coming. They're coming ashore.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Rain fire on them.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Archers!

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: There are too many.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Hound, form a welcome party for any Baratheon troop that manages to touch solid ground. Pod, run to the King's Gate. Bring any men guarding it here, now.

title: Blackwater
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Yes, my lord.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Let's go. Stannis is sending us fresh meat. You, too.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Any of these flaming fucking arrows come near me, I'll strangle you with your own guts.

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Pull, pull! Go!

title: Blackwater
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Nock! Draw!

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Draw! Draw!

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Kill the Lannisters!

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Loose! Loose!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Form the line!

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Draw! Draw! Loose! Loose!

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: To the Mud Gate, go now!

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: First and second squads, to the gate! To the Mud Gate!

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Any man dies with a clean sword, I'll rape his fucking corpse.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: When we were young, Jaime and I, we looked so much alike even our father couldn't tell us apart. I could never understand why they treated us differently. Jaime was taught to fight with sword and lance and mace, and I was taught to smile and sing and please. He was heir to Casterly Rock, and I was sold to some stranger like a horse to be ridden whenever he desired.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You were Robert's queen.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And you will be Joffrey's. Enjoy. I don't think I know this one.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Pretty.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's the worst curtsy I've ever seen. Here, it's not difficult. I mastered it when I was four. Straighten your back and bend.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Better. You learn fast. How long have you been in Lady Sansa's service?

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: A few weeks, Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: When did you leave Lorath?

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I had a Lorathi handmaiden once.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: But she was a nobleman's daughter. You're not. When did you come to Westeros?

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Ten years ago, Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: From Lorathi commoner to the Red Keep in ten years, all without learning how to curtsy. I imagine that's a very interesting story. What's your name?

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Shae, Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Tell us a story, Shae.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: When I was thireen, I-

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Your Grace!

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What news?

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: The Imp has set the river afire. Hundreds of ships are burning, maybe more. Stannis' fleet destroyed, but But But his troops have landed outside the city walls.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Where is Joffrey?

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: On the battlements with Lord Tyrion.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Bring him back inside at once.

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Your Grace-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What?

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: The king's presence is good for morale.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Bring him back to his chambers now.

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Not here?

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: With the women and children? Do you want him to be mocked as a coward for the rest of his life?

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: No, but I-

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Now!

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: When I told you about Ser llyn earlier, I lied. Do you want to hear the truth? You want to know why he's really here? He's here for us. Stannis may take the city, he may take the throne, but he will not take us alive.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Help me!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Fall back! Fall back!

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Get the ladders up!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Faster, you bastards! Faster! Come on, kill the scum!

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Someone bring me a drink.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Fuck the water. Bring me wine.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Can I get you some iced milk and a nice bowl of raspberries, too?

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Eat shit, dwarf.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're on the wrong side of the wall.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I lost half my men. The Blackwater's on fire.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Dog, I command you to go back out there and fight!

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're Kingsguard, Clegane. You must beat them back or they're going to take this city. Your king's city.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Fuck the Kingsguard. Fuck the city. Fuck the king.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Loose!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Put your backs into it!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: All right, get up!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Clear!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Forward!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Forward ladders!

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Heave! Heave!

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Your Grace, the queen has sent me to bring you back to the Red Keep.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If you won't defend your own city, why should they?

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What would you have me do?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Lead. Get down there and lead your people against the invaders who want to kill them.

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What did my mother say exactly? Did she have urgent business with me?

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: She did not say, Your Grace.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: All men to the battlements!

title: Blackwater
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Ser Boros, Ser Mandon, stay with my uncle and represent the king on the field of battle.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Archers, hold your line or I'll kill you myself.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Stand fast!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: No! Get up, you fool.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: We need more arrows!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Where is the king? Why isn't he with us?

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Who are we fighting for?

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Who leads us?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'll lead the attack. I'll lead the attack!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Yes.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: What are you talking about?

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Pod, my helmet. Ser Mandon, you will bear the king's banner. Men, form up. Men Men! They say I'm half a man. But what does that make the lot of you?

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: The only way out is through the gates. And they're at the gates.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There's another way out. I'm going to show you. We'll come out behind them and fuck them in their arses.

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Don't fight for your king and don't fight for his kingdoms. Don't fight for honor. Don't fight for glory. Don't fight for riches, because you won't get any. This is your city Stannis means to sack. That's your gate he's ramming. If he gets in, it will be your houses he burns, your gold he steals, your women he will rape.

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Heave! Heave! Heave!

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Those are brave men knocking at our door. Let's go kill them.

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: The battle is lost, Your Grace. Stannis' troops are at the gates. When the gold cloaks saw the king leaving, they lost all heart.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Where is my son?

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: I want to escort him back to the battle.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Why do I care what you want? Bring me-

title: Blackwater
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Now listen to me-

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Don't be afraid. The queen has raised the drawbridge. This is the safest place we can be. Joffrey's not hurt. He's fighting bravely. His knights have rallied behind him. They will save the city. Shall we sing a hymn? Gentle mother, fount of mercy...

title: Blackwater
Name: all
text: all: Save our sons from war, we pray.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: You must go. Run to your chamber and bar your door. Stannis won't hurt you. This one will.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Come with me.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: I need to say goodbye to someone.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: The queen said they'd rape everyone.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: No one is raping me.

title: Blackwater
Name: shae
text: shae: Go. Run.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: The lady is starting to panic.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What are you doing here?

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Not here for long. I'm going.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Where?

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Someplace that isn't burning. North, might be. Could be.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What about the king?

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: He can die just fine on his own.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I can take you with me. Take you to Winterfell.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I'll keep you safe. Do you want to go home?

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'll be safe here. Stannis won't hurt me.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Look at me. Stannis is a killer. The Lannisters are killers. Your father was a killer. Your brother is a killer. Your sons will be killers someday. The world is built by killers. So you'd better get used to looking at them.

title: Blackwater
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You won't hurt me.

title: Blackwater
Name: sandor
text: sandor: No, little bird, I won't hurt you.

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Heave!

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Come on, you bastards! Get up those ladders!

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Attack!

title: Blackwater
Name: men
text: men: Roll it over!

title: Blackwater
Name: all
text: all: Halfman! Halfman! Halfman!

title: Blackwater
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh, fuck me.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Shh! Be calm, my sweet.

title: Blackwater
Name: tommen
text: tommen: They're still fighting.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No one's going to hurt you. I'll tell you a story. You know the one about the mother lion and her little cub? They lived in the woods.

title: Blackwater
Name: tommen
text: tommen: The Kingswood?

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Yes, my love. In the Kingswood, there lived a mother and her cub. She loved him very much. But there were other things that lived in the woods. Evil things.

title: Blackwater
Name: tommen
text: tommen: Like what?

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Like stags.

title: Blackwater
Name: tommen
text: tommen: Stags aren't evil. They only eat grass.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And wolves.

title: Blackwater
Name: podrick
text: podrick: My lord.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He could hear them howling in the night. The little cub was frightened. His mother said, "You are a lion, my son. You mustn't be afraid."

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: For one day, all the beasts will bow to you. You will be king. All the stags will bow. All the wolves will bow. The bears in the north and the foxes of the south, all the birds in the sky and the beasts in the sea, they will all come to you, little lion, to rest a crown upon your head.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And the cub said, "Will I be strong and fierce like my father?"

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Yes," said his mother. "You will be strong and fierce just like your father.

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I will keep you safe, my love. I promise you.

title: Blackwater
Name: man
text: man: Back to the boats!

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Stand and fight! Stand and fight, damn you!

title: Blackwater
Name: stannis
text: stannis: No!

title: Blackwater
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Father.

title: Blackwater
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The battle is over. We have won.

title: Blackwater
Name: male
text: male: And who are you," the proud lord said / "That I must bow so low?" / "Only a cat of a different coat / That's all the truth I know / In a coat of gold or a coat of red / A lion still has claws / And mine are long and sharp, my lord / As long and sharp as yours" / And so he spoke, and so he spoke / That Lord of Castamere / But now the rains weep o'er his hall / With no one there to hear / Yes, now the rains weep o'er his hall / And not a soul to hear

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Pod.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Pod! Find Bronn or Varys. Tell them I am here with Maester Pycelle. Tell them I am very much alive.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Yes, my lord.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Would you like something for the pain?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What happened?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: The murderer and traitor Stannis Baratheon suffered a stunning defeat at the hands of your father.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Where am I?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: These are your new chambers. A little cramped, perhaps, but you don't need much room, do you? You are no longer Hand of the King.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Oh, For your trouble.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I, Joffrey of the House Baratheon, first of my name, the rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, do hereby proclaim my grandfather, Tywin Lannister, the savior of the city and the Hand of the King.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Thank you, Your Grace.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Lord Petyr Baelish, step forward.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: For your good service and ingenuity in uniting the Houses of Lannister and Tyrell, I declare that you shall be granted the castle of Harrenhal with all its attendant lands and incomes to be held by your sons and grandsons from this day until the end of time.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You honor me beyond words, Your Grace. I shall have to acquire some sons and grandsons.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Ser Loras Tyrell.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Your house has come to our aid. The whole realm is in your debt, none more so than I. If your family would ask anything of me, ask it, and it shall be yours.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: loras
text: loras: Your Grace, my sister Margaery, her husband was taken from us before... She remains innocent. I would ask you to find it in your heart to do us the great honor of joining our houses.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Is this what you want, Lady Margaery?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: margaery
text: margaery: With all my heart, Your Grace. I have come to love you from afar. Tales of your courage and wisdom have never been far from my ears. And those tales have taken root deep inside of me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I, too, have heard tales of your beauty and grace, but the tales do not do you justice, my lady. It would be an honor to return your love, but I am promised to another. A king must keep his word.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Your Grace, in the judgment of your Small Council, it would be neither proper nor wise for you to wed the daughter of a man beheaded for treason, a girl whose brother is in open rebellion against the throne as we speak. For the good of the realm, your councilors beg you to set Sansa Stark aside.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: crowd
text: crowd: Margaery! We want Margaery!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I would like to heed your wishes and the wishes of my people, but I took a holy vow.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Your Grace, the gods do indeed hold betrothal solemn, but your father, blessed be his memory, made this pact before the Starks revealed their falseness. I have consulted with the High Septon and he assures me that their crimes against the realm free you from any promise you have made to them in the sight of the gods.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: The gods are good. I am free to heed my heart. Ser Loras, I will gladly wed your sweet sister. You will be my queen and I will love you from this day until my last day.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: petyr
text: petyr: My lady. My sincerest condolences.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sansa
text: sansa: They're right. I'm not good enough for him.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You shouldn't say that. You'll be good enough for many things. He'll still enjoy beating you. And now that you're a woman, he'll be able to enjoy you in other ways as well.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sansa
text: sansa: But, if he's not marrying me-

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: petyr
text: petyr: He'll let you go home? Joffrey's not the sort of boy who gives away his toys. You have a tender heart, just like your mother did at your age. I can see so much of her in you. She was like a sister to me. For her sake, I'll help get you home.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sansa
text: sansa: King's Landing is my home now.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Look around you. We're all liars here. And every one of us is better than you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: Come in. Make yourself comfortable.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: That doesn't look very comfortable. Here, watch me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: No need for that, my dear.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: You sure? Most men like what they see.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: I'm not like most men.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: That's what most men say.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: If you don't want what most men want, then you'd better tell me what you'd like me to do.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: I would like you to tell me if working for Lord Baelish has been all you'd hoped it would be.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: Have we met?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: You wouldn't remember me if we had?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: I meet a lot of men.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: And I think you remember all of them. I think your true talents are wasted on them.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: You're very kind, my lord. Allow me to return the favor.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: You're afraid. Why? Nothing dangerous down there.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: I know who you are.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: And, unlike your current employer, I protect those who work for me. I don't abuse them to satisfy royal whims or force them to abuse each other.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: How do you know about that?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: I thought you said you knew who I was.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: What can I do for you, Lord Varys?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: Littlefinger looks at you and sees a collection of profitable holes. I see a potential partner.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ros
text: ros: I'm afraid of him.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: Oh, you should be. He's a dangerous man. But everyone has their weaknesses. Your current employer hides his very well, but not as well as he thinks.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You're a virgin, I take it?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Walk.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Childhood must have been awful for you. Were you a foot taller than all the boys? They laughed at you, called you names? Some boys like a challenge. One or two must have tried to get inside Big Brienne.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: One or two tried.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Ah. But you fought them off. But maybe you wished one of them could overpower you, fling you down, tear off your clothes. But none of them were strong enough. I'm strong enough.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Not interested.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Of course you are. You'd love to know what it feels like to be a woman.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Ah. "They lay with lions." Tavern girls, I'd say. Probably served my father's soldiers. Maybe one of them gave up a kiss and a feel. That's how they earned this. The glorious work of the Northern freedom fighters. Must make you proud to serve the Starks.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I don't serve the Starks. I serve Lady Catelyn.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Tell yourself that tonight when they swing in your dreams.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What are you doing?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Burying them.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We shouldn't stay here. We should get back on the river.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I think these women would understand if I don't care what you think.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: I didn't leave it here.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: I had me dagger.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Untie me. Now!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: I gave it to you to cut the rope, and now I don't have me dagger no more.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: So unless it got stuck in your arse on its way to your cunt, it stands to reason that it's gone. Whoa. What's your business here?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Traveling a prisoner.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: You're a woman. A woman!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Well, fuck me!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: If you've quite finished up-

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: All right, we'll be going.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Whoa. Whoa! Who do you fight for?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: The Starks.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: What did he do?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Apparently eating is now a crime. Who knew?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: No, stealing is a crime.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: But it's not a crime to starve. That's justice for you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Where are you taking him?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: To Riverrun.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Why Riverrun?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Steal from the Tullys, it's their dungeons you rot in.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Why not kill him?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: For stealing a pig?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I don't give the orders. He must be important to someone.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Sending him with you? How important could he be?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: All right, have it your way, my lady.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Do I know you?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Have you been to Ashemark?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: No.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Then you don't know me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Do you ever go to the river market at Salt Rock?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Is it near Ashemark?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I've never been there.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: What do you think of these beauties?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I hope you gave them quick deaths.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Two of them we did, yeah.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Wait. I do know you. That's Jaime Lannister.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I wish someone had told me. I wouldn't have had to steal that pig.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: If this is the Kingslayer, I think I'd know about it.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: How do you know what the Kingslayer looks like?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: I was at Whispering Wood. I saw him. They dragged him out of the woods and threw him down before the king.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: He's not the Kingslayer. Sorry to disappoint you. If he was, I'd only be traveling his head.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: I have a question for you both. And I want you to answer it at the same time. I count to three, you both answer. What's his name? One. Two. Three.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Two quick deaths.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Those were Stark men.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I don't serve the Starks. I serve Lady Catelyn. I told you I'd take you to King's Landing, and that's what I'm going to do. Stay.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Walder Frey is a dangerous man to cross.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: robb
text: robb: I know that.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And you mean to do it anyway?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: robb
text: robb: I love her.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I know that seems important to you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: robb
text: robb: It is important to me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Your father didn't love me when we married. He hardly knew me or I him. Love didn't just happen to us. We built it slowly over the years, stone by stone, for you, for your brothers and sisters, for all of us. It's not as exciting as secret passion in the woods, but it is stronger. It lasts longer.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: robb
text: robb: And that is what would be in store for me with one of Walder Frey's daughters, what you and father had?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Why not? Because she's not beautiful? Because she's not exotic and exciting?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: robb
text: robb: Now you're arguing just to argue because you arranged it.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And you agreed to it. You gave him your word. Treat your oaths recklessly, and your people will do the same. If your father lived his life for one thing

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: robb
text: robb: My father is dead. And the only parent I have left has no right to call anyone reckless.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You said you saw my victory in the flames.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: l I did. I still see it.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: The flames lied. And I'm no better than a savage trusting in a fire god. I fought for your god in Blackwater Bay. I led my men to the gates of the seventh hell as their brothers burned alive, and for what? Attacked from behind by Tywin Lannister and the Tyrells. If you see so much in your flames, why didn't you warn me?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The Lord of Light only allows me glimpses.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You claimed to speak for a god.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Will you quit the war just because you've lost a battle?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You talk about war as if you understand it.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I've been fighting far longer than you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Have you? Show me how you fight.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Show me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Where's your god now? Will he save you? Where is your god?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Inside you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I murdered my brother.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: We murdered him. Share the weight with me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: He wasn't your brother.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: This war has just begun. It will last for years. Thousands will die at your command. You will betray the men serving you. You will betray your family. You will betray everything you once held dear. And it will all be worth it because you are the Son of Fire. You are the Warrior of Light. You will sweep aside this pretender and that one. You will be king.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You promise these things, but you don't know. None of us know.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Let me show you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Look into the fire, my king. Look.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I see fire.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Keep looking. Do you see? Do you see, my king?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Yes.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: I will kill that man. I don't care how many arrows they feather me with, how many spears they run through me, I will kill that horn-blowing cunt before I fall.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: They want you to know you're surrounded.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: I know I'm surrounded. I know that because I stood on the battlements and saw I was surrounded.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: They don't want you to sleep. They want to sap your spirit before

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: Thank you, wise bald man. Thank you for explaining siege tactics to me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: No word from my father?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: No.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: Send more ravens.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: You killed all the ravens.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: The first time I saw Winterfell-

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: First time I saw Winterfell, it looked like something that had been here for thousands of years and would be here for thousands of years after I was dead. I saw it and I thought, "Of course, Ned Stark crushed our rebellion and killed my brothers. "We never stood a chance against the man who lives here."

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Lord Stark went out of his way to make it your home.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: Yes, my captors were so very kind to me. You love reminding me of that. Everyone in this frozen pile of shit has always loved reminding me of that. You know what it's like to be told how lucky you are to be someone's prisoner? To be told how much you owe them? And then to go back home to your real father

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: I will kill that man. I swear to the Drowned God, the Old Gods, the New Gods, to every fucking god in every fucking heaven, I will kill that man.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Theon, listen to me. I serve Winterfell. Now Winterfell is yours. I'm bound by oath to serve you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: And what's your counsel, trusted friend?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Run. Five hundred Northmen wait outside the walls. You have twenty men. You can't win. Wait for nightfall and run.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: There's nowhere to run. I'd never make it back to the Iron Islands. And even if I did, even if by some miracle I slipped through the lines and made it home, I'd be a coward. The Greyjoy who ran. The shame of the family.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Don't go home. Join the Night's Watch.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Once a man has taken the black, he's beyond reach of the law. All his past crimes are forgiven.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: I won't make it to the Wall. I won't make it ten feet past the Winterfell gates.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: There are ways. Hidden passageways built so the Lords of Winterfell could escape. The road will be dangerous. But with a little luck...

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: The Night's Watch is an ancient, honorable order. You'll have opportunities there.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: The opportunity for Jon Snow to cut my throat in my sleep.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: The opportunity to make amends for what you've done.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: I've done a lot, haven't I? Things I never imagined myself doing.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: I've known you many years, Theon Greyjoy. You're not the man you're pretending to be. Not yet.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: You may be right. But I've gone too far to pretend to be anything else.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: You hear that? That's the mating call of the Northmen. They want to fuck us. Well, I haven't had a good fuck in weeks. I'm ready for one.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: They say every Ironborn man is worth a dozen from the mainland.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: men
text: men: Aye!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: You think they're right?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: black
text: black: Aye.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: We die today, brothers. We die bleeding from a hundred wounds with arrows in our necks and spears in our guts, but our war cries will echo through eternity. They will sing about the battle of Winterfell until the Iron Islands have slipped beneath the waves. Every man, woman and child will know who we were and how long we stood. Aggar and Gelmarr, Wex and Urzen, Stygg and Black Lorren. Ironborn warriors will cry out our names as they leap onto the shores of Seagard and Faircastle.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: Mothers will name their sons for us.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: Girls will think of us with their lovers inside them.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: And whoever kills that fucking horn-blower will stand in bronze above the shores of Pyke!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: theon
text: theon: What is dead may never die!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: men
text: men: What is dead may never die!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: black
text: black: Thought he'd never shut up.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer: It was a good speech. Didn't want to interrupt.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: What is this? What are you doing?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: dagmer
text: dagmer: Let's go home.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: man
text: man: Come on.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why should I believe you?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: Why would I lie about it?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: To create strife between my sister and me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: Where before there was nothing but love. Ser Mandon Moore tried to kill you on your sister's orders. If it weren't for your squire's bravery, you'd be a dead man.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Yes, my lord?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Would it be excessive of me to ask you to save my life twice in a week?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: podrick
text: podrick: No, my lord.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're a good lad. Get Bronn, tell him I want four of his most loyal gold cloaks outside my door at all times.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: I'm afraid your friend has been relieved of his command of the City Watch. The gold cloaks are now firmly in the hands of your father or your sister. It varies from cloak to cloak.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Then my hill tribesmen.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: Have gone home. Your father paid them quite handsomely. I'm afraid we won't be seeing each other for some time, my lord.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Don't want to swim too close to a drowning man? And I thought we were friends.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: We are. Podrick, would you mind?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
