text: varys: There are many who know that without you this city faced certain defeat. The king won't give you any honors, the histories won't mention you, but we will not forget.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: varys
text: varys: Come along now, Podrick.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: My love.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It was good of you to come.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: Good of me? Of course I come.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: I want to see you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Believe me, you don't.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: Have you looked?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: I will be the first.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: You are a mess.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm a monster as well as a dwarf. You should charge me double.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: You think I'm here for money?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That was the arrangement we made. I pay you and you lie to me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: Oh. I'm a poor little rich man and nobody loves me, so I make jokes all the time and pay them to laugh. Fuck your money. Let's leave.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Leave?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: Leave King's Landing. They tried to kill you. They will try again. Going into wars, fighting soldiers, you're terrible at this. Let's take a boat to Pentos and never come back. You don't belong here.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What would we do in Pentos?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: Eat, drink, fuck, live.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I want to go with you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: So do it. Your father, your sister, all these bad people, they can't stop you. Forget about them. Come with me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I can't. I do belong here. These bad people are what I'm good at. Out-talking them, out-thinking them. It's what I am. And I like it. I like it more than anything I've ever done. Are you going to leave?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: shae
text: shae: You have a shit memory. I am yours and you are mine.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: septon
text: septon: In the sight of the Seven, I hereby seal these two souls, binding them as one for eternity. Look upon one another and say the words.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: robb
text: robb: Father, smith, warrior, mother ,maiden, crone, stranger.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Father, smith, warrior, mother,maiden, crone, stranger.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: robb
text: robb: I am hers and she is mine from this day until the end of my days.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I am his and he is mine from this day until the end of my days.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: kovarro
text: kovarro: A house of ghosts, Khaleesi.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: kovarro
text: kovarro: Where are the guards?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No guards. The warlocks kill with sorcery, not steel.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Let them try.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Is this a riddle?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Khaleesi! Khaleesi!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Are you trying to frighten me with magic tricks? You want me? Here I am. Are you afraid of a little girl?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: hot
text: hot: How did he find us?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: What are you doing here?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Waiting for you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: How did you know we'd come this way?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: After all the things you have seen, this is your question?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: How did you kill those guards? Was it hard?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: No harder than taking a new name, if you know the way.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: Show me how. I want to be able to do it, too.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: If you would learn, you must come with me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: Where?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Far and away across the Narrow Sea to Braavos.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: My dancing master was from Braavos.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: To be a dancing master is a special thing, but to be a faceless man, that is something else entirely. The girl has many names on her lips. Joffrey, Cersei, Tywin Lannister, llyn Payne, the Hound. Names to offer up to the Red God. She could offer them all one by one.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: I want to. But I can't. I need to find my brother and mother. And my sister. I need to find her, too.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Then we must part. A man has duties as well. Here.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: What is it?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: A coin of great value.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: Could it buy a horse?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: It is not meant for the buying of horses.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: Then what good is it?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: If the day comes when you must find me again, just give that coin to any man from Braavos and say these words to him, "Valar Morghulis."

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: Valar Morghulis.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: arya
text: arya: Please don't go, Jaqen.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Jaqen is dead. Say it again. Valar Morghulis.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Good.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Farewell, Arya Stark.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: bran
text: bran: Osha, what are you doing?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: bran
text: bran: Tell us what medicine to get from your chambers.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: rickon
text: rickon: We'll make you better.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: I feel just fine.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: bran
text: bran: They burned it down. They burned everything.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Not everything. Not you. But they may come back. You have to go. Put on your warmest clothes. Pack as much food as you can carry and go north.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: osha
text: osha: North's the wrong way. And mother and brother are south. We don't know where.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: There are too many enemies in the south. Go to the Wall, to Jon. He'll look after you and let your mother know you're safe.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: bran
text: bran: I don't want to leave you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: No more than I want to leave you. I pulled you into the world. Both of you. I've seen both your faces almost every day since. And for that, I consider myself very, very lucky. Go now with Hodor. Go on. I'll be right here.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Osha. You must protect them. You're the only one who can. You may have to protect them against your own kind.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: osha
text: osha: I've got no great love for my own kind. I'll get you milk of the poppy. Tell me where to find it.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: I don't want milk of the poppy.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: luwin
text: luwin: Do it quickly.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: drogo
text: drogo: Moon of my life.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: This is dark magic, like the magic that took you from me. Took you from me before I could even Maybe I am dead and I just don't know it yet. Maybe I am with you in the Night Lands.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: drogo
text: drogo: Or maybe I refused to enter the Night Lands without you. Maybe I told the Great Stallion to go fuck himself and came back here to wait for you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: That sounds like something you would do.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: drogo
text: drogo: Or maybe it is a dream. Your dream, my dream I do not know. These are questions for wise men with skinny arms.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: drogo
text: drogo: You are the moon of my life. That is all I know and all I need to know.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: drogo
text: drogo: And if this is a dream, I will kill the man who tries to wake me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Until the sun rises in the west and sets in the east, until the rivers run dry and the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyatt
text: pyatt: They miss their mother.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: They want to be with you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: Do you want to be with them?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: You will be.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: When your dragons were born,

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: our magic was born again.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: It is strongest in their presence.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: And they are strongest in yours.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: You will be with them, through winter, summer, winter again. Across a thousand, thousand seasons you will be with them.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: And we will be with you until time comes to an end.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: Welcome home, Daenerys Stormborn.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: This is not my home. My home is across the sea, where my people are waiting for me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: pyat
text: pyat: They will be waiting a long time.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Dracarys.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: We should be there by sundown. Won't be a fun night for you. Mance knows how to make crows sing. If you know what to say, you might just make it through the night. Not talking's not the way to go.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jon
text: jon: Careful with that. You might cut yourself.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jon
text: jon: Never swung a sword before, have you? You look like a baby with a rattle.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: rattleshirt
text: rattleshirt: Enough of that!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jon
text: jon: Stop!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin: Why, traitor? So you can give Mance Rayder an invitation to Castle Black?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: rattleshirt
text: rattleshirt: Let 'em fight.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin: That's it? That's what you can do? You little shit.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin: Your traitor father teach you that?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin: Or was it your whore mother?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: qhorin
text: qhorin: We are the watchers on the Wall.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You can tell Mance that's the man who killed Qhorin Halfhand.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: rattleshirt
text: rattleshirt: Burn the body.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: wildling
text: wildling: Aye.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: rattleshirt
text: rattleshirt: You don't want this one coming back for you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Come along, Jon Snow.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Time to meet the King-beyond-the-Wall.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: xaro
text: xaro: What the-

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Khaleesi, please. He said you'd never leave Qarth alive.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Come.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Nothing.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Thank you, Xaro Xhoan Daxos. Thank you for teaching me this lesson.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: xaro
text: xaro: I am king of Qarth. I can help you now, truly help you. We can take the Iron Throne. I'll bring you a thousand ships.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Please, Khaleesi, I beg you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: xaro
text: xaro: All that you have dreamed is within your reach!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: doreah
text: doreah: I beg you, please!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: xaro
text: xaro: Khaleesi.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: doreah
text: doreah: Please! Please!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: xaro
text: xaro: Khaleesi!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It's all a lie.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Looks real enough to me. Real enough to buy a ship?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Aye, a small ship.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Take all the gold and jewels.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: grenn
text: grenn: I thought we were coming north to fight wildlings.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Is this goat?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: It's moose. People shouldn't live anywhere you need to burn shit to keep warm.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Well, you see a tree, let me know.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sam
text: sam: If you step back and think about it, the thing about Gilly that's so interesting is

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Just bloody kill me.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sam
text: sam: No, truly. The thing about her that I find so interesting is that after all that Craster's done to her, she's still got hope that life might get better.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: The thing about Gilly that you find so interesting is that she said six words to you.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sam
text: sam: And the thing about you that I find so interesting is absolutely nothing.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sam
text: sam: It's Jon and the Halfhand. They're back.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Two blasts is wildlings. You're not fighting them alone.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: Come on.

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Three blasts?

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: Run!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sam
text: sam: Wait! Wait for me!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sam
text: sam: Grenn!

title: Valar Morghulis
Name: sam
text: sam: Edd!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: man
text: man: Fall back!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sam
text: sam: Brother?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Did you send the ravens?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jeor
text: jeor: Tarly, look at me. Did you send the ravens?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jeor
text: jeor: That was your job. Your only job. We need to get back to the Wall. It's a long march. We know what's out there, but we have to make it, have to warn them or before winter's done, everyone you've ever known will be dead.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: main
text: main: CREDITS

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: First time you've seen a giant, Jon Snow?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Well, don't stare too long. They're shy. When they stop being shy, they get angry. And when they're angry, I've seen them pound a man straight into the ground like a hammer on a nail.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: man
text: man: Crow!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: boy
text: boy: Crow!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: girl
text: girl: Look over there!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: girl
text: girl: Crow! Look over here! Look!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: woman
text: woman: Ah, look, crow coming!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You're wearing the wrong color.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: Mance was a ranger.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: In your hearts, all you crows want to fly free.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: When I'm free, will I be free to go?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Sure, you will.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: boy
text: boy: Oh!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: And I'll be free to kill you. Got no respect, this lot. Got no fathers to slap 'em when they're foul.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: What happened to their fathers?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Some of them were killed by crows like you. Don't look so grim, Jon Snow. If Mance Rayder likes you, you'll live another day. And if he don't...

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I smell a crow.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: rattleshirt
text: rattleshirt: We killed his friends. Thought you'd want to question this one.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tormund
text: tormund: What do we want with a baby crow?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: This baby killed Qhorin Halfhand. He wants to be one of us.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tormund
text: tormund: That half-handed cunt killed friends of mine. Friends twice your size.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: My father told me big men fall just as quick as little ones if you put a sword through their hearts.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Plenty of little men tried to put their swords through my heart. And there's plenty of little skeletons buried in the woods. What's your name, boy?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: Jon Snow.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: Your Grace.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Your Grace? Did you hear that? From now on, you'd better kneel every time I fart.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: Stand, boy. We don't kneel for anyone beyond the Wall.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: So, you're Ned Stark's bastard. Thank you for the gift, Lord of Bones. You can leave us.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: The girl likes you. You like her back, Snow? That why you want to join us?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Don't panic, boy. This isn't the damned Night's Watch where we make you swear off girls.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: This chicken eater you thought was king is Tormund Giantsbane.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Can't believe this pup killed the Halfhand.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: He was our enemy and I'm glad he's dead.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: He was my brother once. Back when he had a whole hand. What were you doing with him?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: The Lord Commander sent me to the Halfhand for seasoning.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: Why?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: He wants me to lead one day.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: But here you are, a traitor kneeling before the King-Beyond-the-Wall.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: If I'm a traitor, then you are, too.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: Why do you want to join us, Jon Snow?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: I want to be free.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: No, I don't think so. I think what you want most of all is to be a hero. I'll ask you one last time ... why do you want to join us?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: We stopped at Craster's Keep on the way north. I saw...

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: You saw what?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: I saw Craster take his own baby boy and leave it in the woods. I saw what took it.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: You're telling me you saw one of them? And why would that make you desert your brothers?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jon
text: jon: Because when I told the Lord Commander, he already knew. Thousands of years ago, the First Men battled the White Walkers and defeated them. I want to fight for the side that fights for the living. Did I come to the right place?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: mance
text: mance: We'll need to find you a new cloak.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: What if you took off that bit there?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: whore
text: whore: Don't you want to leave something to the imagination?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Trouble is, I've never had much imagination.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: whore
text: whore: I want you to take it off.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: whore
text: whore: Mouth.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Ser Bronn. Ser Bronn.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I didn't hear that.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Apologies, ser.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Back away. Keep backing away till you're outside this establishment. Then back away some more.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Lord Tyrion sent me.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I will murder you, boy.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: podrick
text: podrick: He said it was a matter of life and death.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Pod?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It's your sister. The queen.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What are they doing here?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Protecting me, I assume. Will you let me in?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, I don't think so.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If I wanted to kill you, do you think I'd let a wooden door stop me?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: They stay outside.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I'm not afraid of you, little brother.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why are you here?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I wanted to see your face. They said you'd lost your nose, but it's not as gruesome as all that.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The man who cut me lost more than his nose.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I should hope so. The rebels came for Joffrey's head, they lost their own. Thanks to Father.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Thanks to Father. Of course, it wasn't a rebel who tried to kill me.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No? Curious. Bit of a comedown from chamber of the Hand. But then I don't suppose you need much room.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Grand Maester Pycelle made the same joke. You must be proud to be as funny as a man whose balls brush his knees.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're meeting Father today?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How do you know that?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Because I have hundreds of spies in my employ. The Master of Whisperers owes me a favor or two. Father told me. What do you want from him?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What do I want from him? He's my father. Do I need to want something? I'm sure he loves me dearly, as any father loves his child, his baby boy. Yet he hasn't come to visit once since arriving in King's Landing. I lay here, my face split in half, but Father never came.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're going to make me cry.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why do you care what I want from him?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Because you've slandered me to Father before.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Slandered? When?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You told him I had my guards beat that servant girl at Casterly Rock.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You did have your guards beat her. A girl of nine, I believe.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I was nine, too.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She lost an eye, if I remember correctly.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If I remember correctly, she never stole a necklace again.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's not slander if it's true.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And what's this truth you plan on telling him today?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why are you so nervous about what I'm going to say to Father?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Because you're a liar. I expect you'll tell lies about me, about Joffrey.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Any lies in particular?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're a clever man, but you're not half as clever as you think you are.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Still makes me more clever than you.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Oh, look at these two shining warriors. Ser Taryn Mant and... Ser Whosit of Whocares.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Ser Meryn Trant.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: meryn
text: meryn: You're no knight.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Pod.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater was anointed by the king himself.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: meryn
text: meryn: You're an up-jumped cutthroat, nothing more.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: That's exactly who I am. And you're a grub in fancy armor who's better at beating little girls than fighting men. Now, I have an appointment with Lord Tyrion.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: meryn
text: meryn: You put your hand on that door, you lose the hand.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: As much as I appreciate a walk in the sunshine, your lordship, I am wondering why you sent for me.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A number of people in this city want to kill me. You're here to protect me.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I've been doing that for a while now.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do you grow bored protecting me?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I grow poor protecting you.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Poor? Poor? Under my patronage you've become a knight, you've served as Commander of the City Watch.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Briefly.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm sure you filled your pockets.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: And now my pockets are empty. You've given me a taste for the finer things. And if you want me to carry on protecting you, you'll need to pay more.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I thought we were friends.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: We are. But I'm a sellsword. I sell my sword. I don't loan it out to friends as a favor.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How much?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Double.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Double?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'm a knight now. Knights are worth double.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't even know how much I'm paying you now.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Which means you can afford it.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Here. Here! Help me!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: man
text: man: Who are you?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: I was in the battle at Blackwater. I was a captain and a knight.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: man
text: man: Aye, ser, and serving which king?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: The one true king of Westeros... Stannis Baratheon.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: I thought you were dead. Everyone thought you were dead. And your son?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: He may have swam ashore as you did.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: No, the wildfire took him. I saw it.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: I'm so sorry, my friend. I, too, have lost a son. There is nothing worse in this world. But, Davos, you were a good father.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: If I was a good father, he'd still be here. Stannis lives?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: He licks his wounds at Dragonstone.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Will you take me there?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: There is nothing for me at Dragonstone.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: This war is not over.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: Not for you, maybe. But for Salladhor Saan, the war is over.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: We're both sworn to King Stannis.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: I am sworn to no man. I promised you 30 ships and you promised me riches and glory. I delivered the ships.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Stannis never gives up. Never. Now he will regroup ...

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: He's a broken man. His fleet lies at the bottom of Blackwater Bay. They say he sees no one ... not his generals, not even his wife. Only the Red Woman whispering in his ear, telling him what she sees in the flames and burning men alive.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: What?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: They built a great fire when Stannis returned. All those who spoke against her she called servants of darkness. They say she sang to them as they burned.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: I'm a pirate.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: You're a smuggler.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: Servants of darkness. I'm thinking Dragonstone is a good place for us to avoid.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Take me back there, please.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: You cannot turn Stannis against her.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Maybe not, but I could carve her heart out.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: You could try. If you fail, they will burn you. If you succeed, they'll burn you. And you've only just come back to life. Stay alive a little longer, my friend.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: You call me friend. You drank with me on my wedding day.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: And you drank with me on four of my wedding days, but I don't ask you for favors.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: I have to stop her. Please, do this for me.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: salladhor
text: salladhor: When you are dead, I will gather your bones in a little sack and let your widow wear them around her neck.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: roose
text: roose: We should set the siege lines a thousand yards from Harrenhal.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: robb
text: robb: There won't be a siege. The Mountain can't defend a ruin.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: roose
text: roose: I imagine the Mountain will defend whatever Tywin Lannister tells him to defend.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: robb
text: robb: The Lannisters have been running from us since Oxcross. I'd love a fight. The men would love a fight. I don't think we're going to get one.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Two hundred Northmen slaughtered like sheep.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: roose
text: roose: The debt will be repaid, my friend. For them and for your sons.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Will it? They rot in the ground while their killer runs free.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: roose
text: roose: The Kingslayer won't remain free for long. My best hunters are after him.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: robb
text: robb: A Mallister?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Ser Jeremy. My father's bannerman.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: robb
text: robb: Find her a chamber that will serve as a cell.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: talisa
text: talisa: She's your mother.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: robb
text: robb: She freed Jaime Lannister. The Lannisters robbed them of their sons and she robbed them of their justice.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Water. Water.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: talisa
text: talisa: This needs to be cleaned and closed.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: robb
text: robb: What's your name, friend?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Qyburn.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: talisa
text: talisa: You're lucky to be alive.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Lucky?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The badge looks good on you. Almost as good as it looked on me. Are you enjoying your new position?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Am I enjoying it?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I was very happy as Hand of the King.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Yes. I heard how happy you were.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: blows on his paper to dry the ink.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You brought a whore into my bed.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It wasn't your bed at the time.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I sent you here to advise the king. I gave you real power and authority. You chose to spend your days as you always have, bedding harlots and drinking with thieves.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Occasionally I drank with the harlots.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: What do you want, Tyrion?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why does everyone assume I want something? Can't I simply visit with my beloved father? My beloved father who somehow forgot to visit his wounded son after he fell on the battlefield.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I organized the defense of this city while you held court in the ruins of Harrenhal. I led the foray when the enemies were at the gate while your grandson, the king, quivered in fear behind the walls. I bled in the mud for our family. And as my reward, I was trundled off to some dark little cell. But what do I want? A little bloody gratitude would be a start.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Jugglers and singers require applause. You are a Lannister. Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield? Hmm? Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion. So tell me what you want.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I want what is mine by right. Jaime is your eldest son, heir to your lands and titles. But he is a Kingsguard, forbidden from marriage or inheritance. The day Jaime put on the white cloak, he gave up his claim to Casterly Rock. I am your son and lawful heir.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You want Casterly Rock?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It is mine by right.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay. And when the time is right, you will be given a position fit for your talents so that you can serve your family and protect our legacy. And if you serve faithfully, you will be rewarded with a suitable wife. And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Why? You ask that? You, who killed your mother to come into the world? You are an ill-made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning. Men's laws give you the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine. And to teach me humility, the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him. But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock into your whorehouse. Go, now. Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock. Go.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Oh, one more thing. The next whore I catch in your bed, I'll hang.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Dorne. It's going to Dorne.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: Why Dorne?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's carrying silk and it's supposed to bring back wine in exchange. But it's not coming back. The captain's tired of risking his life so King's Landing lords and ladies can get drunk on better wine than they deserve. He's going to stay in Dorne. Wait out the winter where it's beautiful and warm.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: I met some people in Dorne who weren't so beautiful and warm.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Don't ruin the game.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: I told you, I don't want to play.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What about that one there?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: That one? It's going to Volantis.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: Because when I got on a ship in Volantis, it looked like that one.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: That's not how the game works. You're not supposed to just blurt out the right answer. You've got to invent a story about where the ship is going and why.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: Why should I make up a story when I know the truth?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Because the truth is always either terrible or boring.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Lovely day for it. Watching the ships.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Lord Baelish.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Might I speak with Lady Sansa alone for a moment?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I saw your mother not long ago. She's very eager to see you. And your sister.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Arya's alive? You said you'd take me home.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You said King's Landing was your home. You are the property of the crown. Stealing you would be treason. If you were to tell just one person ...

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I won't tell anyone.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: petyr
text: petyr: How do I know?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Because I'm a terrible liar. You said so yourself. Please, Lord Baelish. Tell me what to do. Tell me when.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'm waiting for word on an assignment that will take me far away from the capital. When I set sail, I might be able to take you with me. But you'll need to be ready to leave on a moment's notice.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ros
text: ros: You're her handmaiden?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: Yes. And you're his...?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ros
text: ros: I help manage his affairs.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: He's an important person.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ros
text: ros: So is she. I grew up in the shadow of her father's castle. The day she was born, they rang the bells from sunrise till sunset. We've both done rather well, you and I.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: Yes.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ros
text: ros: Given where we started.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: And where is that?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ros
text: ros: It's not easy for girls like us to dig our way out. Watch out for her.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: shae
text: shae: I always do.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: ros
text: ros: Watch out for her with him.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They're growing fast.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Not fast enough. I can't wait that long. I need an army

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We'll be in Astapor by nightfall. Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The greatest slave-soldiers in the world. The distinction means a good deal to some people.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Do those people have any better ideas about how to put you on the Iron Throne?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It's too beautiful a day to argue.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You're right. Another lovely day on the high seas.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Don't mock them. They're the first Dothraki who have ever been on a ship. They followed me across the poison water. If they'll do it, others will. And with a true khalasar ...

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The Dothraki follow strength above all, khaleesi. You'll have a true khalasar when you prove yourself strong. And not before.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Your Grace.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I heard you were dead.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Not yet.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I had hoped to speak to you alone, Your Grace.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: stannis
text: stannis: We are alone.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Your Grace, you are the rightful king. Not only by blood. You're an honorable man, a just man. And there is still a war to fight.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I am fighting.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: By burning prisoners alive?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: How would you punish the infidels, Ser Davos?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: I do not judge people for the gods they worship. If I did, I'd have thrown you in the sea before you ever set foot on Dragonstone.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I'm not your enemy.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: You are my enemy.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Was it me you fought on Blackwater Bay? Did I set your ships ablaze? I wasn't there when the wildfire killed our men by the thousands. I could have saved those men. You would have taken the city, Stannis would now sit upon his rightful throne, and you would stand beside him. But I wasn't there because you convinced your king to leave me behind. Do you hear them screaming? All those burning men in the water crying for their mothers, for their gods for help? Until the moment the Blackwater swallowed them.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Don't despair, Ser Davos. What I told your son is true.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Death by fire is the purest death.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: This woman is evil! She's the mother of demons.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Take him to the dungeon and lock him in a cell.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: Your Grace!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: guard
text: guard: Come on.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You've chosen the darkness, Ser Davos.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: davos
text: davos: She will destroy us all!

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I will pray for you.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: guard
text: guard: Guard

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: guard
text: guard: Guard #2

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Why have we stopped?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: guard
text: guard: It's Lady Margaery, Your Grace.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: What is she doing? Who gave her permission?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: maid
text: maid: My lady. We should have guards, my lady.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Why?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Pardon me.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: maid
text: maid: Stop, my lady. You'll ruin your dress.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I have others.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: guard
text: guard: Would you like to speak with her, Your Grace?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: No.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: child
text: child: He was a soldier. He went to fight on the walls when the ships came into Blackwater Bay. He never came back.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: And your mother?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: child
text: child: She died when she had me.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Bad men wanted to come into this city and do terrible things, but your father stopped them.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Whenever you look at this knight, I want you to remember your father.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: child
text: child: He wasn't a knight. He was just a soldier.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: And what do knights swear to do? Protect the weak and uphold the good. Your father did that. Be proud of him.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Was your father a soldier, too?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: You should be proud, too. Under King Joffrey's leadership, your fathers saved the city. They saved us all. From now on, we're going to take care of you. All of you.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Come to me for whatever you need to feed them, clothe them, or house them. Directly to me.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Your Grace.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: loras
text: loras: Your Grace.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Please, sit. Sit. I do apologize, my lady. Small council meetings. At what point does it become treason to waste the king's time?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: That's a lovely gown, my lady.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Yes, it suits you perfectly. I imagine you might be rather cold.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: The climate is a bit more forgiving back in Highgarden, Your Grace.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Shall I have them bring you a shawl, my lady?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I am touched by your concern, Your Grace. Luckily for us Tyrells, our blood runs quite warm. Doesn't it, Loras?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: loras
text: loras: Yes.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Loras, isn't the queen's gown magnificent? The fabric, the embroidery, the metalwork. I've never seen anything like it.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You might find a bit of armor quite useful once you become queen. Perhaps before. Joffrey tells me you stopped your carriage at Flea Bottom on your way back from the sept this morning.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Yes. I paid a visit to an orphanage the High Septon told me about.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: loras
text: loras: Margaery does a great deal of work with the poor back in Highgarden.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: The lowest among us are no different from the highest if you give them a chance and approach them with an open heart.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: An open heart is what you'll get in Flea Bottom if you're not careful, my dear. Not long ago, we were attacked by a mob there. We had a full complement of guards that didn't stop them. The king barely escaped with his life.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: My mother's always had a penchant for drama. Facts become less and less important to her as she grows older. Our lives were never truly in danger.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're right, of course. But you are your father's son. We can't all have a king's bravery.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Hunger turns men into beasts. I'm glad House Tyrell has been able to help in this regard. They tell me 100 wagons arrive daily now from the Reach. Wheat, barley, apples. We've had a blessed harvest. And, of course, it's our duty to assist the capital in time of need.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Well, as Ser Loras said, Lady Margaery has done this sort of... charitable work before. I'm sure she knows what she's doing.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I'm sure she does.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: The Unsullied have stood here for a day and a night with no food or water.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: They will stand until they drop.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Such is their obedience.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They may suit my needs. Tell me of their training.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: The Westrosi woman is pleased with them, but speaks no praise to keep the price down. She wished to know how they are trained.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: Tell her what she would know and be quick about it.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: They begin their training at five. Every day they drill from dawn to dusk until they have mastered the shortsword, the shield, and the three spears. Only one boy in four survives this rigorous training.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Their discipline and loyalty are absolute. They fear nothing.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Even the bravest men fear death.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: The knight says even brave men fear death.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: Tell the old man he smells of piss.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Truly, master?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: No, not truly. Are you a girl or a goat to ask such a thing?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: My master says the Unsullied are not men. Death means nothing to them.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: Tell this ignorant whore of a Westerner to open her eyes and watch.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: He begs you attend to this carefully, Your Grace.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Tell the good master there is no need.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: She's worried about their nipples? Doers the dumb bitch know we've cut off their balls?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: My master points out that men don't need nipples.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: Here, I'm done with you.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: unsullied
text: unsullied: This one is pleased to have served you.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: To win his shield, an Unsullied must go to the slave marts with a silver mark, find a newborn, and kill it before its mother's eyes. This way, my master says, we make certain there is no weakness left in them.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You take a babe from its mother's arms, kill it as she watches, and pay for her pain with a silver coin?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: She is offended. She asks if you pay a sliver coin to the mother for her dead baby.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: What a soft mewling fool this one is.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: My master would like you to know that the silver is paid to the baby's owner, not the mother.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How many do you have to sell?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Eight thousand.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: Tell the Westerosi whore she has until tomorrow.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Master Kraznys asks that you please hurry. Many other buyers are interested.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Eight thousand dead babies.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The Unsullied are a means to an end.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Once I own them, these men...

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They're not men. Not anymore.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Once I own an army of slaves, what will I be?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Do you think these slaves will have better lives serving Kraznys and men like him or serving you?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You'll be fair to them. You won't mutilate them to make a point.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You won't order them to murder babies. You'll see they're properly fed and sheltered. A great injustice has been done to them. Closing your eyes will not undo it.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The warlocks.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I owe you my life, Ser.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: barristan
text: barristan: The honor is mine, my queen.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You know this man?

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I know him as one of the greatest fighters the Seven Kingdoms has ever seen and as the Lord Commander of Robert Baratheon's Kingsguard.

title: Valar Dohaeris
Name: barristan
text: barristan: King Robert is dead. I have been searching for you, Daenerys Stormborn, to ask your forgiveness. I was sworn to protect your family. I failed them.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jon
text: jon: Don't think too much, Bran.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jon
text: jon: Relax your bow arm.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: eddard
text: eddard: And which one of you was a marksman at ten?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: Father?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jojen
text: jojen: You can't kill it, you know.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: Why not?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jojen
text: jojen: Because the raven is you.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: hodor
text: hodor: Hodor.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: It's all right, Hodor.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: Were you inside the wolf again, little lord?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: No, it was the three-eyed raven.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: He's back.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: I tried to kill it, but I couldn't. There was a boy.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: I don't want to hear about it.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: But you asked.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: We've got plenty of worries. We don't need to pour black magic on top of them.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: I didn't ask for black magic dreams.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: I know you didn't, little lord.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: We need to move.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: We don't know who might be after us. No one even knows we're alive.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: And who told you that? The three-eyed raven tell you?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: bran
text: bran: No.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: Some good he is, then.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: osha
text: osha: I don't know what other people know and what they don't. I only know the Wall is a long way off.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: My mother always told me you Westerosi were a grim lot. Grim, bearded, stinking barbarians that would row across the Narrow Sea and steal us from our beds.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: Did you ever think you'd marry one?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I never thought I'd marry anyone at all.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: Never?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Not until I met the king of the grim, bearded, stinking barbarians.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: roose
text: roose: Pardon me, Your Grace. My queen.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Lord Bolton.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: Let me guess which one is the good news.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: roose
text: roose: Word from Riverrun and Winterfell.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I hadn't seen him in years. I don't even know how many.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: We'll travel to the funeral together. Lord Bolton will garrison here until we return.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Will I be wearing manacles when I lay my father to rest?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Something else?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: By the time Bolton's bastard Ramsay got to Winterfell, the Ironborn were gone. They massacred everyone and put the castle to the torch. And Bran and Rickon have not been found. They may have escaped. Or Theon may have taken them back to the Iron Islands as hostages.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Have you received any demands?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: No.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Have you heard anything from Theon at all?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: theon
text: theon: Where am I? Who are you? What do you want?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: torturer
text: torturer: I want to do this.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Do you know how long it's going to take us to get to King's Landing walking through fields and forests?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Yes.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: So how shall we pass the time?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: By putting one foot in front of the other.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It's going to be a very dull walk.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I'm here to take you to King's Landing and bring back Lady Stark's daughters in exchange. Dull is fine.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You know, it doesn't matter how loyal a servant you are, no one enjoys the company of a humorless mute. Trust me on this. People have been serving me since I was born. You think Lady Stark is going to want a giant towheaded plank following her around for the rest of her life? A week's journey with you and she'll order you to fall on your sword.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: If Lady Stark is unhappy with any aspect of my service, I'm sure she'll let me know. She's an honest woman.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: All the good it's done her.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: How did you come into Lady Stark's service? There's something we can talk about.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Not your concern, Kingslayer.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It had to be recently. You weren't with her at Winterfell.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: How would you know?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Because I visited Winterfell. I would have noticed your dour head smacking into the archways.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Move.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Were you pledged to Stannis?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Gods, no.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Ah, Renly. Really? He wasn't fit to rule over anything more important than a 12-course meal.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Shut your mouth.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Why? I lived with him at court since he was a boy, don't forget. Could hardly escape the little tulip. Skipping down the corridors in his embroidered silks. I knew him far better than you.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I knew him as well as anyone. As a member of his Kingsguard, he trusted me with everything. He would have been a wonderful king.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Sounds like you quite fancied him.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I did not fancy him.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Oh, gods, you did.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Did you ever tell him? No, of course not. You weren't Renly's type, I'm afraid.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He preferred curly-haired little girls like Loras Tyrell. You're far too much man for him.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I'm not interested in foul rumors.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Unless they're about me. It's all true about Renly. His proclivities were the worst kept secret at court. It's a shame the throne isn't made out of cocks. They'd have never got him off it.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Shut your mouth!

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I don't blame him. And I don't blame you, either. We don't get to choose who we love.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: man
text: man: Where are you headed, then?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: South. You?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: man
text: man: Riverrun. Staying off the kingsroad, are you? They get you no matter where you go. You can't win.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No, you really can't.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: man
text: man: Looks like you're safe enough, though. Meaning no offense, my lady, but I wouldn't tangle with you. Seven blessings to you.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: And you.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He knows who I am.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: He doesn't.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Maybe you're right. But what if you're not? What if he tells someone?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: brienne
text: brienne: We're not doing it. He's an innocent man.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jaime
text: jaime: More innocent than Lady Stark's daughters?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Make it tighter here.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's better. It makes you look very strong.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: No flowers. I said no flowers. All these are wrong. Bring others.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: tailor
text: tailor: Yes, Your Grace.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Bloody flowers. On the king.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Looks like a Tyrell rose. Give it to Margaery for her wedding gown. Should be more than enough fabric.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Tell me what you think of her.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Who?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Margaery.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: She's an ideal match. With the Tyrells beside us, we'll crush the Northerners. Hang their lords, burn their strongholds, sow their fields with salt, and no one will think of rebelling for another century.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It is a good match, but what do you think of her? She's beautiful and intelligent.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Yes, she is.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Her concern with the well-being of the common people is interesting.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Not to me.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I only meant that to go out of your way to endanger yourself.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: This is becoming one of the most boring conversations I've ever had.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Margaery Tyrell dotes on filthy urchins for a reason. She dresses like a harlot for a reason. She married a traitor and known degenerate like Renly Baratheon for a reason.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: She married Renly Baratheon because she was told to. That's what intelligent women do-what they're told.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You need to ask yourself

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I don't need to do anything.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Better. Much better.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: shae
text: shae: I still don't believe it.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He didn't. He didn't want anything. He just takes an interest because he loved my mother.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: shae
text: shae: Men only want one thing from a pretty girl.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Littlefinger's not in love with me.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: shae
text: shae: Love is not the thing he wants.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's too old.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: shae
text: shae: They never see it that way. He didn't ask you to do something for him? Spy on someone or...?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: shae
text: shae: If he does ask you for anything or try anything or touch you, I want you to tell me.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why? What will you do? I will make him stop.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: guard
text: guard: Ser Loras Tyrell, my lady.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Send him in.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: loras
text: loras: Lady Sansa.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Ser Loras.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: loras
text: loras: My sister Margaery invites you to take the air with her and our grandmother, the Lady Olenna, in the gardens. May I escort you to them?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: loras
text: loras: I believe you grow more beautiful every day, Lady Sansa.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You are too kind, Ser Loras. You probably don't remember the first time we met. At the Hando s tourney, you gave me your favor. A rose, a red rose.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: loras
text: loras: Of course I did.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: margaery
text: margaery: It's more your color. You take it.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: maid
text: maid: Thank you.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: margaery
text: margaery: You're such a dear.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: loras
text: loras: I'll take my leave. Lady Sansa.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Thank you, Ser Loras.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Come. Lady Sansa, it is my honor to present my grandmother the Lady Olenna of House Tyrell.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Kiss me, child.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: It's so good of you to visit me and my foolish flock of hens. We're very sorry for your losses.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And I was sorry when I heard of Lord Renly's death, Lady Margaery. He was very gallant.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Gallant, yes. And charming and very clean. He knew how to dress and smile and somehow this gave him the notion he was fit to be king.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Renly was brave and gentle, Grandmother. Father liked him and so did Loras.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Loras is young and very good at knocking men off horses with a stick. That does not make him wise. As to your fathead father-

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Grandmother! What will Sansa think of us?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: She might think we have some wits about us. One of us, at any rate. It was treason. I warned them. Robert has two sons and Renly has an older brother. How could he possibly have any claim to that ugly iron chair? We should have stayed well out of all this if you ask me. But once the cow's been milked, there's no squirting the cream back up her udders. So here we are to see things through. What do you say to that, Sansa? Shall we have some lemon cakes?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Lemon cake's my favorite.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: So we've been told. Are you going to bring the food or do you mean to starve us to death? Here, Sansa, come sit with me. I'm much less boring than these others.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Do you know my son? The Lord of Highgarden?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I haven't had the pleasure.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: No great pleasure, believe me. A ponderous oaf. His father was an oaf as well. My husband, the late Lord Luthor. He managed to ride off a cliff whilst hawking. They say he was looking up at the sky and paying no mind to where his horse was taking him. And now my son is doing the same, only this time he's riding a lion instead of a horse. Now I want you to tell me the truth about this royal boy, this Joffrey.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I-, I-

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: You, you. Who else would know better? We've heard some troubling tales. Is there any truth to them? Has this boy mistreated you?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Has he ripped out your tongue?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Joff-King Joffrey, he-His Grace is very fair and handsome and as brave as a lion

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Yes, all Lannisters are lions. And when a Tyrell farts, it smells like a rose. But how kind is he? How clever? Has he a good heart, a gentle hand?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I'm to be his wife. I only want to know what that means.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Bring me some cheese.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: servant
text: servant: The cheese will be served after the cakes, my lady.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: The cheese will be served when I want it served. And I want it served now.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Are you frightened, child? No need for that. We're only women here. Tell us the truth. No harm will come to you.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: My father always told the truth.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Yes, he had that reputation. And they named him traitor and took his head.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Joffrey. Joffrey did that. He promised he would be merciful and he cut my father's head off. And he said that was mercy. Then he took me up on the walls and made me look at it.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Go on.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I-I can't. I never meant-my father was a traitor. My brother as well. I have traitor's blood. Please don't make me say anymore.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: margaery
text: margaery: She's terrified, Grandmother. Just look at her.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Speak freely, child. We would never betray your confidence, I swear it.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's a monster.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Ah. That's a pity.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Please, don't stop the wedding.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Have no fear. The Lord Oaf of Highgarden is determined that Margaery shall be queen. Even so, we thank you for the truth. Ah, here comes my cheese.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rickard
text: rickard: We're at war. This march is a distraction.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: My grandfather's funeral is not a distraction.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Are we riding to battle at Riverrun?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Then it's a distraction.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: My Uncle Edmure has his forces garrisoned there. We need his men.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Unless he's been breeding them, he don't have enough to make a difference.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: Have you lost faith in our cause?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rickard
text: rickard: If it's revenge, I still got faith in it.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: If you no longer believe-

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rickard
text: rickard: I can believe till it snows in Dorne. Don't change the fact that we've got half the men.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: You don't think we can win?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rickard
text: rickard: May I speak my mind, Your Grace?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: robb
text: robb: Have you not been speaking your mind, Lord Karstark?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rickard
text: rickard: I think you lost this war the day you married her.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Whoa, whoa.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: man
text: man: Your Grace.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You're afraid of her. And she knows it.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I'm not afraid of her. May I help you, Lady Stark?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: No.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I'm sorry, I shouldn't have-

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You can't help because a mother makes one for her children to protect them. Only a mother can make them.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: You've made them before?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Twice.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Did they work?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: After a fashion. I prayed for my son Bran to survive his fall.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Many years before that, one of the boys came down with the pox. Maester Luwin said if he made it through the night, he'd live. But it would be a very long night. So I sat with him all through the darkness. Listened to his ragged little breaths, his coughing, his whimpering.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Which boy?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Jon Snow. When my husband brought that baby home from the war, I couldn't bear to look at him. I didn't want to see those brown stranger's eyes staring up at me. So I prayed to the gods, take him away. Make him die. He got the pox. And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived. A murderer. I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother. A woman he didn't even know. So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live. Let him live and I'll love him. I'll be a mother to him. I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: talisa
text: talisa: And he lived.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: And he lived. And I couldn't keep my promise. And everything that's happened since then all this horror that's come to my family it's all because I couldn't love a motherless child.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: Was it hard for you to kill the Halfhand?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jon
text: jon: Yes.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: You liked him? I like you, but if you're playing us false, it won't be hard for me to kill you. I've got wildling blood in my veins. These are my people.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jon
text: jon: I understand.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: Well, how could you understand?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jon
text: jon: You want to protect your people.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: Do you know what it takes to unite 90 clans, half of whom want to massacre the other half for one insult or another? They speak seven different languages in my army. The Thenns hate the Hornfoots. The Hornfoots hate the ice-river clans. Everyone hates the cave people. So you know how I got moon worshippers and cannibals and giants to march together in the same army?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jon
text: jon: No.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: I told them we were all going to die if we don't get south. Because that's the truth.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Shouldn't be long now.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: jon
text: jon: What's wrong with him?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: He's a warg. He can enter the mind of animals, see through their eyes. He's scouting for us.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: What, you've never met a warg?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: Orell.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: Where were you this time?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: orell
text: orell: The Fist of the First Men.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: mance
text: mance: What did you see?

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: orell
text: orell: Dead crows.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: rast
text: rast: What's the matter, Piggy? You crying 'cause you're cold? There's 200 brothers killed by dead men and you're still here whimpering. That seem fair to you? I seen 'em torn to pieces fighting while you was off somewhere hiding in a hole. Why don't you lie down and rest for a while, eh? You know you want to.

title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Name: grenn
