title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam: He's beautiful. Does he have a name?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly: No.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam: Are you going to give him one?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Why?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Here.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam: Gilly.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You said to hold it for you until you came back. You're back.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sam
text: sam: I wanted you to have it.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I don't want your stupid thimble. I want to save my baby's life. Can you do that? Can you?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I don't have time for you. I don't have time for anyone but him because he doesn't have much time.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: jojen
text: jojen: You have to go after him.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: bran
text: bran: How?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: jojen
text: jojen: You know how.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Brandon.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: bran
text: bran: Mother.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: How many times have I told you? No climbing.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: bran
text: bran: Mother, I need to find it. It's here. It's calling me.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: I want you to promise me. No more climbing.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Promise me. Promise me! Promise me!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: bran
text: bran: Mother! Mother!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Promise me! Promise me, Bran! Promise me!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: Is he very large?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: No larger than usual, apparently. And yet they said that he was-

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: Extraordinary.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: The most extraordinary man they've ever had. And they've had a lot of men.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: We're talking about the same Podrick? The quiet boy in Lord Tyrion's service? Seems a bit simple?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: What did he do to them?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: I don't know, my lord. The girls are usually quite descriptive.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: So what did they say?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: They said it was hard to describe.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: Huh. Prodigies appear in the oddest of places. And what did Littlefinger say about this loss of income?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: He was too preoccupied to notice. He's leaving for the Eyrie soon. I'm helping him prepare for his journey.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: Ah, yes, to pursue his enduring love of the Lady Arryn and the title that comes with her. Sad, really. Is that all it takes to make our friend lose interest in poor Sansa Stark?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: He hasn't spoken to her since the last time, as far as I know. But I don't think he's lost interest.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: What makes you say so?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: His shipboard inventory.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: Ah. You can read. Rare for a woman in your profession.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: Former profession.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: Of course. I'm missing something obvious you're about to point out?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: Two featherbeds. He's bringing two featherbeds for the cabin.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: Who is important enough to Littlefinger to merit a featherbed besides Littlefinger? Could he be bringing one of his girls?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: He's not interested in them, my lord.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: How do you know?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: ros
text: ros: Because I'm one of his girls.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: varys
text: varys: Prodigies in odd places indeed.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: gendry
text: gendry: What is this place?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Somewhere neither wolves nor lions come prowling.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You look like a bunch of swineherds.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Some of us were swineherds. And some of us tanners and masons. That was before.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You're still swineherds and tanners and masons. You think carrying a crooked spear makes you a soldier?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: No. Fighting in a war makes you a soldier.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Beric Dondarrion? You've seen better days.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: And I won't see them again.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Stark deserters. Baratheon deserters. You lot aren't fighting in a war. You're running from it.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: Last I heard, you were King Joffrey's guard dog. But here you are a thousand miles from home. Which of us is running?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Untie these ropes and we'll find out. What are you doing leading a mob of peasants?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: Ned Stark ordered me to execute your brother in King Robert's name.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Ned Stark is dead. King Robert is dead. My brother's alive.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You're fighting for ghosts.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: That's what we are- ghosts waiting for you in the dark. You can't see us, but we see you. No matter whose cloak you wear- Lannister, Stark, Baratheon- you prey on the weak, the Brotherhood without Banners will hunt you down.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You found god? Is that it?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: Aye. I've been reborn in the light of the one true god. As have we all. As would any man who's seen the things we've seen.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: If you mean to murder me, then bloody well get on with it.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: thoros
text: thoros: You'll die soon enough, dog. But it won't be murder, only justice.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: anguy
text: anguy: And a kinder fate than you deserve. Lions you call yourselves. At the Mummer's Ford, girls of seven years were raped and babes still on the breast were cut in two while their mothers watched.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I wasn't at the Mummer's Ford. Dump your dead children at some other door.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: thoros
text: thoros: House Clegane was built upon dead children. I saw them lay Prince Aegon and Princess Rhaenys before the Iron Throne.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Do you take me for my brother? Is being born Clegane a crime?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Murder is a crime.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I never touched the Targaryen babes. I never saw them, never smelled them, never heard them bawling. You want to cut my throat, get on with it! But don't call me murderer and pretend that you're not.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: arya
text: arya: You murdered Mycah. The butchers boy. My friend. He was twelve years old. He was unarmed. And you rode him down. You slung him over your horse like he was some deer.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Aye, he was a bleeder.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: You don't deny killing this boy?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I was Joffrey's sworn shield. The boy attacked the prince.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: arya
text: arya: That's a lie! I hit Joffrey. Mycah just ran away.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Then I should have killed you. Not my place to question princes.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: You stand accused of murder. But no one here knows the truth of the charge, so it is not for us to judge you. Only the Lord of Light may do that now. I sentence you to trial by combat.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: sandor
text: sandor: So, who will it be? Should we find out if your fire god really loves you, priest? Or you, archer? What are you worth with a sword in your hand? Or is the little girl the bravest one here?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: beric
text: beric: Aye. She might be. But it's me you'll fight.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: missandei
text: missandei: The master says they are untested. He says you would be wise to blood them early. There are many small cities between here and there, cities ripe for sacking. Should you take captives, the masters will buy the healthy ones and for a good price.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: missandei
text: missandei: And who knows? In ten years, some of the boys you send them may be Unsullied in their turn. Thus all shall prosper.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Is it done, then? They belong to me?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: It is done.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: missandei
text: missandei: It is done.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: She holds the whip.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: missandei
text: missandei: You hold the whip.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: The bitch has her army.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Unsullied!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Forward march!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Halt!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: Tell the bitch her beast won't come.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: A dragon is not a slave.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: You speak Valyrian?

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I am Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, of the blood of Old Valyria. Valyrian is my mother tongue.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Unsullied! Slay the masters, slay the soldiers, slay every man who holds a whip, but harm no child. Strike the chains off every slave you see!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: I am your master.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: kraznys
text: kraznys: Kill her! Kill her! Kill her!

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Dracarys.

title: And Now His Watch Is Ended
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Unsullied! You have been slaves all your life. Today you are free. Any man who wishes to leave may leave, and no one will harm him. I give you my word. Will you fight for me? As free men?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Lord, cast your light upon us.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: men
text: men: Lord of Light, defend us.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Show us the truth. Strike this man down if he is guilty. Give strength to his sword if he is true. Lord of Light, give us wisdom. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: men
text: men: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Get back.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: men
text: men: Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: Kill him!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Lord, cast your light upon this man, your servant. Bring him back from death and darkness. His flame has been extinguished. Restore it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: For the night is dark and full of terrors. Lord, cast-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Arya, don't!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Bring him back from death and darkness

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: No! Let go of me! Let me go!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Looks like their god likes me more than your butcher's boy.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: Burn in hell!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: He will. But not today.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Orell says there are crows patrolling on the Wall. Tell me what you know.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: There are four to a patrol- two builders to check for structural damage, two rangers to watch for enemies.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell: How often do these patrols go out?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: It varies. If I knew where on the Wall we were heading, I could tell you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell: You'd like to know that.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund: There are nineteen castles guarding the Wall. How many are manned?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Three.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell: You sure of that?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell: Which three?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Castle Black.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell: Aye, Castle Black. Everyone knows Castle Black. Which others?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Eastwatch-by-the-Sea and the Shadow Tower.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund: How many men remain in Castle Black?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: A thousand.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell: Liar.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: What happens to your eagle after I kill you? Does he drift away like a kite with his strings cut or does he just flop dead to the ground?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: He's no crow.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: orell
text: orell: Just 'cause you want him inside you don't make him one of us.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: I'm not afraid of you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I like you, boy. But if you lie to me, I'll pull your guts out through your throat.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: A thousand men.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tormund
text: tormund: We'll find out soon enough.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: I don't need you to protect me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Of course you do. Who stopped Rattleshirt when he was about to cut your throat? Who vouched for you with Mance? It seems you owe me a debt.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Give it back.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Well, I stole it. It's mine. If you want it, come steal it back.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Ygritte! Ygritte!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Ygritte! Seven hells. Ygritte!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Is Orell right? Are you still a crow? It's time you proved yourself.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Ygritte.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You swore some vows. I want you to break 'em. I want you to see me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: All of me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: We shouldn't.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: We should.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Why are you still dressed? You know nothing, Jon Sno-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: That thing you did with your mouth- is that what lords do to their ladies in the South?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: I don't know. I just wanted to kiss you there is all.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Hmm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: You seemed to like it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Aye, I liked it some. Who taught you that?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: There's been no one else. Only you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: A maid. You were a maid.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: I was a man of the Night's Watch. How about you? Were you a maid?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: What do you think?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Who was he?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Just a boy. He came trading with his brothers. He had red hair like me. Kissed by fire. But he was weak. Not like you. That was the first one. Then there was this Thenn boy. Spoke no Common, but gods, he was built like a mammoth.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jon
text: jon: Yeah, thanks. I think I've heard enough. We'd best get back. Tormund-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: I'm not done with you yet.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: How long's it been since you had a bath?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Let's not go back. Let's stay here a while longer. I don't ever want to leave this cave, Jon Snow. Not ever.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I want my gold.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: It says it clearly right there on that note you'll be repaid in full when the war is over.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Piss on that! You're nothing but thieves.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: anguy
text: anguy: We're outlaws. Outlaws steal. You're lucky we didn't kill you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Come try it, archer. I'll shove those arrows up your ass.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: You can't let him go. He's a murderer. He's guilty.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Not in the eyes of god.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: You can't!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Enough! The judgment isn't ours to make.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Go in peace, Sandor Clegane. The Lord of Light isn't done with you yet.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man: Riders coming through!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man: The Kingslayer.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man: Down!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: locke
text: locke: On your knees. Lord Bolton, I give you the Kingslayer.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose: Pick him up, Locke.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose: You've lost a hand.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: locke
text: locke: No, my lord, he has it here.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose: Take this away.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: locke
text: locke: Send it to his father?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose: You'll hold your tongue unless you want to lose it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose: Cut her free. Apologies, my lady. You're under my protection now.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Thank you, my lord.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose: Find suitable rooms for our guests. We'll speak later.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Lord Bolton.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Is there word from the capital?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose: You haven't heard? Stannis Baratheon laid siege to King's Landing. Sailed into Blackwater Bay. Stormed the gates with thousands of men. And your sister How can I put this? Your sister is alive and well. Your father's forces prevailed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: roose
text: roose: Ser Jaime isn't well. Take him to Qyburn.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Will I die?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: No. The corruption has spread. I fear it must be cut away. The safest course would be to take the whole arm off.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Then you'll die. You're no maester. Where's your chain?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: The Citadel stripped me of it. They found some of my experiments too bold. I can leave your upper arm, make the cut at your elbow.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I don't need my right hand to kill you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: I can take away the rotting flesh and try and burn out the corruption - with boiling wine.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Mmm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: With any luck, that will suffice. You'll need milk of the poppy.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No milk of the poppy.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: There will be pain.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'll scream.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Quite a bit of pain.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'll scream loudly.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Lord Baelish.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Your Grace.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I wonder if I might ask you for a favor.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Of course, Your Grace.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I have reason to believe that House Tyrell do not hold the crown's best interests at heart.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I see. And have you shared these suspicions with Lord Tywin?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My father's a practical man. He appreciates facts.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Myself, I often find them a hindrance.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And he appreciates those who aid his family, as you well know. He's almost as generous to those who help us as he is unpleasant towards those who don't. You have a good working relationship with the Tyrells. I thought you might look into it before you leave the capital.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I shall do my best.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Thank you. And your best will prove better than when I asked you to locate Arya Stark?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I assure you that it will.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Gods, boy, that's enough. We're not in a tavern.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Pardon, my lady.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: No need to speak. Are there any figs? Fetch some. I always take figs midafternoon. They help move the bowels. To what do I owe this summons?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Thank you for seeing me, my lady. I had hoped we might discuss a few financial matters.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: I climbed all those steps to discuss financial matters?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's the royal wedding. I'm told you had a hand in planning it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Naturally.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's shaping up to be a very involved affair. The word extravagant has been used.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: What good is the word extravagant if it can't be used to describe a royal wedding?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I understand that.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Good.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But, as Master of Coin, it falls upon me to calculate the cost for the crown. As of now, it's a huge expense.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And we're at war, Lady Olenna.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Oh, I'd nearly forgotten.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, and maintaining supply lines-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: I can't think how it slipped my mind. What is it, twelve thousand infantrymen the Tyrell family has supplied? Two thousand in support. Provisions so this city might survive the winter. A million bushels of wheat. Half a million bushels each of barley, oats, and rye. Twenty thousand head of cattle. Fifty thousand sheep. You don't have to lecture me about wartime expenses. I'm quite familiar with them.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And we are so grateful for your contributions which are necessary for the preservation of the realm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: As is a royal wedding. The people are hungry for more than just food. They crave distractions. And if we don't provide them, they'll create their own. And their distractions are likely to end with us being torn to pieces. A royal wedding is much safer. Wouldn't you say?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I would.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And traditionally paid for by the royal family.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: I was told you were drunk, impertinent, and thoroughly debauched. You can imagine my disappointment at finding nothing but a browbeaten bookkeeper. Where did you go for them, Volantis?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My lady-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Oh, very well. I won't have it said that House Tyrell refuses to play its part. We'll pay for half the expenses and the celebrations will go on as planned. Is that sufficient?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Quite sufficient. Thank you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Very good, then. That's settled. Good day.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Give me that.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: What are you doing?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Just mending Lord Beric's armor.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: Why?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I'm going to stay on and smith for the Brotherhood.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: Have you lost your mind? When the Lannisters find this place, you think they'll spare the smiths? They'll cave your head in with your own helmet.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry: The Lannisters wanted to kill me long before I joined the Brotherhood.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: You don't have to do this.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I want to. They need good men.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: Robb needs good men, too. We're leaving tomorrow. And then you-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry: What? Serve him? I've served men my entire life. I served Master Mott at King's Landing and he sold me to the Watch. I served Lord Tywin at Harrenhal, wondering every day if I'd get tortured or killed. I'm done serving.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: You just said you were serving Lord Beric.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry: He may be their leader, but they chose him. These men are brothers. They're a family. I've never had a family.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: I can be your family.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You wouldn't be my family. You'd be 'my lady'.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: martyn
text: martyn: Willem. Willem!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: willem
text: willem: Is this a rescue?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Lannister filth! Take him!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: martyn
text: martyn: Please, I didn't do anything. I'm just a squire. Please-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Bring them in.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Is that all of them? It took five of you to murder two unarmed squires?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Not murder, Your Grace. Vengeance.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Vengeance? Those boys didn't kill your sons. I saw Harrion die on the battlefield and Torrhen-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Was strangled by the Kingslayer. They were his kin.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: They were boys! Look at them.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Tell your mother to look at them. She killed them as much as I.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: My mother had nothing to do with this. This was your treason.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: It's treason to free your enemies. In war, you kill your enemies. Did your father not teach you that, boy?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Leave him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Aye. Leave me to the king. He wants to give me a scolding before he sets me free. That's how he deals with treason. Our King in the North. Or should I call him the King Who Lost the North?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Escort Lord Karstark to the dungeon. Hang the rest.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man: Mercy, sire! I didn't kill anyone. I only watched for the guards.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: This one was only the watcher. Hang him last so he can watch the others die.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: man
text: man: Please! Please, no. They made me do it! They made me! They made me!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Word of this can't leave Riverrun. They were Tywin Lannister's nephews. The Lannisters pay their debts. They never stop talking about it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Would you make me a liar as well as a murderer?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: edmure
text: edmure: It wouldn't be lying. We will bury them and remain silent until the war is done.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: I'm not fighting for justice if I don't serve justice to murderers in my ranks, no matter how highborn. He has to die.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: The Karstarks are Northmen. They won't forgive the killing of their lord.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Your mother's right. If you do this, the Karstarks will abandon you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: You tended to their wounds. You brought them supper. Now they're dead.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: And more boys will keep dying until this war is over. You need Karstark men to end it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Spare his life. Keep him as a hostage.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: edmure
text: edmure: A hostage. Tell the Karstarks that as long as they remain loyal, he will not be harmed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: The blood of the First Men flows through my veins as much as yours, boy. I fought the Mad King for your father. I fought Joffrey for you. We are kin- Stark and Karstark.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: That didn't stop you from betraying me. And it won't save you now.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: I don't want it to save me. I want it to haunt you to the end of your days.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Kneel, my lord.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Rickard Karstark, Lord of Karhold, here in sight of gods and men, I sentence you to die. Would you speak a final word?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: rickard
text: rickard: Kill me and be cursed. You are no king of mine.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne. Ser Meryn. The Hound. What are you going to do with me?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: At first light we'll ride for Riverrun. Your brother's there now. He'll make a contribution to our cause and you can go home.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm a hostage and you're selling me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Don't think of it that way.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: But it is that way.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: It is. And it isn't.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: More is than isn't.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Beric admired your father a great deal, you know. He wanted to refuse your ransom altogether.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: So why don't you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: We need the gold.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Do I frighten you, child?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: No.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: You're angry with me. And I don't blame you. But letting him go was the right thing. I have more reason than most to want him hanged.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: I thought he killed you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: He did.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: But how?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Thoros how many times have you brought me back?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: It's the Lord of Light brings you back. I'm just the lucky drunk who says the words.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: How many times?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Five, I think. No, this makes six.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Six.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: There was the first time- the Mountain. Show her. Lance right through the chest.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Then I was stabbed in the belly.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Then it was an arrow in the back. And that axe in the side.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Then the Lannisters caught me and executed me for treason. Was it a hanging or a dagger in the eye?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Both. Fuckers couldn't decide.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: And the Hound makes six.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: Second time I've been killed by a Clegane.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: You'd think you'd learn. It's not getting any easier, you know.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: I know. Every time I come back, I'm a bit less. Pieces of you get chipped away.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: Could you bring back a man without a head? Not six times. Just once.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: thoros
text: thoros: I don't think it works that way, child.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: beric
text: beric: He was a good man, Ned Stark. He's at rest now, somewhere. I would never wish my life upon him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: arya
text: arya: I would. You're alive.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: Lord, cast your light upon me. Protect me in the darkness. Burn away my sins. Help me serve you. Use me as you will. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: I have prayed day and night for you to come to me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: My lady.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I meant to come sooner. The battle-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: I know of your troubles, My king. The Lady Melisandre has told me everything.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Yes, of course.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: You mustn't despair. Your claim is true. You will be victorious.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I believed that once.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: You are the one godo s champion and the finest man I've ever known.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Selyse. I've broken a sacred vow. I've sinned.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: No.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I've wronged you. I have shamed you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: You're doing godo s work.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You don't understand. The Red Woman- the Lady Melisandre-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: I know, Stannis. The Lady Melisandre has told me everything. No act done in service of the Lord of Light can ever be a sin. When she told me, I wept with joy.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: Oh, my sweet boys. Petyr, Tommard, Edric. I thank god every day for bringing Melisandre to us. She gave you a son. I gave you - nothing.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: That's not true.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: So you've come to see her as well? There is no need. You must keep away from such distractions.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: She's my daughter. I want to see her.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: selyse
text: selyse: You are a king. You don't need my permission.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Under the sea I know, I know/ Oh, oh, oh

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: The birds have scales / And the fish take wing / I know, I know / Oh, oh, oh

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Shireen.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Father!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You've grown since I last saw you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Mother said you fought in a battle. Did you win?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: No.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Did the Onion Knight come back with you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: He did. He fought bravely.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: He hasn't come to visit me. He said he'd bring me back a present from the capital.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: He won't be visiting, child.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Why not? He's my friend. Look.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: He made this for me. But don't tell Mother I have it. It's a secret. Mother doesn't like the Onion Knight.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Ser Davos is a traitor. He's rotting in a dungeon cell for his crime. Best forget him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Not so hard. You'll scrub the skin off.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: What are you doing here?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I need a bath. Help me out of these rags.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Now get out.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: There's another tub.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: This one suits me fine. Don't worry. I'm not interested. If I faint, pull me out. I don't intend to be the first Lannister to die in a bathtub.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Why should I care how you die?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You swore a solemn vow, remember? You're supposed to get me to King's Landing in one piece. Not going so well, is it? No wonder Renly died with you guarding him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: That was unworthy. Forgive me. You protected me better than most-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Don't you mock me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm apologizing. I'm sick of fighting. Let's call a truce.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You need trust to have a truce.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I trust you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: There it is. There's the look. I've seen it for seventeen years on face after face. You all despise me. Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. A man without honor. You've heard of wildfire?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Of course.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The Mad King was obsessed with it. He loved to watch people burn, the way their skin blackened and blistered and melted off their bones. He burned lords he didn't like. He burned Hands who disobeyed him. He burned anyone who was against him. Before long, half the country was against him. Aerys saw traitors everywhere. So he had his pyromancer place caches of wildfire all over the city- beneath the Sept of Baelor and the slums of Flea Bottom. Under houses, stables, taverns. Even beneath the Red Keep itself. Finally, the day of reckoning came. Robert Baratheon marched on the capital after his victory at the Trident. But my father arrived first with the whole Lannister army at his back, promising to defend the city against the rebels. I knew my father better than that. He's never been one to pick the losing side. I told the Mad King as much. I urged him to surrender peacefully. But the king didn't listen to me. He didn't listen to Varys who tried to warn him. But he did listen to Grand Maester Pycelle, that grey, sunken cunt. 'You can trust the Lannisters,' he said. 'The Lannisters have always been true friends of the crown.' So we opened the gates and my father sacked the city. Once again, I came to the king, begging him to surrender. He told me to bring him my father's head. Then he turned to his pyromancer. 'Burn them all,' he said. 'Burn them in their homes. Burn them in their beds.' Tell me, if your precious Renly commanded you to kill your own father and stand by while thousands of men, women, and children burned alive, would you have done it? Would you have kept your oath then?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: First, I killed the pyromancer. And then when the king turned to flee, I drove my sword into his back. 'Burn them all,' he kept saying. 'Burn them all.' I don't think he expected to die. He- he meant to burn with the rest of us and rise again, reborn as a dragon to turn his enemies to ash. I slit his throat to make sure that didn't happen. That's where Ned Stark found me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: If this is true why didn't you tell anyone? Why didn't you tell Lord Stark?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Stark? You think the honorable Ned Stark wanted to hear my side? He judged me guilty the moment he set eyes on me. By what right does the wolf judge the lion? By what right?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Help! Help! The Kingslayer!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Jaime. My name is Jaime.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Onion Knight. Ser Onion Knight.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: Princess? Gods, what are you doing here?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Shh, you'll wake Bert.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: Bert?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: He's the fat one. He's on guard duty tonight. He likes to drink wine and sleep a lot.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: Go back to your room. You're not supposed to be here. If your father knew-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: he said you Were a traitor. Are you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: I am, child. I disobeyed my king, your father, and now I'm paying the price.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: I don't care. You're my friend. You must get bored down here. I brought you something to read. It's about Aegon and his dragons. Aegon used to live here. Did you know that? And the Targaryens built this castle.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: Aye. So they did.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: You can hide the book under your cloak. It's a good one. I'll bring you more.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: Thank you, my lady. I'm sure it's a fine book, but it's wasted on me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Take it. I have more.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: My lady, I can't read the words.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: You can't?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: I'll teach you. I'll come when Bert's on duty and teach you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: No. No. No.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: It's easy. It'll be fun.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: Go. We can't.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Why not? What will they do, lock us in cells?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: davos
text: davos: I wouldn't know where to start.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: At the beginning. This word is Aegon. When you see A, E, and G together like that, it sounds like egg. And the title of the whole book is 'An History of Aegon the Conqueror and His Conquest of Westeros.'

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It was a bitch of a siege.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Mm, you were first through the breach at Pyke?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The second. Thoros of Myr went in alone, waving that flaming sword of his.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Thoros of Myr. Bloody madman. Robert knighted you after the battle?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Proudest moment of my life. One knee in the dust, the king's sword on my shoulder, listening to the words. 'In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.' All I could think of was how badly I had to piss.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: In full plate metal for sixteen hours. Never occurred to me till the fighting was over. I was very nearly the first man knighted to piss on the king's boots.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Robert would have laughed. He was a good man, a great warrior. And a terrible king. I burned away my years fighting for terrible kings.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You swore an oath.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Yes. And a man of honor keeps his vows, even if he's serving a drunk or a lunatic. Just once in my life before it's over, I want to know what it's like to serve with pride, to fight for someone I believe in. Do you believe in her?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: With all my heart.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: These are the ones?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Yes, khaleesi. The officers.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You did not choose this life. But you are free men now. And free men make their own choices. Have you selected your own leader from amongst your ranks?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Remove your helmet

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: grey
text: grey: This one has the honor.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What is your name?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: grey
text: grey: Grey Worm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Grey Worm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: missandei
text: missandei: All Unsullied boys are given new names when they are cut- Grey Worm, Red Flea, Black Rat. Names that remind them what they are- vermin.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: From this day forward you will choose your own names. You will tell your fellow soldiers to do the same. Throw away your slave name. Choose the name your parents gave you, or any other. A name that gives you pride.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: grey
text: grey: Grey Worm" gives me pride. It is a very lucky name. The name this one was born with was cursed. That was the name he had when he was taken as a slave. But Grey Worm is the name this one had the day Daenerys Stormborn set him free.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: King Robert wanted her dead.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Of course he wanted her dead. She's a Targaryen. The last Targaryen.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I suppose no one on the small council could speak sense to him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: I didn't sit on the small council.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No? Doesn't the Lord of the Kingsguard traditionally-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Traditionally, yes, but I killed a dozen of Robert's friends during his rebellion.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: He didn't want advice on how to govern from a man who had fought for the Mad King. Can't say I minded much. I always hated the politics.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Yeah, I imagine I would, too. Hours spent jabbering about backstabbings - and betrayals the world over.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Mm-hmm.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Still, she'll have to wade through that muck if she wants to rule the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: She'll have good men around her to advise her, men with experience.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Which men do you have in mind?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Forgive me, Ser Jorah, for what I'm about to say, but your reputation in Westeros has suffered over the years.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It suffered for a reason. I sold men into slavery.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: I don't know if your presence by her side will help our cause when we go home.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Our cause? Forgive me, Ser Barristan, but I was busy defending the khaleesi against King Robert's assassins while you were still bowing to the man.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: We both want her to rule. Am I wrong?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You only joined us a few days ago. I can't speak to your intentions.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: barristan
text: barristan: If we're truly her loyal servants, we will do whatever needs to be done, no matter the cost, no matter our pride.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You're not Lord here. You're just another exile. And I take my orders from the queen.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Come to bed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: You were right.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: The Karstarks are gone. Almost half our forces. Tywin Lannister knows what he needs to do to make us unravel. Nothing. Only wait.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Don't let him.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: What can I do? Attack King's Landing? There's nothing he'd like better. He'd crush us in a day.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: We could ride north. Take your land back from the Greyjoys. Wait out the winter.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Winter could last five years. Once my bannermen are home again, sitting by the fire, surrounded by their families, warm and safe, they'll never ride south again. When I gathered my lords together, we had a purpose, a mission. Now we're like a band of bickering children.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Give them a new purpose.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: What?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Oh, I don't know. I don't even know where Winterfell is.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: Here. And we're here. King's Landing-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: What is it?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: I can't force them to meet us in the field and I can't attack them where they're strongest, but I can attack them where they're not.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: And Casterly Rock can't run away. I'm going to take their home away from them.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Can you do it?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: robb
text: robb: I need men to replace the Karstarks who marched home. There is only one person in this kingdom with that kind of army who hasn't already sided with the Lannisters. The man whose daughter I was supposed to marry- Walder Frey.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's such a splendid fighter. Do you have any idea when we might

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I'll plant the seed as soon as Joffrey and I are married. It should grow quickly.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Joffrey won't let me leave. He's got too many reasons to keep me here.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: margaery
text: margaery: And only one to let you go. Because it will please me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras: Squire!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar: Well fought, ser.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras: That was no fight. I don't know you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar: Olyver, if it please you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar: I should like to see you spar with a proper partner, ser.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras: How did you know?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar: Know what?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras: That I wanted to.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras: My lord, I'll have you know I'm to be married soon and even my intended hasn't the slightest notion.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar: They rarely do, in my experience.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: loras
text: loras: You have a good deal of experience, do you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar: With the husbands.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: That didn't take long.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: olyvar
text: olyvar: Well, it took long enough. It seems our Knight of Flowers is engaged to be wed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Is he? And who's the lucky girl?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: She may not be the grandest ship in the world or the fastest, but she's mine. I've always wanted a ship. Now I want a dozen. Strange, isn't it?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What is?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: It doesn't matter what we want, once we get it, then we want something else. Your hair is different.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Is it?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Lady Margaery wears it that way.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Many ladies wear it this way.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I have good news. I'll be leaving the city soon.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You still want me to come with you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: It's not a question of what I want. It's what you want. You want to go home, don't you?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Of course. More than anything. But maybe it would be better to wait. I've been thinking how dangerous it would be. Not just for me, but for you. You've been so kind. I'd feel terrible if anything happened to you. I can't tell you how touched I am by your concern for my welfare.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I hope you know that I'm your friend, Sansa. Your true friend.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I do, Lord Baelish.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Petyr.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Petyr.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: If you wish to stay, then of course you will stay.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: petyr
text: petyr: We'll speak again when I return.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You're late.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What's she doing here?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Our business concerns her, too. Sit.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You'll be pleased to learn that after one conversation with Olenna Tyrell, I've saved the crown hundreds of thousands on this wedding.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Never mind that now. We have something important to discuss.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm Master of Coin. Saving money is important.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Stop that. You're making me uncomfortable.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Your sister has learned that your new friends the Tyrells are plotting to marry Sansa Stark to Ser Loras.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Very well. She's a lovely girl. Missing some of Loras' favorite bits, but I'm sure they'll make do.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Your jokes are not appreciated.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It wasn't my best, but-

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I bring them into the royal fold and this is how they repay me, by trying to steal the key to the North out from under me.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Sansa is the key to the North? I seem to remember she has an older brother.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The Karstarks have marched home. The young wolf has lost half his army. His days are numbered. Theon Greyjoy murdered both his brothers. That makes Sansa Stark the heir to Winterfell. And I am not about to hand her over to the Tyrells.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Tyrell army is helping us to win this war. Do you really think it's wise to refuse them?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: There's nothing to refuse. This is a plot. Plots are not public knowledge. And the Tyrells won't carry this one out until after Joffrey's wedding. We need to act first and kill this union in its crib.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And how do we do that?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: We find Sansa Stark a different husband.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Wonderful.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Yes, it is.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You can't mean it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I can and I do.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Joffrey has made this poor girl's life miserable since the day he took her father's head. Now she's finally free of him and you give her to me? That's cruel even for you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Do you intend on mistreating her? The girl's happiness is not my concern, nor should it be yours.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She's a child!

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: She's flowered, I assure you. She and I have discussed it at length.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: There, you see? You will wed her, bed her, and put a child in her. Surely you're capable of that.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And if I refuse?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You wanted to be rewarded for your valor in battle. Sansa Stark is a finer reward than you could ever dare hope for. And it is past time you were wed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I was wed. Or don't you remember?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Only too well.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You should be thanking the gods for this. This is more than you deserve.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Tyrion will do as he's bid. As will you.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What do you mean?

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You'll marry Ser Loras.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I will not.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The boy is heir to Highgarden. Tyrion will secure the North, you will secure the Reach.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No, I won't do it.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Yes, you will. You're still fertile. You need to marry again and breed.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I am Queen Regent, not some broodmare.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You're my daughter! You will do as I command and you will marry Loras Tyrell and put an end to the disgusting rumors about you once and for all.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Father, don't make me do it again, please.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Not another word. My children. You've disgraced the Lannister name for far too long.

title: Kissed by Fire
Name: shireen
text: shireen: It's always summer / Under the sea / I know I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The birds have scales / And the fish take wing / I know I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The rain is dry / and snow falls up / I know, I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The stones crack open / The water burns / The shadows come to dance / My lord / The shadows come to play / The shadows come to dance / My lord / The shadows come to stay.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You've got too much wood in there.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: But the more wood, the bigger the fire.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: It needs to breathe. Take off that big log.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: Huh. You know your fires.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Someone built your fires for you growing up?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: It doesn't get so cold down in the Reach. And there were servants, of course.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I knew you were highborn.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: Oh, I found something at the Fist of the First Men. Buried treasure. Thousands of years old. I think.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: What does it do?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: I'm not sure that it does anything. It's beautiful, though, isn't it?

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: How much longer?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: Not so far. A few more days.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Is the Wall as big as they say?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: Bigger. So big you can't even see the top sometimes. It's hidden in clouds.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You're playing with me.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: I'm not. It's seven hundred feet high, all made of ice. On a warm day you can see it weeping. Castle Black is nice enough. They keep a fire burning in the long hall day and night. And Hobb makes venison stew with onions. Very tasty. Sometimes, one of the brothers will sing. Dareon sings best.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Do you sing?

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: No. No, no, no. Not very well.

title: The Climb
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Sing me a song.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: Oh, all right. Let's see.

title: The Climb
Name: sam
text: sam: Oh ahem. The father's face is stern and strong / He sits and judges right from wrong / He weighs our lives, the short and long / And loves the little children / The mother gives the gift of life / And watches over every wife / Her gentle smile ends all strife /And she loves her little children.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: That's not how you skin a rabbit.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: I know how to skin a rabbit.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: Not by the looks of it.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: You grow up north of the Wall, you learn the proper way to handle game.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: I didn't see any game before I got here.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: If I had a bow, I could have shot a dozen rabbits.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: Well, I made this bow myself. Guess you don't learn how to do that north of the Wall.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: You learn how to use your fists, though.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: Oh, you're gonna punch the rabbits to death?

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: I had someone else in mind.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: Well, someone else is sitting right here.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran: You're both very good at skinning rabbits.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: Some of us are just a little better.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: Well, some of us would say thank you when someone else hunts down their breakfast for them. Or don't they teach you to say thank you north of the Wall?

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: You've got a big mouth, girl, and too many teeth.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran: Stop it!

title: The Climb
Name: hodor
text: hodor: Hodor.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran: You've been fighting since you met. Just stop it.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: Lady Reed here's got a stick so far up her ass, it's a wonder her feet touch the ground.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran: You've been nasty to her every day. Of course she's nasty back.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: Me? It's my fault? First time I met her, she put a knife to my throat.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran: First time I met you, you held a knife at me. We can't fight each other. We'll never make it to the Wall. I want you both to make peace.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: Your way of skinning rabbits is quicker than mine.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: I said so, didn't I?

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran: Osha!

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: You're a good little hunter.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: Thank you. See? Not so hard, is it? Thank you.

title: The Climb
Name: osha
text: osha: Don't push me.

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: Shh. I'm right here with you.

title: The Climb
Name: rickon
text: rickon: What's happening?

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: I'm right here with you.

title: The Climb
Name: rickon
text: rickon: What's wrong with him?

title: The Climb
Name: meera
text: meera: The visions take their toll.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran: He's having one now?

title: The Climb
Name: jojen
text: jojen: I saw Jon Snow.

title: The Climb
Name: bran
text: bran: You saw him? At Castle Black?

title: The Climb
Name: jojen
text: jojen: He was on the wrong side of the Wall surrounded by enemies.

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Used to be you couldn't find a tree within a mile of the Wall. Crows would come out every morning with axes.

title: The Climb
Name: orell
text: orell: Your flock gets smaller every year.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: You ever climbed it before?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: No. But Tormundo s done it half a hundred times. You're afraid.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: Aren't you?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Aye. It's a long way up and a long way down. But I've waited my whole life to see the world from up there. Here, sit down.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: I brought a pair for you. They're too big for you, but they're good.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: You kill someone for them?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Nah. I didn't kill him, but I bet his balls are still bruised.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: He wasn't good to me the way you're good to me. He didn't do that thing you do with your tongue.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: Can we not talk about that here?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Can we not talk about that here? I'm Jon Snow. I've killed dead men and Qhorin Halfhand, but I'm scared of naked girls.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: Did I seem scared the other day?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You were trembling like a leaf.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: Only in the beginning.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Only in the beginning. You're a proper lover, Jon Snow. And don't worry. Your secret's safe with me.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: What secret?

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Do you think I'm as dumb as all those girls in silk dresses you knew growing up? You're loyal and you're brave. You didn't stop being a crow the day you walked into Mance Rayder's tent.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: But I'm your woman now, Jon Snow. You're going to be loyal to your woman. The Night's Watch don't care if you live or die. Mance Rayder don't care if I live or die. We're just soldiers in their armies and there's plenty more to carry on if we go down.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: It's you and me that matters to me and you. Don't ever betray me.

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: I won't.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Cause I'll cut your pretty cock right off and wear it 'round my neck.

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Sink your metal deep and make sure it holds before taking your next step. And if you fall, don't scream. You don't want that to be the last thing she remembers.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: You're good. You're not as good as you think you are.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: Face, tits, balls- I hit 'em right where I wanted to.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Aye, but you took your sweet time of it. You won't be fighting straw men, little lady. Show me your position.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Keep your elbow high. You want your back doing the hard labor. You're holding. Never hold.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: What?

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Your muscles tense up when you hold. Pull the string back to the center of your chin and release. Never hold.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: But I have to aim.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Never aim.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: Never aim?

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Your eye knows where it wants the arrow to go. Trust your eye.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: There's someone out there.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: That's about far enough.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: We come as friends.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Begging your pardon, m'lady, but we'll be the judge of that.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Valar morghulis.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Valar dohaeris. I don't see many priestesses of R'hollor in the Riverlands.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You are Thoros of Myr.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The High Priest gave you a mission. Turn King Robert away from his idols and towards the Lord of Light. What happened?

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: I failed.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You quit, you mean. The heathen continue to slaughter each other and you continue to get drunk.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: You worship Him in your way, and I'll worship Him in mine. Do you speak the common tongue?

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: My friends here don't speak High Valyrian. Why are you here, my lady?

title: The Climb
Name: beric
text: beric: Forgive my manners. I don't see many ladies these days.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Lucky for the ladies.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: How many times has the Lord brought him back?

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Six.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: That's not possible.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: The Lord has smiled upon me.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You should not have this power.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: I have no power. I ask the Lord for His favor, and He responds as He will.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: I've always been a terrible priest. Drank too much rum. Fucked all the whores in King's Landing. It's a terrible thing to say, but by the time I came to Westeros, I didn't believe in our Lord. I decided that He, that all the gods, were stories we told the children to make them behave. So I wore the robes and every now and then I'd recite the prayers, but it was just for show. A spectacle for the locals. Until the Mountain drove a lance through this one's heart. I knelt beside his cold body and said the old words. Not because I believed in them, but he was my friend and he was dead. And they were the only words I knew. And for the first time in my life, the Lord replied. Beric's eyes opened and I knew the truth. Our god is the one true god. And all men must serve Him.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You've been to the other side.

title: The Climb
Name: beric
text: beric: The other side? There is no other side. I have been to the darkness, my lady. He sent you to us for a reason.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You have someone He needs.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Bodkin point. Penetrates plate at two hundred yards. Can you make 'em?

title: The Climb
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Yeah, nothing tricky about it. Just need decent steel.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: I'll get you the steel.

title: The Climb
Name: man
text: man: Come on.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't like that woman.

title: The Climb
Name: anguy
text: anguy: That's 'cause you're a girl.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: What does that have to do with anything?

title: The Climb
Name: beric
text: beric: Forgive me, lad.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: What are you doing? Let go of him.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: Tell them to stop. Come on. He wants to be one of you. He wants to join the Brotherhood. Stop them!

title: The Climb
Name: beric
text: beric: We serve the Lord of Light and the Lord of Light needs this boy.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: Did the Lord of Light tell you that or did she?

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: You're not doing this for your god. You're doing it for gold.

title: The Climb
Name: thoros
text: thoros: We're doing it for both, girl. We can't defend the people without weapons and horses and food. And we can't get weapons and horses and food without gold.

title: The Climb
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You told me this was a Brotherhood. You told me I could be one of you.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You are more than they can ever be. They're just foot soldiers in the great war. You will make kings rise and fall.

title: The Climb
Name: arya
text: arya: You're a witch. You're going to hurt him.

title: The Climb
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I see a darkness in you. And in that darkness, eyes staring back at me- brown eyes, blue eyes, green eyes. Eyes you'll shut forever. We will meet again.

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You staring at my ass, Jon Snow?

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Look out!

title: The Climb
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You all right?

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Just seeing if you can take a hit, lad.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Sorry. Were you sleeping?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: Wa-

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Wa-? Wa-? Water? You want some water. I wish I had some for you.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: So let's play a game. Which body part do you need the least?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: Please.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Please is not a body part.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: I'll tell you everything, please.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: But you've already told me everything. Remember? Your daddy was mean to you. The Starks didn't appreciate you. One good bit, though. The Stark boys, they're still alive. Wouldn't that be a hunt to remember? You failed, but I'm a better hunter than you.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Now how about your little finger? You don't use that for much, do you? No? Good. Let's start with that.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You've been wondering why you're here. Haven't you? Where you are. Who I am. Why I'm doing this to you. So guess. If you guess right, I'll tell you. By the old gods and the new, I swear it. You win the game if you can figure out who I am and why I'm torturing you and I win the game if you beg me to cut off your finger.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: If I win, you'll let me go?

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You say please again and you'll wish you hadn't. You first. Where are we?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: The North.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Too vague.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: Deepwood Motte.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Terrible guess.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Now, where?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: Last Hearth.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Do I look like a fucking Umber to you?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: Karhold!

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Karhold? How did you know that? Did you see any banners flying when we came in?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: No. It was just a guess.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Very good, Lord Theon. And who am I?

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: Torrhen Karstark.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: He's dead. Strangled by the Kingslayer.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: He was your brother. Your father is Lord Rickard Karstark.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: You swore to tell me if I-

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You're right.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: Lord Rickard Karstark is Robb Stark's bannerman. I betrayed Robb. That's why you're torturing me.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Yes. You win.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Of course, you forgot to ask one question. You forgot to ask if I'm a liar.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I'm afraid I am.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Everything I told you is a lie.

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: This isn't happening to you for a reason. Well, one reason- I enjoy it.

title: The Climb
Name: theon
text: theon: Please, cut it off! Cut it off! Cut it off!

title: The Climb
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I win.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: Thank you for riding here so quickly. I know travel isn't easy in these times.

title: The Climb
Name: black
