text: black: The roads are crawling with cutthroats and bandits. But when the King of the North summons us, we come.

title: The Climb
Name: lothar
text: lothar: Our father has instructed us to tell you that his alliance with the North can continue if his terms are met. Lord Frey requires a formal apology for your violation of your sacred oath to marry one of his daughters.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: Of course. He deserves as much. I was in the wrong.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black: As restitution for this betrayal, he demands Harrenhal and all its attendant lands.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: I don't think that's-

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: We are fighting for the North. Harrenhal is not in the North. It is his once the war is over and we have no further strategic need for it.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black: And there's something else.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: We will do whatever we can to give Lord Frey what he needs.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black: Not what, whom.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: What?

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: No.

title: The Climb
Name: lothar
text: lothar: Our father requires Lord Edmure to wed one of his daughters- Roslin.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: How old is she?

title: The Climb
Name: lothar
text: lothar: Nineteen.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Could I see her first?

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black: You want to count her teeth? We depart for the Twins in the morning. We need an answer before we leave and a wedding not more than a fortnight thereafter or this alliance is at an end.

title: The Climb
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Your father does realize we're in the middle of a war?

title: The Climb
Name: lothar
text: lothar: Father is old. It will put his heart at peace if he could see her wed to a good husband.

title: The Climb
Name: black
text: black: And his recent experience has made him wary of long engagements.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: He has every right to be. Please excuse us while we discuss it.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Why should I let that old ferret choose my bride for me? At the very least, I should be offered the same choice you were. I'm his liege lord.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: He's a proud man and we've wounded him.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: I didn't wound him. My answer is no.

title: The Climb
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Listen to me and listen very carefully. You-

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: The laws of gods and men are very clear. No man can compel another man to marry.

title: The Climb
Name: brynden
text: brynden: The laws of my fist are about to compel your teeth.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: It's all right. You heard him. If you refuse, our alliance with the Freys is dead.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: He's wanted me for one of his daughters since I was 12. He's not gonna stop wanting it now. When I say no, he will come back and offer me a daughter of my choosing.

title: The Climb
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: You're willing to risk our freedom and our lives for a chance at a prettier wife?

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: I have a war to fight. We can't win it without them. I have no time to haggle. You said you wanted to make amends for the Stone Mill.

title: The Climb
Name: brynden
text: brynden: You recall that heroic engagement?

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: I had something less permanent in mind.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: I've won every battle, but I'm losing this war. If we don't do this and do it now, we're lost.

title: The Climb
Name: edmure
text: edmure: I'll marry her.

title: The Climb
Name: robb
text: robb: You're paying for my sins, Uncle. It's not fair or right. I'll remember it.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: I see my men have finally found you something appropriate to wear.

title: The Climb
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Yes. Most kind of them. You're a Stark bannerman, Lord Bolton. I am acting on Lady Stark's orders to return Jaime Lannister to King's Landing.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: When King Robb left Harrenhal, his mother was his prisoner. If she wasn't his mother, he'd have hanged her for treason.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: I should send you back to Robb Stark.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You should. But instead, you're sitting here watching me fail at dinner. Why might that be?

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: Wars cost money. Many people would pay a great deal for you.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We both know who would pay the most. Or make you pay the most if he found out you had captured me and sent me back up north for a summary execution.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: You're right. Perhaps the safest thing to do is to kill you both and burn your bodies.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It would be, if you honestly believed my father would never find out about it.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: King Robb is keeping your father quite busy. He doesn't have time for anything else.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He'll make time for you.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: As soon as you're well enough to travel, I will allow you to go to King's Landing as restitution for the mistakes my soldiers made. And you will swear to tell your father the truth, that I had nothing to do with your maiming.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Shall we drink on it?

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: I don't partake.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You do understand how suspicious that is to ordinary people?

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Very well. My lady, may our journey continue without further incident.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: Oh, she won't be going with you.

title: The Climb
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I am charged with bringing Ser Jaime to-

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: You are charged with abetting treason.

title: The Climb
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm afraid I must insist.

title: The Climb
Name: roose
text: roose: You're in no place to insist on anything. I would have hoped you'd learned your lesson about overplaying your position.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Impossible.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Why?

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: My grandson is the pride of Highgarden. The most desirable bachelor in all seven kingdoms. Your daughter-

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Is rich, the most beautiful woman in all seven kingdoms and the mother of the king.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Old.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Old?

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Old. I'm something of an expert on the subject. Her change will be upon her before long. I'll spare you the details of what will happen then. You men may have a stomach for bloodshed and slaughter, but this is another matter entirely.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The years punish us as well, I promise you that. My stomach remains quite strong, however. The only thing that might turn it are details of your grandson's nocturnal activities. Do you deny them?

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Oh, not at all. A sword swallower through and through.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: And a boy with his affliction should be grateful for the opportunity to marry the most beautiful woman in the kingdoms and remove the stain from his name.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Did you grow up with boy cousins, Lord Tywin? Sons of your father's bannermen, squires, stable boys?

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Of course.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And you never-

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: No.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Not once? Not in any way?

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Never.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: I congratulate you upon your restraint. But it's a natural thing, two boys having a go at each other beneath the sheets.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Perhaps Highgarden has a high tolerance for unnatural behavior.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: I wouldn't say that. True, we don't tie ourselves in knots over a discreet bit of buggery, but brothers and sisters- where I come from, that stain would be very difficult to wash out.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I will not breathe further life into a malicious lie by discussing it.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Lie or not, you must admit many people find it quite convincing. Convincing enough to put swords in their hands and send them off to kill Lannisters and Tyrells thanks to our new affiliation.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I don't care what people believe. And neither do you.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: As an authority on myself, I must disagree.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Now, if the rumors about my children were true, then Joffrey is no king at all and House Tyrell is throwing its prized flower into the dirt.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And if Cersei is too old to give Loras children, we're throwing another prized flower into the dirt. It is a chance we simply cannot take.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The uncertainty makes you uncomfortable. All right. I'll remove it for you.

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: If you refuse to marry Loras to Cersei, I will name him to the Kingsguard. I'm sure you're familiar with the Kingsguard vows. He will never marry. He will never have children.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Oh

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The Tyrell name will fade. And Highgarden will go to the children of Joffrey and Margaery.

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: You would have your grandson protected by someone who disgusts you?

title: The Climb
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I would have my grandson protected by a skilled warrior who takes his vows seriously. So, shall I draw up the order? Or do you consent to this marriage?

title: The Climb
Name: olenna
text: olenna: It's a rare enough thing- a man who lives up to his reputation.

title: The Climb
Name: orell
text: orell: No!

title: The Climb
Name: orell
text: orell: We've gotta cut them loose!

title: The Climb
Name: tormund
text: tormund: No!

title: The Climb
Name: jon
text: jon: Take my hand!

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: That's a wonderful pin.

title: The Climb
Name: loras
text: loras: Oh, it's more of a brooch, really. Though I suppose a brooch is a sort of pin, so

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm very happy about

title: The Climb
Name: loras
text: loras: Uh, yes. I-I am as well.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I feel like I'm in a dream.

title: The Climb
Name: loras
text: loras: Yes, me, too. Definitely. I've dreamed of a large wedding since I was quite young. The guests, the food, the tournaments. And the bride, of course. The most beautiful bride in the world in a beautiful gown of gold and green brocade with fringed sleeves. Have you ever been to Highgarden, my lady?

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No. I had never left Winterfell before I came to King's Landing. But it sounds wonderful. I can't wait to see it. And to leave this place.

title: The Climb
Name: loras
text: loras: It's terrible, isn't it? The most terrible place there is.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't suppose there's anything we can do about this.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We can have them both killed.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's hard to say which of the four of us is getting the worst of this arrangement. Probably Sansa. Though Loras will certainly come to know a deep and singular misery.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Father doesn't discriminate. We're all being shipped off to hell together.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: On a boat you built.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Tyrells were plotting to undermine our family. I did what I did to protect our family.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm your family. A member of your family who has actively contributed to that family's survival. Whether or not you or Father or anyone else wants to admit it.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I do admit it. If it weren't for your trick with the wildfire, Stannis would have sacked the city before Father got here. Our heads would still be rotting on the city gate.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Trying to have me killed is an odd way of saying thank you. There are two people in King's Landing who can give an order to a Kingsguard. Did you or did you not order Ser Mandon to kill me during the Battle of the Blackwater?

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The impulse I understand. He hates me because I'm the only one who tells him what he really is. So, fair enough. He wants me dead. But his stupidity? He could have had me poisoned and no one would have known. But the king orders a Kingsguard to murder the Hand of the King in full view of his own army. The boy's an idiot.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What do you want me to say?

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I want you to tell me if my life is still in danger.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Probably. But not from Joffrey. He won't do anything now Father's here.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Seven kingdoms united in fear of Tywin Lannister.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Not the Tyrells. Soon they won't need to be afraid of him. Joffrey will belong to Margaery, the little doe-eyed whore. And so will his children and their children. History will be taken from our hands.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You may escape, at least. Once Jaime gets back, Ser Loras may come down with a terrible case of sword through bowels.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: When Jaime gets back, yes. But when do we think that's going to be? He's out there somewhere.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Jaime or not, I'm truly fucked.

title: The Climb
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Who's going to tell her?

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Do you think people will like it?

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae: I don't think they will even notice it.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're right. It's not my wedding. Anyway, from what I can tell, the dressmakers in Highgarden will be far superior to the ones in King's Landing. They'd never make me anything as dull as this for my wedding. Loras likes green and gold brocade.

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm sure he does.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Will they let me invite my family?

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae: They haven't asked my opinion.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: But do you think they will?

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae: No.

title: The Climb
Name: maid
text: maid: Lady Sansa, Lord Tyrion to see you. Should I-

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I beg your pardon, my lady.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Good afternoon, Lord Tyrion. I was just trying on a gown for King Joffrey's wedding.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, it should be quite a wedding. I need to speak with you, Lady Sansa.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Of course.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Alone, if I may.

title: The Climb
Name: shae
text: shae: Why do you need to speak to her alone?

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Shae. Please excuse her, Lord Tyrion. She's not from here. But I trust her, even though she tells me not to.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Sometimes we think we want to hear something and it's only afterwards when it's too late that we realize we wished we'd heard it under entirely different circumstances.

title: The Climb
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's all right, really.

title: The Climb
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How to begin? It's- this- this- this is awkward.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys: A thousand blades taken from the hands of Aegon's fallen enemies, forged in the fiery breath of Balerion the Dread.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr: There aren't. There aren't even two hundred. I've counted.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys: Ha, I'm sure you have. Ugly old thing. Yet it has a certain appeal. The Lysa Arryn of chairs. Shame you had to settle for your second choice.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Early days, my friend. It is flattering, really, you feeling such dread at the prospect of me getting what I want.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys: Thwarting you has never been my primary ambition, I promise you. Although who doesn't like to see their friends fail now and then?

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You're so right. For instance, when I thwarted your plan to give Sansa Stark to the Tyrells. If I'm going to be honest, I did feel an unmistakable sense of enjoyment there. But your confidant, the one who fed you information about my plans, the one you swore to protect, you didn't bring her any enjoyment. And she didn't bring me any enjoyment. She was a bad investment on my part. Luckily, I have a friend who wanted to try something new. Something daring. And he was so grateful to me for providing this fresh experience.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys: I did what I did for the good of the realm.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The realm? Do you know what the realm is? It's the thousand blades of Aegon's enemies. A story we agree to tell each other over and over till we forget that it's a lie.

title: The Climb
Name: varys
text: varys: But what do we have left once we abandon the lie? Chaos. A gaping pit waiting to swallow us all.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them.

title: The Climb
Name: petyr
text: petyr: And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: How far are we?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: About a week, I think.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You think? You don't know?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: When we went to Castle Black, we took the Kingsroad.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You and your roads. Is that how you lot do your fighting? You march down the road banging drums and waving banners?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Most of the time, yes.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: How do the men holding the banners fight?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: They don't, really. It's a great honor to carry your house sigil.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: And the drummers- is that a great honor, too?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Usually it's the young boys banging the drums.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: So what good are they?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: They help the men march.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: How?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Well, it's- it's the rhythm.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Oh, you mean right foot, left foot, right foot, left foot, right foot? You need help remembering that? When Mance gives the signal and we hit Castle Black, we won't be banging on drums to let them know we're coming.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: No. No, you're just gonna light the biggest fire the North has ever seen to let them know you're coming.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: She's right, you don't.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: I know you cut me loose on the Wall.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: Cut her loose, too. Do you see her sulking about it? That's because she understands the way things are.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: And are you gonna share it with me? The deep wisdom you found inside the head of a bird?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: People work together when it suits them. They're loyal when it suits them. They love each other when it suits them. And they kill each other when it suits them. She knows that, you don't. Which is why you'll never hold onto her.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brynden
text: brynden: That rain will cost us another day.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Frey will wait. He knows we're coming.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Lord Walder is prickly by nature.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Prickly? That what you call it? Might be the least pleasant man I've ever met.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Yes, and that is why-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brynden
text: brynden: I've seen wet shits I liked better than Walder Frey. Apologies, Your Grace. Spent too many years around lancers and pikemen.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I've spent the last two years nursing wounded men, watching them bleed and die. I'm not afraid of wet shits.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: Lord Frey will take this delay as a slight.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: edmure
text: edmure: He can take it as he likes. He's getting the wedding he wanted.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: catelyn
text: catelyn: He's getting a wedding. It was a king he wanted.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Edmure is the best match a Frey has had in the history of their house. We should all get some sleep.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: If you don't put some clothes on, I can't promise I won't attack you again.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Attack. Attack.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Who are you writing?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: My mother.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Is that Valyrian?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Gaaa.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Gaaa? Say hello for me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Rytsas.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Ritsas.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: That was close enough.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Does she know her daughter's a queen?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Not yet.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: That will be a surprise, I expect.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Many surprises for her.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: How am I supposed to sit here planning a war when you're over there looking like that?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Will you come with me one day to Volantis? When all this is over?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: I will.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: I promise. I know she'd love to meet you. And her grandchild.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: What, now? Are you certain?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Are you angry with me?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Angry? You're my queen.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: And I have your little prince or princess inside me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: Maybe one of each.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Don't get greedy.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: talisa
text: talisa: Can you leave the war for one night?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: robb
text: robb: I love you. Do you hear me? I love you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Most men fuck like dogs.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tormund
text: tormund: No grace, no skill. A few dozen thrusts and done. You need to be patient. Give her time. Your cock shouldn't go near her till she's slick as a baby seal. And then you go inside, but slowly. Don't jam it in like you're spearing a pig. Come on! Hey, come on.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: You think he loves you, is that it? What did he tell you? He's gonna make you his lady and live with you in some castle?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: No, he didn't tell me anything. He barely talks.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: I've seen you two whispering in the night, giggling like a pair of girls.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: What, you're jealous?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: Of course I'm jealous. You should be with one of your own.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: And you're one of my own? I've never heard a kind word from your mouth.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: You would if you were mine. I'd tell you that you're beautiful and fierce and wild. I'd be good to you. You love him?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: Cause he's pretty? Is that it? You like his pretty hair and his pretty eyes? You think pretty is gonna make you happy?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Don't touch me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: orell
text: orell: You won't love him so much when you find out what he really is.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Growing up at Winterfell, all I ever wanted was to escape, to come here to the capital. See the southern knights and their painted armor and King's Landing after dark- all the candles burning in all those windows. I'm stupid. A stupid little girl with stupid dreams who never learns.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Come on. Come walk with me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I remember the first time I saw you in the throne room. I'd never seen anyone who looked so unhappy. I want very much for you to be happy, Sansa, and so does my grandmother.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: You would have been happy at Highgarden. But women in our position must make the best of our circumstances.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How do I make the best of my circumstances? I have to marry him.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Has Lord Tyrion mistreated you?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Has he been kind to you?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's tried.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: You don't want him, though.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's a Lannister.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Far from the worst Lannister, wouldn't you say?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm sorry. Here I am complaining to you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: My son will be king Sons learn from their mothers. I plan to teach mine a great deal. And your son, if I'm not mistaken, your son might be the Lord of Casterly Rock and the North someday. What?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: My son with him. I'll have to- we'll have to-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: If it's the pain you're worried about-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm not afraid of the pain. Not after what Joffrey's done to me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: What is it, then? He's rather good-looking even with the scar. Especially with the scar.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's a dwarf. And Loras- Loras.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Some women like tall men. Some like short men. Some like hairy men. Some like bald men. Gentle men, rough men, ugly men, pretty men, pretty girls. Most women don't know what they like until they've tried it. And, sadly, so many of us get to try so little before we're old and gray. Tyrion may surprise you. From what I've heard, he's quite experienced.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And that's a good thing?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: It can be. We're very complicated, you know. Pleasing us takes practice.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How do you know all this? Did your mother teach you?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Yes, sweet girl. My mother taught me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She's a child.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn: She's a foot taller than you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A tall child.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn: What's the youngest you've ever had?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Not that young.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn: How much older?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Older.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You're a lord, she's a lady. And a beauty at that. I don't see the problem.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Shae isn't going to like it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Shae is a whore. Are you gonna marry her? Eh? How did marrying a whore work out for you the first time?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I should never have told you about that.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You want Shae, keep her. Wed one and bed the other. All you have to do is get a son in the Stark girl. He'll be Lord of Winterfell one day. You can rule the North in his name. You'll have two women and a whole kingdom of your own.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Two women to despise me and a whole kingdom to join them.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You waste time trying to get people to love you, you'll end up the most popular dead man in town. You want to fuck that Stark girl. You just don't want to admit it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't pay you to put evil notions in my head. The ones already there don't need company.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You pay me to kill people who bother you. Evil notions come free.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Your Grace.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Grandfather.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You wanted to speak to me?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Yes. I'd like a report on the meetings of my small council.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You're welcome to attend the meetings of your small council, Your Grace. Any or all of them.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I've been very busy. Many important matters require a king's attention.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Of course.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: You've been holding the council meetings in the Tower of the Hand instead of the small council chamber.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I have, yes.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: May I ask why?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The Tower of the Hand is where I work. To walk from there to here would take time, time I could otherwise spend productively.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: So if I wanted to attend a council meeting, I would now have to climb all the stairs in the Tower of the Hand?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: We could arrange to have you carried.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Tell me about the Targaryen girl in the east and her dragons.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Where did you hear about this?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Is it true?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Apparently so.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: Don't you think we ought to do something about it?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: When I was Hand of the King under your father's predecessor, the skulls of all the Targaryen dragons were kept in this room. The skull of the last of them was right here. It was the size of an apple.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: And the biggest was the size of a carriage.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Yes, and the creature to whom it belonged died 300 years ago. Curiosities on the far side of the world are no threat to us.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: But how do we know these dragons are just curiosities and not the beasts that brought the whole world to heel?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Because we have been told as much by the many experts who serve the realm by counseling the king on matters about which he knows nothing.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: But I haven't been counseled.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You are being counseled at this very moment.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: joffrey
text: joffrey: I should be consulted about such things.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tywin
text: tywin: From now on, I will see to it that you are appropriately consulted on important matters whenever necessary. Your Grace.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Yunkai. The Yellow City.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: barristan
text: barristan: The Yunkish train bed slaves, not soldiers. We can defeat them.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah: On the field, with ease. But they won't meet us on the field. They have provisions, patience, and strong walls. If they're wise, they'll hide behind those walls and chip away at us, man by man.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I don't want half my army killed before I've crossed the Narrow Sea.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We don't need Yunkai, khaleesi. Taking this city will not bring you any closer to Westeros or the Iron Throne.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How many slaves are there in Yunkai?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Two hundred thousand if not more.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Then we have Two hundred thousand reasons to take the city.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Send a man to the city gates. Tell the slavers I will receive them here, and accept their surrender. Otherwise, Yunkai will suffer the same fate as Astapor.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Now comes the noble Razdal mo Eraz of that ancient and honorable house, master of men and speaker to savages, to offer terms of peace.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Noble lord, you are in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains, and Mother of Dragons.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You may approach. Sit.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Will the noble lord take refreshment?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: Ancient and glorious is Yunkai. Our empire was old before dragons stirred in old Valyria. Many an army has broken against our walls. You shall find no easy conquest here, khaleesi.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Good. My Unsullied need practice. I was told to blood them early.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: If blood is your desire, blood shall flow. But why? 'Tis true you have committed savageries in Astapor. But the Yunkai are a forgiving and generous people.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: The wise masters of Yunkai have sent a gift for the silver queen.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: There is far more than this awaiting you on the deck of your ship.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My ship?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: Yes, khaleesi. As I said, we are a generous people. You shall have as many ships as you require.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what do you ask in return?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: All we ask is that you make use of these ships. Sail them back to Westeros where you belong and leave us to conduct our affairs in peace.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I have a gift for you as well. Your life.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: My life?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And the lives of your wise masters. But I also want something in return. You will release every slave in Yunkai. Every man, woman, and child shall be given as much food, clothing, and property as they can carry as payment for their years of servitude. Reject this gift, and I shall show you no mercy.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: You are mad. We are not Astapor or Qarth. We are Yunkai and we have powerful friends. Friends who would take great pleasure in destroying you. Those who survive, we shall enslave once more. Perhaps we'll make a slave of you as well.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: You swore me safe conduct.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I did, but my dragons made no promises. And you threatened their mother.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: radzal
text: radzal: Take the gold.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My gold. You gave it to me, remember? And I shall put it to good use. You'd be wise to do the same with my gift to you. Now get out.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: barristan
text: barristan: The Yunkish are a proud people. They will not bend.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what happens to things that don't bend? He said he had powerful friends. Who was he talking about?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I don't know.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Find out.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: Chains?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Solid gold from the mines outside Lannisport. Smithed in Casterly Rock.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: Golden chains.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You could buy a ship with these.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: Do I need a ship?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: Am I going somewhere?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Of course you're not going anywhere.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: So, am I invited to your wedding?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I didn't ask for this marriage. I didn't want it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: No? She's a beautiful girl. You said so yourself.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That doesn't mean that- this is duty, not desire.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: Is that what you will tell yourself when you fuck her?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't have a choice. My father-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: Does not rule the world. We can still go across the Narrow Sea.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What would I do there? Juggle? I am a Lannister of Casterly Rock.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: And I'm Shae the funny whore.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My feelings for you have not changed. I will marry Sansa Stark and do my duty by her.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: While I empty her chamber pot and lick your cock when you're bored?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I swear to you it will not be like that.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: No? What will it be like?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I will buy you a good home somewhere in the city. You will have fine clothes, guards to keep you safe, servants. Any children we might have will be well provided for.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: Children? You think I want children who can never see their father? Who would be killed in their sleep if their grandfather found out about them?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Listen. Listen to me, my lady.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm not your lady.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You are. You'll always be my lady.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: shae
text: shae: I'm your whore. And when you are tired of fucking me, I will be nothing.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: gendry
text: gendry: What happened?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Wildfire. I should have been here.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: gendry
text: gendry: After all the running and fighting, here I am, back where I started.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Do you miss it?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: gendry
text: gendry: King's Landing?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Your father's house.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Never had a father. Never wanted one.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Haven't you ever wondered where your strength came from? Your talent for fighting?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I'm lowborn. As low as can be. My mother was a tavern wench.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Mine was a slave. So was I. Bought and sold, scourged and branded, until the Lord of Light reached down, took me in his hand and raised me up.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I was born in Flea Bottom.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Your blood is noble.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Are you saying my father, he was some lord or-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: There. Your father's house.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I'm just a bastard.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The bastard of Robert of the House Baratheon, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men. Why do you think the gold cloaks wanted you? There is power in a king's blood.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: Come sit by the fire, child.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Not talking, eh? That's a first.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't talk to traitors.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: I didn't like giving up the boy.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: arya
text: arya: But you did. You took the gold and you gave him up.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: The Red God is the one true god. You've seen his power. When he commands, we obey.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: arya
text: arya: He's not my one true god.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: No? Who's yours?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: arya
text: arya: Death.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Spotted a Lannister raiding party.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: How many?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: anguy
text: anguy: No more than twenty.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: How far?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: anguy
text: anguy: Less than a day's ride south.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: thoros
text: thoros: What do you say, boys? Time for a lion hunt?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: men
text: men: Yeah!

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: arya
text: arya: But what about Riverrun? It's not south. It's west of here.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: thoros
text: thoros: It will still be west of here two days from now.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: arya
text: arya: You swore.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: To take you home, and I will. But we need to do this first.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: arya
text: arya: Why? So you can steal their gold?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: I swear to you, this isn't-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't care what you swear because you're a liar. You lied to Gendry, you lied to me. You'll lie to anyone. I hope the Lannisters kill you all.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: One day you'll understand, but now-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: beric
text: beric: Anguy, bring her back.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: man
text: man: Come back, girl!

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Kick all you like, wolf girl. Won't do you no good.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I thought you were gone.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Tomorrow.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Have they told you what they plan to do with me?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Lord Bolton's traveling tomorrow as well. He's going to the Twins for Edmure Tully's wedding. You're to remain here.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: With Locke?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I owe you a debt.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: When Catelyn Stark released you, we both made a promise to her. Now it's your promise. You gave your word. Keep it and consider the debt paid.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I will return the Stark girls to their mother. I swear it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Good-bye, Ser Jaime.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Here. Let me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: It will take time.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: roose
text: roose: Qyburn hopes your father will force the Citadel to give him back his chain.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: My father will make him Grand Maester if he grows me a new hand.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: roose
text: roose: You will give my regards to Lord Tywin, I trust?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Tell Robb Stark I'm sorry I couldn't make his uncle's wedding. The Lannisters send their regards.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: Safe journey, Kingslayer. Nothing to say? I liked you better before. I don't remember chopping your balls off, too. And don't you worry about your friend. We'll take good care of her.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Shh.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: Gentle, my lord. Gentle.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: Shh, shh, shh. Myranda knows what she's doing. Let her. She trained as a septa, only she had other urges.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: So did the septons, only they lied about it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: theon
text: theon: Where is he?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: Who, my lord?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: There's no one here but you, me, and Violet.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: theon
text: theon: Please.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: Don't you want us to see it?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Oh, come on. Let us see it. Everybody talks about it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: theon
text: theon: He sent you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Who sent us?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: We sent ourselves, Lord Greyjoy.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: We heard so much about it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: Oh! There it is.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: Oh. Do you think we're ugly? He thinks we're ugly.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Well, he's been through so much. Look at his poor face.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: theon
text: theon: Help me. If he comes back-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: We need to make him feel better.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: And how can we make him feel better?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: I have an idea.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: Oh, she's shy. You know how they are, these religious girls.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Maybe he doesn't know how we are.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Oh. I felt something. Oh, Lord Greyjoy.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: As good as they say?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Mmm.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: And why should you get all the fun?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: What? You like her better?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: violet
text: violet: Plenty there for both of us.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: myranda
text: myranda: I was here first.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Terrible timing.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: But I was getting jealous.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Well? Should we see this cock everyone's always going on about?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Everyone knows you love girls. I bet you always thought they loved you back.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Your famous cock must be very precious to you. Would you say it's your most precious part?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: theon
text: theon: Please. No. No! Mercy, please! Please, mercy! Mercy!

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: This is mercy. I'm not killing you. Just making a few alterations.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: theon
text: theon: No! No! No! Please, no! No! No! No, please! Please!

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: You're gonna scare it off.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: I'm not gonna scare it. I'm gonna kill it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: It's too far away.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Is that a palace?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: It's a windmill.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Windmill. Who built it? Some king?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Just the men who used to live here.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: They must have been great builders, stacking stones so high.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Winterfell has towers three times that size.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: I'm Jon Snow and I'm from Winterfell. My daddy was a fancy lord and I lived in a tower that touched the clouds.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: If you're impressed by a windmill, you'd be swooning if you saw the Great Keep at Winterfell.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: What's swooning?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Fainting.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: What's fainting?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: When a girl sees blood and collapses.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Why would a girl see blood and collapse?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Well not all girls are like you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Well, girls see more blood than boys. Or do you like girls who swoon, Jon Snow? Oh, a spider! Save me, Jon Snow.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: My dress is made of the purest silk from Tralalalaleeday.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: I'd like to see you in a silk dress.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Would you?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: So I could tear it off you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Well, you rip my pretty silk dress, I'll blacken your eye.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Maybe one day I'll take you to Winterfell.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Or maybe one day I'll take you there. After we've taken our land back.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Ygritte. You won't win. I know your people are brave, no one denies that.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You know nothing-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Six times in the last thousand years, a King has attacked the kingdoms. Six times they failed.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: And how do you know that?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Every boy in the North knows it. We grow up learning it. Where the battles were fought, the names of the heroes, who died where. Six times you've invaded and six times you've failed. The seventh will be the same.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: Mance is different.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: You don't have the discipline. You don't have the training. Your army is no army. You don't know how to fight together.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You don't know that.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: I do. I know it. If you attack the Wall, you'll die. All of you.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: All of us.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: ygritte
text: ygritte: You're mine as I'm yours. And if we die, we die. But first we'll live.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jon
text: jon: Yes, first we'll live.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: What's he going on about? And how come he always gets to sit and chat while we do all the work?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: hodor
text: hodor: Hodor.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jojen
text: jojen: That's where we are.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: What are you telling him?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bran
text: bran: It's all right, Osha.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: It's not all right. You think I can't hear you every day? Filling his head with black magic. Talking about visions and three-eyed ravens and worse.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: meera
text: meera: Leave him alone.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: He can speak for himself.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jojen
text: jojen: I don't fill his head with anything.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: So what do you talk about?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jojen
text: jojen: What's happening to him and what that means.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: Go on, then. Tell us what it means.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jojen
text: jojen: It's not like that. I wish I could tell him all the answers. It would be much easier.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: I don't want you talking to him anymore. Until we get to your brother at Castle Black.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jojen
text: jojen: We're not going to Castle Black.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: What did you say?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jojen
text: jojen: I told you already. Jon Snow isn't there. Bran needs to find the raven beyond the Wall.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: Oh, no. I'm not going back there. Your brother is at Castle Black. That's where we're going. Look at me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bran
text: bran: The raven's been coming to me ever since I fell from that tower. He wants me to find him. I don't have my legs anymore. This is what I have now.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: You have a family. You need to go back to Castle Black so you can get back to them where you belong.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bran
text: bran: What if I belong in the North? What if I fell from that tower for a reason?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: Is that what he's telling you? That it's all for a reason? All these bad things happened because the gods got big plans for you? I wish it were true, little lord. But the gods wouldn't spare a raven's cold shit for you or me or anyone.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: bran
text: bran: You don't understand. You don't know.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: You don't know. None of you know. None of you have been up there. I had a man once. A good man. Bruni, his name was. I was his and he was mine. But one night Bruni disappears. People said he left me, but I knew him. He'd never leave me. Not for long.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: osha
text: osha: I knew he'd come back. And he did. He came in through the back of the hut. Only it wasn't Bruni. Not really. His skin was pale like a dead man's. His eyes bluer than clear sky. He came at me, grabbed me by the neck and squeezed so hard I could feel the life slipping out of me. I don't know how I got the knife. When I did, I stuck it deep into his heart. And he hardly seemed to notice. I had to burn our hut down with him inside. I didn't ask the gods what it meant. I didn't need to. I already knew. It meant the North was no place for men to be. Not anymore. I promised your maester I'd get you to Castle Black and no further.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: How is the pain, my lord?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What's the purpose of an arm with no hand?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Well, we've stymied the corruption.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Yes, we've stymied the corruption. You're a learned man.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: All the good it's done me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You did well sewing up this mess. You're far better at this sort of work than Grand Maester Pycelle.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Faint praise, my lord.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: So why did the Citadel take your chain? Did you fondle one boy too many?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: No, my lord. That's not my weakness.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What is?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Curiosity. The only way to treat disease is to understand disease. And the only way to understand it is to study the afflicted.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You performed experiments on living men.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: On dying men.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: With their permission?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: My studies have given me insight that has saved many lives.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Dying paupers, I assume. Men with no families to complain. You found them moaning in the poorhouse and had them carted back to your garret and opened up their bellies to see what was inside.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: How many men have you killed, my lord?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I don't know.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Fifty? A hundred?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Countless.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Countless has a nice ring to it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: And how many lives have you saved?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Half a million. The population of King's Landing. You were in charge of the ravens at Harrenhal. Did you- did you get a bird off to Brienne's father in Tarth?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: A bird flew off and a bird flew back. Lord Selwyn Tarth offered three hundred gold dragons for his daughter's safe return.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: A fair offer.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: A fair offer. Locke won't take it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Why not?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: He's convinced Lord Tarth owns all the sapphire mines in Westeros.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: He feels he's being cheated.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They'd be fools to kill her.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: These men have been at war a long time. Most of them will be dead by winter. She'll be their entertainment tonight. Beyond tonight, I don't think they care very much.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We have to return to Harrenhal.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: steelshanks
text: steelshanks: Why?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I've left something behind.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: steelshanks
text: steelshanks: Absolutely not. I've got orders from Lord Bolton.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: And what are those orders?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: steelshanks
text: steelshanks: To deliver you to your father at King's Landing.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You think you'll get a reward.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: steelshanks
text: steelshanks: I serve Lord Bolton. Any appreciation your father-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You think you're getting a reward. Let me explain something to you. When my father sees me, the first thing he's going to ask is what happened to my hand. And I'm going to tell him this man chopped it off.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: steelshanks
text: steelshanks: I had nothing-

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Or I could tell him this man saved my life. We return to Harrenhal now.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Whoa.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: steelshanks
text: steelshanks: Eyes open, lads.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Be quiet.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: men
text: men: The bear, the bear and the maiden fair / From there to here, from here to there / All black and brown and covered in hair / He smelled that girl in the summer air / The bear, the bear, and the maiden fair!

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: man
text: man: Don't spare her. Don't spare her!

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: Well, this is one shameful fucking performance. Stop running and fight.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: A wooden sword?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: I thought you'd gone.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You gave her a wooden sword.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: We've only got one bear.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'll pay her bloody ransom. Gold, sapphires, whatever you want. Just get her out of there.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: All you lords and ladies still think that the only thing that matters is gold.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: This makes me happier than all your gold ever could. And that makes me happier than all her sapphires. So go buy yourself a golden hand and fuck yourself with it.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Ah!

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Get behind me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I will not.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: What the fuck are you doing to my bear?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: steelshanks
text: steelshanks: Lord Bolton charged me with bringing him back to King's Landing alive and that's what I aim to do.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Pull her up.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Hold my legs.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Pull him up!

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: The bitch stays.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We're taking her to King's Landing. Unless you kill me.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: locke
text: locke: She belongs to me. Lord Bolton's orders.

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What do you think is more important to Lord Bolton? Getting his pet rat a reward or ensuring Tywin Lannister gets his son back alive?

title: The Bear and the Maiden Fair
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Well, we must be on our way. Sorry about the sapphires.

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I'll give you one try, girl.

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Kill me and you're free. But if I live, I'll break both your hands. Go on, hit me. Hit me hard.

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Sulk all you want. The truth is, you're lucky. You don't want to be alone out here, girl. Someone worse than me would find you.

title: Second Sons
Name: arya
text: arya: There's no one worse than you.

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Ha, you never knew my brother. He once killed a man for snoring. There's plenty worse than me. There's men who like to beat little girls, men who like to rape them. I saved your sister from some of them.

title: Second Sons
Name: arya
text: arya: You're lying.

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Ask her, if you ever see her again. Ask her who came back for her when the mob had her on her back. They would have taken her every which way and left her there with her throat cut open.

title: Second Sons
Name: arya
text: arya: Is that the Blackwater?

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: The Blackwater? Where do you think I'm taking you?

title: Second Sons
Name: arya
text: arya: Back to King's Landing to Joffrey and the queen.

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Fuck Joffrey. Fuck the queen. That's the Red Fork. I'm taking you to the Twins.

title: Second Sons
Name: arya
text: arya: But why?

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Because your mother and brother will be there and they'll pay me for you.

title: Second Sons
Name: arya
text: arya: Why would they be at the Twins?

title: Second Sons
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Those outlaws you love so much never told you? The whole countryside is yapping about it. Your uncle is marrying one of the Frey girls. So quit trying to bash my skull in and we might just make it there in time for the wedding.

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Men who fight for gold have neither honor nor loyalty. They cannot be trusted.

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They can be trusted to kill you if they're well paid. The Yunkish are paying them well.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You know these men?

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Only by the broken swords on their banners. They're called the Second Sons. A company led by a Braavosi named Mero, "The Titan's Bastard."

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Is he more titan or bastard?

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He's a dangerous man, khaleesi. They all are.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How many?

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Two thousand, Your Grace. Armored and mounted.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Enough to make a difference?

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It's hard to collect wages from a corpse. I'm sure the sellswords prefer to fight for the winning side.

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I imagine you're right.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'd like to talk to the Titan's Bastard about winning.

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He may not agree to meet.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He will. A man who fights for gold can't afford to lose to a girl.

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Your Grace, allow me to present the captains of the Second Sons- Mero of Braavos, Prendahl na Ghezn, and-

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario: Daario Naharis

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: You are the Mother of Dragons? I swear I fucked you once in a pleasure house in Lys.

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Mind your tongue.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: Why? I didn't mind hers. She licked my ass like she was born to do it.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: You, slave girl, bring wine.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We have no slaves here.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: You'll all be slaves after the battle unless I save you. Take your clothes off and come and sit on Mero's lap and I may give you my Second Sons.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Give me your Second Sons and I may not have you gelded. Ser Barristan, how many men fight for the Second Sons?

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Under two thousand, Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We have more, don't we?

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Ten thousand Unsullied.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'm only a young girl, new to the ways of war, but perhaps a seasoned captain like yourself can explain to me how you propose to defeat us.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario: I hope the old man is better with a sword than he is with a lie. You have eight thousand Unsullied.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You're very young to be a captain.

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl: He's not a captain. He's a lieutenant.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Even if your numbers are right, you must admit the odds don't favor your side.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: The Second Sons have faced worse odds and won.

title: Second Sons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The Second Sons have faced worse odds and run.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Or you could fight for me.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: We've taken the slavers' gold. We fight for Yunkai.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I would pay you as much and more.

title: Second Sons
Name: prendahl
text: prendahl: Our contract is our bond. If we break our bond, no one will hire the Second Sons again.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Ride with me and you'll never need another contract. You'll have gold and castles and lordships of your choosing when I take back the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Second Sons
Name: daario
text: daario: You have no ships. You have no siege weapons. You have no cavalry.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: A fortnight ago, I had no army. A year ago, I had no dragons. You have two days to decide.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: Show me your cunt. I want to see if it's worth fighting for.

title: Second Sons
Name: grey
text: grey: My Queen, shall I slice out his tongue for you?

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: These men are our guests. You seem to be enjoying my wine. Perhaps you'd like a flagon to help you ponder.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: Only a flagon? And what are my brothers in arms to drink?

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: A barrel, then.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: Good. The Titan's Bastard does not drink alone. In the Second Sons, we share everything. After the battle, maybe we'll all share you.

title: Second Sons
Name: mero
text: mero: I'll come looking for you when this is over.

title: Second Sons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Ser Barristan, if it comes to battle, kill that one first.

title: Second Sons
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Gladly, Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Half Robert, half lowborn.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Show the boy to his chambers. Have the maids draw him a bath and find him some decent clothes. I'll come visit you soon.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: What do you mean to do with him?

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You know what I mean to do with him.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Then why bathe him and dress him in fine clothes? If it needs to be done, do it. Don't torture the boy.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Have you ever slaughtered a lamb, my king?

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: No.

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: If the lamb sees the knife, she panics. Her panic seeps into her meat, darkens it, fouls the flavor.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You've slaughtered many lambs?

title: Second Sons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: And none have seen the blade.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos: And tho- and thowg V-v-visenya Targaryen rod- rode Vhagar- Vhag-' Fuck me. 'Visenya Targaryen rode Vhagar, the smallest of the dragons, though still large enog- enough- enough to swallow a horse whole.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos: Your Grace.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: They feeding you enough?

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos: Two meals a day. Cold for breakfast, hot for supper. I cannot complain.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You don't belong in a place like this.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos: Well, it's sad to say, but I've seen worse.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Yeah.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos: I'm sorry about your son. Didn't get the chance to tell you before. Good lad. Loyal lad.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Melisandre's returned.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos: I didn't know she'd been gone.

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Came back with a bastard boy. Robert's bastard boy.

title: Second Sons
Name: davos
text: davos: Why?

title: Second Sons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: She says there's power in king's blood.
