text: davos: You think they ever met a pirate who didn't tell them that joke?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: sallador
text: sallador: Davos. I heard you were rotting in a dungeon in Dragonstone.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: davos
text: davos: Only half rotted.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: sallador
text: sallador: Join us, my friend. Join us. This is Lhara. And this is--

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: lhara
text: lhara: I am Lhara.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: sallador
text: sallador: She's an artist, this one, truly.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: davos
text: davos: No time, I'm afraid. We sail at sunrise.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: sallador
text: sallador: We?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: davos
text: davos: You, me-- we.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: sallador
text: sallador: Once I thought this man loved me. Now I know he despises me. He wants to see me die poor and alone on some cold--

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: davos
text: davos: You won't be alone. And you won't be poor.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: davos
text: davos: There's a chest of the good stuff left back at your house. I gave it to your wife.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: sallador
text: sallador: You're not my friend, my friend.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: davos
text: davos: I'll see you at sunrise.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: I give you until the full moon to order all ironborn scum out of the North and back to those shit-stained rocks you call home. On the first night of the full moon, I will hunt down every islander still on our lands and flay them living, the way I flayed the 20 ironborn scum I found at Winterfell. In the box you'll find a special gift-- Theon's favorite toy. He cried when I took it away from him. Leave the North now or more boxes will follow with more Theon. Signed Ramsay Snow, natural born son of Roose Bolton, Lord of the Dreadfort and Warden of the North.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Yes!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: They skinned our countrymen and they mutilated my brother, your prince. Your prince. Everything they've done to him, they've also done to you.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Yes! Yes!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: As long as they can hurt our prince with impunity, the word ironborn means nothing.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: first
text: first: Go left.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: Theon Greyjoy.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: bolton
text: bolton: I don't know--

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: I'm here for Theon Greyjoy. Take me to the dungeons.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: bolton
text: bolton: He's not in the dungeons.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: bolton
text: bolton: Last cage on the right.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: Thank you.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: This way!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: We're going home.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: No!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: It's all right. It's me, Yara.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: You can't trick me. Tell him. Tell him you couldn't trick me.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: I'm not tricking you, Theon. I'm saving you.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: Not Theon! Reek! Reek! My name is Reek!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: first
text: first: They're here.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: If they catch us in here, we're trapped. Help me with him.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: No, you can't! You can't!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: You're Theon Greyjoy.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: No, I don't believe her! I know who I am! I'm Reek! Reek! Loyal Reek! Good Reek! I've always been Reek!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: This is turning into a lovely evening.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm Reek! Loyal Reek!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: Aah! Theon!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: Give me my brother and no more of your men will die.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You've got bigger balls than he ever did. But with those big balls of yours...

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: how fast can you run?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: Make for the ship, now.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ironborn
text: ironborn: But your brother.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: yara
text: yara: My brother is dead.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I have a treat for you. A reward.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: Reward?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Yes, Reek. Those creatures who came in the night, they wanted to take you away. And you didn't let them. You remained loyal.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: I-- I didn't want them to take me. I was so scared. I didn't want them--

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Yes, yes, Reek. It's a bath. For you. Remove those rags. Now.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: The britches, too, Reek. Take them off.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Do you love me, Reek?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: Yes, of course, my lord.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Good. Because I need you to do something for me. Something very important. There's a castle, you see. Some bad men hold this castle. I need your help to take this castle back.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: But how can--

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I need you to play a role. To pretend to be someone you're not.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: theon
text: theon: Pretend to be who?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Theon Greyjoy.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You stand before Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, the First of Her Name, Queen of Meereen, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Khaleesi of the Great Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons. Don't be afraid, my friend.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: missandei
text: missandei: The Queen says you may approach and speak.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: missandei
text: missandei: He is a goatherd. He says he prayed for your victory against the slave masters.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I thank him for his prayers.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: missandei
text: missandei: It was your dragons, he says. They came this morning for his flock.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: missandei
text: missandei: He hopes he has not offended Your Grace, but now he has nothing.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Tell this man I am sorry for his hardship. I cannot bring back his goats,

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: but I will see he is paid their value three times over.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Send the next one in.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: manservant
text: manservant: The noble Hizdahr zo Loraq begs an audience with the Queen.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The noble Hizdahr zo Loraq can speak to me himself.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Queen Daenerys. Tales of your beauty were not exaggerated.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I thank you.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Mine is one of the oldest and proudest families in Meereen.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Then it is my honor to receive you.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: My father, one of Meereen's most respected and beloved citizens, oversaw the restoration and maintenance of its greatest landmarks. This pyramid included.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: For that, he has my gratitude. I should be honored to meet him.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: You have, Your Grace. You crucified him. I pray you'll never live to see a member of your family treated so cruelly.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Your father crucified innocent children.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: My father spoke out against crucifying those children. He decried it as a criminal act, but was overruled. Is it justice to answer one crime with another?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I am sorry you no longer have a father, but my treatment of the masters was no crime. You'd be wise to remember that.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: What's done is done. You are the queen and I am a servant of Meereen. A servant who does not wish to see its traditions eradicated.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what traditions do you speak of?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: The tradition of funeral rite. Proper burial in the Temple of the Graces. My father and 162 noble Meereenese are still nailed to those posts, carrion for vultures, rotting in the sun.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Your Grace, I ask that you order these men taken down so that they might receive proper burials.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what of the slave children these noble Meereenese crucified? They were rotting in the sun as well. Would you have begged me for their right to a proper burial?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Your Grace, I cannot defend the actions of the masters. I can only speak to you as a son who loved his father. Let me take his body down. Let me have him brought to the temple and buried with dignity so that he might find peace in the next world.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Bury your father, Hizdahr zo Loraq.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Thank you, my queen.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How many more?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: missandei
text: missandei: There are 212 supplicants waiting, Your Grace.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: 212?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: These meetings aren't always going to be this early, are they? I was up late last night. So, does this mean I am a master of something now? Coins, ships?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
text: mace: Lord Tywin and I already determined that I shall be the Master of Ships long before you--

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
text: mace: Lord Tywin, it's a great honor to have been granted a seat on this council. I--

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The trial begins this afternoon. We only have the morning for affairs of state. Shall we begin?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Sandor Clegane has been spotted in the Riverlands, my lord.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei
text: cersei: A coward and a traitor.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: My birds tell me the Hound slaughtered five of our soldiers. I believe the phrase "fuck the king" was uttered.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Disgraceful.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: What would it take to make the common soldier stupid enough to try his luck with the Hound?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: 10 silver stags seems a generous bounty.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Make it 100. What else?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: More whispers from the east, my lord.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The Targaryen girl?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Daenerys has taken up residence in Meereen. She has conquered the city and rules as its queen.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Conquered with what?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: She commands an army of Unsullied, my queen. Some 8,000 strong. She has a company of sellswords-- the Second Sons. She has two knights advising her-- Jorah Mormont and Barristan Selmy. And she has three dragons.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Baby dragons. Larger every year, Your Grace.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Mormont is spying on her for us.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: No longer. He appears to be fully devoted to her. As for Ser Barristan, it would seem he took his dismissal from the Kingsguard a bit harder than anticipated.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He's an old man. He wasn't fit to protect my son.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Joffrey didn't die on his watch. Dismissing him was as insulting as it was stupid.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Don't tell me you're worried about a child halfway across the world.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: A child with two seasoned warriors counseling her and a powerful army at her back, Your Grace.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Lord Varys is right. I have been to Essos and seen the Unsullied firsthand. They are very impressive on the battlefield. Less so in the bedroom.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Dragons haven't won a war in 300 years. Armies win them all the time. She must be dealt with.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: How, my lord? By force?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Eventually, if it comes to that. Can your little birds find their way into Meereen?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Most certainly, my Lord Hand.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Mmm. Lord Tyrell, be a good man. Fetch my quill and paper.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Prince Oberyn.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Lord Varys...

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Only Varys. I'm not actually a nobleman. No one is under obligation to call me lord.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: And yet everyone does.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: You seem quite knowledgeable about the Unsullied. Did you spend much time in Essos?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Five years.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: May I ask why?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Tis a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it. I don't want to be most of us.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Most of us aren't princes.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: You are from Essos. Where? Lys?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: I have an ear for accents. I've lost my accent entirely.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: I have an ear for that as well. How did you get here?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: It's a long story.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: One you don't like telling people.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: People I trust.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: My paramour Ellaria, she would find you very interesting. You should come to the brothel and meet her. We brought our own wine, not the swill they serve here. We have some lovely boys on retainer, but...

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: You did like boys before?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Really? Girls? Hmm. I hope you won't be offended when I say I never would have guessed.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Not at all. But I was never interested in girls, either.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: What then?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Nothing.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Everybody is interested in something.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Not me. When I see what desire does to people, what it's done to this country, I am very glad to have no part in it. Besides, the absence of desire leaves one free to pursue other things.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Such as?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Let me guess, I've been pardoned.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Really?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Father's orders.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, we mustn't disappoint Father.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: man
text: man: Kingslayer!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tommen
text: tommen: I, Tommen of the House Baratheon, First of my Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, and Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, do hereby recuse myself from this trial. Tywin of the House Lannister, Hand of the King, Protector of the Realm, will sit as judge in my stead. And with him Prince Oberyn of the House Martell and Lord Mace of the House Tyrell. And if found guilty... may the gods punish the accused.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Tyrion of the House Lannister, you stand accused by the Queen Regent of regicide. Did you kill King Joffrey?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Did your wife, the Lady Sansa?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Not that I know of.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: How would you say he died, then?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Choked on his pigeon pie.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: So you would blame the bakers?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Or the pigeons. Just leave me out of it.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The crown may call its first witness.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Once we'd got King Joffrey safely away from the mob, the Imp rounded on him. He slapped the king across the face and called him a vicious idiot and a fool. It wasn't the first time the Imp threatened Joffrey. Right here in this throne room, he marched up those steps and called our king a halfwit. Compared His Grace to the Mad King and suggested he'd meet the same fate. And when I spoke in the king's defense, he threatened to have me killed.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh, why don't you tell them what Joffrey was doing?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Silence.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Pointing a loaded crossbow at Sansa Stark while you tore at her clothes and beat her.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Silence! You will not speak unless called upon. You're dismissed, Ser Meryn.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Basilisk venom, widow's blood, wolfsbane, essence of nightshade, sweetsleep, tears of Lys, demon's dance... blind eye--

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: I think you have made your point, Grand Maester. You have a lot of poison in your store.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Had, Prince Oberyn. My stores were plundered.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: By whom?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: By the accused, Tyrion Lannister, after he had me wrongfully imprisoned.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Grand Maester, you examined King Joffrey's corpse. Was it without question poison that killed him?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Without question.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: This was found on the body of Dontos Hollard, the king's fool. He was last seen spiriting Sansa Stark, the wife of the accused, away from the feast. She wore this necklace the day of the wedding. Residue of a most rare and terrible poison was found inside.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Was this one of the poisons stolen from your store?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: pyelle
text: pyelle: It was. The Strangler. A poison few in the Seven Kingdoms possess. And used to strike down the most noble child the gods ever put on this good earth.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I will hurt you for this. A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth and you will know the debt is paid.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
text: mace: Your own brother said this to you?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Shortly before the Battle of Blackwater Bay. I confronted him about his plans to put Joffrey on the front lines. As it turned out, when the attack came, Joff insisted on remaining at the battlements. He believed his presence would inspire the troops.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Tyrion said, "And you will know the debt is paid." What debt?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I discovered he'd been keeping whores in the Tower of the Hand. I asked him to confine his salacious acts to the brothel where such behavior belongs. He wasn't pleased.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Thank you, Your Grace, for the courage of your testimony.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
text: mace: Do you remember the precise nature of this threat?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: I'm afraid I do, my lord. He said, "Perhaps you should speak more softly to me, then. Monsters are dangerous and just now kings are dying like flies."

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
text: mace: And he said this to you at a meeting of the small council?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Yes. After we received word of Robb Stark's death. He didn't seem gladdened by the news. Perhaps his marriage to Sansa Stark had made him more sympathetic to the northern cause.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You're excused, Lord Varys.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Father, may I ask the witness one question?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: One.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You once said that without me, this city would have faced certain defeat. You said the histories would never mention me, but you would not forget. Have you forgotten, Lord Varys?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: varys
text: varys: Sadly, my lord, I never forget a thing.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: We will adjourn for now.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Toll the bells in an hour's time.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: guard
text: guard: Clear the court!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You'd condemn your own son to death?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I've condemned no one. The trial is not over.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: This isn't a trial. It's a farce. Cersei has manipulated everything and you know it.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I know nothing of the sort.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You've always hated Tyrion.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: He killed his king.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: As did I. Do you know the last order the Mad King gave me? To bring him your head. I saved your life so you could murder my brother?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: It won't be murder. It'll be justice.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Justice?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I'm performing my sworn duty as Hand of the King. If Tyrion is found guilty, he will be punished accordingly.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He'll be executed.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: No, he'll be punished accordingly.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Once you said family is what lives on. All that lives on. You told me about a dynasty that would last 1,000 years. What happens to your dynasty when Tyrion dies? I'm a Kingsguard, forbidden by oath to carry on the family line.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: I'm well aware of your oath.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What happens to your name? Who carries the lion banner into future battles? Your nephews? Lancel Lannister? Others whose names I don't even remember?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: What happens to my dynasty if I spare the life of my grandson's killer?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It survives through me. I'll leave the Kingsguard. I'll take my place as your son and heir if you let Tyrion live.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Done.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: When the testimony's concluded and a guilty verdict rendered, Tyrion will be given the chance to speak. He'll plead for mercy. I'll allow him to join the Night's Watch. In three days' time, he'll depart for Castle Black and live out his days at the Wall. You'll remove your white cloak immediately. You will leave King's Landing to assume your rightful place at Casterly Rock. You will marry a suitable woman and father children named Lannister. And you'll never turn your back on your family again.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You have my word.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: And you have mine.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Not going well, is it?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You're going to be found guilty.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh, you think so?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: When you are, you need to enter a formal plea for mercy and ask to be sent to the Wall. Father's agreed to it. He'll spare your life and allow you to join the Night's Watch.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Ned Stark was promised the same thing and we both know how that turned out.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Father is not Joffrey. He'll keep his word.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How do you know?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Do you trust me?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Keep your mouth shut. No more outbursts. This will all be over soon.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: The crown may call its next witness.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: State your name.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: Shae.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Do you swear by all the gods that your testimony will be true and honest?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: I swear it.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Do you know this man?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: Yes. Tyrion Lannister.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: How do you know him?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: I was handmaiden to his wife Lady Sansa.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: This man stands accused of murdering King Joffrey. What do you know of this?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: I know that he's guilty.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: He and Sansa planned it together.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Silence! Continue.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: She wanted revenge for her father, her mother, her brother. She blamed their deaths on the king. Tyrion was happy to help. He hated Joffrey. He hated the queen. He hated you, my lord.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: He stole poison from the Grand Maester's chamber to put in Joffrey's wine.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: How could you possibly know all this? Why would he reveal such plans to his wife's maid?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: I wasn't just her maid. I was his whore.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: mace
text: mace: I beg your pardon? You said you were his...

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: His whore.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: How did you come to be in his service?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: He stole me. I was with another man, a knight in your lordship's army. But when Tyrion arrived at the camp, he sent one of his cutthroats into our tent. He broke the knight's arm and brought me to Lord Tyrion. "You belong to me now," he said. "I want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world."

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Silence. Silence!

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: And did you?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: Did I what?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Fuck him like it was his last night in this world.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: I did everything he wanted. Whatever he told me to do to him. Whatever he felt like doing to me. I kissed him where he wanted. I licked him where he wanted. I let him put himself where he wanted. I was his property. I would wait in his chambers for hours so he could use me when he was bored. He ordered me to call him "my lion," so I did. I took his face in my hands and said, "I am yours and you are mine."

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Shae. Please don't.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: shae
text: shae: I am a whore. Remember? That was before he married Sansa. After that, all he wanted was her. But she wouldn't let him into her bed. So he promised to kill King Joffrey for her.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Father, I wish to confess. I wish... to confess.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You wish to confess?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I saved you. I saved this city and all your worthless lives. I should have let Stannis kill you all.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Tyrion. Do you wish to confess?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, Father. I'm guilty. Guilty. Is that what you want to hear?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You admit you poisoned the king?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, of that I'm innocent. I'm guilty of a far more monstrous crime. I am guilty of being a dwarf.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: You are not on trial for being a dwarf.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh, yes, I am. I've been on trial for that my entire life.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Have you nothing to say in your defense?

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Nothing but this-- I did not do it. I did not kill Joffrey, but I wish that I had.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Watching your vicious bastard die gave me more relief than 1,000 lying whores.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I wish I was the monster you think I am. I wish I had enough poison for the whole pack of you. I would gladly give my life to watch you all swallow it.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tywin
text: tywin: Ser Meryn. Ser Meryn. Escort the prisoner back to his cell.

title: The Laws of Gods and Men
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I will not give my life for Joffrey's murder. And I know I'll get no justice here. So I will let the gods decide my fate. I demand a trial by combat.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I made a deal for you to keep your ungrateful head on your ungrateful neck a little while longer.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm sorry, what am I grateful for? The opportunity to live and die at the Wall as punishment for a crime I did not commit?

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You threw your life away. You threw it away. It's not a joke. You understand that, don't you?

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Of course it's a joke, just not a very funny one. I couldn't- I couldn't listen to her standing there telling her lies. I couldn't do it.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You fell in love with a whore.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, I fell in love with a whore. And I was stupid enough to think that she had fallen in love with me. That deal you made, it was everything Father wanted. You do see that? He gets you back as his heir. The future Lord of the Rock. And he ships me off to Castle Black, out of sight at last. All so perfect. It felt good to take that from him. He knows I'm innocent and he's willing to sacrifice me anyway. He's willing to sacrifice any of us. Not you. You're the golden son. You could kill a king, lose a hand, fuck your own sister, you'll always be the golden son.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Careful. I'm the last friend you've got.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: At least I got to tell them what they really are.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Yes, brilliant speech. They'll be talking about it for days to come. I thought you were a realist. Didn't realize you'd die for pride.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Don't give up on me just yet. I survived one trial by combat, even though you weren't there to save me.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I can't save you this time either. My training has proved that I can't beat a stable boy with my left hand.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Where's your sense of adventure? Even if you lose, imagine the look on Father's face when you fall.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Our family name snuffed out with a single swing of the sword.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It is tempting.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well... Bronn fought for me once, he'll do it again. If he wins, I expect I'll be in his debt for the rest of my life.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: If he wins.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Will you find him for me? Who does Cersei plan on naming as a champion? I hope it's Ser Meryn Trant. I'd enjoy watching Bronn disembowel that pompous child beater.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No. Not Ser Meryn.

title: Mockingbird
Name: guard
text: guard: Go on, move it.

title: Mockingbird
Name: guard
text: guard: And you. Come on.

title: Mockingbird
Name: prisoner
text: prisoner: Mercy. Please. Please, mercy.

title: Mockingbird
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Ser Gregor. Welcome to the capital. Thank you for riding here so quickly.

title: Mockingbird
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You seem to be in good form.

title: Mockingbird
Name: mountain
text: mountain: Who am I fighting?

title: Mockingbird
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Does it matter?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Could be food.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: Could be soldiers.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: You shouldn't be sitting out here like this.

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: Where else to sit? Tried to walk back to my hut, hurt too much. Then I remembered they burned my hut down.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Who were "they"?

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: I stopped asking a while ago.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: That's not gonna get better.

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: Doesn't seem so.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: A bad way to go. Haven't you had enough?

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: Of what? I know. Time to go. Take matters into my own hands. The thought has occurred to me.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: So why go on?

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: Habit.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: Nothing could be worse than this.

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: Maybe nothing is worse than this.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: Nothing isn't better or worse than anything. Nothing is just nothing.

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: Who are you?

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: My name is Arya. Arya Stark.

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: You her father?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Her captor. Bringing her to her aunt for ransom.

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: A fair exchange, that is. Always held to the notion of fair exchange in all my dealings. You give me, I give you. Fair. A balance. No balance anymore. Could I have a drink? Dying is thirsty work.

title: Mockingbird
Name: dying
text: dying: Wish it were wine.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: So do I.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: That's where the heart is. That's how you kill a man.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: The fuck you doing?

title: Mockingbird
Name: rorge
text: rorge: There's a price on your head.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Guess that's what the king does when you tell him to fuck off.

title: Mockingbird
Name: rorge
text: rorge: The king's dead. He drank poisoned wine at his own wedding. The bounty on you is for killing Lannister soldiers. 100 silver stags.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: And you thought you were going to collect it? Didn't think very hard, did you?

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: You were Yoren's prisoners when he was taking me to the Wall. He told me he'd fuck me bloody with a stick.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: This day's really not working out the way you planned. He on your little list?

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: He can't be. I don't know his name.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: What's your name?

title: Mockingbird
Name: rorge
text: rorge: Rorge.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: Thank you.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You're learning.

title: Mockingbird
Name: man
text: man: Rangers returning!

title: Mockingbird
Name: man
text: man: They return!

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: Greetings.

title: Mockingbird
Name: man
text: man: Didn't think I'd see you again.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sam
text: sam: All right, Jon?

title: Mockingbird
Name: man
text: man: Welcome back, brother.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Lord Snow.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: This is no place for wild beasts. Lock him away or I'll let Hobb throw him in tonight's stew.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: Come on, Ghost.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: Mance's army was closing in on Craster's Keep when we left. We saw their campfires from Osric's Hill. They'll reach the Wall before the next full moon.

title: Mockingbird
Name: janos
text: janos: I'm surprised you didn't ride over and say hello. The King-beyond-the-Wall is your old friend, isn't he?

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: We need to prepare.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: We've been preparing.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: We should seal the tunnel. Plug it with rocks and ice. Flood it and let it freeze.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: And how would we range north?

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: We wouldn't.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Coward. You would cut off our legs, pluck out our eyes, leave us cowering behind the Wall hoping for the storm to pass?

title: Mockingbird
Name: grenn
text: grenn: We can't defend the gate against a hundred thousand men.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: This castle has stood for thousands of years. The Night's Watch has defended her for thousands of years. And in all those centuries, we have never sealed the tunnel.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: Have you ever seen a giant, Ser Alliser? I have.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: The bars on those gates are four inches thick. Cold-rolled steel.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: They won't stop them.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Remind me which order you belong to, Lord Snow.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: The stewards.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Are the stewards responsible for maintaining the tunnel?

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: No.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Who would that be?

title: Mockingbird
Name: jon
text: jon: The builders.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Ah, the builders. First Builder Yarwyck, Lord Snow here recommends sealing the tunnel, leaving us unable to carry out our duties as sworn brothers of the Night's Watch. Do you agree with him?

title: Mockingbird
Name: yarwick
text: yarwick: No.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Given your deep knowledge of the Wildling army, Lord Snow, you and Tarly will take night duties atop the Wall until the full moon.

title: Mockingbird
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Moving on. First Builder, we'll need a hundred barrels of pitch brought atop the wall.

title: Mockingbird
Name: yarwick
text: yarwick: Aye.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: My lord.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You have new clothes.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Do you like 'em? Eh? Gloves are doeskin. Softer than a virgin's thighs.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I sent for you days ago.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I've been a bit busy.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Doing what?

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: My lonesome bachelor days are over. I'm to wed Lollys Stokeworth.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Lollys Stokeworth? She doesn't strike me as your sort of girl.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I wouldn't say I had a single sort of girl.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She's dim-witted.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: If I wanted wits, I'd marry you.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: When my sister arranged this love match, did she mention that Lollys has an older sister?

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Falyse. Aye, I did know about the older sister.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And you understand the rules of inheritance?

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Falyse is forty and barren.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She still gets Castle Stokeworth when her father dies.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: She does. Unless she happens to perish before her father. Then Lollys gets the castle.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: What? Ladies fall from their horses and snap their pretty necks all the time.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You and my sister deserve each other. Why did you bother to come here?

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You once said if anyone ever asked me to sell you out, you'd double their price.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Is it two wives you want or two castles?

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: One of each will do. But if you want me to kill the Mountain for you, it'd better be a damn big castle.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm a bit short on castles at the moment. But I can offer you gold and gratitude.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I have gold. What can I buy with gratitude?

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You might be surprised. A Lannister always pays his debts.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Your sister's a Lannister, too.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My wife is heir to Winterfell. If I emerge from this with my head still on my shoulders, I may one day rule the North in her name. I could carve you out a big piece of it.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: If and may and could. It's bloody cold up north. Lollys is soft and warm. And close. If I gave you the choice between fucking Lollys and fighting the Mountain, you'd have your britches down and your cock out before I could blink.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Does he frighten you so much?

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'd be a bloody fool if he didn't frighten me. He's freakish big and freakish strong. And quicker than you'd expect for a man of that size. Maybe I could take him, dance around until he's so tired of hacking at me, he dropped his sword, get him off his feet somehow. But one misstep... and I'm dead. Why should I risk it?

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Because you're my friend.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Aye, I'm your friend. And when have you ever risked your life for me?

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I like you, pampered little shit that you are. I just like myself more.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I understand.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'm sorry it has to be this way.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why are you sorry? Because you're an evil bastard with no conscience and no heart? That's what I liked about you in the first place.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: We had some good days together.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, we did.

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: What will you do?

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I suppose I'll have to kill the Mountain myself. Won't that make for a great song?

title: Mockingbird
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I hope to hear them sing it one day.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How did you get in here? Your door is well guarded,

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: But your window is not.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: I swam to an island a mile offshore for these.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Don't do that again.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: Never met a woman who didn't like wildflowers.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: These are my private quarters. If I want you here, I will summon you.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: Forgive me, my queen. I live to serve you.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Tell me why you're here.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: I came to ask a favor. I only have two talents in this world- war and women. You are staying here in Meereen to rule. That is a wise decision. I respect it. But here in Meereen, I cannot pursue my talents.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I've ordered the Second Sons to patrol the streets to stop the revenge killing.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: You've ordered us to be night watchmen.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And as for women, there are thousands in Meereen you can pursue.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: There is only one, and she does not want me.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You swore me your sword.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: My sword is yours till the day I die.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: So if I command you to stay in Meereen and patrol the streets?

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: I'll stay in Meereen and patrol the streets. Send me to kill your enemies. Any enemy anywhere. Let me do what I do best.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Very well.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Do what you do best.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Take off your clothes.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: Oh.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Come in, my queen. Please.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: I didn't mean to disturb you, my lady.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You could never disturb me.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: I just wanted to speak with you before we left.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Could you bring me that vial over there? The blue one.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: No, no, no. Not that one. You don't even want to touch that one. Next to it. That's the one.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: When I looked into the flames this morning, the Lord spoke to me. He said, "Tonight, you will have your last good bath in a long while. Make it count." A joke. Not a very good one, I'm afraid.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: It was. I- humor isn't my strength.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: That's because most jokes are lies and you're devoted to the truth.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: If they're lies, my lady, aren't they best avoided?

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Not always.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Most of these powders and potions are lies. Deceptions to make men think they witnessed our Lordo s power. Once they step into his light, they will see the lie for what it was-- a trick that lead them to the truth. A pinch of this powder in a bonfire will send a flaming column screaming towards the sky. And this one creates a black smoke that will make the bravest man piss himself with fear. And a drop of this in any man's wine will drive him wild with lust.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: Did you use it with Stannis?

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: No. Don't be upset. Men never crave what they already have.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: It's only flesh. It needs what it needs.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: No act done in service of the Lord can ever be called a sin. I thank God every day for bringing you to us. And Stannis to you. He wants to bring Shireen with us. I think that would be ill-advised. My daughter has heretical tendencies, as you're well aware. I don't know if her doubt is real or simply meant to spite me, but whichever the case, she should stay home.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I understand how you feel.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: Hmm.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: But that is impossible.

title: Mockingbird
Name: selyse
text: selyse: Why?

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You don't need powders and potions, my queen. You don't need lies. You are strong enough to look into the Lordo s light and see his truth for yourself.

title: Mockingbird
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: However harsh it is. However hard for us to understand. You don't need my help, but I will need yours soon. When we set sail, your daughter must be with us. The Lord needs her.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daario
text: daario: Jorah the Andal. Are you here to see our queen? She's in a good mood.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Khaleesi.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You're here early.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Later than some.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You don't approve?

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It's not a question of approval, it's a question of trust.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You neither approve nor trust.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Why would I? The man's a sellsword.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Didn't you fight for the Golden Company before pledging your sword to my brother?

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I did.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I trust you.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Daario Naharis killed his captains and dumped their heads at your feet when he grew tired of their commands. How could you ever have faith in a man like that?

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I could never have faith in a man like Daario. That's why I've sent him and the Second Sons to retake Yunkai.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You have?

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I have.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Without you there to rule, Khaleesi, I fear the masters will simply bide their time, wait for the invaders to leave and reassert control.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: That is why I've ordered Daario to execute every master in Yunkai. The masters tear babies from their mothers' arms. They mutilate little boys by the thousands. They train little girls in the art of pleasuring old men. They treat men like beasts, as you said yourself.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Herding the masters into pens and slaughtering them by the thousands is also treating men like beasts. The slaves you freed, brutality is all they've ever known. If you want them to know something else, you'll have to show it to them.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And repay the slavers with what? Kindness? A fine? A stern warning?

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It's tempting to see your enemies as evil, all of them, but there's good and evil on both sides in every war ever fought.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Let the priests argue over good and evil. Slavery is real. I can end it. I will end it. And I will end those behind it.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I sold men into slavery, Khaleesi.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And now you are helping me show them to freedom.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I wouldn't be here to help you if Ned Stark had done to me what you want to do to the masters of Yunkai.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The man who came to me the other day about burying his father.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Hizdahr zo Loraq?

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He will accompany the Second Sons and serve as my ambassador to Yunkai. He will tell the masters what has happened in Meereen. He will explain the choice they have before them. They can live in my new world or they can die in their old one.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Well, go and catch Daario before he leaves. Tell him I changed my mind.

title: Mockingbird
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Yes, Khaleesi.

title: Mockingbird
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No. Tell him you changed my mind.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Rat cunts. Fucking whore.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: You're doing it wrong. You need to burn away that horrible bit there. Otherwise it's gonna get infected and fester. I know you don't like fire, but if you don't do it right-

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: No fire.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: It'll only take a second. It won't hurt that much.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: No fire!

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Shut up about it. Shut up about everything. Thanks to you, I'm a walking bag of silver anywhere the Lannisters hold sway. Which is everywhere between where we are now and where we're going.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I'm as stupid as that hog you stuck back in the village, getting myself cut and stabbed and bitten. No reward is worth this much trouble. Wish I'd never laid eyes on you. You say your brother gave you that sword.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: My brother gave me this. It was just like you said a while back. Pressed me to the fire like I was a nice juicy mutton chop.

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: Why?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Thought I stole one of his toys. I didn't steal it. I was just playing with it. The pain was bad. The smell was worse. But the worst thing was that it was my brother who did it. My father, who protected him... told everyone my bedding caught fire. You think you're on your own?

title: Mockingbird
Name: arya
text: arya: Let me wash it out and help you sew it up at least.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Bit of comfort never hurt anyone. We've been sleeping in ditches the last few weeks. I think we can treat ourselves to a featherbed for the night and a hot meal not cooked by you.

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Couldn't agree more, my lady.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Just don't start expecting silk underclothes. Not working for your former lord any longer.

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Yes, my lady.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Don't get drunk.

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: No, my lady.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: Can I get you anything else?

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: No, this will do nicely, thank you. Kidney pie is wonderful.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: Thanks. I do my best.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: A good kidney pie is all about the ingredients. Flour, lard, water, eggs, milk. Easy enough. But the meat, peacetime or not, getting your hands on a good bottom round steak and calves' kidneys is not easy. I mean, some people settle for plain old beef kidneys. Got no right to cook anything, them. Oh, and the gravy. Don't get me started on the gravy. Very difficult to get right. See, a lot of people give up on the gravy. You cannot give up on the gravy. No gravy, no pie. Simple as that. That's nice armor. Are you a knight?

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: No.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: Oh, it's just people with armor are usually knights. Generally speaking. From King's Landing, though, aren't you? From there myself originally. Flea Bottom born and bred. What brings you to these parts?

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: We're looking for someone.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: Someone in particular? Maybe they came in here. A lot of people come in here. Just the other day we had seventeen-

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: A girl, tall, red hair, very pretty. Her name is Sansa Stark, but she may be using a different name.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: Starks? What, like them lot from "Winterhell"?

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: No, ain't seen anyone like that. I heard they was all traitors. Don't need no traitors in here.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I pledged my life to their mother Catelyn Stark. I swore to her I'd bring her daughters home.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: Sure I can't get you a bit more kidney pie?

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: What?

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: It's nothing, my lady.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You wouldn't be screwing your face up like that if it was nothing.

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Don't want to offend, my lady. Truly, I don't.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You're not interesting enough to be offensive.

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: The Lannisters want Lady Sansa. The Lannisters have money. People kill for money. I don't think we should be telling people we're searching for Lady Sansa.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: My lady. My lord. Could I have a word?

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: What about? Not kidney pie.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: You seem like a proper lady. Someone who could be trusted. I never met no Sansa Stark. But I know her sister... Arya.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: No one's seen Arya Stark since her father was beheaded. She's presumed dead.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: She weren't when I last spoke to her.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: When was that?

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: Heading up north with the Night's Watch. She was all dressed up as a boy. Like your ladyship, only without the armor. Going by the name Arry.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: So what happened to her?

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: Well-

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: The quick version.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: The Lannisters took us prisoner. We escaped. The Brotherhood took us prisoner. They sold me to the innkeep. They were gonna sell Arya to her mother at Riverrun along with another prisoner. Big ugly fellow. Foul mouth and a face like a half-burnt ham. Not friendly.

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: The Hound.

title: Mockingbird
Name: hot
text: hot: That's the one. If you find her, could you give her this? She liked the last one I gave her, but, well, this one turned out better.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Um, you were saying?

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Her mother's dead, grandfather's dead, Walder Frey is the new lord of Riverrun. The Brotherhood isn't going to Riverrun.

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: They'll take her to the Eyrie, my lady.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Why the Eyrie?

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Her aunt, Lysa Arryn. Catelyn Stark's sister. She's Arya's last living relative with money. She hates the Lannisters. Lord Tyrion made sure I knew which house married which and who hated who.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Sansa could be there, too.

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Aye, my lady. Could be.

title: Mockingbird
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You sure about this?

title: Mockingbird
Name: podrick
text: podrick: No.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I imagined you'd be back at the brothel at this hour.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: I did spend some time with an absolutely stunning blonde the other day.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Mm, do tell. I've got every kind of filth down here except the kind I like.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Your sister.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Cersei approached me. We spoke a great deal about her daughter. How worried your sister is about her. She was trying very hard to pretend she had not come to sway me against you. I think she may have even believed it herself.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Making honest feelings do dishonest work is one of her many gifts.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: It was difficult for her to hide her true intentions. It is rare to meet a Lannister who shares my enthusiasm for dead Lannisters. She desperately wants to see you killed.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She didn't need to bother you. It looks as though I've taken care of that myself. The joy she will feel when my head leaves my neck. She's wanted this for a long time.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Yes, I know. We met, you and I. Many years ago.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I think I would have remembered that.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: Unlikely. You had just been born. Our father brought me and my sister Elia with him on a visit to Casterly Rock. My first time away from Dorne. I didn't like anything about the Rock. Not the food, not the weather, your accents. Nothing. But the biggest disappointment... you.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You and my family have more in common than you might admit.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: The whole way from Dorne all anyone talked about was the monster that had been born to Tywin Lannister. A head twice the size of his body, a tail between his legs, claws, one red eye, the privates of both a girl and a boy.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That would have made things so much easier.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: When we met your sister, she promised she would show you to us. Every day we would ask. Every day she would say, "Soon." Then she and your brother took us to your nursery and... she unveiled the freak. Your head was a bit large. Your arms and legs were a bit small, but no claw. No red eye. No tail between your legs. Just a tiny pink cock. We didn't try to hide our disappointment. "That's not a monster," I told Cersei. "That's just a baby." And she said, "He killed my mother." And she pinched your little cock so hard, I thought she might pull it off. Until your brother made her stop. "It doesn't matter," she told us. "Everyone says he will die soon. I hope they are right. He should not have lived this long."

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well... sooner or later, Cersei always gets what she wants.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: And what about what I want? Justice for my sister and her children.

title: Mockingbird
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If you want justice, you've come to the wrong place.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: I disagree.

title: Mockingbird
Name: oberyn
text: oberyn: I've come to the perfect place. I want to bring those who have wronged me to justice. And all those who have wronged me are right here. I will begin with Ser Gregor Clegane, who killed my sister's children and then raped her with their blood still on his hands before killing her, too. I will be your champion.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Hello, Robin.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: What are you doing?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm building my home, Winterfell. At least I think I am. I haven't been back there in a very long time.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: Why did you leave?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's a long story.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: I stay here in the Eyrie. Mother says it's dangerous on the roads and I have to keep myself safe because I'm the Lord of the Vale and the Lord of the Vale is a very important person.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes, you certainly are.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: When will you go back?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Probably never. My family doesn't live there anymore and someone burned it down.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: Oh. Does Winterfell have a Moon Door?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, I'm afraid not. It's not high up in the mountains. It's down on the ground.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: That sounds dangerous. How do you make people fly?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: We don't.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: What do you do with all the bad people and the scary people and the people you don't like?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I never did anything with them at all. Girls didn't take part in that where I came from.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: Well, I'm Lord of the Vale. When I grow up, I'll be able to fly anybody who bothers me. Or you. When we get married, you can tell me if you don't like somebody and then we can bring them back here and, whoosh! Right through the Moon Door.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I like the sound of that.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: Let's put a Moon Door in your Winterfell.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: All right.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: It can go in here in this big tower.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Careful. You've ruined it. Now I'm going to have to rebuild the whole thing.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: I didn't ruin it.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You did.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: It was already ruined because it didn't have a Moon Door. I was fixing it.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Knocking things down isn't fixing them. It's ruining them.

title: Mockingbird
Name: robin
text: robin: I didn't ruin it!

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're being stupid.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Robin, I'm sorry, I-

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Children.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I hit him.

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Yes, I saw.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I shouldn't have done that.

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No, his mother should have a long time ago. Consider it a step in the right direction.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: If he tells Aunt Lysa...

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Let me worry about Aunt Lysa.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I was trying to remember what everything looked like. I'll never see it again.

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: A lot can happen between now and never. If you want to build a better home, first you must demolish the old one.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why did you really kill Joffrey? Tell me why.

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I loved your mother more than you could ever know. Given the opportunity, what do we do to those who've hurt the ones we love? In a better world, one where love could overcome strength and duty, you might have been my child. But we don't live in that world.

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You're more beautiful than she ever was.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Lord Baelish...

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Call me Petyr.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You wanted to see me, Aunt Lysa?

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Come here, Sansa.

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Do you know how far the fall is?

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No.

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Neither do I, precisely. Hundreds of feet. It's fascinating what happens to bodies when they hit the rocks from such a height. The impact breaks them right apart. Like eggs dropped on the floor. Sometimes pieces remain intact. You'll find the head sitting on its own. Every hair in place. Blue eyes staring at nothing. I know what you did.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm so sorry, Aunt Lysa. I never should have hit Robin, I know it. I promise it won't happen-

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Don't be coy with me, you little whore. You kissed him. You kissed Petyr.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I didn't. You don't understand.

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: I saw you! You can't lie to me because I saw it with my own eyes.

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He kissed me. I pulled away.

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: Liar! Whore! He is mine!

title: Mockingbird
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Please!

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: My father, my husband, my sister, they all stood between us and now they're all dead. That's what happens to people who stand between Petyr and me. Look down! Look down! Look down! Look down!

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Lysa! Let her go.

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: You want her? This empty-headed child?

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Let her go.

title: Mockingbird
Name: lysa
text: lysa: She's just like her mother. She'll never love you. I lied for you. I killed for you. Why did you bring her here? Why?

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'll send her away. I swear on my life. I swear to all the gods. Let her go, Lysa.

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Oh, my sweet wife. My sweet, silly wife.

title: Mockingbird
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I have only loved one woman... only one, my entire life. Your sister.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: man
text: man: Here we are.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: man
text: man: The Rains of Castamere!

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: moles
text: moles: You fucking dick! Same wrong guess every fucking time. Listen, ya cunt.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: man
text: man: Oh, The Bear and the Maiden Fair!

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: moles
text: moles: There's a man with an ear. Too bad you've got a hangnail for a cock. First time I saw you with your britches down, I thought you were a eunuch! You seen it girls. Like a baby snail peekin' out of his shell. *laughs and walks toward Gilly* *to Gilly* Your baby was crying this morning. It waked me up. You hear me?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Yes.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: moles
text: moles: Well, what are you going to say?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I'm sorry it woke you up.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: moles
text: moles: I don't care if you're sorry. Keep that baby quiet, or I will.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Don't you ever touch him.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: moles
text: moles: Hehehe, little Wildling bitch. You shouldo ve stayed with your own kind. *an owl hoots in the distance* Are you listening to me?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Shut your mouth.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: moles
text: moles: What? It's just an owl you dumb bitch.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: gilly
text: gilly: No it's not.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: sam
text: sam: I should never have left her there.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: jon
text: jon: You couldn't have known.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: sam
text: sam: Of course I couldo ve known. They were raiding the villages close by.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: grenn
text: grenn: And we just cower in here while they slaughter our brothers?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: ed
text: ed: Our brothers had orders to stay at Castle Black.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: grenn
text: grenn: Oh, so it's alright then?! Black Jack and Kegs and Mully chopped to pieces 'cause they broke the rules?!

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: ed
text: ed: I didn't say it was alright! I'm sayin' they shouldn't have been there.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: grenn
text: grenn: We pledged to guard the realms of men.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: sam
text: sam: She's dead because of me.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: grenn
text: grenn: We can't even guard Mole's Town.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: jon
text: jon: We can't go after them, you know that. That's what they want.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: sam
text: sam: Little Same. As if I'd cut their throats myself.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: pyp
text: pyp: Maybe she managed to hide herself. I thought one of you was dead, you went North with Mormont and no one came back. Not for ages. But then you did.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: ed
text: ed: She survived Craster and he was the worst shit I've ever met. She survived the long march to the wall. She survived a white walker for fuck's sake. She might've got out.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: sam
text: sam: She might have.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: jon
text: jon: If they hit Mole's Town, then we're next. Mance's army must be close.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: ed
text: ed: A hundred thousand.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: grenn
text: grenn: And there's what, 5 of us left.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: ed
text: ed: If you're counting Black Jack, Kegs, and Mully. A hundred and two.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: pyp
text: pyp: How do a hundred and two men stop a thousand?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: ed
text: ed: Whoever dies last, be a good lad and burn the rest of us. Once I'm done with this world, I don't want to come back.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You think he was spying on you?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: missandei
text: missandei: No, not spying.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The Dothraki think outsiders are ridiculous taking shame in the naked body. They make love under the stars for the whole Khalasar to see.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Yes your grace.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: But you are not Dothraki.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: missandei
text: missandei: No.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Well, I don't see why it matters. Grey worm isn't interested, none of the unsullied care what's under our clothes.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: missandei
text: missandei: He was interested.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I believe he was interested.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: When the slavers castrate the boys, do they take all of it?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: missandei
text: missandei: All of it?

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The...the pillar an the stones.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I don't know, your grace.

title: The Mountain and the Viper
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Haven't you ever wondered?
