Because you did not belong across the world with the bloody Stone men. . You are the Princess Shireen of House Baratheon. And you are my daughter.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I thought I might find you here. . Your Aunt Lyanna.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Father never talked about her. Sometimes I'd find him down here, lighting the candles. They say she was beautiful.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I saw her once. I was a boy, living with your mother's family. Lord Whent had a great tourney at Harrenhal. Everyone was there. The Mad King, your father, Robert Baratheon. And Lyanna, she was already promised to Robert. You can imagine what it was like for me, a boy from nowhere, with nothing to his name, watching these legendary men, tilting at the lists. The last two riders were Barristan Selmy and Rhaegar Targaryen. When Rhaegar won, everyone cheered for the prince. I remember the girls laughing when he took off his helmet and they saw that silver hair. How handsome he was. Until he rode right past his wife, Elia Martell, and all the smiles died. I've never seen so many people so quiet. He rode past his wife, and he lay a crown of winter roses in Lyanna's lap. Blue as frost. How many tens of thousands had to die because Rhaegar chose your aunt?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes, he chose her… and then he kidnapped her and raped her.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Come. . Let's speak somewhere the dead can't hear us. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Dressed for riding?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I am.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Where are you going?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: King's Landing.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: King's Landing?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Cersei sent for me. . We must not let her sniff out any trouble.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You can't leave me here!

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I know how hard it is to live with people you despise, believe me. But it won't be for long.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How do you know?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Stannis Baratheon garrisons at Castle Black. He'll march south to King's Landing before the winter snows block his way. But first, he has to take Winterfell.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You don't know that.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I do. Once he liberates these lands from the Boltons he'll rally your father's bannermen to his cause. With the North behind him, Stannis can finally take the Iron Throne.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You think he'll defeat the Boltons?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: He has a larger army. He's the finest military commander in Westeros. A betting man would put his money on Stannis. . As it happens, I am a betting man.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And if you're right?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Stannis takes Winterfell, he rescues you from the most despised family in the North. Grateful for your late father's courageous support for his claim, he names you Wardeness of the North.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: But I, I wouldn't… Wardeness of the North

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You are the last surviving Stark. He needs you.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What if you're wrong? What if Stannis never attacks Winterfell, or he does and the Boltons defeat him?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Then you will take this Bolton boy, Ramsay, and make him yours.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I don't know how to do that.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Of course you do. He's already fallen for you.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: His father frightens me.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: petyr
text: petyr: He should, he's a dangerous man. But even the most dangerous men can be outmaneuvered. And you've learnt to maneuver from the very best. . I return before too long. . You'll be strong without me. . The North will be yours. Do you believe me?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I expect I'll be a married woman by the time you return.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Breakfast.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: That would have been a shit way to die.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: As far as I've seen, they're all shit ways to die.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Aye. But your lot like to give the singers a good ending.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I don't care what's sung about me when I'm dead.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: No? Two knights, off to rescue a princess. Sounds like a good song to me.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Sounds like all the rest.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What about you? What shit way would you choose?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: In my own keep, drinking my own wine, watching my sons grovel for my fortune.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: How disappointing. I thought you'd have something more exciting planned.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I've had an exciting life. I want my death to be boring. How do you want to go?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: In the arms of the woman I love.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: She want the same thing?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Let's go.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: The captain to that ship… What was he, Braavosi?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Pentoshi.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: And he's headed to Oldtown?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: As I said. Why?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: What's to stop him from docking down the coast and telling the locals that Jaime Lannister's in Dorne?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: A bag of gold.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'm not sure you understand how much people hate your family in this part of the world.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It was a heavy bag.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: And I bet he swore all kinds of oaths to get it. But you won't be around if he breaks them.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: How many you count?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Four.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: How many you think you can take?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: One, if he's slow.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: rider
text: rider: Halt!

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Fucked in the arse. . Hiya! . Morning, lads. Glad we found you.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: rider
text: rider: Who are you?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Cooper. . This is Darnell.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: rider
text: rider: You're from King's Landing.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Accent gave me away? Flea Bottom. Whelped and whipped.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: rider
text: rider: Why are you here?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Our ship capsized in the night. We managed to swim ashore. It was a near thing, really.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I thought the sharks would get us. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: rider
text: rider: There are no sharks in Dorne.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I could have sworn those were shark fins.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Dolphins maybe.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: rider
text: rider: Throw your swords in the sand.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Boys, there's no need for this. Just, point us in the right direction. We'll find our way home.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: rider
text: rider: Swords in the sand! Now!

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: That one should be slow enough.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Nice move! .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Luck.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You had a wonderful teacher.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Always wanted a Dornish stallion. Beasts can run a day and night without tiring. We'll ride to the Water Gardens with a nice breeze in our face.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: First we need to bury these bodies.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Birds have to eat too.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Corpses raise questions, questions raise armies. We're not here to start a war.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Do you know how long it will take us to dig all those holes?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I can't dig very well with one hand. Not at all, really.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyene
text: tyene: Nama!

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: elaria
text: elaria: Nym, Obara.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: obara
text: obara: Will it be war?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: elaria
text: elaria: Prince Doran will weep for your father, but nothing else. We must avenge Oberyn ourselves.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: obara
text: obara: Without Doran we have no army to march against the Lannisters.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: elaria
text: elaria: We don't need an army to start a war. . Queen Cersei loves her children, and we have one of them.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: We may have a problem.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: obara
text: obara: A ship's captain, who found me in Planky Town, claiming he had information to sell. He told me he smuggled Jaime Lannister into Dorne.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: elaria
text: elaria: He's come for Myrcella. If he gets to her before we do, we lose our only chance for revenge. You must choose. Doran's way and peace, or my way and war.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyene
text: tyene: I'm with you. Always. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: elaria
text: elaria: Nym? . Obara?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: obara
text: obara: When I was a child, , Oberyn came to take me to court. I'd never seen this man, and yet he called himself my father. My mother wept, said I was too young, and a girl.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: obara
text: obara: I made my choice long ago.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Thank you. . Who are you?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Your captor.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do you have wine?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I can't sleep without wine.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Then stay awake.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're going the wrong way. My sister's in Westeros. Westeros is west! We're heading east.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I'm not taking you to your sister.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You said you were taking me to the Queen.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I am. Queen Daenerys Targaryen. She's the Queen I serve.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What a waste of a good kidnapping. So happens I was heading there myself!

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: What business would you have with the Queen?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Gold and glory. Oh, and hate. If you've ever met my sister, you'd understand. So now that it's clear we're on the same side? . A high born knight from the North of Westeros, down on his luck in Essos. Dragon epaulettes? Bear sigil breast plate. You're Jorah Mormont. I have to ask how, exactly, were you serving your Queen in a whore house, half a world away? Is it possible, that you were running? Why would you be running? And why would she have sent you away? Oh, wait! You were spying on her, weren't you? It's all coming back to me! I was drunk through most of the Small Council meetings, but it's all coming back. You passed notes to Varys's little birds. She found out, didn't she? Found out, and exiled you. . And now you hope to win back her favor with a gift. A risky scheme. One might even say, desperate. Do you think Daenerys would execute me, and pardon you? I'd say the reverse is just as likely.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Everyone looks happy enough from up here. . What?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: barristan
text: barristan: I was thinking of all the times your brother made me go with him down from the Red Keep, into the streets of King's Landing.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Why?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: barristan
text: barristan: He liked to walk among the people, he liked to sing to them.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He sang to them?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Yes. Rhaegar would take a spot on the Hook or the Street of Seeds and then he'd sing. Just like all the other minstrels.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what did you do?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: barristan
text: barristan: I made sure no one killed him. And I collected the money. . Well he liked to see how much he could make.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He was good?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: barristan
text: barristan: He was very good. Viserys never told you?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He told me Rhaegar was good at killing people. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Rhaegar never liked killing. He loved singing.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what did you do with the money?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Well, one time, he gave it to the next minstrel down the street. One time, he gave it to an orphanage in Flea Bottom. One time... we got horribly drunk. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daario
text: daario: Your Grace. Hizdahr is here, waiting in your audience chamber.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How many others are there?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daario
text: daario: Fifty a hundred.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Will you be joining us, Ser Barristan?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daario
text: daario: I think I can protect you from Hizdahr Zo Loraq.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I think I can protect me from Hizdahr Zo Loraq. Go, Ser Barristan. Sing a song for me.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: barristan
text: barristan: Your Grace. .

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: All men must die. But not all can die in glory.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Glory?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Why else do men fight? Why did your ancestors cross the Narrow Sea and conquer the Seven Kingdoms? So their names would live on. Those who find victory in the fighting pits, will never become kings, but their names will live on. It's the best chance they'll ever have.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Is that what you used to tell men before you set them to butchering each other for sport?

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Your Grace, today is the traditional start of the fighting season.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I do not recognize this tradition.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Traditions are the only thing that will hold this city, your city, together. . Without them, former slaves and former masters have nothing in common. Nothing but centuries of mistrust and resentment. I can't promise this is the answer to all our problems, but it's a start.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: woman
text: woman: Sons of the Harpy.

title: Sons of the Harpy
Name: end
text: end: EPISODE

title: Kill the Boy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: I am so sorry, my queen. He was a good man.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Barristan the Bold" they called him. He crossed a continent to serve me. He was a loyal friend. And he died in an alley, butchered by cowards who hide behind masks.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daario
text: daario: We could pull back to the pyramid district, secure it, and use it as a base from which to operate. Then we clean the city out, neighborhood by neighborhood, street by street, until the rats have nowhere left to hide.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I prefer your earlier suggestion. Round up the leaders of each of Meereen's great families and bring them to me.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: But... I'm the leader of my family.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: No, Your Grace! I had nothing to do with this. Your Grace!

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Walk forward.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: You cannot do this.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Another step.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They will eat you, if I tell them to. They may eat you even if I don't. Children. Some say I should give up on them. . But a good mother never gives up on her children. She disciplines them if she must.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: But she does not give up on them.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Who is innocent? Maybe all of you are, , maybe none of you are. Maybe, , I should let the dragons decide.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: All men must die.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Don't want to overfeed them. Tomorrow perhaps.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: And though Daenerys maintains her grip on Slaver's Bay, forces rise against her from within and without. She refuses to leave until the freedom of the former slaves is secure." She sounds like quite a woman.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: aemon
text: aemon: And she's alone, under siege, no family to guide her or protect her. Her last relation thousands of miles away, useless, dying.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: Don't say that, Maester Aemon.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: aemon
text: aemon: A Targaryen, alone in the world, is a terrible thing.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Maester Aemon.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: aemon
text: aemon: Lord Commander.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Sam, I'd like to speak to the maester alone.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: How are you feeling?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: aemon
text: aemon: Oh, like a hundred-year-old man slowly freezing to death.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: I need your advice. There's something I want to do, something I have to do. But it'll divide the Night's Watch. Bitterly. Half the men will hate me the moment I give the order.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: aemon
text: aemon: Half the men hate you already, Lord Commander. Do it.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: But you don't know what it is.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: aemon
text: aemon: That doesn't matter. You do. You will find little joy in your command. But with luck, you will find the strength to do what needs to be done. Kill the boy, Jon Snow. Winter is almost upon us. Kill the boy, and let the man be born.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Where are the rest of the free folk now? . Where have they gone? . Who leads them?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: They followed Mance. They won't follow anyone else.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: What about you?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Hard to lead when you're in chains.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: What if I unchained you?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Why would you do that?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Because you are not my enemy. And I'm not yours.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You sure seemed like my enemy when you were killing my friends.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: For 8,000 years the Night's Watch have sworn an oath to be the shield that guards the realms of men. And for 8,000 years we've fallen short of that oath. You belong to the realms of men. All of you.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: And now everything is going to change?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: It is.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Why now?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Because now, , I am Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: What would you have me do, , Lord Commander?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: I'd have you go north of the Wall. Gather the remaining free folk wherever they are and bring them back here. I'll open the gates for them and let them through. I'll find them lands to settle south of the Wall.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: They won't kneel for you and neither will I.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: I don't want them to kneel for me. I want them to fight with me when the time comes.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: The day I ask my people to fight with the crows is the day my people cut my guts from my belly and make me eat them.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: And how many of your people can't fight? The women, the children, the old, the sick, what happens to them? You're condemning them to death. Worse than death because you're too proud to make peace. Or maybe you're not proud. Maybe you're just a coward.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Easy thing to say to a man in chains.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Your people need a leader. And they need to get south of the Wall before it's too late. We don't have much time and they have less. The walkers are coming and they'll hit your people first. I'm not asking you to make peace to save your skin. Make peace to save your people.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Most of them are at Hardhome. You know where that is?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Up on Storroldo s Point. I can give you 10 horses and nine other men. You can get there in a week.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: We'll need ships.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: I'll talk to King Stannis about lending you his fleet.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tormund
text: tormund: All right, then. You're coming with me. You're the Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. They need to hear it from you. They need to know the ships they are boarding won't be torched in the middle of the sea. You come with me, or I don't go.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: You'd bring wildlings here, through our gates?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Men, women, and children will die by the thousands if we do nothing.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: Let them die. We got our own to worry about. Less enemies for us.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Fewer.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: What?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Nothing.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: There is good farmland in the Gift. . Land that no one uses now. A dozen abandoned villages.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: And why do you think the farmers abandoned those villages? Because the wildlings raided them for years. Cut them down! Just like they did this boy's people.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: allister
text: allister: We've been fighting them all for thousands of years. They've slaughtered villages. They've slaughtered our brothers.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: And we've slaughtered theirs.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: edd
text: edd: I will follow you anywhere, you know that. But they killed Grenn. And they killed Pyp. . They killed 50 of our brothers. I can't forget that. I can't forgive it.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: You were at the Fist of the First Men. If we abandon them, you know what they become. We can learn to live with the wildlings or we can add them to the army of the dead. Whatever they are now, they're better than that.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: Thank you. . Olly. . If you have something you want to say to me, say it. It's all right.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: olly
text: olly: You don't mean it, do you? Telling the wildlings you want to make peace. You're just doing it to trick them.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: It's not a trick.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: olly
text: olly: They burned my village. They put an arrow through my father's head right in front of me. They butchered my mother, everyone I ever knew.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: I know what it's like to lose the people you love. I know this is hard for you. But winter is coming. We know what's coming with it. We can't face it alone.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: olly
text: olly: Will there be anything else you need, Lord Commander?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: No.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: podrick
text: podrick: She's far away from the Lannisters. This is her home. Maybe Lady Sansa is better off here.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Better off with the Boltons who murdered her mother and brother? Sansa's in danger even if she doesn't realize it.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Thank you. You've lived here a long time?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: Aye.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Did you know Lord Eddard?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: I knew him and his father before him. The Starks are gone now.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Not all of them. I know who's inside that castle.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: Everyone knows. The Boltons.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I'm not talking about the Boltons. I need to get a message to her. To Sansa Stark.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: Who are you?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Someone who swore to keep her safe.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: Swore to who?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Her mother.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: man
text: man: Her mother's dead.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: That doesn't release me from an oath. I served Lady Catelyn. I serve her still. Who do you serve?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Come back here. Myranda.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: I saw you staring at her.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I'm going to marry her. That will involve looking at her from time to time.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: You said you'd marry me.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: And I meant it. When I was a bastard named Snow. But I'm a Bolton now. What I want is no longer the primary consideration. I'm furthering a dynasty.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Do you think she's pretty?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Of course I do. I'm not blind.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You think she's pretty, too. I'm looking forward to our wedding night. But don't worry, I'll have plenty of time for you.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Perhaps I'll marry, too.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You're the kennel master's daughter. Who are you going to marry, the stable keeper's son? . You're mine. You're not going anywhere. Unless I have to listen to more of your jealousy. Jealousy bores me. You remember what happens to people who bore me. You're not going to bore me, are you, Myranda?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Never.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: woman
text: woman: Beg pardon, my lady. I've come to refill the wash basin.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Oh, I don't need-

title: Kill the Boy
Name: woman
text: woman: You still have friends in the North. If you're ever in trouble, light a candle in the highest window of the broken tower.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: But who -

title: Kill the Boy
Name: woman
text: woman: You're not alone.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: I like your dress. Who made it for you?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I made it myself.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Really?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Who, who are you?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: I'm Myranda, the kennel master's daughter. May I? . Oh, wonderful. The stitching. Who taught you?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: My mother. .

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: I'm sorry for what happened to her.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Thank you.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: It's good that she taught you. It was a gift. Now every time you wear something you made, you can remember her.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'd rather have a mother.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: I know. It's not the same. Still, it's good to remember. Remember the way things were. I almost forgot. There's something else to help you remember.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Down there at the end.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What is it?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: That would spoil the surprise. Go ahead, it's perfectly safe. You won't believe it when you see it.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Theon?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: theon
text: theon: You shouldn't be here.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You smell particularly ripe this evening. Pour me some wine.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Do you have something to tell me?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: theon
text: theon: No, my lord.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Reek.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: theon
text: theon: She saw me.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Who?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: theon
text: theon: Sansa. Lady Sansa. She came to the kennels.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: She saw you?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: theon
text: theon: Yes. I'm sorry, master. Forgive me. I didn't think -

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Come here.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You mustn't keep secrets from me, Reek. Get on your knees.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Give me your hand.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I forgive you.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: I trust you find your chamber suitable, my lady.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes, thank you, my lord.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Allow me.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Mother.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: walda
text: walda: Thank you, Ramsay.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: My lady, we are all a family, we northerners. Our blood ties go back thousands of years. So I'd like to drink to our wedding. May our happiness spread from Moat Cailin to the Last Hearth.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: To your wedding.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: walda
text: walda: To your wedding.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: walda
text: walda: It must be difficult for you being in a strange place.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: This isn't a strange place. This is my home. It's the people who are strange.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You're right. Very strange. More wine, please.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I heard you two had reunited. A fitting place for it. . I like to imagine that the last time you spoke was in this very room. Are you still angry with him after he - what he did? Don't worry. The North remembers. I punished him for it. He's not ironborn anymore. Not Theon Greyjoy anymore. He's a new man. A new person, anyway. Aren't you, Reek?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: theon
text: theon: Yes, master.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: That's his new name, Reek.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why are you doing this?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Because Reek has something to say to you. Don't you, Reek? . An apology. Apologize to Lady Sansa for what you did. Apologize for murdering her two brothers.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm sorry.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Look at her, Reek. An apology doesn't mean anything if you're not looking the person in the eye.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Sorry about what?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: theon
text: theon: For killing your brothers.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: There, over and done with. Doesn't everyone feel better? I do. That was getting very tense. Whew. . You know what, my lady? What with him having murdered your brothers and the rest of your family gone Reek here is the nearest thing to living kin that you have left. Reek. You will give away the bride. Someone has to. What better person? Good? Good?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: Yes, yes, very good.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Wonderful. .

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: Walda and I have some good news as well, since we're all together.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: walda
text: walda: We're going to have a baby.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm very happy for you.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: From the way she's carrying, Maester Wolkan says it looks like a boy.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: How can you be sure?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: Sure of what?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: That she's pregnant. I mean how can you tell?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: Maester Wolkan has assured us beyond all doubt.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: So how did you manage it?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: Manage what?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Getting her pregnant.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: I imagine you're familiar with the procedure.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Of course, but how did you find it?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: You disgraced yourself at dinner, parading that creature before the Stark girl.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: And if it's a boy?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: You're worried about your position.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: My position is quite clear. I'm your son until a better alternative comes along.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: You've never asked me about your mother.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Why would I? She had me, she died. And here we are.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: roose
text: roose: She was a peasant girl. Pretty in a common sort of way. She was the miller's wife. Apparently they had married without my knowledge or consent. So I had him hanged and I took her beneath the tree where he was swaying. She fought me the whole time. She was lucky I didn't hang her, too. A year later she came to my gates with a squalling baby in her arms. A baby she claimed was mine. I nearly had her whipped and the child thrown in the river. . But then I looked at you and I saw then what I see now. You are my son. . Stannis Baratheon has an army at Castle Black. But he won't stay for long. He wants the Iron Throne, and the road to King's Landing comes right through Winterfell. He means to take the North. But the North is ours. It's yours and mine. Will you help me defeat him?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Yes.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Is this every book there is?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: Every book there is?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: gilly
text: gilly: In the world.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: Well, no. There are thousands and thousands of books out there. This library is rather small, actually.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Where you grew up, were there more books?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: My father's not the most literate man. They say the Citadel has the largest library in the world.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Where's that?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: The Citadel? In Oldtown.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I'm sorry I don't know things.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: Gilly, look at me. You know how to do a hundred things I can never do. You can build a fire with wet wood. You can cook. You can stitch a wound.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I can wash the linens. I can sweep the floor.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: Well -

title: Kill the Boy
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Why does the Citadel have the biggest library?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: It's where they train the maesters.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Like Maester Aemon?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: I wanted to be one when I was young. Instead, I became a man of the Night's Watch. Far more adventure up here anyway. I wouldn't have met you.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: Ah, Your Grace.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You're Samwell Tarly?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: I am, Your Grace.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Your father is Randyll Tarly. He defeated my brother at the Battle of Ashford. Only battle Robert ever lost. I told him he shouldn't go so far west so soon, but he never listened. Fine soldier, your father. You don't look like a soldier. But I'm told you killed a white walker.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: I did, Your Grace.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: How?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: With a dagger made of dragonglass.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Dragonglass?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: What the maesters call obsidian -

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I know what it is. We have it in Dragonstone. Why would obsidian kill a walker?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: I don't know. I've been going through all the old manuscripts hoping to find something, and all I've learned is that the children of the forest used to hunt with dragonglass.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: The Lady Melisandre told me that death marches on the Wall.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: I've seen it, Your Grace.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Seen what?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: sam
text: sam: The army of the dead. And when they come -

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: We have to know how to fight them. . Keep reading, Samwell Tarly.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: It's time.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: Uh, Your Grace. Wouldn't it be better to wait? When Jon Snow returns with the wildlings, we could have thousands more men.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: If Jon Snow returns with the wildlings. We can't wait that long. We have the advantage, more men, more horses, all fed and rested. But every day we wait, the odds shift in Bolton's favor. This could turn to winter at any moment. We have to act now. Give the order. We march at sunrise.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: I'll choose a dozen men to stay and guard the queen and the princess.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: No need, they're coming with us.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: It's a tough road ahead, Your Grace. Won't they be safer -

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Here? Half these watchmen are killers and rapists. No, they march with us.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: As you wish, Your Grace.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Do you think Father will let me go down into the crypt?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: Beg your pardon?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: shireen
text: shireen: At Winterfell. All the Kings in the North are buried there. Bran the Builder and King Dorren and-

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: First things first. It's a long march ahead. And then we have to take the castle.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Is there going to be a battle?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: Aye, princess, but you won't be anywhere near -

title: Kill the Boy
Name: selyse
text: selyse: That's enough talk of battle, Ser Davos. You'll scare the child.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: Yes, my queen.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: shireen
text: shireen: I'm not scared.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: davos
text: davos: Well, I am. When the battle comes, promise you'll protect me.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: shireen
text: shireen: I promise.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I hope you know what you're doing with these wildlings. I need those ships.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jon
text: jon: You'll get them back, I swear it. Have a safe journey, Your Grace. And thank you.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: You're still too weak. .

title: Kill the Boy
Name: grey
text: grey: How long have I been here?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Three days.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: grey
text: grey: Ser Barristan?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: grey
text: grey: I failed him. I failed my men, I failed my queen.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: You failed no one. You fought bravely. You'll fight again. Are you ashamed? You were ambushed, outnumbered. There was no way you could have known.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: grey
text: grey: This is not why. Wounded in war, there is no shame for this. I am ashamed because when the knife go in and I fall to the ground, I am afraid.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: All men fear death.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: grey
text: grey: No, not death. I fear I never again see Missandei from the Island of Naath.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Now you have given the Masters what they deserve.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: If I give everyone what they deserve, I'll have no one left to rule. Ser Barristan counseled mercy when I took this city right up to the morning he died. Daario Naharis thinks I should kill the former Masters and let the rest of the city fend for itself. What do you think?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Your Grace, I think that I am not fit to have an opinion on these matters.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You are as fit as anyone I know. You know why I'm here. And you know who will suffer the most if this all falls apart. So what do you think?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I can only tell you what I have seen, Your Grace. . I have seen you listen to your counselors. I have seen you lean on their experience when your own was lacking and weigh the choices they put before you. And I have seen you ignore your counselors, because there was a better choice. One that only you could see.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: My, my queen, please do not do this.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What about "Valar Morghulis"?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: I did not want to die a coward. Apparently I do not want to die at all. .

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It takes courage to admit fear. And to admit a mistake. I came here to tell you that I was wrong. I was wrong and you were right. About tradition. About bringing the people of this city together. I will reopen the fighting pits. To free men only. Slavery will never return to Meereen, not while I live.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Yes, my queen.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And in order to forge a lasting bond with the Meereenese people, I will marry the leader of an ancient family. . Thankfully a suitor is already on his knees.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Don't worry. I'll be fine. Nothing broken, I don't think. Where are we now? Not the Rhoyne. . Long, sullen silences and an occasional punch in the face. The Mormont way. Let's start over. I apologize for before. My mouth sometimes runs away from me. This doesn't have to be an unpleasant trip. We're going to be spending a lot of time together on the way to Meereen.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We are.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What would make our time together truly enjoyable would be some wine.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No wine.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I am a person who drinks. People who drink need to keep drinking. Otherwise, they're not…

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I know where we are. You're taking us through Valyria.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I am.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Have you sailed this route before?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're going to bring Daenerys a souvenir from her ancestral homeland in case I'm not enough?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I think you'll be plenty.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You know what they say. The Doom still rules Valyria. What about the demons and the flames? Aren't you afraid of the Doom?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No. But the pirates are.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Smoking Sea. How many centuries before we learn how to build cities like this again? Thousands of years the Valyrians were the best in the world at almost everything. And then -

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: And then they weren't.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And then they weren't. "They held each other close and turned their backs upon the end. The hills that split asunder and the black that ate the skies; The flames that shot so high and hot that even dragons burned; Would never be the final sights that fell upon their eyes. A fly upon a wall, the waves the sea wind whipped and churned -"

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The city of a thousand years, and all that men had learned; The Doom consumed it all alike, and neither of them turned.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I would clap.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I suppose this is it, then. This is what remains.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What was that?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Stone Men! Don't let them touch you!

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Get behind!

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Mormont, cut me free! . Mormont!

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Mormont! Mormont!

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Tyrion? Tyrion. Tyrion. Tyrion. You're all right.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You're heavier than you look. Did any of them touch you?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You? . I've seen greyscale before, but nothing like that.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I suppose that's why they send them there.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It'd be kinder to put daggers in their hearts and be done with it. . Thank you for saving me. Of course, I wouldn't have needed saving if you hadn't kidnapped me in the first place. . So what now?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We walk, up the coast. With luck, we'll find a fishing village. Maybe another boat.

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Without luck?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We've got a long walk ahead of us. I'll get some wood for a fire. Try to get some rest, huh?

title: Kill the Boy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That's the best idea you've had all day.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: What are they doing with the bodies?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: Get back to work.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: No! I've been here for weeks. I'm not scrubbing one more corpse until you tell me why I'm doing it.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: You will know why.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: When?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: When it's time. Not before. Get back to work.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: When do I get to play the game?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: Game?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: The game. The game of faces.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: You tried already. You failed.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: I didn't even know I was playing.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: Who are you?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: No one.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: Well who are you? What are you doing here? How'd you get here?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: I'm from Westeros. Just like you. Daughter of a Lord. Just like you. Except I was an only child. Heir to his fortune. My mother died. My father remarried and his new wife gave birth to a girl. My stepmother didn't want any rivals for her precious daughter so she tried to kill me with poison. I found out, sought help from the Faceless Men and my father was widowed again. I've been serving them ever since.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: Was that true or a lie?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: What?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: waif
text: waif: Did you believe every word I said?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Who are you?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: Arya.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: And where did you come from?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: Westeros. My family home is Winterfell. I'm the youngest daughter of a great lord. Eddard Stark. He died in battle.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: A lie.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: After he was executed I fled the capital. Had to kill a stable boy. Drove my sword through his back.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: I stabbed him in the gut. I tried to find my mother and brother. I never did. They were murdered by Walder Frey. An outlaw kidnapped me. A man called Polliver.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: A man called the Hound. Sandor Clegane. He tried to sell me but was wounded in a fight. He begged me to kill him but I wouldn't. I left him in the mountains to die. I wanted him to suffer, I hated him.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: I hated him.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: I hated him!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: That's not a lie!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: The girl lies. To me. To the Many Faced God. To herself. Does she truly want to be no one?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: Yes.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm not playing this stupid game anymore!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: We never stop playing.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So, those villages we were supposed to find. We can't live on berries and roots.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I can.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're not hungry?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Of course I'm hungry.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're an awful travelling companion, do you know that? Possibly the least charming man I have ever met.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I am not your travelling companion.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We are travelling together. In each other's company. Therefore…

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Do you ever shut up?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I sailed from King's Landing to Pentos in a crate. Without ever saying a word.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Why?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Never occurred to you to ask why until now? You never wondered why Tyrion Lannister decided to visit a brothel in Volantis.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I'm sure you've visited many brothels in many cities.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I killed my father. He wanted to execute me for a crime I didn't commit. And he was fucking the woman I loved.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: As miserable as you are, Mormont, at least your father was a good man.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: What do you know about my father?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I met him. I visited the Wall. When I asked him about his men he knew all the stories, every one of them. He actually cared about the people in his command. How did they put it in the Watch? “We shall never see his like again.”

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You didn't know. I'm sorry. I am.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: How?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I only know what I heard

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: He was leading an expedition beyond the wall. There was a mutiny. He was murdered by his own men.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We better keep moving.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: man
text: man: Valar morghulis.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: Valar dohaeris.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: man
text: man: I have nowhere else to go. I've taken her to every healer in Braavos. I've spent every penny I had. She suffers every day of her life. I just want it to end.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: girl
text: girl: It hurts.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: I know. Don't be afraid. I used to be like you. I was sick. I was dying. But my father never gave up on me. He loved me. More than anything in the world, just like your father loves you. So he brought me here. My father prayed to the many faced god. And I drank the water from this fountain. It healed me.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: arya
text: arya: I've devoted my life to him now. You don't want to hurt anymore. Drink.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Is the girl ready to give up her ears, her nose, her tongue, her hopes and dreams, her loves and hates, all that makes a girl who she is, forever?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: No. The girl is not ready to become no one. But she is ready to become someone else.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why Daenerys? Why is she worth all this? As I recall, the Mormonts fought against the Targaryens during Robert's Rebellion.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Do you believe in anything?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I believe in many things.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: In something greater than ourselves, I mean. The Gods. Destiny. Do you believe there's a plan for this world?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Neither did I. I was a cynic, just like you. Then I saw a girl step into a great fire with three stone eggs. When the fire burned out I thought I'd find her blackened bones. Instead I found her. Daenerys. Alive and unhurt. Holding her baby dragons. Have you ever heard baby dragons singing?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It's hard to be a cynic after that.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Doesn't mean she's going to be a great queen.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: No it doesn't.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Targaryens are famously insane. What if she conquers the world? Then what? 1,000 years of peace and prosperity?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: First we have to conquer the world.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We? Alright, let's assume your dreams come true. She's ecstatic when you bring her this enemy dwarf. She hacks off my head and restores your position. You command her army, sail to Westeros, defeat all your enemies, then watch as she climbs those steps and sits on the Iron Throne. Hurrah, long live the Queen. Then what?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Then she rules.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So a woman who has not spent a single day of her adult life in Westeros becomes the ruler of Westeros? That's justice?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: She is the rightful heir.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why, because her father who burned living men for amusement was the king?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Shh! It's a slave ship

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why is it anchored?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: They probably came ashore for--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: water.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sam
text: sam: PLACE - LATER

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: Got a lot of fight in you, huh?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: slaver
text: slaver: Salt mines.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: That or a galley slave. He looks strong enough.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: slaver
text: slaver: What about the dwarf?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: Worthless. Cut his throat.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Wait, wait! Wait, wait, wait, let's discuss this!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: And then chop off his cock. We can sell it for a fortune. A dwarf's cock has magic powers.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Wait, wait, wait, wait! You can't just hand a dried cock to a merchant and expect him to pay for it. He has to know it came from a dwarf. And how could he know unless he sees the dwarf?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: slaver
text: slaver: It will be a dwarf-sized cock.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Guess again.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: The dwarf lives until we find a cock merchant.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Queen Daenerys has outlawed slavery.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: We're bound to Volantis, not Slaver's Bay. Besides, she reopened the fighting pits. I never heard of free men fighting in the pits.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The fighting puts in Mereen! You're in luck then, you're about to be rich. You are looking at one of the great warriors in the seven kingdoms.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Him.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: Him? He's got to be 60 years old.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Sure, he's a bit long in the tooth, a bit withered, been in the sun too long. We can all see that. But he is a veteran of 100 battles. They wrote songs about him!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: Is that true?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: He won the tournament at Lannisport, unseating Ser Jaime Lannister himself.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Kingslayer!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: Jousting. You're talking about jousting. A fancy game for fancy lads. The men who fight at Mereen will swallow him whole.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I killed a Dothraki blood rider in single combat.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: malko
text: malko: Liar.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It's no lie. His name was Qotho. He was bloodrider to Khal Drogo. Take me to Slaver's Bay, put a sword in my hand, I'll prove my worth.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Lord Baelish.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Yes? Lancel Lannister.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Brother Lancel. We abandoned our family names.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: That's quite a family to abandon.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: lancel
text: lancel: The city has changed since you were here last. We flooded the gutters with wine, smashed the false idols, and sent the godless on the run.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Well done.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'm here on urgent business for the Queen Mother. Should I send word that I'll be delayed?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Step carefully, Lord Baelish. You'll find that there's little tolerance for flesh peddlers in the new King's Landing.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: We both peddle fantasies, Brother Lancel. Mine just happen to be entertaining.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Do you think it's wise, your Grace, arresting the heir to Highgarden?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Faith arrested the heir to Highgarden.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Of course. And the Faith were armed on your orders.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The King's orders. Is the King to blame for Ser Loras' perversion?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: House Tyrell won't tolerate these insults.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: House Tyrell won't tolerate it? I'm the insulted party, Lord Baelish. Ser Loras was promised to me, instead he chose the company of boys.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: One's choice of companion is a curious thing.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Most curious. Lysa Arryn for instance. A sorrily repellent woman. Forgive me. I know you're still in mourning.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Lysa was a good woman. A kind woman.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: She was neither of those things, we both know it. Still, I pity her son. How fortunate that the young Lord of the Vale has a new father to counsel him.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I know how hard it can be to lose both of your parents at such a young age.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If war comes to Westeros will the Knights of the Veil fight for their king?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Young Lord Robyn heeds my advice. And I have always counseled loyalty to the throne.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Good. If there's nothing else.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: There is another matter, your Grace. Something so urgent I couldn't trust the words to a raven. You once charged me with finding Arya Stark. To my shame I failed you. But I have found Sansa Stark. Alive, and well, and home again. In Winterfell.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's not possible.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: My sources are well placed. They tell me Roose Bolton plans to marry her to his son, Ramsay, a bastard recently legitimized by King Tommen.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Roose Bolton is Warden of the North by the grace of my father.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Indeed. As reward for stabbing his own king in the heart.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We were fools to trust a turncloak.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Marrying his son to the last of the Starks gives him more legitimacy in the North than an alliance with a hated southern house.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I will skin him and his bastard like that wretch on that bloody sigil.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I would counsel patience, your grace.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Patience? Sansa helped murder my son, Roose Bolton is a traitor.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Stannis Baratheon is also a traitor, marching with his army on Winterfell. Let Stannis and Roose battle, let the enemies of the throne slaughter each other and when they're done seize Winterfell from whichever thief survives.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Winterfell is 1,000 miles away from here. The weather has already begun to turn.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: That is why it is critical to strike soon, while the victor still licks his wounds. Surely your Uncle Kevan could muster a force.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My Uncle Kevan has all the courage of a kitchen mouse.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Ser Jaime, then.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Jaime is away on a sensitive diplomatic mission. I've no idea when he'll be back.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Perhaps I can help. The Knights of the Vale are some of the best fighters in Westeros, trained to battle in the ice and the snow.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Forgive me Lord Baelish, you have a reputation as a money lender and brothel keeper, not a military man.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You wouldn't risk a single Lannister soldier or a single coin from the Royal Treasury. What do you have to lose, a brothel keeper?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And if you succeed?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Name me Warden of the North.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I'll speak to the king this evening. Have him issue a royal decree.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'll not rest until the lion flies over Winterfell.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And I'll l know you're a man of your word when I see Sansa Stark's head on a spike.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: petyr
text: petyr: As I said. I live to serve.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane: I'm going to ask him tomorrow.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: What if he says no?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane: He won't. You've waited long enough. I want you to be my wife now. What is it?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: Do you want to marry me because our families arranged it, or do you…

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: We can't. Not yet.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane: Why not?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: You know why not. Someone will see.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane: You are going to be my wife. I am going to be your husband. We are allowed to walk through the gardens together.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: How many other girls have you walked through these gardens?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane: I like the way your eyes go squinty when you're jealous.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: They don't go squinty, and you didnt answer the question.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: doran
text: doran: They make a lovely couple. A Lannister and a Martell. They have no idea how dangerous that is. We must protect them.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo: Yes, my prince.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: doran
text: doran: You have not had to use that axe of yours in a very long time. I hope you remember how.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo: I remember how.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: The Dornishman's wife was as fair as the sun and her kisses were warmer than spring. The Dornishman's blade it was made of black steel and its kiss was a terrible thing. The Dornishman's wife would sing as she bathed in a voice that was sweet as a peach...

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Alright, thats enough.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'm coming to the best part.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We're trying to blend in. We don't want everyone in Dorne to hear your accent.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: This song really is all about the ending.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It can wait. Up there.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: That's the Water Gardens.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Once we got the princess, then what?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I like to improvise.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: That explains the golden hand.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Unbowed, unbent, unbroken. For Oberyn.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sand
text: sand: For Oberyn.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Well, she's made herself at home.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Myrcella.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: Uncle Jaime? I don't understand, what are you doing here?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Let's speak in private.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane: I am Trystane Martell.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: Trystane is my intended.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Excellent. Good to meet you.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: trystane
text: trystane: We weren't expecting you, Ser Jaime.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Why don't you let them have some time alone, son?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Let's not do something stupid.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: No!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: That was something stupid.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We have to go, Myrcella, now.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: You hurt him!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You'll be fine, I promise, but we have to--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Oh for fuck's sake.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: obara
text: obara: You're coming with me.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: I don't want to!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: obara
text: obara: I wasn't asking, princess.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo: Drop you weapons!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: obara
text: obara: I am Obara Sand. Daughter of Oberyn Martell. I fight for Dorne. Who do you fight for?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo: Drop your weapons!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: areo
text: areo: When you were whole, it would have been a good fight.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You fight pretty good for a little girl.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: rider
text: rider: Halt!

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Oh! You can smell the shit from 5 miles away. Well, why are we stopped, go on.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Rumors and gossip, that's all they got. It's theater, nothing more. If they arrested all the pillow biters in King's Landing there'd be no room left in the dungeons for anyone else.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Everyone knew about him and Renly.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Renly Baratheon shagged half the stable boys in the Seven Kingdoms. Everyone knew. No one cared.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery: But he was the king's brother.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And Loras is the queen's brother. No, no, no, no, this is unacceptable.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Cersei is behind this.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Of course she is. She wants to drag our names through the dirt. Put us in our place. Get some rest, dear, you look appalling. Let me deal with Cersei Lannister.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Your Grace, I have travelled a long way.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You must be exhausted.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Put the pen down, dear, we all know you aren't writing anything.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Ah, yes, the famously tart-tongued queen of thorns.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And the famous tart Queen Cersei.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Beg your pardon.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: I know you're behind this absurd incarceration of my grandson.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If you apologize for that comment perhaps--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: You'll get your apology when I get Loras.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I was as shocked as anyone when The Faith arrested Ser Loras. I have no love for these fanatics. But what can the queen mother do?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Has the crown suddenly stopped needing the troops, gold, and wheat my house supplies?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I assure you our alliance with House Tyrell remains--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Do you expect the alliance to continue after you've thrown our future into prison?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: As I said, i didn't imprison anyone. As for your veiled threats--

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: What veil?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Lannister-Tyrell alliance brought peace to a war-torn country. Do you really want to see the Seven Kingdoms slide back into warfare?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: I didn't trust your father. I didn't particularly like him. But I respected him. He was no fool. He understood that sometimes we must work with our rivals rather than destroy them.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: cersei
text: cersei: House Lannister has no rival. The High Septon has called for an inquest, not a trial. Just a small hearing to determine whether the charges against Loras have merit, which I'm sure they don't. Loras will be freed, our happy alliance will continue, and we'll forget this unfortunate conversation ever happened. Good day, Lady Olenna.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You are aware of the rumors concerning you and Renly?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras: I don't pay attention to rumors.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You were said to be despondent when he died. Witnesses said that you refused to leave his bedside, even as Stannis' army closed in

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras: He was my friend. He was my king.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Wasn't Joffrey your king? He was anointed by the 7, not Renly.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras: I was wrong to support Renly's claim. I know that. But I was forgiven by Joffrey. I fought for him at the Battle of the Blackwater.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Wearing Renly's armor.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras: Why does it matter what I wore?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Do you deny all of the charges against you? Fornication, buggery, blasphemy.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras: Of course I deny them.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You never lay with Renly Baratheon.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: loras
text: loras: Never.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Nor any other man.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: That will be all Ser Loras.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Well I think that's quite enough of that.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Faith calls Queen Margaery forward.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery: You call me forward?

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Yes. We have some questions for you.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I am the queen.

title: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken
Name: sparrow
