text: shireen: But why am I getting a present?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: davos
text: davos: Because you deserve it. My son was always on me trying to teach me to read. Gods, I was stubborn about it. Made it this far without reading, seemed to me I could make it to the grave. I wish I had listened to them. This is my own poor way of saying thank you for teaching me to be a grown up. I'll be gone for a few days, Princess. I'll want to hear all about the dance of dragons when I'm back.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: You'll just have to read it yourself.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Prince Doran.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: Forgive us, we started without you. Please, sit.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Princess Myrcella.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: Uncle.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What a lovely dress.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: You don't like it?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You must be cold.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: Not at all. The Dornish climate agrees with me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Prince Trystane. How's your jaw?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: trystane
text: trystane: A fleabite.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: What are you doing in Dorne?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Looking out for the safety of my niece, the princess Myrcella.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: And rather than send a raven or speak to me directly you decided to enter my country in secret and abduct our guest by force.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We received a threatening message. The princess's necklace in the jaws of a viper.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: That necklace was stolen from my room.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Ah. Excellent. The last meal before the beheading.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: We can't behead you. Many in Dorne want war. But I've seen war. I've seen the bodies piled on the battlefields. I've seen the orphans starving in the cities. I don't want to lead my people into that hell.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: No, you want to break bread with the Lannisters.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: And that is precisely what we are doing. Let us drink to Tommen, the first of his name, the King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: King Tommen insists on his sister's return to the capital?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm afraid he does.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: I cannot disobey my King's command. She will return with you to King's Landing. And my son, Prince Trystane, will accompany you both. If the alliance between Dorne and the Iron Throne is to continue, their engagement must stand.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I accept.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: One more thing. My brother was named to the small council before his death. Your father understood the importance of keeping Dorne in the loop. With Oberyn gone, Trystane will take his place on the small council.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You have my word.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: The word of a Kingslayer.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: No wonder you can't stand. You have no spine.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: You are mother to four of my nieces, girls I love very much. For their sake, I hope you live a long life. Talk to me that way again and you won't.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: May I inquire into the fate of my man?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: Tell me, Ser Jaime, in King's Landing, how do they punish a commoner who strikes a prince?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He said it was just a fleabite. The fault is mine. Bronn is merely a soldier following my orders. If anyone should be punished it's me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: Prince Trystane must learn judgement if he's to rule one day. I'll let him decide.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: trystane
text: trystane: I have learned the value of mercy from my father. I will set your man free.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You're a good man.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: trystane
text: trystane: On one condition.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: Why do we play? I'm better than you, I'll always be better than you. Have I ever missed once? I don't think, I can't recall. You must love humiliation or pain. Which do you love most? Humiliation or-- -- pain? That one hurt didn't it? You going to cry? Give up, little sister.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyene
text: tyene: You're going to miss.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: I never miss.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyene
text: tyene: You will. You're thinking too much. Now you're nervous. “What if she's right?”

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: Luck.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyene
text: tyene: Now it's my turn.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: You're too slow. You've always been too slow.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Am I going to be happy at the end of this walk?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: areo
text: areo: You'll find out very soon.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyene
text: tyene: Say it one more time, handsome. Who am I?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: bronn
text: bronn: The most beautiful woman in the world.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyene
text: tyene: And that's the truth!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: Slut.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Prince Doran, Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Only the one.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I believe you've already met Prince Trystane.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Prince. Sorry about the other day.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Prince Trystane here is a man of mercy. He's agreed to grant you your freedom.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'm glad to hear it. The pie looks good.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: There was one condition.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: Perhaps some soup instead?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: arya
text: arya: Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cock--

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man: How much for your little clam?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: arya
text: arya: Oysters, clams, and cockels! Oysters, clams, and cockels!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: thin
text: thin: Come on.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: thin
text: thin: Some oysters, girl! I'm talking to you! Girl?! Are you deaf? Girl?!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker: Lord Tyrell! On behalf of the Iron Bank, may I be the first to welcome you to the free city of Braavos. I hope your journey was trouble free.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace: Bit of chop the last few days but nothing too awful. Good to see the old chap is still guarding the Harbor.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker: And how goes the harvest in the Reach?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace: Vintnors say this might be the best year for red grapes in half a century. If we come to a satisfactory arrangement, I'll be sure to send the Arbor's finest your way.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker: I'm afraid I don't partake.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace: Some consider usury distasteful, dishonorable. Pure nonsense, of course.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker: I'm glad we see eye-to-eye on this matter.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace: Did you know that at one point Maegor the third tried to outlaw it in the Seven Kingdoms? Wanted to arrest anyone caught charging interest and cut off both their hands.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker: Most unfortunate for the glovers.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace: If a man charges low interest on a loan then he has nothing to gain and everything to lose, so why charge him? Whereas a reward makes a man willing to gamble.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker: We are not gamblers here at the Iron Bank, Lord Tyrell.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace: You are the worldo s best gamblers. And all those bets you won built this.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker: I'm afraid I still have a good deal of work to do.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace: Oh, nonsense. Work's over. Do you sing?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: banker
text: banker: I don't have that gift.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: mace
text: mace: It's not a gift, it's a skill, anyone can learn it. “So give me a kiss by the Long Canall and give me two kisses in Salty Town, for we are going to die, tomorrow. The bareheaded beggar, the king with his crown…”

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: I thought that old shit would never stop singing.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man: It wasn't bad, though.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: The Tyrells can all rot in hell, treasonous cunts. They were going to make that boy-fucker Renly king.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: This is the place, lads. The sleekest little minks in Braavos.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man: You're buying?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Oh, I'm buying. But I never was good at sharing.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: brothel
text: brothel: Sell your fish somewhere else.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute: Oh let her in, Brusco, I'm hungry. Come here, sweetness.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: prostitute
text: prostitute: They say oyster's get the juices flowing. We'll take half a dozen.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: arya
text: arya: Three coppers.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jon
text: jon: Here's a silver because the lady likes you.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Too old.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head: Brea.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head: I have just the one. Anara our most expensive girl, but well worth it, I assure you.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Do you have what I want or not?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head: Of course. Of course.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man: Fresh? Come on, the lads are hungry.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man: Nothing better for you cock stand than fresh oysters.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man: I'll have one.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head: Who let this girl in? Shoo shoo!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: Good.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: I'll tell you when we're done.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: meryn
text: meryn: You'll have a fresh one for me tomorrow.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head: Of course.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: head
text: head: I'll have you whipped, girl! Go on!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: man
text: man: Valaar morghulis.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: And?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: arya
text: arya: The Thin Man wasn't hungry today.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Perhaps that's why the man is thin.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: arya
text: arya: Tomorrow.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Tomorrow.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: A girl has work to do.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: Your rebellion is over. You can swear your allegiance to me now, or you can die.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: doran
text: doran: I believe in second chances. I don't believe in third chances.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: You write like a 7 year old.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Your maester kindly agreed to copy it over for me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: He didn't try to make you pay?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Then maybe he's changed. The Queen will be thrilled to know you'll be bringing her daughter home

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: She will.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: You love her very much, don't you?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Of course, she's my niece.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: I wasn't talking about her.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: You think I disapprove. Why? Because people disapprove of that sort of thing where you are from? They disapproved of Oberyn and me where you are from. Here, no one blinked an eye. 100 years ago, no one would have blinked an eye at you if you had been named Targaryen. It's always changing, who we're supposed to love and who we're not.The only thing that stays the same is that we want who we want.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: I know your daughter had no part in the terrible thing that happened to the man I loved. Perhaps even you were innocent of that.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Father. Aren't you cold?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: No. What are you reading?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: The Dance of Dragons.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: What's it about?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: It's the story of the fight between Rhaenyra Targaryen and her half-brother Aegon for control of the Seven Kingdoms. Both of them thought they belonged on the Iron Throne. When people started for declaring for one of them or the other, their fight divided the kingdom in two. Brothers fought brothers. Dragons fought dragons. By the time it was over, thousands were dead. And it was a disaster for the Targaryens as well. They never truly recovered.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: The dance of dragons”? Why is that a dance?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: That's just what they call it.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Doesn't make much sense.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: I think it's poetic.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: If you had to choose between Rhaenyra and Aegon, who would you have chosen?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: I wouldn't have chosen either. It's all the choosing sides that made things so horrible.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Sometimes a person has to choose. Sometimes the world forces his hand. If a man knows what he is and remains true to himself, the choice is not choice at all. He must fulfill his destiny and become who he is meant to be. However much he may hate it.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: It's alright, father.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: You don't even know what I'm talking about.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: It doesn't matter. I want to help you. Is there any way I can help?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Yes there is.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Good, I want to. I'm the Princess Shireen of House Baratheon and I'm your daughter.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Forgive me.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Where's my father? I want to see my father.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: It will all be over soon, Princess.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Where's my father? No you can't do this, father where are you?!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Let me see my father! Where are you, please?!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: selyse
text: selyse: It's what the Lord wants. It's a good thing. A great thing.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The year is now, my Lord. For you we offer up this girl, that you may cleanse her with your fire and that its light may lead our way.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: selyse
text: selyse: If we don't act then we'll all starve here all of us, but if we make this sacrifice…

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Accept this token of our faith, my lord and lead us from the darkness. Lord of Light show us the way!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Mother, please mother! Mother, please mother!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: selyse
text: selyse: I can't.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: stannis
text: stannis: There's no other way. She has King's blood.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Lord of Light protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: shireen
text: shireen: Mother, don't do this please! Please help! Don't do this! Please, father! Mother, help!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: selyse
text: selyse: No...

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Where have you been?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Just making sure everything's in order.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: announcer
text: announcer: Free citizens of Meereen! By the blessings of the Graces and her majesty the Queen, welcome to the Great Games!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: announcer
text: announcer: My queen, our first contest. Who will triumph

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: quick
text: quick: I fight and die for your glory, oh glorious queen.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: strong
text: strong: I fight and die for your glory, oh glorious queen.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: They're waiting for you. Clap your hands.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario: That one, the smaller man, no question, that's where you should put your money.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The smaller man it is.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'm not putting my money anywhere.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Kings and queens never bet on the games. Perhaps you should go find someone who does.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario: People used to bet against me when I fought in the pits. He would have bet against me. Common novice mistake.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: I have spent much of my life in Meereen, and in my experience, larger men do triumph over smaller man, far more often than not.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Has your experience ever involved any actual fighting? You, yourself, have you ever tried to kill a man that was trying to kill you?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario: Whenever I got into the pit against a beast like that one, the crowd saw me, all skin and bone back then, then they saw a pile of angry muscles ready to murder me. They couldn't get their money out fast enough. But the pile of angry muscles never had any muscles here or here . And the big men were always too slow to stop my dagger from going where their muscles weren't. Yes, whenever I saw a beast like that one, standing across from me making his beast faces, I knew I could rest easy.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: You don't approve?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There's always been more than enough death in the world for my taste. I can do without it in my leisure time.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Fair enough, yet -- it's an unpleasant question -- but what great thing has ever been accomplished without killing or cruelty?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's easy to confuse what is with what ought to be. Especially when what is has worked in your favor.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: I'm not talking about myself. I'm talking about the necessary conditions of greatness.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: That is greatness?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: That is a vital part of the great city of Meereen. Which has existed long before you arrived and will remain standing long after we have returned to the dirt.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My father would have liked you.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: announcer
text: announcer: We ask again

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: One day your great city will return to the dirt as well.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: At your command?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: If need be.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: announcer
text: announcer: A Meereenese champion?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: How many people will die to make this happen?

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: If it comes to that they would have died for a good reason.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Those men think they're dying for a good reason.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Someone else's reason.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: So your reasons are true, and theirs are false. They don't know their own minds, but you do.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well said, you're an eloquent man. Doesn't mean you're wrong. In my experience, eloquent men are right every bit as often as imbeciles.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: announcer
text: announcer: or a Westerosi Knight?!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I fight and die for your glory, oh glorious Queen.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Your Grace--

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario: Shut your mouth.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You can end this.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: She cannot.

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You can!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario: Protect your queen!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: hizdahr
text: hizdahr: Your Grace, Your Grace, come with me! I know a way out! I know a way--

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Stay close!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: jorah
text: jorah: This way!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daario
text: daario: The other side, follow me!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Drogon!

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Valahd..

title: The Dance of Dragons
Name: end
text: end: EPISODE

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The Lord of Light has made good on his promise, my king. His fires have melted the snows away. The way ahead is clear.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: We ride for Winterfell.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: And you will take it. The Lord has shown me Bolton banners burning. You will receive what is yours by right.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Your Grace.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Prepare to form up.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Tell me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier: The men. Many deserted before dawn.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: How many?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Nearly half. All the sell-swords, with all the horses.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Your Grace?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Speak up. It can't be worse than mutiny.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Cut her down.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Your Grace. The Lady Melisandre was just seen riding out of camp.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Get the men into marching formation. On to Winterfell.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: He raised his hands. And they all stood up at once. Tens of thousands of them, the biggest army in the world.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: So what are you gonna do?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm gonna hope they don't learn how to climb the wall.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: But… the Dragonglass?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: No one's ever getting that back, now. It wouldn't have mattered anyway, unless we had a mountain of it.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: But… you killed a White Walker.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: With Longclaw. I saw them shatter steel axes like they were glass. But Longclaw…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: He's made of Valyrian steel. How many Valyrian steel swords are left in the Seven Kingdoms?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: Not enough. The first Lord Commander in history to sacrifice the lives of sworn Brothers to save the lives of Wildlings. How's it feel to be friends with the most hated man in Castle Black?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: You were friends with me when I first got here. And I wasn't winning any elections back then.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: Here's to us then. Long may they sneer.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: What?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: I wanted to ask you something. To ask something of you. Send me, Gilly, and the baby to Oldtown so I can become a Maester. That's what I'm meant to be, not this.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: I need you here, Sam. If you leave, who's left to give me advice I trust?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: Well, there's Edd.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: I'll be more use to you as a Maester. More use to everyone now that Maester Aemon's gone. The Citadel has the worldo s greatest library. I'll learn about history, strategy, healing. And other things. Things that will help when they come.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: If Gilly stays here then she'll die. And the baby that she named after me will die. And I'll end up dying, too, trying to protect them. Which means that the last thing that I'll see in this world will be the look in her eyes when I fail them. I'd rather see a thousand White Walkers than see that.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: Thank you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: You know that The Citadel will make you swear off women, too.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: They'll bloody try.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: Sam?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: What?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: Sam…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: You've just been beaten half to death. How did you--

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: Very carefully.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm glad the end of the worldo s working out for someone.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: I'll come back.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: To your return.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sam
text: sam: To my return.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: podrick
text: podrick: My lady! Stannis. Stannis Baratheon is coming. His whole army.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: How do you know it's Stannis?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: podrick
text: podrick: He's carrying his flaming heart banners. From the Blackwater. I'll never forget it.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Trench here. Another one 300 yards from the castle wall. Hurry them along. And send out a foraging party immediately. The siege begins at sunrise.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: soldier
text: soldier: There's not going to be a siege, Your Grace.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Bolton has women fighting for him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I do not fight for the Boltons. I'm Brienne of Tarth. I was Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon. I was there when he was murdered by a shadow with your face. You murdered him? With blood magic?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: I did.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: brienne
text: brienne: In the name of Renly of House Baratheon, First of his Name, Rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, and Protector of the Realm, I, Brienne of Tarth, sentence you to die. Do you have any last words?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: stannis
text: stannis: Go on, do your duty.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Looks like we're done here.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: survivor
text: survivor: I surrender. I surrender!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: And I accept your surrender.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Let's head back. My wife must be lonely.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: My lady. I have come to escort you back to your chamber.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: theon
text: theon: Go with her. Please.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I know what Ramsay is. I know what he'll do to me. If I'm going to die, let it happen while there's some of me left.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Die? Who said anything about dying? You can't die yet. Your father was Warden of the North, and Ramsay needs you. Though I suppose he doesn't need all of you. Just the parts he'll use to make his heir. Until you've given him a boy or two and he's finished using them. He's got incredible plans for those parts. So. Shall we wait for him to come back, or shall we begin now?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: You're leaving it to me? Good. Let's begin.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myranda
text: myranda: Stop! Stop!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: man
text: man: Open the gates!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: theon
text: theon: He's coming back.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: meryn
text: meryn: I can see I have my work cut out for me.You two. Out.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: You were the first person on my list, you know. For killing Syrio Forel, remember him? Probably not. I've gotten a few of the others. The Many Faced God stole a few more for me. I'm glad he left me you. Do you know who I am?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: I can't hear you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: You know who I am. I'm Arya Stark.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: Do you know who you are?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: You're no one. You're nothing.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: A girl has taken a life. The wrong life.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: waif
text: waif: I was right about her.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: You were.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: waif
text: waif: You're not ready. Not at all.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: That man's life wasn't yours to take. A girl stole from the Many Faced God. Now a debt is owed.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Only death can pay for life.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: No! No! No, you don't die! Don't die!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: waif
text: waif: Why are you crying?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: He was my friend.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: waif
text: waif: No he wasn't. Didn't you listen to him?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: He was no one.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: But if you're… Who's this?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: No one at all. Just as a girl should have been before she took a face from the hall.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: The faces are for no one.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: You are still someone.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: And to someone…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: the faces are as good as poison.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: I can't see!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: arya
text: arya: What's happening?! What's happening?!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: doran
text: doran: I wish you a safe journey home.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Thank you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Forgive me child. I wish you all the happiness in the world.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Maybe I'll come visit you sometime.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyene
text: tyene: Maybe I'll come visit you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Don't wait too long. I've a noble woman to marry back home.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyene
text: tyene: You want a good girl, but you need the bad pussy.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Whenever you're ready, My Lord.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Try not to lose it this time.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: I'll never take it off again.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I know you didn't want to leave Dorne. But I'm glad you're coming home. Your mother's desperate to see you. And I'm glad Trystane's coming with us. He seems like a nice boy. You're lucky. Arranged marriages are rarely so… so well arranged.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: Do you think mother will like him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: If she sees you're happy, I'm sure she will.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: And you really believe that?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Have you ever known your mother to like anyone aside from her children?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: She likes you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm not so sure about that. Listen. There's something I've wanted to tell you. Something I should have told you long ago. So. Now that you've seen more of the world, you've learned how complicated things can be. People can be. The Lannisters and the Martells have hated each other for years, but you've fallen in love with Trystane. It was an accident, really, I mean what were the chances? You happen to fall in love with the man you were assigned to marry? My point is… we don't choose whom we love. We just… It's beyond our control. I sound like an idiot.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: No you don't.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What I'm trying to say. What I'm trying and failing to say…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: I know what you're trying to say.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No. I'm afraid you don't.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: I do.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: myrcella
text: myrcella: I know. About you and mother. I think a part of me always knew. And I'm glad. I'm glad that you're my father.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Myrcella?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Myrcella?!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Myrcella?! Myrcella?!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You love her, don't you? How could you not. Of course, it's hopeless for the both of you. Sellsword from the fighting pits, a disgraced knight. Neither one of you is fit consort for a queen. But, we always want the wrong woman.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: Does he always talk so much?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey: Jorah the Andal.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Torgo Nudho.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey: You should not be here.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: No, but he is.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey: Our queen ordered him exiled from city.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: Our queen would be dead if not for him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: It's true. And I would be dead if not for the… little man.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Dwarf. I believe that's the word. Apologies. My Valyrian is a bit “nostril”.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: A bit “rusty”.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Rusty” Thank you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey: I am sorry. Sorry I am not there to fight for my queen.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: You missed a good scrap.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: None of that matters now. The longer we sit here bantering the longer Daenerys is out there in the wilderness.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: He's right. The dragon headed north. If we're going to find her, that's where we're to go.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We? You're a Lannister. The Queen intends to remove your family from power.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And I intend to help her do it.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You've been here for how many days now? I've fought for her for years. Since she was little more than a child.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You betrayed her!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Careful now.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And she exiled you, twice, I believe?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The second time thanks to you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Don't blame me for your crimes, Mormont.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: He's right. The Queen exiled Jorah. And he's right, Jorah saved her life. Perhaps she feels differently about him now. Perhaps not. The only way we'll know is if we ask her.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Fine, fine, I suppose he can join us. Just as long as he promises not to kill me in my sleep.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: If I ever kill you your eyes will be wide open.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: Forgive me, but why would we bring you?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Pardon me?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: Have you ever tracked animals in the wilderness?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Not precisely, but I have other skills that'd be very useful--

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: Can you fight?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I have fought. I don't claim to be a great warrior.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: Are you good on a horse?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Middling.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: So mainly you talk?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And drink. I've survived so far.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: Which I respect. But you would not help us on this expedition. You would help us here in Meereen, though. None of us have any experience governing a city, except for him. You want to prove your value to the queen? Prove it right here in Meereen.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He's a foreign dwarf that barely speaks the language. Why would the Meereenese listen to him?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: They wouldn't. They will listen to Grey Worm.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey: I'll come with you. I'll find our queen.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: You are not strong enough to go anywhere.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: grey
text: grey: I am.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: He is, he's the toughest man with no balls I've ever met. But you still can't go. The people believe in you. They know you speak for the queen.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: missandei
text: missandei: It's true. Only the Unsullied can keep the peace in Meereen. If you leave, half the city will consume the other half.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daario
text: daario: And Missandei. Our queen trusts no one more than Missandei. Certainly not me. The queen's closest confidant, the commander of the Unsullied, and the foreign dwarf with the scarred face. Good fortune, my friends, Meereen is ancient and glorious. Try not to ruin her. Looks like it's you and me, Jorah the Andal. Let's find some good horses. We have so much to talk about.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: voice
text: voice: Hello, old friend.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys: I thought we were so happy together until you abandoned me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I suppose there's no point in asking how you found me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys: The birds sing in the west, the birds sing in the east. If one knows how to listen. They tell me you've already found favor with the Mother of Dragons.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, she didn't execute me, so that's a promising start. Now the heroes are off to find her, and I'm stuck here, trying to placate a city on the brink of civil war. Any advice for an old comrade?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys: Information is the key. You need to learn your enemies' strengths and strategies. You need to learn which of your friends are not your friends.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If only I knew someone with a vast network of spies.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys: If only. A grand old city, choking on violence, corruption, and deceit. Who could possibly have any experience managing such a massive, ungainly beast?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I did miss you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: varys
text: varys: Oh, I know.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We have to go home.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My poor, sweet thing. Does it hurt? We have to go home. Drogon? Can you take me back to Meereen?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How far did you carry me?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Drogon, we need to return. My people need me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Well, there's no food. At the very least you can hunt us some supper.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: septa
text: septa: Confess. Confess.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I have sinned. I see that now. How could I have been so blind for so long. I want to be clean again. I want absolution. The Crone came to me with her lamp raised high, and with its holy light--

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You wish to make a confession?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Once I've confessed, will I be free?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Your Grace will be dealt with according to her sins.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Mother have mercy then. I lay with a man outside the bonds of marriage, I confess.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Name him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Lancel Lannister.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Your cousin. And the King's squire.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I was lonely and afraid.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You had a husband.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: A husband of whoring every chance he got.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: His sins do not pardon your own.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: May the gods forgive me.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Other men?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: No others?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Speaking falsehoods before the Gods is a great crime. You understand this?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I do.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: There are those who say your children were not fathered by King Robert. That they are bastards born of incest and adultery.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: A lie. A lie from the lips of Stannis Baratheon. He wants the Throne, but his brother's children stand in his way, so he claims they are not his brothers'. The filth. There is not one shred of truth to it. I deny it.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Good. But these are terrible charges. And the realm must know the truth of them. If Your Grace has given honest testimony, your trial will prove your innocence.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Trial? I have confessed?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: To a single sin. Others you have denied. Your trial will separate the truths from the falsehoods.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I bow to the wisdom of your High Holiness. But if I might beg for just one drop of the Mother's mercy. I haven't seen my son… I don't know how long it's been. I need to see him. Please.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You have taken the first step on a path back to righteousness. In light of this, I will permit you to return to the Red Keep.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Thank you. Thank you.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: The Mother is merciful. It is her you should thank.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I will, I will. I swear it, day and night.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Good.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Am I free to go?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: After your atonement.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My atonement?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: A sinner comes before you. Cersei of House Lannister, mother to his Grace King Tommen, widow to his Grace King Robert. She has committed the acts of falsehood and fornication. She has confessed her sins and begged for forgiveness. To demonstrate her repentance, she will cast aside all pride, all artifice, and present herself as the gods made her, to you. The good people of the city. She comes before you with a solemn heart. Shorn of secrets. Naked before the eyes of gods and men. To make her walk of atonement.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: septa
text: septa: Shame. Shame. Shame.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: crowd
text: crowd: Bitch! Whore! All hail her royal tits!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: woman
text: woman: I've had half as many cocks as the queen!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: man
text: man: Suck me off! Suck me off, you bitch!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Your Grace. It's good to have you back. Come. We'll take you inside. I need to have a look at those feet.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: May I have the honor of presenting the newest member of the Kingsguard.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: If it please Your Grace, he's taken a holy vow of silence. He has sworn that he will not speak until all his Grace's enemies are dead, and the evil has been driven from the realm.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: davos
text: davos: He came to your aid. Stannis. Now he needs you!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: We don't have enough men to make any difference.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: davos
text: davos: The wildlings will make a difference!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: The wildlings won't ever fight for Stannis, I told you before--

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: davos
text: davos: You saved their bloody lives. If they're going to live in the Seven Kingdoms, safe behind our wall, they ought to fight for the damn place.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: It's not their fight!

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: Stannis?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: davos
text: davos: Shireen? The princess?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: olly
text: olly: Lord Commander. It's one of the wildlings you brought back. Says he knows your Uncle Benjen. Says he's still alive.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: Are you sure he's talking about Benjen?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: olly
text: olly: Says he was first Ranger. Said he knows where to find him.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Man says he saw your uncle at Hardhome the last full moon.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: He could be lying.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Could be. There are ways to find out.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: Where is he?

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: alliser
text: alliser: Over there.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: alliser
text: alliser: For the Watch.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: brother
text: brother: For the Watch.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: jon
text: jon: Olly…

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: olly
text: olly: For the Watch.

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: end
text: end: EPISODE

title: Mother’s Mercy
Name: end
text: end: SEASON

title: The Red Woman
Name: nights
text: nights: It's the Lord Commander!

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: Help me get him inside

title: The Red Woman
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: Thorne did this

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: How many of your brothers do you think you can trust?

title: The Red Woman
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: Trust? The men in this room

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: Does the wolf know you?

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: We need all the help we can get

title: The Red Woman
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Ser Davos

title: The Red Woman
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I saw him in the flames, fighting at Winterfell

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: I can't speak for the flames, but he's gone

title: The Red Woman
Name: male
text: male: He was our Lord Commander!

title: The Red Woman
Name: male
text: male: He never should have been!

title: The Red Woman
Name: alliser
text: alliser: You all know why you're here Jon Snow is dead

title: The Red Woman
Name: nights
text: nights: Who killed him?

title: The Red Woman
Name: alliser
text: alliser: I did

title: The Red Woman
Name: alliser
text: alliser: And Bowen Marsh and Othell Yarwyck and the other officers in this castle

title: The Red Woman
Name: nights
text: nights: Murderers!

title: The Red Woman
Name: nights
text: nights: Traitors!

title: The Red Woman
Name: alliser
text: alliser: You're right!

title: The Red Woman
Name: alliser
text: alliser: We've committed treason, all of us Jon Snow was my Lord Commander I had no love for him That was no secret But I never once disobeyed an order Loyalty is the foundation on which the Night's Watch is built, and the Watch means everything to me I have given my life, we have all given our lives to the Night's Watch Jon Snow was going to destroy the Night's Watch He let the wildlings through our gates, as no Lord Commander has ever done before He gave them the very land on which they reaved and raped and murdered Lord Commander Snow did what he thought was right, I've no doubt about that And what he thought was right would have been the end of us He thrust a terrible choice upon us, and we made it

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: He'll have seen we didn't come Thorne will have made it official by now Castle Black is his

title: The Red Woman
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: I don't care who's sitting at the high table Jon was my friend, and those fuckers butchered him Now we return the favor

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: We don't have the numbers

title: The Red Woman
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: We have a direwolf

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: It's not enough I didn't know Lord Commander Snow for long, but I have to believe he wouldn't have wanted his friends to die for nothing

title: The Red Woman
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: If you were planning to see tomorrow, you picked the wrong room We all die today I say we do our best to take Thorne with us when we go

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: We need to fight, but we don't need to die Not if we have help

title: The Red Woman
Name: nights
text: nights: Who's gonna help us?

title: The Red Woman
Name: davos
text: davos: You're not the only ones who owe your lives to Jon Snow

title: The Red Woman
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: Bolt the door Don't let anyone in I'll be back as soon as I can

title: The Red Woman
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: She was 11 the first time I saw her

title: The Red Woman
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: The kennelmaster's daughter She smelled of dog I wasn't much older, but everybody was already afraid of me You certainly were

title: The Red Woman
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Myranda wasn't, though What could I do to her that those hounds couldn't? She was fearless There was nothing she wouldn't do.

title: The Red Woman
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Your pain will be paid for a thousand times over. I wish you could be here to watch.

title: The Red Woman
Name: maester
text: maester: Shall I have a grave dug for her, my lord? Or would you rather the men build a pyre?

title: The Red Woman
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Buried, burned?

title: The Red Woman
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: This is good meat Feed it to the hounds

title: The Red Woman
Name: roose
text: roose: Your command of the cavalry was impressive Thanks to you, the false king Stannis Baratheon is dead Do you know who struck the killing blow?

title: The Red Woman
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: No

title: The Red Woman
Name: roose
text: roose: A shame I'd reward the man Still, a great victory. Do you feel like a victor?

title: The Red Woman
Name: roose
text: roose: I rebelled against the crown to arrange your marriage to Sansa Stark Do you think that burning wagons in the night and mowing down tired, outnumbered Baratheons is the same as facing a prepared and provisioned Lannister army?

title: The Red Woman
Name: roose
text: roose: A reckoning will come We need the North to face it The entire North They won't back us without Sansa Stark We no longer have Sansa Stark You played your games with her You played your games with the heir to the Iron Islands and now they're both gone

title: The Red Woman
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I have a team of men after them with some of my best hounds They won't get far

title: The Red Woman
Name: roose
text: roose: I'm glad to hear it Without Sansa, you won't be able to produce an heir. And without an heir, well…

title: The Red Woman
Name: roose
text: roose: let's hope the maesters are right and Lady Walder's carrying a boy

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: We can't stop

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: We have to cross here

title: The Red Woman
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I can't

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: It's the only way to throw off the hounds

title: The Red Woman
Name: sansa
text: sansa: But it's too cold I can't I won't make it I'll die

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: I've seen what his hounds do to a person This way is better

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: Over here Come on

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: Sansa Sansa

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: Stay here. I'll lure them away

title: The Red Woman
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, I won't make it without you

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: You will Go north, only north Jon is Lord Commander at Castle Black He'll help you

title: The Red Woman
Name: bolton
text: bolton: Where is Lady Bolton?

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: Dead

title: The Red Woman
Name: bolton
text: bolton: Liar

title: The Red Woman
Name: theon
text: theon: She broke her leg jumping from the ramparts I left her to die in the snow

title: The Red Woman
Name: bolton
text: bolton: I can't wait to see what parts Ramsay cuts off you this time

title: The Red Woman
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Lady Sansa, I offer my services once again I will shield your back and keep your council and give my life for yours if need be I swear it by the old gods and the new

title: The Red Woman
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And I vow...that you shall always have a place by my hearth and…

title: The Red Woman
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Meat and mead at my table

title: The Red Woman
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Meat and mead at my table And I pledge to ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor I swear it by the old gods and the new Arise

title: The Red Woman
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden: Your Grace, I'm sorry to disturb you A ship from Dorne has sailed into the harbor

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Myrcella…

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you remember the first time you saw a dead body?

title: The Red Woman
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Mother

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: All I could think about when she died was what would happen to her now Every day, every night, what does Mama look like now? Has she started to bloat? Has her skin turned black? Have her lips peeled back from her teeth?

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I think about locking Myrcella in a crypt

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I think about her beautiful little face starting to collapse

title: The Red Woman
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Shh, shh Don't think about it

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I have to I have to It's not right she has to suffer alone

title: The Red Woman
Name: jaime
text: jaime: She's not suffering She's gone No one can hurt her anymore

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: She was good From her first breath, she was so sweet I don't know where she came from She was nothing like me No meanness, no jealous, just good

title: The Red Woman
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I know

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I thought if I could make something so good, so pure...maybe I'm not a monster

title: The Red Woman
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Listen -- listen to me She was my daughter and I failed her

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No, I knew this would happen The witch told me years ago She promised me three children She promised me they'd die “And gold their shrouds” Everything she said came true You couldn't have stopped it It's prophecy It's fate

title: The Red Woman
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You don't believe that

title: The Red Woman
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Of course I do You told me yourself when Father died You said we had to stay together You said people would try to tear us apart, take what's ours That was a prophecy, too I didn't listen to you, and everything you said came true

title: The Red Woman
Name: septa
text: septa: The Seven Hells brim with the souls of saintly men They scream in agony and their shame is so great, they do not feel the flames, for now they see if not for a single sin they concealed, they were saved”

title: The Red Woman
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I'd like to see my brother

title: The Red Woman
Name: septa
text: septa: Confess

title: The Red Woman
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Please How is he? At least tell me that

title: The Red Woman
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I am the queen and I demand to see my brother

title: The Red Woman
Name: septa
text: septa: Sinners don't make commands They make confessions

title: The Red Woman
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Septa Unella

title: The Red Woman
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Our other guests need you

title: The Red Woman
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: There

title: The Red Woman
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Septa Unella can be overzealous at times I'll speak with her

title: The Red Woman
Name: margaery
text: margaery: My brother, can you tell me how he is?

title: The Red Woman
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: It isn't Ser Loras that brings me here Your husband misses you dearly The love between a man and wife is sacred It reflects the love the gods have for all of us But sin leads us away from the sacred And only confession can purge sin

title: The Red Woman
Name: margaery
text: margaery: I have nothing to confess

title: The Red Woman
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: So you believe you are pure? Perfect? Wholly without sin?

title: The Red Woman
Name: margaery
text: margaery: None of us are

title: The Red Woman
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You have started down the path But you have many miles to go.

title: The Red Woman
Name: doran
text: doran: I always envied Oberyn He lived He truly lived Sailed around the world Fought men from every country Lay with the most beautiful women alive

title: The Red Woman
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: And men

title: The Red Woman
Name: doran
text: doran: And men He experienced everything, while I sat here in Dorne trying my best to keep my people alive and well fed But that is life We each have our roles

title: The Red Woman
Name: doran
text: doran: Oberyn was born to be an adventurer And I was born to rule

title: The Red Woman
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: The gods are not fools You would have been a lousy adventurer And Oberyn, pfft, he would have been a terrible ruler

title: The Red Woman
Name: doran
text: doran: Your mother is a brilliant woman, you know that?

title: The Red Woman
Name: maester
text: maester: Prince Doran.

title: The Red Woman
Name: doran
text: doran: The Princess Myrcella…

title: The Red Woman
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: When was the last time you left this palace? You don't know your own people Their disgust for you Elia Martell raped and murdered, and you did nothing Oberyn martell butchered, and you did nothing You're not a Dornishman You're not our prince

title: The Red Woman
Name: doran
text: doran: My son Trystane…

title: The Red Woman
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Your son is weak just like you And weak men will never rule Dorne again.

title: The Red Woman
Name: trystane
text: trystane: I told you I'm not hungry

title: The Red Woman
Name: obara
text: obara: We're not here to feed you

title: The Red Woman
Name: obara
text: obara: We're here to kill you

title: The Red Woman
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: You want her to do it or me?

title: The Red Woman
Name: trystane
text: trystane: We are family I don't want to hurt you

title: The Red Woman
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: Her or me?

title: The Red Woman
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: Good.

title: The Red Woman
Name: obara
text: obara: Smart boy.

title: The Red Woman
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: You're a greedy bitch, you know that?

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We're never going to fix what's wrong with this city from the top of an 800-foot pyramid

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We'll be fine We're dressed like common merchants

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: You walk like a rich person

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You've spent a lot of time studying the way rich people walk?

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: You walk as though the paving stones were your personal property I used to steal from people like you when I was a boy

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's a good thing you're not a boy anymore...because you have no cock

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: For your baby To eat

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: She thinks you want to eat her baby

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: His Valyrian is terrible He only wants to give you money, so your baby can eat

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: Mhysa means mother in Valyrian

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I know what mhysa means

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: Who wrote it?

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Hard to know Our queen is not as popular in Meereen as she used to be

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: The Sons of the Harpy?

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Very possibly Daenerys Targaryen took away their most valuable property, told them human beings weren't even property to begin with You can see why they're unhappy Of course, it could also be the freed men

title: The Red Woman
Name: listeners
text: listeners: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

title: The Red Woman
Name: red
text: red: The Lord of Light sent the Mother of Dragons to you, and those who love the darkness chased her away

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Many of the former slaves feel that Daenerys has abandoned them

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: She did fly away on a dragon and not come back

title: The Red Woman
Name: red
text: red: How will you respond? Will you wring your hands, while you wait for the Mother of Dragons to return? Or will you you take up her flames yourselves? Will you fight for your own salvation, now that Queen Daenerys is not here to fight for you?

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's a problem

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Fear has brought Meereen to a standstill Whoever you are, wherever you go, someone in this city wants to murder you We can't fight an enemy we don't know

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: The Sons of the Harpy planned their attack in the fighting pits very carefully, which means they take orders from someone

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And have you started looking for that someone?

title: The Red Woman
Name: varys
text: varys: My little birds have already taken wing Soon they'll return, singing songs of men in gold masks

title: The Red Woman
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, we won't be sailing to Westeros anytime soon

title: The Red Woman
Name: daario
text: daario: Goat?

title: The Red Woman
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Ram

title: The Red Woman
Name: daario
text: daario: You think our friend got him?

title: The Red Woman
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Don't know anything else that can melt a ram's horn

title: The Red Woman
Name: daario
text: daario: We're on the right path, then

title: The Red Woman
Name: daario

title: Home
Name: lady
text: lady: Ramsay, where is your father? Ramsay? Where is Lord Bolton?

title: Home
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I am Lord Bolton

title: Home
Name: lady
text: lady: Ramsay Ramsay, please I'll leave Winterfell. I'll go back to the Riverlands Please. Ramsay He's your brother

title: Home
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I prefer being an only child

title: Home
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I saw her with a man I don't think he hurt her She didn't want to leave him, he didn't want to leave her

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You don't know which way she went?

title: Home
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I spent three days looking for her She disappeared

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How did she look

title: Home
Name: brienne
text: brienne: She looked good She wasn't exactly dressed like a lady

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, she wouldn't be

title: Home
Name: brienne
text: brienne: What happened at Winterfell

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I shouldo ve gone with you while I had the chance

title: Home
Name: brienne
text: brienne: It was a difficult choice, my lady

title: Home
Name: brienne
text: brienne: We've all had to make difficult choices

title: Home
Name: theon
text: theon: We shouldn't be lighting fires It's not safe He won't stop hunting us

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: We just have to make it to Castle Black Once we're with Jon, Ramsay won't be able to touch us

title: Home
Name: theon
text: theon: Jon will have me killed the moment I step through the gate

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I won't let him I'll tell him the truth about Bran and Rickon

title: Home
Name: theon
text: theon: And the truth about the farm boys I killed in their place The truth about Ser Rodrik, who I beheaded

title: Home
Name: theon
text: theon: And the truth about Rob, who I betrayed

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: When you take the black, all your crimes are forgiven

title: Home
Name: theon
text: theon: I don't want to be forgiven I can never make amends to your family for all the things that I've done They'll keep you safer than I ever could

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're not coming with us?

title: Home
Name: theon
text: theon: I would have taken you all the way to the Wall I would have died to get you there

title: Home
Name: theon
text: theon: May I take one of the horses?

title: Home
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Where will you go?

title: Home
Name: theon
text: theon: Home

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: The Glovers have retaken Deepwood Motte

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: And the Ironborn who held it

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: They died fighting to a man

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: What is dead may never die

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: What is dead may never die

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: But they did and our invasion died with them Deepwood Motte was our last stronghold on the mainland

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: They we will take more

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: Why? For more pinecones and rocks

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: Because I order it

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: We can defeat anyone at sea, but we'll never hold lands and castles against mainland armies

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: Not if our captains defy my orders, abandon their posts, and sacrifice our men on foolish mission

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: I won't apologize for trying to rescue Theon

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: Then where is he

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: Where is your kingdom We took those castles because the northerners marched off to war That war is over The last time we provoked them too far, I watched from that window as they breached our walls and knocked down our towers I lost two brothers that day

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: And I lost three sons The War of the Five Kings, they call it Well, the other four are dead When you rule the Iron Islands, you can wage all the peace you wan. But for now, shut your mouth and obey or I will make another heir who will

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: Let me pass. You fool, move aside for your king.

title: Home
Name: hooded
text: hooded: Haven't I always, brother?

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: I thought you'd be rotting under some foreign sea by now

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron: What is dead may never die

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron: Has the custom changed since I've been gone? Aren't you supposed to repeat the words?

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: You can mock our god without my help

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron: I don't mock the Drowned God I am the Drowned God From Oldtown to Qarth, when men see my sails, they pray

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron: You're old, brother You've had your time Now let another rule

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: I heard you lost your mind during the storm on the Jade Sea They tied you to the mast to keep you from jumping overboard

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron: They did

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: And when the storm passed, you cut out their tongues

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron: I needed silence

title: Home
Name: balon
text: balon: What kind of an Ironborn loses his senses during a storm

title: Home
Name: euron
text: euron: I am the storm, brother The first storm and the last And you're in my way

title: Home
Name: aeron
text: aeron: Lord, take your servant Balon back beneath the waves Feed the creatures of your kingdom on his flesh Pull his bones down to your depths to rest beside his ancestors and his children

title: Home
Name: all
text: all: What is dead may never die

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: I'm going to find out who did this I'm going to feed them to the sharks while they live I swear it by the Salt Throne

title: Home
Name: aeron
text: aeron: The Salt Throne is not yours to swear upon, not unless the kingsmoot chooses you

title: Home
Name: yara
text: yara: My father wouldo ve wanted me to rule

title: Home
Name: aeron
text: aeron: Your father does not get to choose The law is clear Perhaps you'll win Perhaps you'll be the first woman in history to rule the Ironborn And perhaps not

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Come in

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: I'm sorry, my lady I didn't mean to interrupt

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You interrupt nothing

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: I assume you know why I'm here

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I will after you tell me

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: It's about the Lord Commander

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The former Lord Commander

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: Does he have to be?

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: What are you asking

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: Do you know of any magicthat could help him? Bring him back?

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: If you want to help him, leave him be

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: Can it be done

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: There are some with his power

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: How

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I don't know

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: Have you seen it done

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I met a man who came back from the dead, but the priest who did it -- It shouldn't have been possible

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: But it was It could be now

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Not for me

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: Not for you? I saw you drink poison that shouldo ve killed you I saw you give birth to a demon made of shadows

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Everything I believed, the great victory I saw in the flames, all of it was a lie

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: You were right all along The Lord never spoke to me

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: Fuck him, then Fuck all of them I'm not a devout man, obviously Seven Gods, drowned gods, tree gods, it's all the same

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: I'm not asking the Lord of Light for helpI'm asking the woman who showed me that miracles exist

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I never had this gift

title: Home
Name: davos
text: davos: Have you ever tried?

title: Home
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Please

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos: Easy, easy Easy

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos: What do you remember?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon: They stabbed me Olly...he put a knife in my heart I shouldn't be here

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos: The lady brought you back.

title: Oathbreaker
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Afterwards, after they stabbed you, after you died, where did you go? What did you see?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon: Nothing There was nothing at all

title: Oathbreaker
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The Lord let you come back for a reason Stannis was not the prince who was promised, but someone has to be

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos: Could you give us a moment?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos: You were dead And now you're not That's completely fucking mad, seems to me I can only imagine how it seems to you

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon: I did what I thought was right And I got murdered for it And now I'm back Why?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos: I don't know Maybe we'll never know What does it matter? You go on You fight for as long as you can You clean up as much of the shit as you can

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon: I don't know how to do that I thought I did, but...I failed

title: Oathbreaker
Name: davos
text: davos: Good Now go fail again

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tormund
text: tormund: They think you're some kind of god The man who returned from the dead

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm not a god

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I know that

title: Oathbreaker
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I saw your pecker What kind of god would have a pecker that small?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: Your eyes are still brown Is that still you in there?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: jon
text: jon: I think so Hold off on burning my body for now

title: Oathbreaker
Name: dolorous
text: dolorous: That's funny You sure that's still you in there?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You all right?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam: Yes Yes, I'm fine

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Did I ever tell you I used to think the sea was called the see because it was nothing but water as far as the eye could see?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam: I don't think so

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Sea, see They're spelled different, but they sound the same

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam: Yeah, they do

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: It was before I learned how to read, obviously

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Sam, are you going to be sick?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Won't be long We'll be in the south soon I'm excited to see Oldtown Captain says it's the most beautiful city in Westeros Are you going to vomit again?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam: No No, no, no The Citadel doesn't admit women There won't be a place for you there or for Little Sam

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I stayed at Castle Black There's no women allowed there

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam: The Citadel isn't Castle Black I don't have a Jon Snow or a Maester Aemon to help me bend the rules

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: I'll stay in Oldtown, then

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam: By yourself? With a baby and no money?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: So if we're not going to Oldtown, where are you taking me?

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam: To my home Horn Hill My father's -- well, my father, but my mother's a kind woman and my sister's lovely They'll take care of you both

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Wherever you go, I go, too” That's what you said

title: Oathbreaker
Name: sam
text: sam: I said that because I want you and Little Same to be safe That's all I want -- to become a maester so I can help Jon when the time comes so you'll be safe

title: Oathbreaker
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Us and everyone else in the world
