text: lyanna: Welcome to Bear Island.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I remember when you were born, my lady. You were named for my Aunt Lyanna. It was said she was a great beauty. I'm sure you will be, too.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I doubt it. My mother wasn't a great beauty or any other kind of beauty. She was a great warrior, though. She died fighting for your brother, Robb.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: I served under your uncle at Castle Black, Lady Lyanna. He was also a great warrior and an honorable man. I was his steward. In fact- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I think we've had enough small talk. What are you here?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: Stannis Baratheon garrisoned at Castle Black before he marched on Winterfell and was killed. He showed me the letter you wrote to him when he petitioned for men. It said- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I remember what it said. “Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark.”

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: Robb is gone, but House Stark is not. And it needs your support now more than ever. I've come with my sister to ask for House Mormont's allegiance.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: As far as I understand, you're a Snow and Lady Sansa is a Bolton. Or is she a Lannister? I've heard conflicting reports.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I did what I had to do to survive, my lady. But I am a Stark. I will always be a Stark.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: If you say so. In any case, you don't just want my allegiance. You want my fighting men.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: Ramsay Bolton cannot be allowed to keep Winterfell, my lady. It is our duty to stop him. Even more so because he holds our brother Rickon Stark as prisoner. What you have to understand, my lady, is that- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I understand that I'm responsible for Bear Island and all who live here. So why should I sacrifice one more Mormont life for someone else's war?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: If it please, my lady, I understand how you feel.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I don't know you, Ser…?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: Davos, my lady, of House Seaworth.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: You needn't ask your maester about my house. It's rather new.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: All right, Ser Davos of House Seaworth. How is it you understand how I feel?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: You never thought you'd find yourself in your position. Being responsible for so many lives at such a young age. I never thought I'd be in my position. I was a crabber's son, then I was a smuggler. And now I found myself addressing the lady of a great house in time of war. But I'm here because this isn't someone else's war. It's our war.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: Go on, Ser Davos.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: Your uncle, Lord Commander Mormont, made that man his steward. He chose Jon to be his successor because he knew had the courage to do what was right, even if it meant giving his life. Because Jeor Mormont and Jon Snow both understood that the real war isn't between a few squabbling houses. It's between the living and the dead. And make no mistake, my lady, the dead are coming.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: Is this true?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: Your uncle fought them at the Fist of the First Men. I fought them at Hardhome. We both lost.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: As long as the Boltons hold Winterfell, the North is divided. And a divided North won't stand a chance against the Night King. You want to protect your people, my lady. I understand. But there's no hiding from this. We have to fight and we need to do it together.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: House Mormont has kept faith with House Stark for 1,000 years. We will not break faith today.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: Thank you, my lady. How many fighting men can we expect?

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: 62.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: 62?

title: The Broken Man
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: We are not a large house, but we're a proud one. And every man from Bear Island fights with the strength of 10 mainlanders.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: If they're half as ferocious as their lady, the Boltons are doomed.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Kingslayer.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Blackfish.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: I assume you're here to fulfill the vow you gave my niece. I don't see Sansa and Arya.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I don't have them.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Pity. Do you wish to resume your captivity?

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Then why are you here?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You know why I'm here. This castle belongs to House Frey. You're trespassing. In the name of King Tommen, I order you to surrender or- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Or you'll kill Edmure?

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: My nephew's marked for death no matter what. Hang him and be done with it.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It won't stop with Edmure. You'll force me to storm the castle. Hundreds will die.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Hundreds of mine. Thousands of yours. If you can breach the walls.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We'll breach them and kill every last one of you. But if you surrender, I'll spare the lives of your men. On my honor.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Your honor? Bargaining with oathbreakers is like building on quicksand.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The war is over, ser. Why sacrifice living men to a lost cause?

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: As long as I'm standing, the war is not over. This is my home. I was born in this castle and I'm ready to die in it. So you can either attack or try to starve us out. We have enough provisions for two years. Do you have two years, Kingslayer?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You clearly have no intention of saving your men's lives. Why did you come to treat with me?

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Sieges are dull. And I wanted to see you in person, get the measure of you.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Well, now you have.

title: The Broken Man
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Aye, now I have. I'm disappointed.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: The answer is no.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: Lord Glover, if you could just hear us out.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: I've heard enough. We've only just taken back this castle from the Ironborn. The Boltons helped us do it. Now you want me to fight against them? I could be skinned for even talking to you.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: The Boltons are traitors. Roose Bolton- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: Have other northern houses pledged to fight for you?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: House Mormont.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: And?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: We sent raven to Houses Manderly- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: I don't care about ravens. You're asking me to join your army. Who is fighting in this army?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: The bulk of the force is made up of wildlings.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: Then the rumors are true. I didn't dare believe them. I received you out of respect for your father. Now I would like you to leave. House Glover will not abandon its ancestral home to fight alongside wildlings.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: Lord Glover.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: There's nothing else to say.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I would remind you that House Glover is pledged to House Stark. Sworn to answer when called upon.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: Yes, my family served House Stark for centuries. We wept when we heard of your father's death. When my brother was lord of this castle, he answered Robb's call and hailed him King in the North.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: And where was King Robb when the Ironborn attacked this castle? When they threw my wife and children in prison and brutalized and killed our subjects? Taking up with a foreign whore. Getting himself and those who followed him killed.

title: The Broken Man
Name: robett
text: robett: I served House Stark once, but House Stark is dead.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon: Why did we have to come here?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Some of us still like it. Have a drink at least.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon: I don't want one.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Don't go far, love.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: I'll find you in a bit.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Nothing on the Iron Islands has an ass like that. Doesn't interest you anymore?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: I'm sorry. I won't joke about it. I'll never hurt you, little brother. Don't you know that?

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon: You think Uncle Euron's hunting for us?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Of course he is. As long as we're alive, we're a threat.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon: He'll find us.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: It's a great big world and we have fast ships. Drink.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon: I don't want any.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: I don't care what you want. Drink.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Drink it all.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: You're Ironborn, Theon. I know you've had some bad years.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon: Some bad years?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: But I'm tired of watching you cower like a beat dog. Drink the goddamn ale.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Now listen to me. I need you. The real Theon Greyjoy, not this rat shit pretender. Can you find him for me? Drink.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: You escaped, do you hear me? You got away and you're never going back. We'll get justice for you.

title: The Broken Man
Name: theon
text: theon: If I got justice, my burnt body would hang over the gates of Winterfell.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Fuck justice, then. We'll get revenge. Drink.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Listen to me. If you're so broken that there's no coming back, take a knife and cut your wrists. End it. But if you're staying, Theon, I need you. We're gonna sail to Meereen. We're gonna make a pact with this Dragon Queen. And we're gonna take back the Iron Islands.

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Are you with me? Are you really with me?

title: The Broken Man
Name: yara
text: yara: Now, since it's my last night ashore for a long while, I'm gonna go fuck the tits off this one.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: Stannis camped here on his way to Winterfell.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And that's a good thing?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: He was the most experienced commander in Westeros. He chose this place for a reason. Those mountains are a natural fortification. There's a stream down there for the horses.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: We're not staying here long. Another storm could hit any day..

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: Aye, the snows defeated Stannis as much as the Boltons did.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: We have to march on Winterfell now while we still can.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: 2,000 Wildlings. 200 Hornwoods, 143 Mazins- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: 62 Mormonts.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: It's not what we'd hoped for. But we still have a chance if we're careful and smart.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: For fuck's sake.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: So he's your most trusted advisor now? Because he secured 62 men from a ten year old?

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: Ser Davos is the reason I'm standing here talking to you and he served Stannis for years.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Stannis who lost the Blackwater, who murdered his own brother, who doesn't have a head?

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's not enough. We need more men.

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: There's no time.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sansa
text: sansa: If we went down to Castle Cerwyn, I know that Lord- -

title: The Broken Man
Name: jon
text: jon: We fight with the army we have.

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: Friends, this is not worth fighting over!

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: This'll be it, now. Right now, we don't need to be fighting.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man: Who the fuck are you?

title: The Broken Man
Name: davos
text: davos: Hold on.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man: Yeah, who the fuck are you?

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: I was a soldier once. All my superiors thought I was brave. I wasn't. I mean, I never ran from a fight. Only because I was afraid my friends would see I was afraid. That's all I was, a coward. We followed orders no matter the orders. Burn that village. Fine, I'm your arsonist. Steal that farmer's crops. Good, I'm your thief. Kill those young lads so they won't take up arms against us. I'm your murderer. I remember once a woman screaming at us, calling us animals as we dragged her son from their hut. But we weren't animals. Animals are true to their nature and we had betrayed ours. I cut that young boy's throat myself as his mother screamed and my friends held her back.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: That night...I felt such shame. Shame was so heavy on me, I couldn't eat, I couldn't sleep.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: All I could do was stare into that dark sky and listen to that mother screaming her son's name. I'll hear her screaming the rest of my life.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: Now, I know I can never bring that lad back. All I can do with time I've got left is bring a little goodness into the world. That's all any of us can do, isn't it? Never too late to stop robbing people, to stop killing people. Start helping people.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: It's never too late to come back.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: And it's not about waiting for the gods to answer your prayers. It's not even about the gods. It's about you. Learning you have to answer your prayers yourself.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: Seven save you, friends. How can we help you?

title: The Broken Man
Name: lem
text: lem: What are you doing here?

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: Well, we're talking about life. You?

title: The Broken Man
Name: lem
text: lem: Protecting the people.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: Well, we thank you for your protection. Who are you protecting us from?

title: The Broken Man
Name: lem
text: lem: Do you have any horses?

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: No horses. No gold. No steel.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lem
text: lem: Food, then. Protecting the people is hungry work.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: I'm sure it is. You're welcome to stay for supper, but we have hungry mouths here.

title: The Broken Man
Name: lem
text: lem: Stay safe. The night is dark and full of terrors.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Seven save you, friends.”

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: I'm a fucking septon. What was I supposed to say?

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor: They don't believe in your Seven. They're from the Brotherhood. They follow the Red God.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: Aye, well, all are welcome here. Anyway, we got nothing for them.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Sure, you do. You've got food, you've got steel even if you say you don't. And you've got women.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: What do you want to do? Fight them? Kill them?

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: It'd be you against all of them. I mean, these people don't know how to fight.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You do.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: I'm done with fighting.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Even if it's to protect yourself?

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: Violence is a disease. You don't cure a disease by spreading it to more people.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You don't cure it by dying, either.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: You've done enough work for one day. Come on up for some supper.

title: The Broken Man
Name: sandor
text: sandor: It's gonna be a cold night. We'll need firewood.

title: The Broken Man
Name: ray
text: ray: I'll save you a bowl of stew. Might even have some ale hidden away.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man: He's not a lying man. He says the Iron Fleet's in Slaver's Bay. I'm inclined to believe him. I'm not going anywhere near those mad fuckers.

title: The Broken Man
Name: arya
text: arya: You're Westerosi.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man: What do you care?

title: The Broken Man
Name: arya
text: arya: I want to book passage home.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man: You? Can't afford it.

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man: Where'd you steal this from?

title: The Broken Man
Name: arya
text: arya: Why do you care?

title: The Broken Man
Name: man
text: man: We leave in two days. You can have a hammock in steerage.

title: The Broken Man
Name: arya
text: arya: I want a cabin. And we'll leave at dawn.

title: The Broken Man
Name: arya
text: arya: See you at sunrise.

title: The Broken Man
Name: woman
text: woman: Sweet girl.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: My son. My firstborn son. My child king, hush. Listen to the gods, for you they sing. Fight no more, sweet child. Your wars are won. The wolves are buried and the false stag done. Shut your blue eyes, my love. Let the crown fall. The Father above beckons you into his hall. In Seventh Heaven I'll see you once more. But now I seek vengeance on Sansa the whore and my brother the Imp who killed his own king. Born amongst lions, our curse from within. I will slay him, I swear. With noose or with knife, though it take me a fortnight, a moon, or my life.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: You're good at that. Where did you learn?

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: I'm a jealous woman. I've always liked bad men and they've always liked me. They'd come home wherever home was that night stinking of some whore's perfume.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: So we'd fight and I'd put a hole in them. And then I'd feel terrible, so I'd patch them up. I got good at patching them up.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: And good at putting holes in them.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: And that.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: What happened to the actress? The one who wanted you dead.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: Bianca.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: She'll have a hard time finding work as an actress after what I did to her face.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: Mmm.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: I never did learn to cook. But eat. Eat. You need it. The company is moving on to Pentos soon. You should come with us.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: I can't.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: Why not? Got a feeling you'd be good at this sort of work. And besides, we need a new actress.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't think I could remember all of the lines.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: Come with us. What's left for you here?

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: You wouldn't be safe. Not while she's looking for me.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: Who?

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: She doesn't have a name.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: Where will you go?

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: Essos is east and Westeros is west. But what's west of Westeros?

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: I don't know.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: Nobody does. That's where all the maps stop.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: The edge of the world, maybe.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: I'd like to see that.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: What's that?

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: Milk of the poppy.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't want any.

title: No One
Name: lady
text: lady: Sleep is the only way you'll heal. Trust me, if my soup didn't kill you, nothing will.

title: No One
Name: man
text: man: Thing about Gatins, right, is he used to be pretty.

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: I was a famous kisser. You lads know how to kiss proper?

title: No One
Name: young
text: young: Course we do.

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: This is for masters, this technique. You're not ready.

title: No One
Name: young
text: young: I'm ready.

title: No One
Name: man
text: man: He says he's ready.

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: All right.

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: Now, pay attention. You put your left hand on the back of the lady's head.

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: Your right hand holds the small of the lady's back like so.

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: Very romantic. Take your middle finger, yeah, and you jam it right up her bunghole.

title: No One
Name: man
text: man: So fucking close!

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: Ah, it smells like pussy to me.

title: No One
Name: man
text: man: Look at him. You get hard, boy?

title: No One
Name: young
text: young: Fuck you! Disgusting old twats.

title: No One
Name: young
text: young: Got off on that, did you, you old fuck?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Where's the other one? The one with the yellow cloak.

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: Fuck you!

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Those are your last words, fuck you? Come on, you can do better.

title: No One
Name: gatins
text: gatins: Cunt!

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You're shit at dying, you know that?

title: No One
Name: red
text: red: From the fire she was reborn to remake the world. Daenerys is a gift from the Lord of Light to her children. If we are steadfast in our love for the Queen and her faithful advisors, no man will ever lock us in chains again.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'd call that a successful gambit.

title: No One
Name: varys
text: varys: Would you?

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Look around. The city has come back to life.

title: No One
Name: varys
text: varys: You made a pact with fanatics.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I did and it worked.

title: No One
Name: varys
text: varys: If you shaved your beard with a straight razor, you'd say the razor worked. That doesn't mean it won't cut your throat.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Spoken like a man who has never had to shave.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm going to miss you.

title: No One
Name: varys
text: varys: I know.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I hope you're right about this expedition of yours.

title: No One
Name: varys
text: varys: If I don't return, you'll know I was wrong.

title: No One
Name: varys
text: varys: We need friends in Westeros. And we need ships.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Most of all, we need our queen.

title: No One
Name: varys
text: varys: She'll come back. She has to. My heart's been broken too many times already.

title: No One
Name: varys
text: varys: I'll walk the rest of the way myself. I can't go off on a secret mission in the company of the most famous dwarf in the city.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Varys.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The most famous dwarf in the world.

title: No One
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Your Grace, several members of the Faith Militant have been permitted entry to the Red Keep.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Have been permitted? That's rather a tortured way of putting it.

title: No One
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: They demand to see you, Your Grace.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Who permitted them inside the Red Keep?

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The king is aware of their presence?

title: No One
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: He is, Your Grace. He's currently in his chambers at prayer.

title: No One
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Your Grace, His Holiness the High Septon wishes to speak with you at the Great Sept of Baelor.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: His Holiness the High Septon is welcome to see me here in the Red Keep.

title: No One
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Your Grace, this is not a request.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It is a request, Cousin Lancel. You are asking me for something, I'm refusing.

title: No One
Name: lancel
text: lancel: The High Septon commands you. Are you sure you want to refuse him?

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He promised me I could stay in the Red Keep until my trial.

title: No One
Name: lancel
text: lancel: He made no such promises. If you refuse to come of your own free will- -

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Get out.

title: No One
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Move aside, ser.

title: No One
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Order your man to step aside or there will be violence.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I choose violence.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Please tell His High Holiness he's always welcome to visit.

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Looks like a siege, my lady.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You have a keen military mind, Pod.

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: My lady. My lady.

title: No One
Name: man
text: man: Who goes there? State your business!

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: My name is Brienne of Tarth. Please inform Ser Jaime Lannister I've come to speak with him. Tell him I have his sword.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Getting a bit old to be a squire, aren't we?

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Podrick fucking Payne. I thought you'd be dead by now.

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Not yet.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Are they in there?

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Mm-hmm.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You think they're fucking?

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: What? No.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Why not? I'd fuck her. You'd fuck her, wouldn't you?

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: I'm her squire.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Oh. Well, he'd fuck her, that's for sure. And she's fuck him, don't you think? The way she looks at him. The way all women look at him is frankly irritating. I preferred working with the little brother on that account. Come on, you're the one with the magic cock.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You must have shown it to her by now.

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: She's training me to fight.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Is she? Oh.

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: An hour in the morning, and hour at night. Every day.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Then how come an old cunt like me can still sneak up and murder you?

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Well, that's a different sort of fighting.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Now, that's the truth, isn't it? You want to learn that sort of fighting?

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: All right, let's start with your footwork.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Show me your stance.

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Now, listen to me, Pod. See how your feet are about a yard apart?

title: No One
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Lesson number one, assume everyone wants to hit you. ‘Cause they do, Pod. Everyone wants to hit a fucking squire. Do it again. Come on, don't sulk.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I never thought you'd find her. I just assumed Sansa was dead.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Why would you assume that?

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: In my experience, girls like her don't live very long.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I don't think you know many girls like her.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Well, I'm proud of you. I am. You fulfilled your oath to Catelyn Stark against all odds.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Of course my sister wants Sansa dead. The girl is still a suspect in Joffrey's murder, so there is that complication. What the hell are you doing here?

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I've come for the Blackfish.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You're welcome to have him.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Lady Sansa desires to take her ancestral seat back from the Boltons and assume her rightful position as Lady of Winterfell.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: With what army does she plan on taking Winterfell?

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: The Tully army.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They're a bit occupied at the moment. I was sent here to reclaim Riverrun currently defended by the Tully rebels, so you can see the conundrum.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: The Tullys are rebels because they're fighting for their home?

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Riverrun was granted to the Freys by royal decree.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: As a reward for betraying Robb Stark and slaughtering his family.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Exactly.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We shouldn't argue about politics.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You're a knight, Ser Jaime. I know there is honor in you. I've seen it myself.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm a Lannister. Don't ask me to betray my own house.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I do no such thing. Take Riverrun without bloodshed. Ride south with your mission complete and your army intact.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What do you propose?

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Allow me to enter Riverrun under a flag of truce. Let me try to persuade the Blackfish to give up the castle.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Why would he abandon his ancestral home?

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Because you'll allow him to lead the Tully forces safely north.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Have you ever met the Blackfish?

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: No.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He's even more stubborn than you are.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: All right. Try to talk some sense into the old goat. He won't listen, but his men might. Not everybody wants to die for someone else's home.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I need your word. If I persuade him to abandon the castle, you'll grant us safe passage north.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You have my word. You have until nightfall.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You gave it to me for a purpose. I've achieved that purpose.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It's yours. It will always be yours.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: one last thing, Ser Jaime.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Yes, Lady Brienne?

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Should I fail to persuade the Blackfish to surrender, and if you attack the castle, honor compels me to fight for Sansa's kin.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Of course it does.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: To fight you.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Let's hope it doesn't come to that.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: I've said no three times already.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I have a signed letter from your niece Sansa Stark.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: I haven't seen her since she was a child. I don't know her signature. I don't know you. And I will not surrender.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Double the guards tonight.

title: No One
Name: bryndel
text: bryndel: The Kingslayer wants to try us. I can feel it.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: As I have said, my name is- -

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Yes, Brienne of Tarth. I know your father. A good man.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: He always spoke highly of you.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: And if he were here now, I'd tell him the same I'm telling you.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: If you think I'm abandoning my family's seat on the Kingslayer's word of honor, you're a bloody fool.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Riverrun cannot stand against the Lannisters and the Freys.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: We can stand longer than your one-handed friend thinks we can.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: He's not my friend.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: No?

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Who gave you permission to cross the siege line and enter the castle? Who gave you that sword with the gold lion on the pommel?

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Ser Jaime kept his word to your niece Catelyn Stark. He sent me to find Sansa, to help her as Catelyn wanted. He gave me this sword to protect her. That is what I have done and I will continue to do until the day I die.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: She's exactly like her mother.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: I don't have enough men to help her take Winterfell.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You have more than she does.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: She wants her home back. I understand that. But this is my home. And if Jaime Lannister wants it, he can bloody well take it the way everyone else does.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Find the maester. We need to get a raven north to Sansa.

title: No One
Name: podrick
text: podrick: What should I write?

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Tell her I failed.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: There's to be a royal announcement?

title: No One
Name: kevan
text: kevan: There is.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Why wasn't I informed?

title: No One
Name: kevan
text: kevan: There is to be a royal announcement in the throne room at this very moment.

title: No One
Name: kevan
text: kevan: Where are you going?

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: To stand by my son.

title: No One
Name: kevan
text: kevan: Your place is in the gallery with the other ladies of the court.

title: No One
Name: tommen
text: tommen: Lords and ladies, the Faith and the Crown are the two pillars that hold up this world. One collapses, so does the other. The Father judges us all. If you break his laws...you will be punished. After conferring with His Holiness the High Septon, we have determined that Loras Tyrell and Cersei lannister's trial will be held in the Great Sept of Baelor on the first day of the Festival of the Mother.

title: No One
Name: tommen
text: tommen: Furthermore, after much prayer and reflection, the Crown has decided that from this day forward, trial by combat will be forbidden throughout the Seven Kingdoms. The tradition is a brutish one, a scheme devised by corrupt rulers in order to avoid true judgment from the gods. Cersei Lannister and Loras Tyrell will stand trial before seven septons as it was in the earliest days of the Faith. Seven blessings to all.

title: No One
Name: crowd
text: crowd: Seven blessings.

title: No One
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Your Grace...that old rumor you told me about. My little birds investigated.

title: No One
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And? Was it just a rumor or something more?

title: No One
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: More. Much more.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: You seem happy.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I am happy. You should both be as well. Not so long ago, this city was ready to devour itself.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Now it's like a man reborn.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I will be happy when our queen returns.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why don't you drink? Why don't either of you ever drink?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: Unsullied never drink.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why not?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: Rules.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And who made these rules? Your former masters?

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Those miserable old shits didn't want you to be human. Have a drink with me.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And you? What's your excuse?

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I have tried wine before. It made me feel funny.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That's how you know it's working.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Here's to our queen. Anyone not drinking is disrespecting our queen.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: To Daenerys Stormborn, Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains, long may she reign.

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: Long may she reign.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do you like it?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: Tastes like it has turned.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, yes. Fermentation. One day, after our queen has taken the Seven Kingdoms...I'd like to have my own vineyard. Make my own wine. The Imp's Delight. Only my close friends could drink it.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Tell me a joke, Missandei of Naath.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I do not know any jokes.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Grey worm?

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Right. Three lords walk into a tavern- - a Stark, a Martell, and a Lannister. They order ale...

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: but when the barkeep brings them over, each of them finds a fly in his cup. The Lannister, outraged, shoves the cup aside and demands another. The Martell plucks the fly out and swallows it whole. The Stark reaches into his cup, pulls out the fly and shouts, “Spit it out, you see shit. Spit it out.”

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's funnier in Westeros.

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: The Starks and the lannisters, i thought these were enemies.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: A joke is like a story, Torgo Nudho. Not a true story, necessarily.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A story that's supposed to make you laugh, ideally. Not at the moment, perhaps.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Missandei, do you like the wine?

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I do.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Tell a joke.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Two translators are on a sinking ship.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: The first says, “Do you know how to swim?” The second says, “No, but I can shout for help in 19 languages.”

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Ah!

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: That is the worst joke I ever heard.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: You don't even know what a joke is.

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: I am soldier all my life. You think I never hear joke?

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You lied to us.

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: I make joke.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: More jokes.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I once walked into a brothel with a honeycomb and a jackass. The madam says- -

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: The Masters have come for their property.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Lord Edmure.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I apologize for the way the Freys treated you. A man of your birth deserved better. You have my word you'll be properly fed and clothes from now on.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: I have your word?

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Oh, good. Good, that's- - that's a fine thing. My uncle will never surrender the castle, ser. Whatever game you're playing.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The Blackfish is an old man. A good death is all he can hope for. But you, you have a child now, I've heard. A son you sired on your wedding night. You're a potent man.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: A son I've never met born of a wife that I haven't seen since our first night together.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You should be with them both. I can arrange that, you realize? Comfortable rooms for you at Casterly Rock. A tutor for your boy, knights to train him to fight and to ride. And when he comes of age, he'll have a keep of his own.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Do you imagine yourself a decent person? Is that it? After you've massacred my family. Kept me in a cell for years. Stolen our lands.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'll remind you that our houses are at war. I'm sorry if this conflict has inconvenienced you, but rebelling against the Crown does have consequences.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Says the man who shoved his sword through his king's back.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Did I give you the impression that this was a negotiation? It's not.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: You understand. On some level you understand that you're an evil man.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'll leave the judgments to the gods.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Well, that is convenient for you. You're a fine-looking fellow, aren't you?

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Your square jaw, your golden armor. Tell me, I want to know. I truly do. How do you live with yourself? All of us have to believe that we're decent, don't we? You have to sleep at night. How do you tell yourself that you're decent after everything that you've done?

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I was your sister's prisoner once. She hit me on the head with a rock if I remember correctly.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Yeah. She should have killed you.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Perhaps, but she didn't. Catelyn Stark hated me just like you hate me. But I didn't hate her. I admired her. Far more than her husband or her son.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Do you think I care whom you admire and whom you don't?

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No, I don't, but I'm telling you anyway because you're my prisoner. You don't have a choice. The love she had for her children, I was a little awed by it. Reminded me of my sister.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Oh. Oh, I see. You're a madman.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm not here to trade insults. Your sister was a strong- -

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Don't talk about Cat!

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'll talk about whomever I want.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: She loved her children. I suppose all mothers do, but Catelyn and Cersei, there's a fierceness you don't often see.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They'd do anything to protect their babies.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Start a war. Burn cities to ash. Free their worst enemies. The things we do for love.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: You didn't come here to talk about our sisters.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: That's exactly why I came here. I love Cersei. You can laugh at that if you want. You can sneer. It doesn't matter. She needs me. And to get back to her, I have to take Riverrun. I'll send for your baby boy.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: And I'll launch him into Riverrun with a catapult. Because you don't matter to me, Lord Edmure. Your son doesn't matter to me. The people in the castle don't matter to me. Only Cersei. And if I have to slaughter every Tully who ever lived to get back to her, that's what I'll do.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: Who goes there?

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Edmure Tully, son of Hoster Tully, and the rightful Lord of Riverrun. I demand entry.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Don't let him in.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: He's the Lord of Riverrun. I have to obey his commands.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: He's been their captive ever since they murdered his king at the Red Wedding. Why do you think the people who murdered his king at the Red Wedding would decide to let him come home? Because it's a trap, you idiot. Don't let him in.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: He's my lord, my lord. I've sworn to serve the Lord of Riverrun and obey his commands.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: You're not obeying Edmure's commands. You're obeying the fucking Kinglsayer's commands.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: I demand entry.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: My lord has given an order.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: WIth a knife to his throat. That is not a valid order.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: Lower the drawbridge and open the gate for Lord Ed- -

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: I'll have your head before I surrender Riverrun.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: You are not lord of this castle, my lord.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: Lower the drawbridge!

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: Aye, ser!

title: No One
Name: black
text: black: If you're wrong, we're just surrendered our most valuable prisoner.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: Welcome home, my lord.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Command all the forces within the castle to lay down their arms. Open the gates.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: My lord- -

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Your lord has given a command.

title: No One
Name: edmure
text: edmure: Find the Blackfish. Put him in irons and hand him over to the Freys.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: Find him.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Go on.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Come with us.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: I've run before from the Red Wedding. I'm not running again. This is my family home.

title: No One
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Your family is in the North. Come with us. Don't die for pride when you can fight for your blood.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: You'll serve Sansa far better than I ever could.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: Go on, now.

title: No One
Name: brynden
text: brynden: I haven't had a proper sword fight in years. I expect I'll make a damn fool of myself.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: We found the Blackfish, my lord.

title: No One
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Good. Bring him to me.

title: No One
Name: guard
text: guard: He died fighting, my lord.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I was wrong. I admit it.

title: No One
Name: missandei
text: missandei: That changes nothing.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Unsullied could mount a defense off the beachhead. If the slavers' forces- -

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: No more talking from you. Your talking gave us this.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And I have acknowledged that. I'm trying- -

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: You're trying to tell me what the army should do. You do not know what the army should do.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: All right, what should the army do?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: We'll not go to the beach. If we go to the beach, the Masters will take the pyramid. The pyramid is the only place in the city we can defend. We stay here.

title: No One
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And then?

title: No One
Name: grey
text: grey: We wait for them to come to us. Then we fight them.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: Clegane.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: What the fuck you doing here?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Chasing them. You?

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Hanging them.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Any particular reason?

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: They're our men. Or they were. They attacked a nearby sept and murdered the villagers. Why do you want them?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Same reason. I was helping build it. They killed a friend of mine.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: You've got friends?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Not anymore. They're mine.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: It's the Brotherhoodo s good name they've dragged through the dirt.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Fuck your name. They're mine. I killed you once before, Dondarrion. Happy to do it again.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Drop that arrow, you bloody girl.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Tougher girls than you have tried to kill me.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: You can have one of them.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Two.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: No, no, no.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: We're not butchers. We hang them.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: hanging? All over in an instant. Where's the punishment in that?

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: They die.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: We all bloody die.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Except this one here. I'll only gut one of them.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: No.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I'll chop off one hand.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: We gave you two of the three out of respect for your loss. That's generous.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Bunch of nancies.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: There was a time I would have killed all seven of you just to gut these three.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: You're getting old, Clegane.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: He's not.

title: No One
Name: lem
text: lem: Please don't. I'll give you anything.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Got anything to eat?

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Enjoying yourself?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I prefer chicken.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: You ought to join us. We could use you.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I tried joining. Didn't work out for me.

title: No One
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Clegane, we're here for a reason. The Lord of Light is keeping Beric alive for a reason. He gave a failed, drunk priest the power to bring him back for a reason. We are part of something larger than ourselves.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Lots of horrible shit in this world gets done for something larger than ourselves.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: Cold winds are rising in the North.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: And you're going to go stop them?

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: We need good men to help us.

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Last time you saw me, you wanted to execute me.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: True enough. But the Lord of Light gave you the power to defeat me. Why?

title: No One
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I beat you because I'm better than you, Beric. I was better than you before you started yammering on about the Lord and I'm better than you now.

title: No One
Name: beric
text: beric: Aye, you're probably right. You're a fighter. You were born a fighter. You walked away from the fight. How did that go? Good and bad, young and old, the things we're fighting will destroy them all alike. You can still help a lot more than you've harmed Clegane, it's not too late for you.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: Lady Crane?

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif: If you'd have done your job, she would have died painlessly.

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif: Instead…

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif: The Many-Faced God was promised a name. He must always receive what is his. You can't change that. I can't change that. No one can. And now he's been promised another name.

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif: It will all be over soon. On your knees or on your feet?

title: No One
Name: waif
text: waif: Haven't we been through this already? That won't help you.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: You told her to kill me.

title: No One
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Yes. But here you are. And there she is.

title: No One
Name: jaqen
text: jaqen: Finally a girl is no one.

title: No One
Name: arya
text: arya: A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and I'm going home.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Despite appearances, I think you'll find the city's on the rise.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Perhaps we should take shelter.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The city is on the rise?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Meereen is strong. Commerce has returned to the markets. The people are behind you.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, not all the people, of course. No ruler that ever lived had the support of all the people. But the rebirth of Meereen is the cause of this violence. The Masters cannot let Meereen succeed. Because if Meereen succeeds, a city without slavery, a city without Masters…

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: it proves that no one needs a Master.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Good. Shall we begin?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do we have a plan?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I will crucify the Masters. I will set their fleets afire, kill every last one of their soldiers, and return their cities to the dirt. That is my plan.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You don't approve?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You once told me you knew what your father was. Did you know his plans for King's Landing when the Lannister armies were at his gates?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Probably not. Well, he told my brother and Jaime told me. He had caches of wildfire hidden under the Red Keep, the Guildhalls, the Sept of Baelor, all the major thoroughfares. He would have burned every one of his citizens. The loyal ones and the trators. Every man, woman, and child. That's why Jaime killed him.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: This is entirely different.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're talking about destroying cities. It's not entirely different. I'd like to suggest an alternate approach.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: razdal
text: razdal: Once before, I offered you peace. If you had not been so arrogant, you could have returned to your homeland with a fleet of ships. Instead, you will flee Slaver's Bay on foot like the beggar queen you are.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We are here to discuss terms of surrender, not to trade insults.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan: The terms are simple. You and your foreign friends will abandon the Great Pyramid and the city of Meereen. The Unsullied you stole from Kraznys mo Nakloz will remain to be sold again to the highest bidder. The translator you stole from Kraznys mo Nakloz will remain to be sold again to the highest bidder. The dragons beneath the Great Pyramid will be slaughtered.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We obviously didn't communicate clearly. We're here to discuss your surrender, not mine.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: razdal
text: razdal: I imagine it's difficult adjust to the new reality. Your reign is over.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My reign has just begun.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Dracarys.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: grey
text: grey: You men have a choice

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: grey
text: grey: fight and die for the masters who would never fight and die for you, or go home to your families.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Thank you for the armada. Our queen does love ships. Now, last time we spoke, we made a pact. You violated that pact. You declared war upon us. Though our queen does have a forgiving nature, this cannot be forgiven.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Our queen insists that one of you must die as punishment for your crimes.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It always seems a bit abstract, doesn't it, other people dying?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: razdal
text: razdal: Him. He should die.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: belicho
text: belicho: Yes, him.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: razdal
text: razdal: He's not one of us. He's an outsider, a lowborn. He does not speak for us.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yezzan
text: yezzan: Please.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Tell your people what happened here. Tell them you live by the grace of Her Majesty. When they come forward with notions of retribution or ideas about returning the slave cities to their former glory, remind the what happened when Daenerys Stormborn and her dragons came to Meereen.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: You don't have to be here.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes, I do.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: My beloved wife. I've missed you terribly.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Thank you for returning Lady Bolton safely. Now, dismount and kneel before me, surrender your army and proclaim me the true Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North. I will pardon you for deserting the Night's Watch. I will pardon these treasonous lords for betraying my house. Come, bastard, you don't have the men, you don't have the horses, and you don't have Winterfell. Why lead those pour souls into slaughter? There's no need for a battle. Get off your hose and kneel. I'm a man of mercy.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: You're right. There's no need for a battle. Thousands of men don't need to die. Only one of us. Let's end this the old way. You against me.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I keep hearing stories about you, bastard. The way people in the North talk about you, you're the greatest swordsman who ever walked. Maybe you are that good. Maybe not. I don't know if I'd beat you. But I know that my army will beat yours. I have 6,000 men. You have, what, half that? Not even?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Aye, you have the numbers. Will your men want to fight for you when they hear you wouldn't fight for them?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: He's good. Very good. Tell me, will you let your little brother die because you're too proud to surrender?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How do we know you have him?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Now, if you want to save —

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton. Sleep well.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: She's a fine woman, your sister. I look forward to having her back in my bed. And you're all fine-looking men. My dogs are desperate to meet you. I haven't fed them for seven days. They're ravenous. I wonder which parts they'll try first. Your eyes? Your balls? We'll find out soon enough. In the morning, then, bastard.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: If he was smart, he'd stay inside the walls of Winterfell and wait us out.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: That's not his way. He knows the North is watching. If the other houses sense weakness on his part, they'll stop fearing him. He can't have that. Fear is his power.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: It's his weakness, too. His mean don't want to fight for him. They're forced to fight for him. If they feel the tide turning...

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: It's not his men that worry me. It's his horses. I know what mounted knights can do to us.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You and Stannis cut through us like piss through snow.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: We're digging trenches all along our flanks. They won't be able to hit us the way that Stannis hit you, in a double envelopment.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: stares blankly at JON SNOW.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: A pincer move.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: They won't be able to hit us from the sides.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Good.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: It's crucial that we let them charge at us. They've got the numbers, we need the patience. If we let him buckle our center, he'll pursue. Then we'll have him surrounded on three sides.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Did you really think that cunt would fight you man to man?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: No. But I wanted to make him angry. I want him coming at us full tilt.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: We should all get some sleep.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Rest, Jon Snow. We need you sharp tomorrow.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: So you've met the enemy, drawn up your battle plans.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Aye, for what they're worth.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You've known him for the space of a single conversation, you and your trusted advisors, and you sit around and make your plans on how to defeat a man you don't know. I lived with him. I know the way his mind works. I know how he likes to hurt people. Did it ever once occur to you that I might have some insight?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: You're right.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You think he's going to fall into your trap. He won't He's the one who lays traps.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: He's overconfident.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He plays with people. He's far better at it than you. He's been doing it all his life.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Aye, and what have I been doing all my life? Playing with broomsticks? I fought beyond the Wall against worse than Ramsay Bolton. I've defended the Wall from worse than Ramsay Bolton.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You don't know him.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: All right, tell me. What should we do? How do we get Rickon back?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: We'll never get him back. Rickon is Ned Starks trueborn son, which makes him a greater threat to Ramsay than you, a bastard, or me, a girl. As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: We can't give up on our brother.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Listen to me, please. He wants you to make a mistake.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Of course he does. What should I do differently?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I don't know! I don't know anything about battles! Just don't do what he wants you to do.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Aye, that's good advice.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You think that's obvious?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Well, it is a bit obvious.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: If you had asked for my advice earlier, I would have told you not to attack Winterfell until we have a larger force, or is that obvious, too?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: When will we have a larger force?! We've pleaded with every house that'll have us! The Blackfish can't help us! We're lucky to have this many men!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's not enough!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Now, it's not enough! It's what we have! Battles have been won against greater odds.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: If Ramsay wins, I'm not going back there alive. Do you understand me?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: SNOW I won't ever let him touch you again. I'll protect you, I promise.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No one can protect me. No one can protect anyone.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: You think there's hope?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I've never seen these Bolton fuckers fight. And they've never seen the free folk fight, so, yes, there's hope. You want to avenge your king, don't you?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: It wasn't the Boltons defeated Stannis. It was Stannis himself. I loved the man. He lifted me up and made me something. But he had demons in his skull whispering foul things.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You saw these demons?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: What?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: No, it's a manner of speaking. Not actual demons.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Oh. Well, you loved that cunt Stannis and I loved the man he burned. Mance didn't have demons in his skull. He didn't torch people or listen to some red witch. I believed in him. I thought he was the man to lead us through the Long Night. But I was wrong just like you.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: Maybe that was our mistake, believing in kings.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Jon Snow's not a king.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: No, he's not.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I need a good drink to help me sleep the night before a fight. You want some? I have a jug of sour goat's milk stronger than any of that grape water you southern twats like sucking on.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: No, thanks. It does sound delicious, but I better keep a clear head. I can never sleep the night before a battle.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: So what do you do all night?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: I walk. Think and walk. Think and walk until I'm far enough away from camp that no one can hear me shitting my guts out.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Happy shitting.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: My lady. You weren't at the war council.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I'm not a soldier.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Any advice?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Don't lose.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: If I do, if I fall, don't bring me back.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I'll have to try.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm ordering you not to bring me back.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I am not your servant, Jon Snow.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: You're in my camp. I'm the commander.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I serve the Lord of Light. I do what he commands.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: How do you know what he commands?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I interpret his signs as well as I can. If the Lord didn't want me to bring you back, how did I bring you back? I have no power. Only what he gives me and he gave me you.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Why?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I don't know. Maybe you're only needed for this small part of his plan and nothing else. Maybe he brought you here to die again.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: What kind of god would do something like that?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The one we've got.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Last time we saw each other was at Winterfell, yes? You were making jokes about my height, I seem to recall. Everyone who makes a joke about a dwarf's height thinks he's the only person ever to make a joke about a dwarf's height. “The height of nobility,” “a man of your stature,” “someone to look up to.” You're all making the same five or six jokes.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: It was a long time ago.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It was. And how have things been going for you since then? Not so well, I gather. Can't imagine you would have murdered the Stark boys if things had been going well.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: I didn't murder the Stark boys. But I did things that were just as bad or worse.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara: And he paid for them.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Doesn't seem like it. He's still alive. It was complicated for you, I'm sure, growing up at Winterfell. Never quite knowing who you were. But then, we all live complicated lives, don't we?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You've brought us 100 ships from the Iron Fleet with men to sail them. In return, I expect you want me to support your claim to the throne of the Iron Islands?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: Not my claim. Hers.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what's wrong with you?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: I'm not fit to rule.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We can agree upon that at least.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Has the Iron Islands ever had a queen before?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara: No more than Westeros.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Lord Tyrion tells me your father was a terrible king.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara: You and I have that in common.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We do. And both murdered by a usurper as well.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Will their ships be enough?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: With the former Masters' fleet, possibly. Barely. There are more than 100 ships in the Iron Fleet.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: There are and Euron is building more. He's going to offer them to you.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: So why shouldn't I wait for him?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: The Iron Fleet isn't all he's bringing. He also wants to give you --

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara: His big cock, I think he said. Euron's offer is also an offer of marriage, you see. You won't get one without the other.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And I imagine your offer is free of any marriage demands?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara: I never demand, but I'm up for anything, really.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He'll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Seven Kingdoms.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: All of them.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And you don't want the Seven Kingdoms?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: theon
text: theon: Your ancestors defeated ours and took the Iron Islands. We ask you to give them back.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And that's all?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara: We'd like you to help us murder an uncle or two who don't think a woman's fit to rule.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Reasonable.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What if everyone starts demanding their independence?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: She's not demanding, she's asking. The others are free to ask as well. Our father were evil men, all of us here. They left the world worse than they found it. We're not going to do that. We're going to leave the world better than we found it.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You will support my claim as queen of the Seven Kingdoms and respect the integrity of the Seven Kingdoms. No more reaving, roving, raiding, or raping.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara: That's our way of life.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No more.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: yara
text: yara: No more.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Do you like games, little man? Let's play a game. Run to your brother. The sooner you make it to him, the sooner you get to see him. That's it. That's the game. Easy. Ready? Go.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: No, you have to run, remember? Those are the rules.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Don't.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: Prepare to charge! Prepare to charge!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: Go! Go! Follow your commander!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Run and fight!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Now.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: karstark
text: karstark: Cavalry, charge!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: We'll just kill our own men. Stand down.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Loose!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: Get word --

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: We may as well be taking shits back here.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: Follow!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: It's time, go.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon: Who owns the North?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: all
text: all: We do!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: smalljon
text: smalljon: Show me!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Hey!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: man
text: man: Infantry, advance!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: davos
text: davos: With me, lads! Break their line!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: man
text: man: Tormund!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: man
text: man: Get him back!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Fuck this, come on!

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Their army's gone.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: man
text: man: Our army's gone.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: We have Winterfell. They don't have the men for a siege. All we have to do is wait.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: You suggested one on one combat, didn't you?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: I've reconsidered. I think that sounds like a wonderful idea.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: jon
text: jon: We're going to bury my brother in the crypt next to my father.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Jon.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Where is he?

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Ah. Sansa. Hello, Sansa. Is this where I'll be staying now? No. Our time together is about to come to an end. That's all right. You can't kill me. I'm part of you now.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Your words will disappear. Your house will disappear. Your name will disappear. All memory of you will disappear.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: My hounds will never harm me.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You haven't fed them in seven days. You said it yourself.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: They're loyal beasts.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: sansa
text: sansa: They were. Now they're starving.

title: Battle of the Bastards
Name: ramsay
text: ramsay: Sit. Down! Down! Down! Down! Down!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: attendant
text: attendant: Your Grace. The trial will be getting underway soon.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: mistress
text: mistress: You got my money?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Later. Go away.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: girl
text: girl: Grand Maester.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Ser Loras Tyrell. Are you prepared to stand trial and profess your guilt or innocence before the Seven?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras: There'll be no need for a trial. I confess before the Seven and freely admit to my crimes.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: To which crimes will you be confessing?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras: All of them. I lay with other men including the traitor Renly Baratheon.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
