text: loras: I perjured myself before the gods. I am guilty of depravity… dishonesty, profligacy, and arrogance. I see that now. I humble myself before the Seven and accept whatever punishment the gods deem just.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: The gods' judgment is fierce, but also fair. The Warrior punishes those who believe themselves beyond the reach of justice. But the Mother shows her mercy to those who kneel before her.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras: I take full responsibility for my many sins and unburden myself of my desires. My only remaining wish is to devote my life to the Seven. May I be a living example of their grace for others to witness.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You understand fully what this means?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras: I do. I will abandon the Tyrell name and all that goes with it. I will renounce my lordship and my claims on Highgarden. I will never marry and I will never father children.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Brother Loras…

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: I ask you to dedicate your life to the seven gods.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Will you fight to defend your faith against heretics and apostates?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: loras
text: loras: I will.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: mace
text: mace: No, I can't let them…

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Faith is the way, Father.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tommen
text: tommen: All right. I'm ready.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tommen
text: tommen: I have to go, I'm-- I'm late for the trial.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: You mutilated him. You gave me your word.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: I've kept my word. Once the queen mother's trial is concluded, Brother Loras is free to leave.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: And where is the queen mother?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Her litter never left the Red Keep.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: It appears the queen mother doesn't wish to attend her own trial.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: Go to the Red Keep and show her the way.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lancel
text: lancel: Get the others.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: Where's the king?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Elsewhere, I'm afraid.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: pycelle
text: pycelle: What's the meaning of this? I was told that-- I have more important things to do with my time than waste them in the presence--

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Please, Grand Maester. I bear you no ill will. Please forgive me if you can.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: This pains me, my lord. Whatever your faults, you do not deserve to die alone in such a cold, dark place. But sometimes before we can usher in the new, the old must be put to rest.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lancel
text: lancel: The longer you wait, the worse it'll be for you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lancel
text: lancel: What are you doing?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: There's something wrong.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: You have nothing to fear, Your Grace. The trial will begin shortly.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Cersei is not here. Tommen is not here. Why do you think they are not here?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sparrow
text: sparrow: If the accused is not here, she will be tried regardless. We cannot escape the justice of the gods--

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I'm telling you. Cersei understands the consequences of her absence and she is absent anyway, which means she does not intend to suffer those consequences. The trial can wait. We all need to leave.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: We all need to leave now!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Loras. Stay with me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Let me through. Let me through. Get out of my way.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: margaery
text: margaery: Let us through!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Confess. Confess.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: septa
text: septa: No.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Confess.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Confess. It felt good. Beating me, starving me, frightening me, humiliating me. You didn't do it because you cared about my atonement. You did it because it felt good. I understand. I do things because they feel good. I drink because it feels good. I killed my husband because it felt good to be rid of him. I fuck my brother because it feels good to feel him inside me. I lie about fucking my brother… because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites. I killed your High Sparrow… and all his little sparrows… all his septons, all his septas, all his filthy soldiers, because it felt good to watch them burn. It felt good to imagine their shock and their pain. No thought has ever given me greater joy. Even confessing feels good under the right circumstances.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You've always been quiet.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died. Do you remember?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: septa
text: septa: Good. I'm glad to see your face. I'm ready to meet the gods.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What? Now? Today? You're not going to die today. You're not going to die for quite a while. Ser Gregor.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: This is Ser Gregor Clegane. He's quiet, too.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Your gods have forsaken you. This is your god now.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Shame.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: attendant
text: attendant: I'm very sorry, Your Grace. Very sorry.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: For House Lannister!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: men
text: men: Hear me roar!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: For House Frey!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: men
text: men: We stand together!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: May we stand together through the centuries, good friends to the last.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: And when we drive our swords through our enemies' hearts, may we speak the words of our alliance, “The Freys and the Lannisters send their regards.”

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You don't even have to do anything, do you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You just sit there, a rich slab of beef, and all the birds come pecking.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You're welcome to her.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn: She doesn't want me. She wants your golden fingers up her twat.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Those two have their eyes on you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn: They have their eyes on you, cunt.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Not my type.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Not blonde enough?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Ladies, have you met Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, hero of the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: There you go.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Maybe I'm not in the mood.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Fuck it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bronn
text: bronn: No need to call me ser just because I'm an anointed knight.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: This came together rather well. Your father would be pleased.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm sure he would be.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: Edmure is back in a cell. Can't go killing my son by law. It wouldn't be right. Give the family a bad name.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: So the famous Blackfish killed by footsoldiers, eh? Legendary warrior, everyone said.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Have you done much fighting yourself, Lord Frey?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: I'm a bit old for all that.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No, but back in your day.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: The purpose of fighting is defeating your enemies, isn't it?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: I've defeated mine. Riverrun belonged to House Tully for a thousand years. Now it's mine. What do you call that? Victory.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Yes, you're a great conqueror.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: Go on, mock me, boy. You think I mind? The Tullys mocked me for years. The Starks mocked me. Where are they now? You talk about war as if you're an expert but the one battle I remember you fighting, you were captured by Robb Stark, the Young Wolf. But it doesn't matter. Here we are now, two kingslayers. We know what it's like to have them grovel to our faces and snigger behind our backs. We don't mind, do we? Fear is a marvelous thing.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They don't fear the Freys, though. They fear the Lannisters. We gave you the Riverlands to hold the Riverlands. If we have to ride north and take them back for you every time you lose them, why do we need you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Show me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Your Grace, there's no need--

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: What are your thoughts concerning the king's funeral? As the Sept of Baelor is no longer an option, perhaps a ceremony in the throne room?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He should be with his grandfather, his brother, his sister. Burn him and bury his ashes where the sept once stood.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam: Hello.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam: From Lord Commander Snow at Castle Black.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam: I'm-- I'm to be the new maester.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester: Oh.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester: According to our records, Jeor Mormont is Lord Commander.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam: He died.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester: We received no report from the maester at Castle Black.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam: Maester Aemon became quite ill shortly after the election. He's since passed away. Which is why I'm here.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester: This is irregular.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sam
text: sam: Yes, well, I suppose that life is irregular.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester: The archmaester will discuss these irregularities with you. In the meantime, you are permitted to use the library. Follow me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: maester
text: maester: No women or children!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I'd sit down there.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Could have been worse, Jon Snow. You had a family. You had feasts.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: Aye, you're right. I was luckier than most.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: What is that?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: Tell him. Tell him who it belonged to.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The Princess Shireen.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: Tell him what you did to her. Tell him!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: We burned her at the stake.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: Why?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The army was trapped. The horses were dying. It was the only way.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: You burned a little girl alive!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I only do what my Lord commands!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: If he commands you to burn children, your Lord is evil!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: We are standing here because of him. Jon Snow is alive because the Lord willed it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: I loved that girl like she was my own. She was good. She was kind. And you killed her!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: So did her father. So did her mother. Her own blood knew it was the only way.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: The only way for what? They all died anyway! You told everyone Stannis was the one. You had him believing it, all of them fooled. And you lied.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I didn't lie. I was wrong.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: Aye, you were wrong. How many died because you were wrong?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: I ask your leave to execute this woman for murder. She admits to the crime.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: Do you have anything to say for yourself?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I've been ready to die for many years. If the Lord was done with me, so be it, but he's not. You've seen the Night King, Jon Snow. You know the great war is still to come. You know the army of the dead will be upon us soon. And you know I can help you win that war.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: Ride south today. If you return to the North, I'll have you hanged as a murderer.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: davos
text: davos: If you ever come back this way, I will execute you myself.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm having the lordo s chamber prepared for you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Mother and Father's room? You should take it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm not a Stark.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You are to me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: You're the Lady of Winterfell. You deserve it. We're standing here because of you. The battle was lost until the Knights of the Vale rode in. They came because of you. You told me Lord Baelish sold you to the Boltons.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He did.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: And you trust him?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Only a fool would trust Littlefinger. I should have told you about him, about the Knights of the Vale. I'm sorry.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: We need to trust each other. We can't fight a war amongst ourselves. We have so many enemies now.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Jon.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: A raven came from the Citadel. A white raven. Winter is here.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: Well, Father always promised, didn't he?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated. 100 red scorpions, was it?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: You have nothing to fear from us, Lady Olenna.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: You murder your own prince, but you expect me to trust you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: obara
text: obara: We invited you to Dorne because we needed your help. You came to Dorne because you needed our help?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: What is your name again? Barbaro?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: obara
text: obara: Obara.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Obara. You look like an angry little boy. Don't presume to tell me what I need.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: Forgive my sister. What she lacks in diplomacy, she makes--

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Do shut up, dear.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Anything from you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: No? Good. Let the grown women speak.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: The Lannisters have declared war on House Tyrell. They have declared war on Dorne. We must be allies now if we wish to survive.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Cersei stole the future from me. She killed my son. She killed my grandson. She killed my granddaughter. Survival is not what I'm after now.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: You're absolutely right. I chose the wrong words. It is not survival I offer. It is your heart's desire.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And what is my heart's desire?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Vengeance. Justice.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: varys
text: varys: Fire and blood.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: Your ships are nearly ready. I saw them painting the sails.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: I'm curious to see how the Dothraki do on the poison water.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You're not coming with us.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: New strategy? You want the Second Sons to attack from the west coast? If we take Casterly Rock, the Lannisters will have nowhere to run when you hit King's Landing.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You're not going to Westeros. You're staying here with the Second Sons. There's finally peace in Meereen. You will keep the peace while the people choose their own leaders.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: Fuck Meereen. Fuck the people. I'm here for you, not them.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You promised me. “My sword is yours. My life is yours.” This is what I command. If I'm going to rule in Westeros, I'll need to make alliances. The best way to make alliances is with marriage.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: Who are you marrying this time?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I don't know. Maybe no one.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: But you need to lure all the noble houses to the table? Are you a queen or fish bait?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I can't bring a lover to Westeros.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: A king wouldn't think twice about it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: So that's what you want? To be my mistress?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: I'm not proud. I don't care what perfumed aristocrat sits beside you in the throne room. I don't want a crown. I want you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: I love you. And I make you happy. You know I do. Bring me with you. Let me fight for you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I can't.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: The dwarf told you to do this.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No one tells me to do anything.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: Clever fellow. Can't argue with his logic. I'm no use to you over there.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Don't get angry.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: I'm not angry. I'm full of self-pity. Who comes after you? Who can ever follow Daenerys Stormborn, the Mother of Dragons?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: A great number of women, I imagine. Specific orders will be left for you regarding the welfare of Meereen and the Bay of Dragons.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: Bay of Dragons?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We can't call it Slaver's Bay anymore, can we?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: You'll get that throne you want so badly, I'm sure of it. I hope it brings you happiness.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daario
text: daario: I pity the lord of Westeros. They have no idea what's coming for them.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Farewell, Daario Naharis.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: How did he take it?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No tears.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I know it was hard for you. You turned away a man who truly loves you because he would have been a liability in the Seven Kingdoms. That's the kind of self-sacrifice that makes for a good ruler, if it's any consolation.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It's not.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, I suppose not. I'm terrible at consoling.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Yes, you really are.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: All right, how about the fact that this is actually happening? You have your armies, you have your ships, you have your dragons. Everything you've ever wanted since you were old enough to want anything. It's all yours for the taking. Are you afraid?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Good. You're in the great game now. And the great game's terrifying. The only people who aren't afraid of failure are madmen like your father.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Do you know what frightens me? I said farewell to a man who loves me. A man I thought I cared for. And I felt nothing. Just impatient to get on with it.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: He wasn't the first to love you and he won't be the last.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Well, you have completely failed to console me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: For what it's worth, I've been a cynic for as long as I can remember. Everyone's always asking me to believe in things-- family, gods, kings, myself. It was often tempting until I saw where belief got people. So I said no, thank you to belief. And yet here I am.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I believe in you. It's embarrassing, really. I'd swear you my sword, but I don't actually own a sword.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It's your counsel I need.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's yours. Now and always.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Good. I, um… I had something made for you. I'm not sure if it's right.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Tyrion Lannister, I name you Hand of the Queen.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: You're not one of mine, are you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden: No, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: Didn't think so. Too pretty.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: Where are my damn moron sons? Black Walder and Lothar promised to be here by midday.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden: They're here, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: Well, what are they doing, trimming their cunt hairs? Tell them to come here now.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden: But they're already here, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden: Here, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: handmaiden
text: handmaiden: They weren't easy to carve. Especially Black Walder.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: walder
text: walder: What…

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: arya
text: arya: My name is Arya Stark. I want you to know that. The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Forgive me, my lady… if you're at prayer.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm done with all that. I came here every day when I was a girl. I prayed to be somewhere else. Back then I only ever thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I was a stupid girl.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You were a child.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What do you want?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I thought you knew what I wanted.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I was wrong.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No, you weren't. Every time I'm faced with a decision, I close my eyes and see the same picture. Whenever I consider an action, I ask myself will this action help to make this picture a reality? Pull it out of my mind and into the world? And I only act if the answer is yes. A picture of me on the Iron Throne… and you by my side.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's a pretty picture.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr: News of this battle will spread quickly through the Seven Kingdoms. I've declared for House Stark for all to hear.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You've declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish. It's never stopped you from serving yourself.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The past is gone for good. You can sit here mourning its departure or you can prepare for the future. You, my love, are the future of House Stark. Who should the North rally behind? A trueborn daughter of Ned and Catelyn Stark born here at Winterfell or a motherless bastard born in the south?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: benjen
text: benjen: This is where I leave you.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: meera
text: meera: You're not coming with us?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: benjen
text: benjen: The Wall is not just ice and stone. Ancient spells were carved into its foundations. Strong magic to protect men from what lies beyond. And while it stands, the dead cannot pass. I cannot pass.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: meera
text: meera: Where will you go?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: benjen
text: benjen: The great war is coming and I still fight for the living. I'll do what I can… as long as I can.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bran
text: bran: Thank you, Uncle Benjen.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: benjen
text: benjen: I wish you both good fortune.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: meera
text: meera: Are you sure you're ready for this?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: bran
text: bran: I'm the Three-Eyed Raven now. I have to be ready for this.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: Ned?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Lyanna.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: Is that you? Is that really you?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: You're not a dream.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard: No, I'm not a dream. I'm here. Right here.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I've missed you, big brother.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard: I've missed you, too.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I want to be brave.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Shh. You are.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I'm not.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I don't want to die.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard: You're not going to die.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Get her some water!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: No, no water.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: eddard
text: eddard: Is there a maester?

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: Please. Listen to me, Ned.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: If Robert finds out, he'll kill him, you know he will. You have to protect him. Promise me, Ned. Promise me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: Promise me, Ned. Promise me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: vale
text: vale: You can't expect Knights of the Vale to side with wildling invaders.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: tormund
text: tormund: We didn't invade. We were invited.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: vale
text: vale: Not by me.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won. My father uses to say we find our true friends on the battlefield.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: man
text: man: The Boltons are defeated. The war is over. Winter has come. If the maesters are right, it'll be the coldest one in a thousand years. We should ride home and wait out the coming storms.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won't wait out the storm. He brings the storm.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: Your son was butchered at the Red Wedding, Lord Manderly. But you refused the call. You swore allegiance to House Stark, Lord Glover, but in their hour of greatest need, you refused the call. And you, Lord Cerwyn, your father was skinned alive by Ramsay Bolton. Still you refuse the call. But House Mormont remembers. The North remembers. We know no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark. I don't care if he's a bastard. Ned Stark's blood runs through his veins. He's my king from this day until his last day.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: manderly
text: manderly: Lady Mormont speaks harshly and truly. My son died for Robb Stark, the Young Wolf. I didn't think we'd find another king in my lifetime. I didn't commit my men to your cause ‘cause I didn't want more Manderlys dying for nothing. But I was wrong. Jon Snow avenged the Red Wedding. He is the White Wolf. The King in the North.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: glover
text: glover: I did not fight beside you on the field and I will regret that until my dying day. A man can only admit when he was wrong and ask forgiveness.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jon
text: jon: There's nothing to forgive, my lord.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: glover
text: glover: There will be more fights to come. House Glover will stand behind House Stark as we have for a thousands years. And I will stand behind Jon Snow… the King in the North!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: glover
text: glover: The King in the North!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: all
text: all: The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North!

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Come on.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: I now proclaim Cersei of the House Lannister First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Long may she reign.

title: The Winds of Winter
Name: all
text: all: Long may she reign.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder: You're wonder why I brought you all here. After all, we just had a feast. Since when does old Walder give us two feasts in a single fortnight?

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder: Well, it's no good being lord of the Riverlands if you can't celebrate with your family. That's what I say!

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder: I've gathered every Frey who means a damn thing so I can tell you my plans for this great house now that winter has come. But first, a toast! No more of that Dornish horse piss! This is the finest Arbor gold! Proper wine for proper heroes!

title: Dragonstone
Name: waldery
text: waldery: Stand together!

title: Dragonstone
Name: all
text: all: Stand together!

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder: Not you. I'm not wasting good wine on a damn woman.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder: Maybe I'm not the most pleasant man. I'll admit it. But I'm proud of you lot. You're my family, the men who helped me slaughter the Starks at the Red Wedding.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder: Yes, yes. Cheer. Brave men, all of you. Butchered a woman pregnant with her babe. Cut the throat of a mother of five. Slaughtered your guests after inviting them into your home. But you didn't slaughter every one of the Starks.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder: No, no, that was your mistake. You should have ripped them all out, root and stem.

title: Dragonstone
Name: walder
text: walder: Leave one wolf alive and the sheep are never safe.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.

title: Dragonstone
Name: edd
text: edd: You wildlings?

title: Dragonstone
Name: meera
text: meera: I'm Meera Reed, daughter of Howland Reed. This is Brandon Stark, son of Ned Stark.

title: Dragonstone
Name: edd
text: edd: How do I know that's true?

title: Dragonstone
Name: bran
text: bran: You were at the Fist of the First Men. You were at Hardhome. You've seen the Army of the Dead. You've seen the Night King. He's coming for us. For all of us.

title: Dragonstone
Name: edd
text: edd: Okay, come on. Let's get them inside.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: I want every northern maester to scour their records for any mention of dragonglass. Dragonglass kills white walkers. It's more valuable to us now than gold. We need to find it, we need to mine it, we need to make weapons from it. Everyone aged 10 to 60 will drill daily with spears, pikes, bow and arrow.

title: Dragonstone
Name: robett
text: robett: It's about time we taught these boys of summer how to fight.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Not just the boys.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: We can't defend the North if only half the population is fighting.

title: Dragonstone
Name: robett
text: robett: You expect me to put a spear in my granddaughter's hand?

title: Dragonstone
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: I don't plan on knitting by the fire while men fight for me. I might be small, Lord Glover, and I might be a girl, but I am every bit as much a Northerner as you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: robett
text: robett: Indeed you are, my lady. No one has questioned--

title: Dragonstone
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: And I don't need your permission to defend the North.

title: Dragonstone
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: We'll begin training every man, woman, boy, and girl on Bear Island.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: While we're preparing for attack, we need to shore up our defenses. The only thing standing between us and the Army of the Dead is the Wall and the Wall hasn't been properly manned in centuries. I'm not the king of the Free Folk.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: But if we're going to survive this winter together...

title: Dragonstone
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You want us to man the castles for you?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Last time we saw the Night King was at Hardhome. The closest castle to Hardhome is Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

title: Dragonstone
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Then that's where I'll go. Looks like we're the Night's Watch now.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: If they breach the wall, the first two castles in their path are Last Hearth and Karhold.

title: Dragonstone
Name: yohn
text: yohn: The Umbers and the Karstarks betrayed the North. Their castles should be torn down with not a stone left standing.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.

title: Dragonstone
Name: all
text: all: Aye!

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: The Umbers and the Karstarks have fought beside the Starks for centuries. They've kept faith for generation after generation.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And then they broke faith.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm not going to strip these families of their ancestral homes because of the crimes of a few reckless sons.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: The punishment for treason is death. Smalljon Umber died on the field of battle. Harald Karstark died on the field of battle.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: When I was Lord Commander of the Night's Watch I executed men who betrayed me. I executed men who refused to follow orders. My father always said, "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword," and I have tried to live by those words. But I will not punish a son for his father's sins, and I will not take a family home away from a family it has belonged to for centuries. That is my decision, and my decision is final.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Ned Umber.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Alys Karstark.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: For centuries, our families fought side by side on the battlefield. I ask you to pledge your loyalty once again to House Stark, to serve as our bannermen and come to our aid whenever called upon.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Stand.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Yesterday's wars don't matter anymore. The North needs to band together, all the living north. Will you stand beside me, Ned and Alys, now and always?

title: Dragonstone
Name: ned
text: ned: Now and always!

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: You are my sister, but I am king now.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Will you start wearing a crown?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: When you question my decisions in front of the other lords and ladies, you undermine me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: So I can't question your decisions anymore?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Of course you can, but--

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Do you think I'm Joffrey?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're as far from Joffrey as anyone I've ever met.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Thank you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're good at this, you know.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: At what?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: At ruling.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: No.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why are you laughing?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: What did father used to say? Everything before the word "but" is horse shit.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He never said that to me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: No. No, he never cursed in front of his girls.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: All right, I'll stop trying to protect you and you stop trying to undermine me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm not trying to undermine you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: And how should I be smarter? By listening to you?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Would that be so terrible?

title: Dragonstone
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: A raven from King's Landing, Your Grace.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Cersei of House Lannister, First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms--

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What does she want?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: Come to King's Landing. Bend the knee or suffer the fate of all traitors.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him. And believe me, you'd think of little else if you had, too.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: There's a thousand miles between us and Cersei. Winter is here. The Lannisters are a southern army. They've never ranged this far north.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jon
text: jon: You almost sound as if you admire her.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I learned a great deal from her.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What is this?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Its what we've been waiting for our whole lives. It's what Father trained us for, whether he knew it or not.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He knew it. Made me memorize every damn city, town, lake, forest, and mountain.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It's ours now, we just have to take it.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You've been quiet since you came home. Are you angry with me?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No, not angry.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Are you afraid of me?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Should I be?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Daenerys Targaryen has chosen Tyrion to be her Hand. Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne. Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our first-born son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel. He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada. Where will they land?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Dragonstone.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They have deep-water ports for the ships. Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Enemies to the east.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Enemies to the south--Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Enemies to the west--Olenna, the old cunt. Another traitor.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Enemies to the north. Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him. Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors. You're in command of the Lannister army now. How do we proceed?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Winter is here. We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses. The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: If they think Daenerys will win. No one wants to fight on the losing side. Right now, we look like the losing side.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Three kingdoms, at best. I'm not sure you understand how much danger we're in.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I understand we're in a war for survival. I understand whoever loses dies. I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: A dynasty for whom? Our children are dead. We're the last of us.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: A dynasty for us, then.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We never talked about Tommen.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: There's nothing to say.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Our baby boy killed himself.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He betrayed me. He betrayed us both. Should we spend our days mourning the dead--mother, father, and all our children?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Cersei--

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I loved them. I did. But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood. We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Even Lannisters can't survive without allies. Where are our allies now? You saw what happened to Walder Frey and his family.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I heard. How could we ever trust a man like that?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We couldn't. He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us. Now they're all dead. Whoever killed them is no friend of ours. We need allies. Stronger, better allies. We can't win this war alone.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You think I listened to Father for 40 years and learned nothing?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The Greyjoys? You invited the Greyjoys to King's Landing?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Not all of them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Well, it looks like all of them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands. You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies. There you are.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: How are they better allies? How are they different from the Freys? They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: So does everyone when it suits them. Unlike the Freys, they have ships. And they're good at killing.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They're not good at anything. I know the Ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people. All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Oh, what did he come here for, then?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: A queen.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: The moment I was chosen Lord of the Iron Islands, they turned on me. Their own uncle. They stole my best ships and ran. Sailed the right across the world and gave them to the Dragon Queen so she could bring her armies here to attack you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: It's nothing compares to the treason you suffered at the hands of a family members, from what I hear. But still, it bothers me. Murdering them would make me feel a lot better. And since it appears that all our treasonous family members are fighting for the same side, I thought we rightful monarchs could murder them together.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You're not a rightful monarch, though, are you?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The Greyjoys rebelled agains the throne for the right to be monarchs, but as I recall, you were soundly defeated. Come to mention it, weren't you the one who started that rebellion by sailing to Casterly Rock and burning the Lannister fleet? You certainly caught us there. Very smart move on your part. Of course, we all made it to the Iron Islands anyway. I was there.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: I remember very well. I saw you. I heard so much talk. The best in the world. No one can stop him. I didn't believe it, to be honesty. But I must say, when you rushed through the breach and started cutting people down...it was glorious. Like a dance.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The people I was cutting down were your own kin.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: The place was getting crowded. I enjoyed watching it. I truly did.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jaime
text: jaime: And I enjoyed killing Greyjoys.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: A good thing for me. If you hadn't crushed us, I wouldn't have gone into exile. If I hadn't done that, I wouldn't be the greatest captain on the 14 seas.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If not the most humble.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: You're not humble. You're the queen of a great nation. You don't care about the Iron Islands. They're nothing but rocks and bird shit and--and a lot of very unattractive people. The Iron Fleet, on the other hand, that's something else entirely. It's the greatest armada Westeros has ever seen. With the Iron Fleet, you own the seas. You can defeat the invaders of the east and the pretenders of the north and south.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What do you want in return?

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: Ever since I was a little boy, I wanted to grow up and mary the most beautiful woman in the world. So here I am, with a thousand ships and two good hands.

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I decline your proposal.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: Why?

title: Dragonstone
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're not trustworthy. You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity. You murdered your own brother.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: You should try it. Feels wonderful.

title: Dragonstone
Name: euron
text: euron: I don't expect you to trust me outright. You need proof of my honest intentions. In my experience, the surest way to a woman's heart is with a gift. A priceless gift. I won't return to King's Landing until I have that for you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Ah, Maester Weyland. A drinker's liver if ever I saw one.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Weigh that.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: The triumph of transitory pleasures. Mankindo s curse.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: Archmaester, I was wondering...

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: What's the weight?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: Um, 147.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: I was wondering if you had considered my proposition.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: I don't remember your proposition.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: That area is reserved for maesters. Are you a maester?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: No.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Not a very strong proposition, is it?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: Archmaester, with respect, I've seen them--the Army of the Dead. The white walkers. W was sent here to learn how to defeat them, but everyone in the Citadel, those who will even talk to me, they all doubt the walkers ever existed in the first place.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Everyone in the Citadel doubts everything. It's their job. But the tales of the Long Night can't be pure fabrication. Too many similarities from unconnected sources.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: Sources in the restricted area?

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: The very same. And the simplest explanation for your grating obsession with the white walkers is that you're telling the truth and that you saw what you say you saw.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: So, you believe me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: I do. You'll finish weighing that heart?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: That makes you the only person south of the Twins who does.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: We're not lie the people south of the Twins. And we're not like the people north of the Twins. In the Citadel, we lead different lives for different reasons. We are this worldo s memory, Samwell Tarly. Without us, men would be little better than dogs. Don't remember any meal but the last, can't see forward to any but the next. And every time you leave the house and shut the door, they howl like you're gone forever. When Robert's Rebellion was raging, people that the end was near. The end of the Targaryen dynasty. "How will we survive?" When Aegon Targaryen turned his eye westward and flew his dragons to Blackwater Rush--"The end is near! How will we survive?" And thousands of year before that, during the Long Night, we can forgive them for thinking it truly was the end. But it wasn't. None of it was. The Wall has stood through it all. And every winter that ever came has ended.

title: Dragonstone
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Be a good lad. Clean this up.

title: Dragonstone
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Nope.

title: Dragonstone
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You're a lucky man.

title: Dragonstone
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I've heard she beat the Hound in single combat. She's a very impressive woman.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What do you want, Lord Baelish?

title: Dragonstone
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I want you to be happy. I want you to be safe.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: petyr
text: petyr: What about happy? Why aren't you happy? What do you want that you do not have?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: At the moment, peace and quiet.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.

title: Dragonstone
Name: petyr
text: petyr: My lady.

title: Dragonstone
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Why is he still here?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.

title: Dragonstone
Name: brienne
text: brienne: He wants something.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I know exactly what he wants.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: He rode through the streets of the city / Down from his hill on high / O'er the winds and the steps and the cobble / He rode to a woman's sigh / For she was his secret treasure / She was his shame and his bliss / And a chain and a keep are nothing / Compared to a woman's kiss / For hands of gold are always cold / But a woman's hands are warm / For hands of gold are always cold / But a woman's hands are--

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: That's a pretty song. I've never heard it before.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: It's a new one.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Are you hungry? We've got some rabbit.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't want to steal your food.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: You're not stealing, we're offering. Come on, it's gonna be a cold night.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: You heading south?

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: King's Landing.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Poor girl.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: Not so bad, is it?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Depends on your taste, I guess. If you like your streets covered in shit and pig's blood, it's the town for you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: All my life, I wanted to see the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor, the Dragonpit. Then when I finally make it, they wouldn't let me within a mile of the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor's blown to hell, and the Dragonpit is a damn ruin.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: The people who live there, they'd skin you alive if they could make two coppers off your hide.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Worst place in the world.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: What are you doing in the Riverlands?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: There's been some trouble with the Freys up at The Twins, so we're part of the army that's been sent to keep the peace.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Here you go. Guests first.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: Oh, no, I couldn't. You don't have enough.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: My mother always told me to be kind to strangers. Strangers will be kind to you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: You're a long way from home. I'm sure you've had some adventures, though.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Yeah, endless adventures. They'll be singing about us for a thousand years.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: 3; The truth is when we left home, we couldn't wait to get away. But now we've been gone a while, we can't wait to get home.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: I just think about my dad out there on his boat all alone. I ought o be out there with him.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: My wife's just had our first baby.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: Boy or girl?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Oh, who knows? You think soldiers get ravens with news from home?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: I hope it's a girl.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: Why?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Girls take care of their papas when their papas grow old. Boys just go off to fight in someone else's wars.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: Are you old enough to drink?

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: It's blackberry wine. I made it myself.

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: It's really good.

title: Dragonstone
Name: man
text: man: So, why is a nice girl on her own heading to King's Landing?

title: Dragonstone
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm going to kill the queen.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Bad night to be outdoors.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You've got real powerful magic to figure that out. Did the Lord of Light whisper that in your ear? "It's snowing, Thoros. It's windy. It's gonna be a cold night."

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: You're a grouchy old bear, aren't you, Clegane? You want some rum?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Don't like that shit. It's too sweet.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Why are you always in such a foul mood?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Experience.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: This seems like a good place to spend the night.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: These people don't want us here.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: Seems deserted to me. No livestock. No smoke coming from the chimney.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I don't like the look of it.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: For a big, hard man, you scare easy.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I'll tell you what doesn't scare me

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Come on. Maybe they've got some ale hidden away.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: They don't.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: See if there's a larder. They always leave something behind.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: How do you think it ended for them?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: With death.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: Girl died in her father's arms. Both of them covered in blood and a knife at their feet. I'd say they were starving. And rather than letting his little girl suffer, he ended it for both of them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Doesn't matter now.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: No, doesn't matter now.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I've known you a long time, Dondarrion.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: Aye. I think the first time we met was at that tournament--

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: And I always thought you were dull as dirt.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You're not bad. I don't hate you. Don't like, but you're not bad.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: Thank you, Clegane. That warms the heart.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: But there's nothing special about you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: You're right about that.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: So why does the Lord of Light keep bringing you back? I've met better men than you, and they've been hanged from crossbeams, or beheaded, or just shat themselves to death in a field somewhere. None of them came back. So, why you?

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: You think I don't ask myself that? Every hour of every day? Why am I here? What am I supposed to do? What does the Lord see in me?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: And?

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: I don't know. I don't understand our Lord.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Your Lord.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: I don't know what He wants from me. I only know that He wants me alive.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: If he's so all-powerful, why doesn't he just tell you what the fuck he wants?

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Clegane.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Come over here. Don't worry. The fire won't bite. I want to show you something.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: It's my fucking luck I end up with a band of fire worshippers.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: Aye. Almost seems like divine justice.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: There's no divine justice, you dumb cunt. If there was, you'd be dead...and that girl would be alive.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: What do you want?

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Look into the flames.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I don't want to look in the damn flames.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: You saw me bring him back from the dead after you cut him down. Don't you want to know what gave me the power?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I keep asking and no one wants to tell me.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: We can't tell you. Only the fire can tell you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: What do you see?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Logs burning.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Keep looking. What do you see?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Ice. A wall of ice. The Wall.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: What else?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: It's where the Wall meets the sea. There's a castle there.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: There's a mountain. Looks like an arrowhead. The dead are marching past.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Thousands of them.

title: Dragonstone
Name: beric
text: beric: Do you believe me now, Clegane? Do you believe we're here for a reason?

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: What the hell are you doing, Clegane?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Burying the dead.

title: Dragonstone
Name: thoros
text: thoros: You knew these people.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Not really.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sandor
text: sandor: We ask the Father to judge us with mercy. We ask the Mother to... Fuck it, I don't remember the rest. I'm sorry you're dead. You deserved better. Both of you.

title: Dragonstone
Name: little
text: little: Mom.

title: Dragonstone
Name: gilly
text: gilly: You should really sleep, Sam.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: The dead don't.

title: Dragonstone
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Legends of the Long Night.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: The Targaryens used dragonglass to decorate their weapons without even knowing what the First Men used it for.

title: Dragonstone
Name: gilly
text: gilly: What is it?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: It's a map of Dragonstone. The Targaryens built their first stronghold there when they invaded Westeros.

title: Dragonstone
Name: gilly
text: gilly: That's dragonglass?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: A mountain of it. Beneath the ground. Stannis told me, but I didn't think... This is important. Jon needs to know.

title: Dragonstone
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Has she come yet?

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: Who?

title: Dragonstone
Name: jorah
text: jorah: The Dragon Queen. Daenerys Stormborn.

title: Dragonstone
Name: sam
text: sam: Haven't heard anything.

title: Dragonstone
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Shall we begin?

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: On a night like this, you came into the world.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I wish I could remember it.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I always thought this would be a homecoming. It doesn't feel like home.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We won't stay on Dragonstone for long.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Good.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Not so many lions.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They cry out for their true queen? They drink secret toasts to my health?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: People used to tell my brother that sort of thing, and he was stupid enough to believe them.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: If Viserys had three dragons and an army at his back, he'd have invaded King's Landing already.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Conquering Westeros would be easy for you. But you're not here to be queen of the ashes.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We can take the Seven Kingdoms without turning it into a slaughterhouse. If the great houses support your claim against Cersei, the game is won. With the Tyrell army and the Dornish on our side, we have powerful allies in the south.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I never properly thanked you for that.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You served my father, didn't you, Lord Varys?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: I did.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And then you served the man who overthrew him?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: But you didn't serve him long. You turned against him.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: So you took it upon yourself to find a better one.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Your Grace, when I was ready to drink myself into a small coffin, Lord Varys told me about a queen in the east who--

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Before I came to power, you favored my brother. All your spies, your little birds, did they tell you Viserys was cruel, stupid, and weak? Would those qualities have made for a good king in your learned opinion?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: So you and your friends traded me like a prized horse to the Dothraki.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: Which you turned to your advantage.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Who gave the order to kill me?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: King Robert.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Who hired the assassins?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Who sent word to Essos to murder Daenerys Targaryen?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: Your Grace, I did what had to be done to--

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: To keep yourself alive.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Lord Varys has proven himself a loyal servant.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Proven himself loyal? Quite the opposite. If he dislikes one monarch, he conspires to crown the next one. What king of a servant is that?

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Swear this to me, Varys. If you ever think I'm failing the people, you won't conspire behind my back. You'll look me in the eye as you have done today, and you'll tell me how I'm failing them.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: I swear it, my queen.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And I swear this--if you ever betray me, I'll burn you alive.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: Forgive me, my queen. A red priestess from As'shai has come to see you.

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Queen Daeneys, I was a slave once, bought and sold, scourged and branded. It is an honor to meet the Breaker of Chains.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The Red Priests helped bring peace to Meereen. You are very welcome here. What is your name?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I am called Melisandre.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne. It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: No, it didn't.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You chose an auspicious day to arrive at Dragonstone.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We've just decided to pardon those who served the wrong king.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The Lord of Light doesn't have many followers in Westeros, does he?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Not yet. But even those who don't worship the Lord can serve his cause.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What does your Lord expect from me?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: The Long Night is coming. Only the prince who was promised can bring the dawn.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The prince who was promised will bring the dawn. I'm afraid I'm not a prince.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Your Grace, forgive me, but your translation is not quite accurate. That noun has no gender in High Valyrian, so the proper translation for that prophecy would be the prince or princess who was promised will bring the dawn.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Doesn't really roll off the tongue, does it?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No, but I like it better.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And you believe this prophecy refers to me?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Prophecies are dangerous things. I believe you have a role to play, as does another. The King in the North, Jon Snow.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Jon Snow? Ned Stark's bastard?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You know him?

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I traveled with him to the Wall when he joined the Night's Watch.

title: Stormborn
Name: varys
text: varys: And why do you think the Lord of Light singled out this Jon Snow aside from the visions you've seen in the flames, that is?

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: As Lord Commander of the Night's Watch he allowed the Wildlings south of the Wall to protect them from great danger. As King in the North he has united those Wildlings with the northern houses so together they may face their common enemy.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He sounds like quite a man.

title: Stormborn
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Summon Jon Snow. Let him stand before you and tell you things that have happened to him, the things that he has seen with his own eyes.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I can't speak to prophecies or visions in the flames, but I like Jon Snow and I trusted him, and I am an excellent judge of character.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If he does rule the north, he would make a valuable ally. The Lannisters executed his father and conspired to murder his brother. Jon Snow has even more reason to hate Cersei than you do.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Very well. Send a raven north. Tell Jon Snow that his Queen invites him to come to Drangonstone...and bend the knee.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Do you think it's really Tyrion? It could be someone trying to lure you into a trap.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: Read the last bit.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: All dwarfs are bastards in their father's eyes." What does that mean?

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: It's something he said to me the first night we met. You know him better than any of us. What do you think?

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Tyrion is not like the other Lannisters. He was always kind to me, but it's too great a risk. "The Seven Kingdoms will bleed as long as Cersei sits on the Iron Throne. Join us. Together we can end her tyranny."

title: Stormborn
Name: davos
text: davos: Sounds like a charmer. Of course, the casual mention of a Dothraki horde, a legion of Unsullied and three dragons, a bit less charming.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: What?

title: Stormborn
Name: davos
text: davos: Fire kills Whites, you told me. What breathes fire?

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're not suggesting Jon meet with her?

title: Stormborn
Name: davos
text: davos: No, too dangerous.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: But?

title: Stormborn
Name: davos
text: davos: But if the Army of the Dead makes it passed the Wall, do we have enough men to fight them?

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she will destroy the Realm as we know it. Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell. But House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the Crown. With their help the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores. Mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts. Dothraki heathens who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women, and butcher your children without a second thought. This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You all remember the Mad King. You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people. His daughter is no different. In Essos her brutality is already legendary. She crucified hundreds of noblemen in Slaver's Bay. And when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It is my solemn duty to protect the people, and I will but I need your help, My Lords. We must stand together, all of us, if we hope to stop her.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll: She has three full-grown dragons, Your Grace. The same as Aegon when he conquered the Seven Kingdoms. How do you propose to stop them?

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: We are currently at work on a solution, My Lord.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Lord Tarley.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll: Ser, Jaime. I believe you know my son.

title: Stormborn
Name: dickon
text: dickon: Ser, Jaime.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Rickon, isn't it?

title: Stormborn
Name: dickon
text: dickon: Dickon.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: That's it.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Thank you for coming. The other lords of the Reach look to you for guidance now more than ever. They might not have come if you hadn't.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll: If my queen summons me, I answer the call. And I've heard what she does to those that defy her.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Do you ride for Hornhill today?

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll: I have an army to mobilize. It won't be long until the fighting starts.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: And what side will you be fighting for? You were the only man to defeat Robert Baratheon in battle. Not even Rhaegar Targaryen could --

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll: It's a long ride back to the reach, Ser Jaime. How may I serve?

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I want you to be my ranking general in the wars to come. I want you to swear allegiance to Cersei and I want you to help her destroy her enemies. All of her enemies.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
