text: randyll: Including Olenna Tyrell? I'm a Tarley. That name means something. We're not oath breakers. We're not schemers. We don't stab our rivals in the back or cut their throats at weddings. I swore an oath to House Tyrell.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You swore an oath to the Crown as well, Lord Tarley.

title: Stormborn
Name: randyll
text: randyll: I've known Olenna since I was a child.

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: She was a great woman, once. Now she's broken. She wants revenge so badly she brought the Dothraki to our shores. The Dothraki in Westeros for the first time in history. I know you don't like my sister, but you have to make a choice. Do you fight with us or with the foreign savages and eunuchs?

title: Stormborn
Name: jaime
text: jaime: When the war is won the queen will need a new warden of the south. I can think of no better man than Randyll Tarley.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: The infection has spread too far. You should have cut off your arm the moment you were touched.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah: How long?

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: It will be years before it kills you. It could be 10, could be 20.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah: But how long 'till...

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Your mind? Six months, maybe fewer.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Pardon, Archmaester. I met Stannis Baratheon's daughter at Castle Black. She had Greyscale as a baby and was cured. Isn't there some way --

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Does this look like a baby to you?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: No.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Have you studied the varying rates of Greyscale progression in infants and fully grown men?

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Maester Chrissen discovered Shireen Baratheon's affliction immediately.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: This is quite advanced and beyond our skills, Ser. Were you a commoner I'd have you shipped to Valyria at once to live out your life with the Stone Men. As an anointed Knight I'll allow you one more day. How you choose to spend that time is up to you.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Come, Samwell.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Should we send word to your family, Ser...

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Jorah. Jorah Mormont.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Mormont?

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah: There's no need. I've been dead to them for years.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Have you ever been down here, Your Grace?

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No, I can't say I have. I haven't seen these since Robert had them removed from the Throne Room.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Curious that King Robert did not have them destroyed.

title: Stormborn
Name: cersei
text: cersei: They were his trophies. He couldn't keep them around. They would have made him look small. Sometimes he would come down here and look at them. I believe he brought his whores on occasion.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Balerion the Dread. The beast that Aegon rode across the sea. Its flames forged the Iron Throne and brought the Seven Kingdoms to heel. Powerful, but not invincible.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Apparently one of Daenarys' dragons was wounded by spears in the fighting pits of Meereen. If they can be wounded, they can be killed.

title: Stormborn
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: The finest artilleters and blacksmiths in King's Landing have been laboring day and night, Your Grace. If you'd kindly pull that lever.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: If you want the Iron Throne, take it. We have an army, a fleet, and three dragons. We should hit King's Landing now. Hard. With everything we have. The city will fall within a day.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If we turn the dragons loose, tens of thousands will die in the firestorms.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: It's called war. You don't have the stomach for it, scurry back into hiding.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I know how you wage war. We don't poison little girls here. Myrcella was innocent.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: She was a Lannister. There are no innocent Lannisters. My greatest regret is that Oberyn died fighting for you.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: That's enough. Tyrion is the Hand of the Queen. You will treat him with respect.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I am not here to be queen of the ashes.

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna: That's very nice to hear. Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my grand daughter. The common people loved her, the nobles loved her. And what is left of her now? Ashes. Commoners, nobles, they're all just children really. They won't obey you unless they fear you.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'm grateful to you, Lady Olenna, for your council. I'm grateful to all of you. But you have chosen to follow me. I will not attack King's Landing. We will not attack King's Landing.

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Then how do you mean to take the Iron Throne? By asking nicely?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We will lay siege to the capital surrounding the city on all sides. Cersei will have the Iron Throne but no food for her army or the people.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But we won't use Dothraki and Unsullied.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Cersei will try to rally the lords of Westeros by appealing to their loyalty, their love for their country. If we besiege the city with foreigners, we prove her point. Our army should be Westerosi.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellia
text: ellia: And I suppose we're providing the Westerosi?

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You are.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Lady Greyjoy will escort you home to Sunspear and her Iron Fleet will ferry the Dornish army back up to King's Landing.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Dornish will lay siege to the capital alongside the Tyrell army. Two great kingdoms united against Cersei.

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna: So, your master plan is to use our armies? Forgive me for asking, but why did you bother to bring your own?

title: Stormborn
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The unsullied will have another objective. For decades House Lannister has been the true power in Westeros. And the seat of that power is Casterly Rock. Grey Worm and the Unsullied will sail for the Rock and take it.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Do I have your support?

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: You have mine.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellia
text: ellia: Dorne is with you, Your Grace.

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Thank you all. Lady Olenna, may I speak with you alone?

title: Stormborn
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I realize you're here out of hatred for Cersei and not love for me. But I swear to you she will pay for what she's done and we will bring peace back to Westeros.

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Peace. Do you think that's what we had under your father or his father or his? Peace never lasts, my dear. Would you take a bit of advice from an old woman?

title: Stormborn
Name: olenna
text: olenna: He's a clever man, your Hand. I've known a great many clever men. I've outlived them all. Do you know why? I ignored them. The lords of Westeros are sheep. Are you a sheep? No. You're a dragon. Be a dragon.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: Enter.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: You leave tomorrow. Were you going to say goodbye?

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: I will see you when I return.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: But you don't know when that will be.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: No one knows.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I wish you good fortune.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: Missandei --

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: It is hard for me to say goodbye to you.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Why?

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: You know why.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I don't.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: You are my weakness.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: That's what I am? Your weakness?

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: When Unsullied are young their masters learn their fears. One boy is scared of dogs. One boy hates high places. One is frightened of the ocean. They make the boy sleep with dogs or climb a cliff. They throw him in the water. If he learns to swim, good. If he drowns, good. Either way, strong Unsullied. But I had no fears. I was never the biggest, never the strongest, but I was bravest always.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I believe it.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: Until I meet Missandei from the Isle of Naarth. Now I have fear.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I do too.

title: Stormborn
Name: grey
text: grey: No.

title: Stormborn
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I want to see you. Please.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: It might be useful. Fouthen was a dreadful writer but an excellent researcher.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Archmaester, I wanted to --

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: And this one.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Maester Faol was quite the opposite. A brilliant stylist who invented half the stories he tells.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: I wanted to ask you --

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: If you need to write histories, Tarley, you have to do the research. If you want people to read your histories, you need a bit of style. I'm not writing the Chronicle of the Wars Following the Death of King Robert the First so it can sit on a shelf unread.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: What? You don't like the title? What would you call it then?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Possibly something a bit more poetic?

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: We're not poets, Tarley.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Archmaester, if I could just have a moment.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: This is your moment. Use it wisely.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: I may have found a way to treat Ser Jorah. There are two recorded cases of advanced Greyscale being cured. I found the procedure in the Study of Rare Diseases by Archmaester Pilos.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: I'm familiar with Archmaester Pylos and the Study of Rare Diseases.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Oh, you are?

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Yes. Should I tell you how he died? From Greyscale.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Oh.

title: Stormborn
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: The procedure is far too dangerous which is why it's now forbidden.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Hello.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah: What are you doing?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: You're Jorah Mormont. You're the only son of Jeor Mormont.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: My name is Samwell Tarley. I'm a sworn brother of the Night's Watch training to serve as maester of Castle Black. I knew your father. I was with him when he died. You're not dying today, Ser Jorah.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Drink this.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah: What is it?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Rum. Drink it all, please. I'm afraid this is going to hurt.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: If you could take off your shirt.

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: If you wouldn't mind, bite down hard. I'm sorry but no one knows I'm here. If they hear you screaming then we're both finished.

title: Stormborn
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Have you ever done this before?

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: No. No one else will try, so I'm the best you've got. Have a seat. I'm going to remove the entire layer of infected tissue, then apply a medicinal ointment to the --

title: Stormborn
Name: sam
text: sam: Shh, shhh. Again, I'm sorry. Please try not to scream.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man: They say her dragons are bigger than Aegons.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man: Horse shit. Cersei is just trying to frighten us.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man: If it's true, if she lays siege to King's Landing prices will triple.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man: As long as we get back there before they start.

title: Stormborn
Name: man
text: man: One more round. It's a long ride.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: Ary!

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Hello, Hot Pie. Sit down. Who's that for?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Mmm. This is good.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: You think so? The secret is browning the butter before making the dough. Most people don't don't do that because it takes up too much time.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: I didn't do that.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: You've been making pies?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: One or two.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: I can't believe you're here. Did you meet the big lady?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Big lady?

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: The lady knight. I figured she was a knight because she had armor on. She was looking for your sister but I told her about you. Did she ever find you?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: She found me.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: What happened to you Ary?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: You got any ale?

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: Where are you heading?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: King's Landing.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: Why?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: I heard Cersei's queen now.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: I heard she blew up the Great Sept. That must have been something to see. Boom.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Hmm.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: I can't believe someone could do that.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Cersei would do that.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: I thought you'd be heading for Winterfell.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Why would I go there? The Boltons have it.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: No. The Boltons are dead.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: What?

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: Jon Snow came down from Castle Black with a Wildling army and won the Battle of the Bastards. He's King in the North now.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: You're lying.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: Why would I lie about that? He's your brother right?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Thanks for the pie.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: Friends don't pay. I can't believe I thought you were a boy. You're pretty.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Thanks.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Take care of yourself, Hot Pie. Try not to get killed.

title: Stormborn
Name: hot
text: hot: No, I won't. I'm like you, Ary. I'm a survivor.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: Come in.

title: Stormborn
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: A raven, My King, from the Citadel.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: This message was sent to me by Samwell Tarley. He was my brother at the Night's Watch. A man I trust as much as anyone in this world. He's discovered proof that Dragonstone sits on a mountain of Dragonglass.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: I received this a few days ago from Dragonstone. It was sent to me by Tyrion Lannister.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: He's now Hand of the Queen to Daenerys Targaryen. She intends to take the Iron Throne from Cersei Lannister. She has a powerful army at her back and if this message is to be believed, three dragons.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: Lord Tyrion has invited me to Dragonstone to meet with Daenerys and I'm going to accept.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: We need this Dragonglass, My Lords. We know that Dragonglass can destroy both White Walkers and their army. We need to mine it and turn it into weapons.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: But more importantly, we need allies. The Night King's army grows larger by the day. We can't defeat them on our own. We don't have the numbers. Daenerys has her own army and she has dragon fire. I need to try and persuade her to fight with us. Ser Davos and I will ride for White Harbor tomorrow, then sail for Dragonstone.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Have you forgotten what happened to our grandfather? The Mad King invited him to King's Landing and roasted him alive.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: I know that.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: She is here to reclaim the Iron Throne and the Seven Kingdoms. The north is one of those seven kingdoms. This isn't an invitation, it's a trap.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: It could be, but I don't believe Tyrion would do that. You know him. He's a good man.

title: Stormborn
Name: yohn
text: yohn: Your Grace, with respect I must agree with Lady Sansa. I remember the Mad King all too well. A Targaryen cannot be trusted, nor can a Lannister.

title: Stormborn
Name: robett
text: robett: We called your brother king, and then he rode south and lost his kingdom.

title: Stormborn
Name: lyanna
text: lyanna: Winter is here, Your Grace. We need the King in the North in the north.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: You all crowned me your king. I never wanted it, I never asked for it, but I accepted it because the north is my home. It's part of me and I will never stop fighting for it, no matter the odds. But the odds are against us. None of you have seen the Army of the Dead. None of you. We can never hope to defeat them alone. We need allies, powerful allies. I know it's a risk. But I have to take it.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Then send an emissary. Don't go yourself.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: Daenerys is a queen. Only a king can convince her to help us. It has to be me.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're abandoning your people. Your abandoning your home.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm leaving both in good hands.

title: Stormborn
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Whose?

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: Yours. You are my sister. You are the only Stark in Winterfell. Until I return, the north is yours.

title: Stormborn
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I delivered his bones myself. I presented them to Lady Catlyn as a gesture of goodwill from Tyrion Lannister. It seems like a lifetime ago. Do give Lord Tyrion my best when you see him.

title: Stormborn
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I was sorry when he died. Your father and I had our differences but he loved Cat very much. So did I. She wasn't fond of you, was she? Well, it appears she vastly underestimated you. Your father and brothers are gone, yet here you stand King in the North. Last best hope against the coming storm.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: You don't belong down here.

title: Stormborn
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Forgive me. We have never talked properly. I wanted to remedy that.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: I have nothing to say to you.

title: Stormborn
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Not even thank you? If it weren't for me you'd have been slaughtered at that battlefield. You have many enemies, My King, but I swear to you I'm not one of them. I love Sansa as I loved her mother.

title: Stormborn
Name: jon
text: jon: Touch my sister and I'll kill you myself.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Nymeria?

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Nymeria, it's me, Arya. I'm heading north, girl, back to Winterfell. I'm finally going home. Come with me.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: Come with me.

title: Stormborn
Name: arya
text: arya: That's not you.

title: Stormborn
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: You can't have them all. It's not fair.

title: Stormborn
Name: obara
text: obara: I'm oldest.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyene
text: tyene: Momma will want Cersei for herself.

title: Stormborn
Name: obara
text: obara: She's not my momma. You can have Cersei. I want The Mountain.

title: Stormborn
Name: nymeria
text: nymeria: The Mountain killed father. He'll crush you with one hand.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyene
text: tyene: Father got careless. That's what Momma says.

title: Stormborn
Name: obara
text: obara: Will you shut up about Momma? Momma, momma.

title: Stormborn
Name: tyene
text: tyene: Maybe I'll kill you both before we take King's Landing and then I won't have to share.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: How can you drink this piss? When we reach Sunspear I'll treat you to a Dornish red, the best in the world. Have you ever been to Dorne?

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: A few times. Never stayed long.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: A boy in every port?

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: A boy, a girl. Depends on the port.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Could we get some more?

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: I thought it wasn't for you.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: I'm developing a taste for it.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: He's not your servant.

title: Stormborn
Name: theon
text: theon: It's fine.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: So, you're going to be Queen of the Iron Islands.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: Once I kill my uncle.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: And what will you be, handsome?

title: Stormborn
Name: theon
text: theon: Whatever my queen demands.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: He'll be my advisor, my protector.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Oh, I see. Your protector.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: So if someone gets too close to you --

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: He might have to intervene.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: hold that person back.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: Until they've made their intentions known.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Why are you standing all the way over there then? A foreign invasion is under way. It seems like you don't need a protector.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: Stay here.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: Euron.

title: Stormborn
Name: yara
text: yara: Your mother is below deck. Keep her safe.

title: Stormborn
Name: ellaria
text: ellaria: Kill us! Get it over with!

title: Stormborn
Name: euron
text: euron: Give your uncle a kiss.

title: Stormborn
Name: euron
text: euron: Theon!

title: Stormborn
Name: euron
text: euron: Ah, come on your cockless hound. I have her. Come and get her.

title: Stormborn
Name: end
text: end: CREDITS

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The bastard of Winterfell.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: The dwarf of Casterly Rock.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I believe we last saw each other on top of the wall.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: You were pissing off the edge, if I remember right. You picked up some scars along the road.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's been a long road. But we're both still here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm Tyrion Lannister.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: Davos Seaworth.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: and DAVOS shake hands.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Ah, the Onion Knight. We fought on opposite sides at the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: Unluckily for me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Missandei is the queen's most trusted advisor.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Welcome to Dragonstone. Our queen knows this is a long journey. She appreciates the effort you have made on her behalf. If you wouldn't mind handing over your weapons.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Of course.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Please, this way.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: Where are you from? I can't place the accent.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I was born on the Island of Naarth.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: Ah. I hear it's beautiful down there. Palm trees and butterflies. I haven't been myself.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: This place has changed.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And Sansa, I hear she's alive and well.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: She is.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Does she miss me terribly?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A sham marriage and unconsummated.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I didn't ask --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Well, it was. It wasn't. Anyway, she's much smarter than she lets on.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: She's starting to let on.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Good. At some point I want to hear how a Knight's Watch recruit became King in the North.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: As long as you tell me how a Lannister became Hand to Daenerys Targaryen.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A long and bloody tale. To be honest, I was drunk for most of it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: My bannermen think I'm a fool for coming here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Of course they do. If I was your hand I would have advised against it. General rule of thumb, Stark men don't fare well when they travel south.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: True. But I'm not a Stark.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'd say you get used to them, but you never really do.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Come. Their mother is waiting for you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: I wondered why you weren't there to meet our guests. You begged us to summon the King in the North. Don't you want to see him again?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I've done my part. I've brought ice and fire together.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: Strange. You spoke so highly of Jon Snow but when he arrives you hide on a cliff. I didn't take you for a bashful girl.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: My time whispering in the ears of kings has come to an end.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: Oh, I doubt that. Give us common folk one taste of power we're like the lion who tasted man. Nothing is ever so sweet again.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Neither of us is common folk anymore. I did not part on good terms with the King in the North, or his advisor.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: Why?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Because of mistakes I made. Terrible mistakes. I would only be a distraction if I stayed.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: So where will you go?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: Volantis.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: Good. If you don't mind my saying, I don't think you should return to Westeros. I'm not sure you'd be safe here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I will return, dear spider. One last time.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: My Lady --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: melisandre
text: melisandre: I have to die in this strange country, just like you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei: You stand in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, rightful heir to the Iron Throne, rightful Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms, the Mother of Dragons, the Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, The Unburnt, The Breaker of Chains.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: This is Jon Snow.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: He's King in the North.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Thank you for traveling so far, My Lords. I hope the seas weren't too rough.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: The winds were kind, Your Grace.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: Apologies. I have a Flea Bottom accent, I know. But Jon Snow is King in the North, Your Grace. He's not a lord.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Forgive me --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Your Grace, this is Ser Davos Seaworth.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Forgive me, Ser Davos. I never did receive a formal education, but I could have sworn the last King in the North was Torren Stark who bent the knee to my ancestor Aegon Targaryen in exchange for his life and the lives of the northmen. Torren Stark swore fealty to House Targaryen in perpetuity. But do I have my facts wrong?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: I wasn't there, Your Grace.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No. Of course not. But still, an oath is an oath. In perpetuity means -- what does perpetuity mean, Lord Tyrion?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Forever.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Forever. So I assume, My Lord, that you're here to bend the knee.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I am not.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Oh. Well, that is unfortunate. You've travelled all this way to break faith with House Targaryen?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Break faith? Your father burned my grandfather alive. He burned my uncle alive. He would have burned the Seven Kingdoms.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My father was an evil man. On behalf of House Targaryen I ask your forgiveness for the crimes he committed against your family. And I ask you not to judge a daughter by the sins of her father. Our two houses were allies for centuries. Those were the best centuries the kingdom's ever known. Centuries of peace and prosperity with the Targaryens sitting on the Iron Throne and a Stark serving as Warden of the North. I am the last Targaryen, Jon Snow. Honor the pledge your ancestor made to mine. Bend the knee and I will name you Warden of the North. Together we will save this country from those who would destroy it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: You're right. You're not guilty of your father's crime. And I'm not beholden to my ancestor's vows.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Then why are you here?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Because I need your help and you need mine.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Did you see three dragons flying overhead when you arrived?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I did.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And did you see the Dothraki, all of whom have sworn to kill for me?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: They're hard to miss.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: But still, I need your help?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: Not to defeat Cersei. You could storm King's Landing tomorrow and the city would fall. Hell, we almost took it and we didn't even have dragons.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Almost.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: But you haven't stormed King's Landing. Why not? The only reason I can see is you don't want to kill thousands of innocent people. It's the fastest way to win the war but you won't do it. Which means at the very least you're better than Cersei.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Still, that doesn't explain why I need your help.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Because right now you and I and Cersei and everyone else, we're children playing at a game screaming that the rules aren't fair.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You told me you liked this man.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I do.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: In the time since he's met me he's refused to call me queen, he's refused to bow and now he's calling me a child.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I believe he's calling all of us children. Figure of speech.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Your Grace, everone you know will die before winter is over if we don't defeat the enemy to the north.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: As far as I can see, you are the enemy to the north.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I am not your enemy. The dead are the enemy.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The dead?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Is that another figure of speech?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: The Army of the Dead is on the march.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Army of the Dead?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: You don't know me well, My Lord, but do you think I am a liar or a madman?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No, I don't think you're either of those things.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: The Army of the Dead is real. The White Walkers are real. The Knight King is real. I've seen them. If they get past the wall and we're squabbling amongst ourselves --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: we're finished.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I was born at Dragonstone. Not that I can remember it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We fled before Robert's assassins could find us. Robert was your father's best friend, no? I wonder if your father knew his best friend sent assassins to murder a baby girl in her crib. Not that it matters now of course. I spent my life in foreign lands. So many men have tried to kill me. I don't remember all of their names. I have been sold like a brood mare. I have been chained and betrayed, raped and defiled. Do you know what kept me standing through all those years in exile? Faith. Not in any gods. Not in myths and legends. In myself. In Daenerys Targaryen. The world hadn't seen a dragon in centuries until my children were born. The Dothraki hadn't crossed the sea. Any sea.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They did for me. I was born to rule the Seven Kingdoms. And I will.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: You'll be ruling over a graveyard if we don't defeat the Night King.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The war against my sister has already begun. You can't expect us to halt hostilities and join you in fighting --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: whatever you saw beyond the wall.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: You don't believe him. I understand that. It sounds like nonsense.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: But if destiny has brough Daenerys Targaryen back to our shores, it has also made Jon Snow King in the North. You were the first to bring Dothraki to Westeros. He was the first to make allies with Wildlings and northmen. He was named Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. He was named King in the North. Not because of his birthright. He has no birthright. He's a damn bastard. All those hard son's of bitches chose him as their leader because they believe in him.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: All those things you don't believe in, he faced those things. He fought those things for the good of his people. He risked his life for his people. He took a knife in the heart for his people. He gave his own --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: davos
text: davos: If we don't put asside our enmities and band together we will die. And then it doesn't matter whose skeleton sits on the Iron Throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If it doesn't matter you might as well kneel.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Swear your allegiance to Queen Daenerys. Help her to defeat my sister and together our armies will protect the north.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: There's no time for that. There's no time for any of this. While we stand here debating --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It takes no time to bend the knee. Pledge your sword to her cause.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: And why would I do that?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I mean no offense, Your Grace, but I don't know you. As far as I can tell your claim to the throne rests entirely on your father's name. And my own father fought to overthrow the Mad King. The lords of the north placed their trust in me to lead them. And I will continue to do so as well as I can.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: That's fair. It's also fair to point out that I'm the rightful queen of the Seven Kingdoms. By declaring yourself king of the northern most kingdom, you are in open rebellion.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You must forgive my manners. You will both be tired after your long journey. We'll have baths drawn for you and supper sent to your rooms.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Am I your prisoner?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Not yet.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: Our Iron Born and Dornish allies were attacked on route to Dorne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: Two or three ships escaped. The rest sunk our captured. Ellaria and the sand snakes dead or captured. The Greyjoys are dead or captured.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: All of them?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: captain
text: captain: Your sister's dead?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: theon
text: theon: Euron has her.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: captain
text: captain: You saw him take her? And you got away?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: theon
text: theon: I couldn't save her. I tried.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: captain
text: captain: You wouldn't be here if you tried.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: This is the life. Look at them. Cheering for a Greyjoy.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: I have to be honest, it's making me hard. Did you see little Theon's face right before he jumped overboard?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: Oh no!

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: What a twat.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: My queen. Please accept this gift on behalf of all of your loyal subjects in the Iron Islands.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: I give you --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: what no other man could give. Justice. Justice for your murdered daughter.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You've proven yourself the greatest captain on the 14 seas and a true friend to the crown.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: A bit more than a true friend.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And you deserve a proper reward for your heroism.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: There's only one reward I want.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You shall have what your heart desires --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: when the war is won.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: With Euron Greyjoy commanding our naval forces and Jaime Lannister leading our armies, the sons and daugters of Westeros shall defend our country.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: There's nothing quite like it, is there? The love of the people. I suppose you wouldn't know.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: This same mob spat at my sister not long ago, and if you turn on us, they'll cheer to see your head mounted on a spike.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: Or yours. They just like severed heads really. Listen, if you have any advice at all I'd love to hear it when we have an hour or two to speak as brothers.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Advice?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: Does she like it gentle or rough? A finger in the bum?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: euron
text: euron: Shhh, shhh, shhh, not now. We'll talk later.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I want you to know I understand. Even though we're enemies, you and I, I understand the fear that drives you. I was there that day when Ser Gregor crushed your lover's head. I close my eyes I can hear the sound of Oberyn's skull breaking.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The sound of your scream. I never heard a sound like that. I thought, that's true love. Oberyn looked beautiful that day. He really did. No one moved like him. No one had such skill with a spear. Even Ser Gregor couldn't stop him. If only he hadn't taunted him. He could have walked away and left poor Ser Gregor to die. But that wasn't your lover's way, was it? Now he's burried somewhere. And here Ser Gregor is stronger than ever. That must be difficult for you. When my daughter was taken from me, my only daughter, well, you can't imagine how that feels unless you've lost a child. I fed her at my own breast even though they told me to give her to the wet nurse. I couldn't bear to see her in another woman's arms. I never got to have a mother. But Myrcella did. She was mine and you took her from me. Why did you do that?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It doesn't matter now.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Your daughter is a beauty too. Brown eyes, those lips. A perfect Dornish beauty.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I imagine she is your favorite.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I know, I know, we're not supposed to have favorites. But still, we're only human. We love who we love.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I'm sorry. I can't understand you. The gag makes it difficult to understand what you're saying. It must be frustrating.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We all make our choices. You chose to murder my daughter. You must have felt powerful after you made that choice.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you feel powerful now? I don't sleep very well, not at all really. I lie in bed and I stare at the canopy and imagine ways of killing my enemies. How to destroy Ellaria Sand, the woman who murdered my only daughter. I thought about having Ser Gregor crush your skull the way he did Oberyn's. It would be poetic I suppose but fast. Too fast.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I thought about having him crush your daughter's skull.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: She's so beautiful. The thought of this lovely face cracking open like a duck egg, no, it's just not right.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyene
text: tyene: Momma!

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Qyburn, he's the cleverest man I know. Clever enough to learn what poison you used to murder Myrcella. The long goodbye, was that it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: The Long Farewell.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's the one.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: How long does the poison take?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Difficult to say. Hours, days, it depends on the subject's constitution.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: But death is certain?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Oh yes, Your Grace, quite certain.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Your daughter will die here in this cell. You will be here watching when she does. You will be here the rest of your days. If you refuse to eat we will force food down your throat. You will live to watch your daughter rot, to watch that beautiful face collapse to bone and dust all the while contemplating the choices you've made.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Make sure the guards change the torches every few hours. I don't want her to miss a thing.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Don't.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What are you doing? No one can see us like this ?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I am queen of the Seven Kingdoms. I'll do as I please.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: messenger
text: messenger: Forgive me, Your Grace. The visitor from Braavos has arrived.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Good. And we'll need fresh sheets for the bed.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: messenger
text: messenger: At once, Your Grace.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: No, thank you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: My condolences, Your Grace, on the death of your son. From all reports he was a fine young man.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Iron Bank didn't send you hear to offer condolences.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Condolences and congratulations. You've become the first ruling queen in the Seven Kingdoms. That's quite an accomplishment. The Iron Bank appreciates how you cast off the yoke of superstition freeing the crown from elements that sought to subvert the rule of law.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The destruction of the Sept of Baelor was a tragic accident.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Indeed. But sometimes tragedies are necessary to restore order and rational leadership.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Iron Bank wants its gold back.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Your father never minced words either. But, yes, your debts are considerable. And you are now engaged in a conflict on several fronts. We both know how expensive war can be.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And we both know gold wins wars. Your vaults are empty. Your late husbando s profligacy saw to that.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Your wealthiest ally is the Tyrells who are now your enemies. You're surrounded on all sides by rivals for the throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And the Iron Bank wants to bet on a winner.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: We don't make bets. We invest in endeavors we deem likely to be successful.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's a fancy way of saying bet. The war has already begun. I've drawn first blood. I decapitated the Dornish snake. My armada owns the Narrow Sea.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Euron Greyjoy's armada owns the Narrow Sea.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Euron Greyjoy is loyal to me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: For now. Daenerys Targaryen has three full grown dragons. How well do wooden ships fare against fire breathing dragons?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Her dragons might not be as invulnerable as some think. Now, let's talk about the Targaryen girl. You want to invest in her? I'm guessing the Iron Bank invested considerable gold in the slave trade. How are you profits now that Daenerys has freed all the slaves?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: The slave trade has entered a down turn, it's true.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: From what I gather she considers herself more of a revolutionary that a monarch. In your experience how do bankers usually fare with revoltionaries?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Lannisters owe the Iron Bank quite a lot of money but Lannisters always pay their debts. Do former slaves or Dothraki or dragons?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Your father's daughter indeed.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Give me a fortnight. Stay in King's Landing as my honored guest and when you return to Braavos I swear to you my debt will be paid in full.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I came out here to brood over my failure to predict the Greyjoy attack. You're making it difficult. You look a lot better brooding than I do. You make me feel like I'm failing at brooding over failing.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm a prisoner on this island.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I wouldn't say you're a prisoner on this island. You're free to walk the castle, the beaches, to go wherever you want.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Except to my ship. They took my ship.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I wouldn't say we took your ship.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm not playing word games with you. The dead are coming for us all.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Why don't you figure out what to do about my missing fleet and murdered allies, and I'll figure out what to do about your walking dead men.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: It's hard for me to fathom. It really is. If someone told me about the White Walkers and the Night King --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: You probably don't believe me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I do actually.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: You didn't before. Grumpkins and snarks you called them. Do you remember? You said it was all nonsense.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It was all nonsense. Everybody knew it. But then Mormont saw them and you saw them, and I trust the eyes of an honest man more than I trust what everybody knows.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: How do I convince people who don't know me that an enemey they don't believe in is coming to kill them all?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Good question.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I know it's a good question. I'm looking for an answer.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: People's minds aren't made for problems that large. White Walkers, the Night King, Army of the Dead, it's almost a relief to confront a familiar monster like my sister.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I need to help prepare my people for what's coming. I can't help them from here. I'd like to leave.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It seems unlikely that you became King in the North by giving up that easily.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Everyone told me to learn from my father's mistakes. Don't go south. Don't answer a summons from the Mad King's daughter, a foreign invader. And here I am. A northern fool.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Children are not their fathers, luckily for all of us. And sometimes there's more to foreign invaders than northern fools that meets the eye. Daenerys could have sailed for Westeros long ago but she didn't. Instead she stayed where she was and saved many people from horrible fates some of whom are on this island with us right now. While you're our guest here you might consider asking them what they think of the Mad King's daughter. She protects people from monsters, just as you do. That's why she came here. And she's not about to head north to fight an enemy she's never seen on a word of a man she doesn't know after a single meeting. That's not a reasonable thing to ask.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So do you have anything reasonable to ask?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: What do you mean?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Maybe you are a northern fool. I'm asking if there's something I can do to help you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Dragonglass?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes. Volcanic glass, obsidian. He says you have a tremendous amount of it here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Why are we talking about glass? We just lost two of our allies.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Which is why I was speaking to Jon Snow, a potential ally.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what does the King in the North want with Dragonglass?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Apparently it can be turned into weapons that kill White Walkers and their foot soldiers, or stop them, destroy them. I'm unsure of the nomenclature.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And what do you think of this Army of the Dead and White Walkers and Night Kings?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'd very much like to believe that Jon Snow is wrong, but a wise man once said that you should never believe a thing simply because you want to believe it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Which wise man said this?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't remember.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Are you trying to present your own statements as ancient wisdom?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I would never do that...to you. The reason I believe Jon Snow is because he's here. All of his advisors would have told him not to come. I would have told him not to come, yet he's here anyway. You don't have to believe him. Let him mine the Dragonglass. If he's wrong it's worthless. You didn't even know it was here. It's nothing to you. Give him something by giving him nothing. Take a step toward a more productive relationship with a possible ally. Keep him occupied while we focus on the task at hand. Casterly Rock.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What was that Ser Davos said about taking a knife in the heart for his people? Did you notice that?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You must allow them their flights of fancy. It's dreary in the north.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Amazing thing to see.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I named them for my brothers Vicerys and Rhaegon. They're both gone now.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You lost two brothers as well?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: People thought dragons were gone forever but here they are. Perhaps we should all be examining what we think we know.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: You've been talking to Tyrion?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He is my Hand.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: He enjoys talking.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We all enjoy what we're good at.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I don't.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You know I'm not going to let Cersei stay on the Iron Throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I never expected that you would.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And I haven't changed my mind about which kingdoms belong to the throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: I haven't either.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I will allow you to mine the Dragonglass and forge weapons from it. Any resources or men you need I will provide for you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: Thank you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jon
text: jon: So you believe me then about the Night King and the Army of the Dead?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You better get to work, Jon Snow.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How much do we have?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: 4,000 bushels, My Lady.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What does that mean?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn: For the current occupants of the castle it's enough food for a year, perhaps more.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What's the longest winter in the past 100 years?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: I'm not entirely certain. I'll check Maester Llewyn's records. He kept a copy of every raven scroll.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the north come back to defend Winterfell.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: No, My Lady, most likely not.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: We must prepare for that eventuality. Every direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be. We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the north. If we don't use it by winter's end we'll give it back to them, but if the entire north has to flee to Winterfell there won't be enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn: Very wise, My Lady.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Maester Wolkan, you'll see to it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Are they covering those breastplates in leather?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn: No, My Lady.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Well, shouldn't they be once the real cold comes?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn: They should indeed. Pardon me, My Lady.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: yohn
text: yohn: You there, why isn't there leather on these?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Command suits you. The northerns are all facing north worried about the threat beyond the wall.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: So they should be.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I know Cersei better than anyone here. If you turn your back on her --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You don't know Cersei better than anyone here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I only meant to say --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: That the woman who murdered my mother, father and brother is dangerous? Thank you for your wise council.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr: One of two things will happen. Either the dead will defeat the living, in which case all our troubles come to an end. Or life will win out. And what then?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Don't fight in the north or the south. Fight every battle everywhere always in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend, every possible series of events is happening all at once. Live that way and nothing will surprise you. Everything that happens will be something that you've seen before.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: guard
text: guard: Lady Sansa, at the gate.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: Hello, Sansa.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I wish Jon was here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: Yes. I need to speak to him.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Your father's last living true born son. You're Lord of Winterfell.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: I can never be the Lord of Winterfell. I can never be lord of anything. I'm the three-eyed raven.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I don't know what that means.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: It's difficult to explain.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Try, please, for me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: It means I can see everything. Everything that's ever happened to everyone. Everything that's happening right now. It's all pieces, fragments. I need to learn to see better. When the long night comes again I need to be ready.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How do you know all of this?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: The three-eyed raven taught me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I thought you were the three-eyed raven.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: I told you it's difficult to explain.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Bran --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: I'm sorry for all that's happened to you. I'm sorry it had to happen here at our home. It was so beautiful that night. Snow falling just like now. And you were so beautiful in your white wedding dress.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I have to go back inside, Bran.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: bran
text: bran: I'll stay a bit longer.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Hmm.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Hmm. Does it hurt?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah: A bit. Less than before.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: The infection no longer appears to be active.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Unusual. Unlikely. One could almost be forgiven for thinking the entire upper layer of diseased skin was debrided and the underlying region treated with some sort of ointment.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I don't know anything about that. I just started feeling better. I assumed it was the rest that did it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah: And the climate.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: The climate? You're free to go, Ser. This chamber is needed for the infectious, which you are no longer.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Tarley, I'd like to speak with you in my study this evening.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah: How bad is it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: I suppose I'll find out this evening.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: Where will you go?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it. I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could. Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise. The only place for me is with her.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I owe my life to her and you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: Your father saved me more than once. It's the least I could do.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Perhaps our paths will cross again?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: I hope they do.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: You treated him?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: Yes.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Who told you to treat him?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: No one.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Who forbade you or anyone to attempt to treat him?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: I seem to remember you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: But you treated him anyway?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: I did.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: I forbade it because it's dangerous and rarely successful. Especially on someone of that age. You could have infected yourself and others. You could have devastated the entire Citadel. But you didn't. It's a meticulous, difficult procedure. Many maesters whose chains are heavy with healing links have attempted it and failed. But you succeeded. How?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: I read the books and followed the instructions.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: That man is alive because of you. You should be proud.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: sam
text: sam: Thank you, Archmaester.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Come here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: All these manuscripts and scrolls and rotting away. I need you to make copies of them.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: You were expecting a reward? Your reward is not being immediately expelled from the Citadel. You'd better get started. Be mindful of the paper mites. They like flesh as well.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We need to find Euron Greyjoy's fleet and sink it.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet. To send our remaining ships after him --

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'm not talking about sending our ships after him.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But you'll have to go yourself. Euron's ships could be anywhere or in more than one place. You'd be flying around the open seas alone for who knows how long.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I wouldn't be alone. I'd have Drogon, Vicerion and Rhaegal. What can anyone do to them?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei: They can still do something to you. It only takes one arrow.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's too great a risk. You're too important.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What about Casterly Rock?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: The Unsullied will be there soon.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: missandei
text: missandei: And what will they face?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: varys
text: varys: A difficult situation. They know we're coming.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes. Cersei believes my sole purpose in life is to destroy House Lannister. She will be ready.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No one has ever taken the rock.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The Lannister army is still the army my father built. Well trained and well provisioned. 10,000 men at least. They will see us coming.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: They will be ready.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: man
text: man: Draw! Loose!

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The gates of Casterly Rock are impregnable.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The fight up the walls will be hard. We'll be at a disadvantage. Many men will die.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Interesting thing about my father. He built our house up from near ruin. He built our army. He built Casterly Rock as we know it, but he didn't build the sewers. That was beneath him. So he gave the job to the lowest person he could find. Me. He was right. I was low. The company I kept low, women mostly. They weren't welcome at the Rock. Father disapproved of that sort of behavior. I couldn't walk them through the front gates. I couldn't have them in my chambers. So in the process of building the sewers I threw in something for myself.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It was a passage that began by the sea and ended beneath one of the main guard towers.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No better place for low pursuits. Casterly Rock, the impregnable fortress.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: As a good friend of mine once said, "give me 10 good men and I'll impregnate the bitch."

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And so it begins. They will face the bulk of the Lannister forces. They will be outnumbered. They will have less armor and fewer weapons.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: But as my sister's armies fights for her, the Unsullied will be fighting for something greater. They will be fighting for freedom and the person who gave it to them. They will be fighting for you. And that is why they will triump.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: unsullied
text: unsullied: There are none left.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: grey
text: grey: There are supposed to be more than this. Many more.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: grey
text: grey: Where are they? Where are the rest of the Lannisters?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: It's done?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It is.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And now the rains weep for our whores. Did we fight well?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I suppose as well as can be expected.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: It was never our forte. Golden roses indeed. Your brother and his new queen thought you would be defending Casterly Rock.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The truth is Casterly Rock isn't worth much anymore. Well, it is to me. My fond childhood memories won't keep Cersei on the throne.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: So you'll just let them take it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: For now. They won't be able to hold it. Euron Greyjoy's navy burned their ships, we emptied the larders before we left. Eventually they'll be forced to abandon their position and march all the way across Westeros.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: And you took your army, your real army, and went where they weren't?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: As Robb Stark did to me at Whispering Wood. There are always lessons in failures.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Yes. You must be very wise by now.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: My father always said I was a slow learner.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: If he was so clever why didn't he take Highgarden the moment your gold mines ran dry? I suppose I'll be able to ask him myself soon enough. No more learning from my mistakes, eh? How will you do it? With that sword?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: That was Joffrey's sword, wasn't it? Not that he ever used it. What did he call it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Widow's Wail.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: He really was a cunt, wasn't he? I did unspeakable things to protect my family, or watched them being done on my orders. I never lost a night's sleep over them. They were necessary. And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell I did. But your sister has done things I wasn't capable of imagining. That was my prize mistake, a failure of imagination. She's a monster, you do know that?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: To you, sure. To others as well. But after we've won and there's no one left to oppose us, the people living peaceful in the world she built, do you really think they'll wring their hands over the way she built it?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: You love her. You really do love her. You poor fool. She'll be the end of you.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Possibly. Not much to be gained from discussing it with you though, is there?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: What better person to discuss it with? What better guarantee could you have that the things you say will never leave this room? But perhaps you're right. If she's driven you this far it's gone beyond your control.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Yes, it has.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: She's a disease. I regret my role in spreading it. You will too.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I think we're done here.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: How will it happen?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Cersei had several ideas. Whipping you through the streets and beheading you in front of the Red Keep. Flaying you alive and hanging you from the walls of King's Landing. I talked her out of those.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: Will there be pain?

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No. I made sure of that.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: That's good.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: olenna
text: olenna: I'd hate to die like your son clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes blood red, skin purple. It must have been horrible for you as a Kingsguard, as a father. It was horrible enough for me. A shocking scene. Not at all what I intended. You see, I'd never seen the posion work before. Tell Cersei. I want her to know it was me.

title: The Queen’s Justice
Name: end
text: end: CREDITS

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Halt that wagon!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: opens the carriage. It is filled with gold bars and coins. He picks up a large sack and hands it to BRONN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You just won the biggest prize in the world. What could you possibly have to be upset about? Come on. You can tell me. Queen of Thorns give you one last prick in the balls before saying goodbye?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'll save my confessions for the High Septon.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: There is no more High Septon.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No, there isn't, is there?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: There is still the question of my prize.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: is putting a padlock on the wagon bearing the gold. He stops and turns to BRONN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: That's a lot of money I just gave you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: It's not a castle.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: turns and points to Highgarden.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: How about that one? It's available.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You don't want Highgarden.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I beg to differ.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We're at war. Daenerys Targaryen could come take it back the day after you move in. Besides, think of the upkeep. The more you own, the more it weighs you down.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Oh, is that why you're so fucking glum, eh? All your new riches weighing you down?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: pounds on the back of the carriage and the horses start trotting.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They're not mine. The gold belongs to the Iron Bank. We pay our debts.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Right. Just not to me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Bronn of the Blackwater, formerly of whatever nameless shit heap you're from with a saddlebag full of gold complaining about not getting paid. When we win this war all the castles in the Seven Kingdoms will be yours to choose from with no one left to take them away from you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Yes, I'm sure Queen Cersei's reign will be quiet and peaceful.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Stranger things have happened.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Like what?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: TARLEY and his son DICKON come riding up on horseback. RANDYLL addresses JAIME.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: The granaries are being emptied and loaded into wagons, My Lord.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The current harvest?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: We have teams of men collecting it and more farmers in the Reach.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: looks over to BRONN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Ser Bronn, will you accompany the Tarleys and help them accelerate this process?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'm not much for shoveling weight.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: No, but motivating reluctant farmers to hand over their harvest, I've heard you guys have a real talent for that.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: My Lord.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: My Lord.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: DICKON and BRONN break away from the Lannister army and ride into the distance. Horse drawn carts are carrying spoils from Highgarden and Lannister men are marching down the road.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei: and TYCHO NESTORIS from the Iron Bank of Braavos are sitting having a discussion.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho: I must say, I don't think the Iron Bank has ever had a debt of this magnitude repaid in a single installment. I always considered your father a very effective and efficient man, but you appear to be redefining those terms entirely.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You're too kind, My Lord.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho: I am neither kind, nor a lord, Your Grace. I am merely an instrument of the institution I represent, its wellbeing is a matter of arithmetic, not sentiment. And the current arithmetic is outstanding. The gold --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Is on its way. My brother is supervising its transportation himself.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Some at the Iron Bank will be disappointed. They've grown rather fond of your interest payments.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We must devise a way to raise their spirits.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Yes. Perhaps we could be of assistance in some current venture.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My only venture at the moment is reestablishing control over this continent and every person on it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
