text: tycho: I see a great deal of potential in that venture. I imagine that it would require outside investment?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It will indeed. I need to expand my armies, my navies. My hand, Qyburn, had made overtures to the Golden Company in Essos.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho: I know them well. They've helped us recover significant sums from parties who had fallen into deep arrears.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's good to hear. I too would like them to recover some things that belong to me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tycho
text: tycho: Rest assured, Your Grace, you can count on the Iron Bank's support, as soon as the gold arrives.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: is sitting in a wheelchair. PETER BAELISH is sitting next to him. BAELISH unsheathes a Valyrian steel dagger and shows it to BRAN. It's the same dagger used in the attempt to assassinate BRAN years ago.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: This is for you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: flips the knife in his hand and extends it towards BRAN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The last man who wielded it meant to cut your throat, but your mother fought him off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: reaches out and takes the knife, turning it and looking it over carefully.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: The other dagger, the one that took her life, I would have stopped that dagger with my own heart if I could have. I wasn't there for her when she needed me most. But I am here for her now. To do what she would have done, to protect her children. Anything I can do for you, Brandon, you need only ask.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: Do you know who this belonged to?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: No. That very question was what started the War of the Five Kings. In a way, that dagger made you what you are today. Forced from your home, driven out to the wilds beyond the Wall. I imagine you've seen things most men wouldn't believe.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: hands the sheath of the knife to BRAN. BRAN slides the knife into the sheath.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: To go through all of that and make your way home again only to find such chaos in the world, I can only imagine --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: Chaos is a ladder.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: is staring at BAELISH. BAELISH stops speaking. The door opens and Meera appears.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I'm sorry to have disturbed you, Lord Stark.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: stands up to leave.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: I'm not Lord Stark.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: petyr
text: petyr: bows and walks past Meera and closes the door.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: notices BRAN sitting in a wheelchair.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: What's that?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: Maester Wolkan built it for me so I can move around more easily.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: It's a very good idea.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: You're leaving?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: I don't want to leave you, but when they come I need to be with my family. And you're safe, safe as anyone can be now. You don't need me anymore.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: No, I don't.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: That's all you've got to say?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: Thank you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: Thank you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: For helping me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: My brother died for you. Hodor and Summer died for you. I almost died for you. Bran!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: I'm not really, not anymore. I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: begins to cry.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: You died in that cave.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: meera
text: meera: turns to walk out the door. She hesitates looking at BRAN, then walks out.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: approaches the main gate on foot. Two guards are huddled by a brazier getting warm. There's indistinct chatter. One of the men notice ARYA walking to the gate and approach her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Hey, oh. Where are you going?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: In there. I live here.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Fuck off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm Arya Stark. This is my home.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Arya Stark is dead.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Send for Maester Llewyn or Ser Rodrick. They'll tell you who I am.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: There's no Rodrick here.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Maester's name is Wolkan.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Go ask Jon Snow then, the King in the North. He's my brother

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: He's a thousand miles away.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: It's cold. We're busy. So, you know, best fuck off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Mm-hmm.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: If Jon Snow is gone who is in charge of Winterfell?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: The Lady of Winterfell, Lady Stark.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Which Lady Stark?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: You tell us. You're the one impersonating her sister.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Tell Sansa her sister is home.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Lady Sansa is too busy to waster her breath on you, just like us. So for the last time, fuck off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: 1 goes to grab Arya but she easily dodges out of his grasp.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: I'm getting into this castle one way or another. If I'm not who I say I am, I won't last long. But if I am, and Sansa finds out that you turned me away...

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: keeps glancing at the men. They look uneasy. They bring her inside of the gate. They indicate towards a cart near the entrance.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: You sit there. Right there. Don't move.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Go tell Lady Stark. I'll watch her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: is glancing around Winterfell. Men are working building tools and cutting wood. ARYA looks over and sees a Winterfell flag sigil hanging from the wall. The two guards are still arguing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: You tell her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: I'm not.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Because if you don't I'll hit you right in the fucking face as hard as I can.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: We told her to wait. We were standing right next to her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: sighs.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: When we turned around she had gone, My Lady. She was nothing. Some winter town girl.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: She comes in asking for Ser Rodrick and Maester Llewyn.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: man
text: man: Don't trouble yourself over it, My Lady. We'll find her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You don't have to. I know where she is.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: is standing look at a statue of Ned Stark holding his sword. ARYA hears a sound and turns to see SANSA approaching. SANSA stops when she sees ARYA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Do I have to call you Lady Stark now?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: hesitates for a moment.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: begins smiling then walking towards ARYA. SANSA reaches out and hugs ARYA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You shouldn't have run from the guards.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: I didn't run. You need better guards.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: smirks at ARYA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: It suits you, Lady Stark. Jon left you in charge?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He did. I hope he comes back soon. I remember how happy he was to see me. When he sees you, his heart will probably stop.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: That doesn't look like him. It should have been carved by someone who knew his face.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Everyone who knew his face is dead.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: We're not.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: turns to face SANSA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: They say you killed Joffrey. Did you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I wish I had.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Me too. I was angry when I heard someone else had done it. However long my list got he was always first.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Your list?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Of people I'm going to kill.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: begins to laugh. ARYA joins her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How did you get back to Winterfell?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: It's a long story. I imagine yours is too.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Yes. It's not a very pleasant one.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Mine neither, but our stories aren't over yet.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, they're not.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Arya, Bran's home too.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: smiles and looks at SANSA. SANSA doesn't smile back. The smile fades from ARYA's face.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: is sitting next to the Weirwood tree. SANSA and ARYA approach. BRAN turns to look at them. BRAN begins speaking to ARYA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: You came home.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: steps forward and throws her arms around BRAN. SANSA smiles in the background. ARYA lets go and steps back.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: I saw you at the crossroads.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: You saw me?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: I see quite a lot now.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Bran has visions.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: I thought you might go to King's Landing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: So did I.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why would you go back there?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: Cersei is on her list of names.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: stares at BRAN. ARYA turns to look at SANSA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Who else is on your list?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Most of them are dead already.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: produces the Valyrian dagger that BAELISH gave him and unsheathes it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Where did you get this?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: Littlefinger gave it to me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Littlefinger, he's here?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: turns to look at SANSA.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's declared for House Stark.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: steps up closer to BRAN and speaks to him.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why would he give you a dagger?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: He thought I'd want it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Why?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: Because it was meant to kill me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: The cutthroat after your fall?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Why would a cutthroat have a Valyrian steel dagger?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: Someone very wealthy wanted me dead.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: He's not a generous man. He wouldn't give you anything unless he thought he was getting something back.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: It doesn't matter.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What do you mean it doesn't matter?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: I don't want it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: holds the knife out to ARYA. ARYA looks at BRAN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Are you sure? It's Valyrian steel.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bran
text: bran: It's wasted on a cripple.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: looks down at the dagger. She steps forward and takes it from BRAN.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: is pushing BRAN in his wheelchair and SANSA is next to them. The Stark children are walking back through the gate of Winterfell. Men are milling around doing various jobs. BRIENNE and PODRICK see the Stark children all back at Winterfell together.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Catelyn Stark would be proud. You kept your vow.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I did next to nothing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick: You're too hard on yourself, My Lady.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I'm not a --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: pauses for a moment.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Thank you, Podrick.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: and MISSANDEI are walking along a path outside of Dragonstone followed by members of the Queensguard.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Your Grace, there's still no word from the Unsullied.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Soon. They will come back to me.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: He better.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: stops and turns to look at MISSANDEI. She then continues walking.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What happened?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: begins smirking.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Many things.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Many things?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: Your Grace.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: looks at MISSANDEI then her Queensguard. She speaks in Valyrian and motions to her guard to stand down.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It's all right.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: descends the stairs with MISSANDEI and they begin walking with JON. They walk along the beach until they reach a cave. DAVOS is waiting for them with a lit torch.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: I wanted you to see it before we start hacking it to bits.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: leads DAENERYS and MISSANDEI into the cave. He lights a brazier and illuminates the Dragonglass along the walls. He continues walking deeper into the cave.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: So this is it, all we'll ever need.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: is looking up at the walls of Dragonglass.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: There is something else I want to show your, Your Grace.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: and DAENERYS go to a further chamber in the cave. There are murals painted on the walls of Dragonglass.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: The Children of the Forest made these.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: When?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: A very long time ago.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They were right here standing where we're standing before there were Targaryens or Starks or Lannisters. Maybe even before there were men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: No.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: stops looking at the walls and turns to look at JON. JON walks to another wall and begins to examine the murals. The murals depict Children of the Forest and the First Men standing together.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: They were here together the Children and the First Men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Doing what? Fighting each other?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: takes DAENERYS by the arm and swings her torch to another part of the wall. There is a mural of the Night King and White Walkers.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They fought together against their common enemy. Despite their differences, despite their suspicions, together. We need to do the same if we're going to survive.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: and DAENERYS look back at the wall with the Night King.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: Because the enemy is real. It's always been real.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: turns to look at JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And you say you can't defeat them without my armies and my dragons?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: No, I don't think I can.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: steps forward closer to JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I will fight for you. I will fight for the north...when you bend the knee.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: My people won't accept a southern ruler, not after everything they've suffered.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: steps even closer to JON until they're face to face.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They will if their king does. They chose you to lead them. They chose you to protect them. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: and DAENERYS, DAVOS and MISSANDEI are walking out of the cave. As they exit TYRION and VARYS are standing on the beach awaiting them. DAENERYS begins addressing Tyrion.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What is it?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We took Casterly Rock.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: That's very good to hear.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: and VARYS look at each other. They aren't eager to deliver the bad news.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Isn't it?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: You'll want to discuss this amongst yourselves. Perhaps --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You will stay. All my allies are gone. They've been taken from me while I've been sitting here on this island.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We still have the largest army.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Who won't be able to eat because Cersei has taken all the food from the Reach.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Call Grey Worm and the Unsullied back. We still have enough ships to carry the Dothraki to the mainland. Commit to the blockade of King's Landing. We have a plan. It's still the right plan.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: stops walking, turns and speaks harshly to Tyrion.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The right plan? Your strategy has lost us Dorne, the Iron Islands and the Reach.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If I've underestimated our enemies --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Our enemies? Your family, you mean. Perhaps you don't want to hurt them after all.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: begins looking out to the ocean. Three dragons are flying in the sky over the water.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Enough with the clever plans.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: turns back and looks at TYRION.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I have three large dragons. I'm going to fly them to the Red Keep.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We've discussed this.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My enemies are in the Red Keep. What kind of a queen am I if I'm not willing to risk my life to fight them?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A smart one.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: looks over to JON SNOW.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: What do you think I should do?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: I would never presume to --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'm at war. I'm losing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: begins walking close to JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: looks over the ocean at the dragons flying.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: I never thought that dragons would exist again. No one did. The people who follow you know that you made something impossible happen. Maybe that helps them believe that you can make other impossible things happen. Build a world that's different from the shit one they've always known.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: glances back towards the dragons.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: But if you use them to melt castles and burn cities, you're not different. You're just more of the same.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: looks back out to her dragons flying along the water.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: and PODRICK are sparring. BRIENNE kicks PODS foot out from under him and he lands face first in the dirt.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Don't lunge.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick: pushes himself back up and picks up his sword. PODRICK attacks again. Brienne blocks his blows and kicks his foot out again.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Don't go where your enemy leads you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: is watching the sparring session from across the courtyard. She begins to approach Brienne.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Up.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: begins striking at PODRICK while he blocks her blows. BRIENNE hits PODRICK in the stomach with the hilt of her sword and PODRICK lands on the ground.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: And don't --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: Don't fight someone like her in the first place.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick: stands up and retrieves his sword. ARYA walks closer to speak to BRIENNE.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Nice sword. Very nice dagger.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: looks down at the Valyrian dagger and unsheathes it. She approaches BRIENNE flipping the knife several times in her fingers. BRIENNE takes the dagger and examines it.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: and BAELISH are walking along the upper section of the courtyard having a conversation.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: If they haven't contributed the right amount of grain to the stores then I'm afraid they'll have to make due with --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: sansa
text: sansa: sees ARYA in the courtyard speaking with BRIENNE and stops to watch her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: It's been awhile since I've trained.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I can go and find the Master of Arms for you, My Lady.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: He didn't beat the hound. You did. I want to train with you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: chuckles.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: You swore to serve both of my mother's daughters, didn't you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: nods her head in agreement.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Move aside, Podrick.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: podrick
text: podrick: backs away. ARYA draws her sword, Needle.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: You can't use that, My Lady. It's too small.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: I won't cut you. Don't worry.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: smirks and raises her sword to a fighting posture.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I'll try not to.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: strikes at ARYA who quickly sidesteps and parries the attack. BRIENNE attacks again and ARYA sidesteps, dodges multiple strikes and parries BRIENNE while smiling. ARYA strikes at BRIENNE and hits her hand causing BRIENNE to flinch and lose her two-handed grip on her sword. BRIENNE regains composure and starts to circle ARYA. BAELISH and SANSA are still watching from the upper balcony. ARYA is waiting for an attack with her sword behind her back. BRIENNE strikes and ARYA blocks her attacks, spins and stabs behind her back and hits BRIENNE in the knee causing BRIENNE's sword to strike the dirt. BRIENNE kicks ARYA in the stomach and sends ARYA to the ground. ARYA quickly gets back to her feet. BRIENNE overpowers ARYA and ARYA drops her sword on the ground. BRIENNE strikes again but ARYA dodges, draws her Valyrian dagger and puts it near BRIENNE's neck. BRIENNE and ARYA both stop fighting and sheathe their weapons smiling.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Who taught you to do that?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: No one.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: arya
text: arya: collects her sword. SANSA walks away. BAELISH remains on the balcony staring at ARYA who looks up at him. BAELISH bows to ARYA and walks away.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: and DAVOS are walking along the paths outside of Dragonstone having a discussion.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: What do you think of her?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: Who?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: sighs

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: I believe you know of whom I speak.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: I think she has a good heart.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: A good heart? I've noticed you starring at that good heart.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: There's no time for that. I saw the Night King, Davos. I looked into his eyes. How many men do we have in the north to fight him? 10,000? Less?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: Fewer.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: What?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: and JON near the end of the path. MISSANDEI is standing along the path looking at the ocean.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: Speaking of good hearts, Missandei of Naarth.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: turns to looks at DAVOS and JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Ser Davos, Lord Snow.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: King Snow, isn't it? No? That doesn't sound right. King Jon?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: It doesn't matter.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Forgive me, but may I ask a question?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: Of course.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Your name is Jon Snow, but your father's name was Ned Stark?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm a bastard. My mother and father weren't married.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: Is the custom different in Naarth?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: We don't have marriage in Naarth so the concept of a bastard doesn't exist.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: The sounds liberating.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: Why did you leave your homeland?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I was stolen away by slavers.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm sorry.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: If I may, how did a slave girl come to advise Daenerys Targaryen?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: She bought me from my master and set me free.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: That was good of her. Of course you're serving her now, aren't you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I serve my queen because I want to serve my queen. Because I believe in her.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: And if you wanted to sail home to Naarth tomorrow --

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Then she would give me a ship and wish me good fortune.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: You believe that?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: missandei
text: missandei: I know it. All of us who came with her from Essos, we believe in her. She's not our queen because she's the daughter of some king we never knew. She's the queen we chose.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: You'll forgive me if I switch sides.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: notices a single ship sailing into the bay. It has a kraken sigil. MISSANDEI turns to look.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: Is that a Greyjoy ship?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon: GREYJOY and other Iron Born are pulling their landing boat onto the beach wading through the surf. They pull the boat onto the sand. JON SNOW, MISSANDEI, DAVOS and Dothraki guards are waiting to meet them. JON sees THEON and both men freeze and stare at each other. JON steps forward towards THEON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon: Jon. I didn't know you were here.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon: steps closer to JON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon: Sansa, is she all right?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: grabs THEON by his shirt and pulls him face to face.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: What you did for her is the only reason I'm not killing you.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: releases THEON.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: We heard your uncle attacked your fleet. We thought you were dead.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon: I should be.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: davos
text: davos: Your sister?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon: Euron has her. I came to ask the queen to help get her back.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jon
text: jon: The queen is gone.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: theon
text: theon: Where did she go?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: All of the gold is safely through the gates of King's Landing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Good.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: We need to get the last of these wagons over the Blackwater Rush before nightfall. If the head of the line is ambushed, the tail will never be able to reinforce in time.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We are stretched a bit thin.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: With your permission, flogging stragglers has a marked effect on mobility.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Let's give them fair warning first. These men fought well at Highgarden.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: is clearly disappointed. He turns and rides off back to the line of soldiers. JAIME and BRONN exchange glances, then follow RANDYLL. BRONN and JAIME are riding through the ranks. DICKON TARLEY sees JAIME and starts a conversation.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: Ser Jaime.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Rickon.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: Dickon.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: openly laughs in DICKON's face and looks at JAIME.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I hear you fought bravely at Highgarden. Your first battle?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: nods his head in agreement.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: And?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: It was glorious.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Come on. Your father's not here.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: All my life we've been pledged to House Tyrell. I knew some of those men. I hunted with them.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: They didn't deserve to die. But Lady Olenna chose to betray the queen and support the Targaryen girl. So here we are.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: I didn't expect it to smell like that.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Men shit themselves when they die. Didn't they teach you that at fancy lad school?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: looks over at BRONN

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Well, I learned it when I was 5.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: pauses and strains to hear a noise far in the distance.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Listen.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Spears and shields! Spears and shields!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Spears and shields!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: In line now!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: is riding across the battlefield yelling orders to men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: Come on, lads. Not those wagons. Fall in line. Fall in line.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: dickon
text: dickon: draws his sword. RANDYLL is yelling orders to the men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: randyll
text: randyll: Spears armed!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Get back to King's Landing.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm not abandoning my army.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You're a commander, not a damned infantryman. These fuckers are about to swamp us.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We can hold them off.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Dracarys!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: drogon
text: drogon: breathes fire into the first line of Lannister soldiers. The men burst into flames and start screaming. DICKON looks on in shock. A flanking group of Dothraki Screamers ride over the flames through the hole created by Drogon and start cutting men down. JAIME attempts to issue orders to the men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Hold the line!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Archers! Archers with me!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Knock!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: archers
text: archers: Knock! Draw!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: drogon
text: drogon: loops around and is making a pass on JAIME and the archers. DAENERYS and DROGON are diving at the group of men.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Loose!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Qyburn's scorpion is over there.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Go get it then.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I can't shoot with one hand.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: holds up his gold hand to illustrate his point.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: hesitates for a moment. He turns his horse and rides to man the artillery crossbow. JAIME draws his sword and rides into battle.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Come on!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Where are you?

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: walks to the edge of the battlefield accompanied by Dothraki guards. He can see Lannisters being slaughtered. One of the Dothraki guards begin to speak.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: guard
text: guard: Your people can't fight.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: is watching the mayhem. Men are screaming and engulfed in flames. Horses and carriages run wild with no driver. JAIME is still on the battlefield struggling against the horde. Burning Lannister men are taking off their helmets revealing melted faces. Men crawl to the river in search of relief from the dragonfire. DROGON and DAENERYS are flying over the river creating wake in the water. JAIME sees her approaching his position.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Take cover!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: drogon
text: drogon: spits flames into the Lannister position. The men standing there are reduced to standing ash. The wind blows them away. BRONN is lining up DROGON in the sights of the crossbow. He reaches down and pulls the lever to fire. A bolt sails past DROGON and misses. BRONN reloads the machine. DROGON and DAENERYS circle around and dive on the crossbow. BRONN takes his time aiming his shot.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Come on you fucker.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: commands DROGON to fire at the crossbow.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Flee, you idiot!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: looks at DAENERYS and readies himself. He spurs his horse onward.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Come on, boy. Come on!

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: grabs the spear as he rides by and brings it up to position. JAIME's horse is galloping full speed on the edge of the river kicking up water. TYRION is watching JAIME's attempt to kill DAENERYS.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You fucking idiot.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: jaime
text: jaime: is getting close. DAENERYS turns at the last moment to see JAIME bearing down on her spear in hand. DROGON notices JAIME, turns his head and spews flames. BRONN appears from nowhere and manages to dive off of his horse and knock JAIME and himself in the water before they're both consumed by fire. Their horses are instantly burned to death. JAIME is being dragged down by a full set of armor into the dark water. JAIME sinks into blackness and out of sight.

title: The Spoils Of War
Name: end
text: end: CREDITS

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You could have killed me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: What the fuck were you doing back there?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Ending the war by killing her.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You saw the dragon between you and her?

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: looks incredulously at JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: And?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: sits up and says nothing to BRONN. BRONN sits up and faces JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Listen to me, cunt. Till I get what I'm owed, a dragon doesn't get to kill you. You don't get to kill you. Only I get to kill you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: That was only one of them. She has two more. If she decides to use them, to really use them --

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: You're fucked.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Don't you mean we're fucked?

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: No, I do not. Dragons are where our partnership ends. I'm not going to be around when those things start spitting fire on King's Landing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I have to tell Cersei.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: pauses and looks at JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Best well jump back in that river.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: stands up and walks away. JAIME continues sitting on the shore looking at the smoke and fire from the distant battle.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: is walking over an ash covered ground. There are burned bodies and cargo strewn about. Dothraki are looting dead Lannister soldies. A group of mounted Dothraki are escorting captured Lannister soldiers to where DAENERYS and DROGON are awaiting the prisoners. DAENERYS addresses the captured soldiers.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I know what Cersei has told you, that I've come to destroy your cities --

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: burn down your homes, murder you and orphan your children. That's Cersei Lannister, not me. I'm not here to murder. And all I want to destroy is the wheel that is rolled over rich and poor to the benefit of no one but the Cersei Lannisters of the world. I offer you a choice. Bend the knee and join me. Together we will leave the world a better place than we found it, or refuse and die.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Step forward, My Lord.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll: takes several steps towards DAENERYS and stands in front of the kneeling Lannister men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You will not kneel?

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll: I already have a queen.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: My sister, she wasn't your queen until recently though, was she, until she murdered your rightful queen and destroyed House Tyrell for all time. So it appears your allegiances are somewhat flexible.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll: There are no easy choices in war. Say what you will about your sister, she was born in Westeros, has lived here all her life. You on the other hand, you murdered your own father and chose to support a foreign invader. One with no ties to this land, an army of savages at her back.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You will not trade your honor for your life. I respect that.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: turns to speak to DAENERYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Perhaps he could take the black, Your Grace. Whatever else he is, he is a true soldier. He would be invaluable at the Wall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll: You cannot send me to the Wall. You are not my queen.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: turns to look at her Dothraki escort. The Dothraki walk forward to collect RANDYLL. As the men are pulling RANDYLL away DICKON steps forward.

title: Eastwatch
Name: dickon
text: dickon: You will have to kill me too.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll: pulls away from the Dothraki and turns to face his son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll: Step back and shut your mouth.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Who are you?

title: Eastwatch
Name: randyll
text: randyll: A stupid boy.

title: Eastwatch
Name: dickon
text: dickon: I'm Dickon Tarley, son of Randyll Tarley.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You are the future of your house. This war has already wiped one great house from the world. Don't let it happen again. Bend the knee.

title: Eastwatch
Name: dickon
text: dickon: looks to RANDYLL. RANDYLL nods to his son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: dickon
text: dickon: I will not.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: turns to speak to DAENERYS. He speaks softly so no one but the queen can hear.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Your Grace, nothing strips bold notions from a man's head like a few weeks in a dark cell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I meant what I said. I'm not here to put men in chains. If that becomes an option many will take it. I gave them a choice. They made it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Your Grace, if you begin beheading entire families --

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'm not beheading anyone.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: pauses and looks over the DROGON. DRGON roars and shakes his head and flexes his wings.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Your Grace --

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: looks to her Dothraki escort and gives a signal. The men grab RANDYLL and DICKON and walk them over to DROGON. RANDYLL takes DICKON by the arm.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Lord Randyll Tarley, Dickon Tarley, I, Daenerys of House Targaryen, First of my name, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons, sentence you to die.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: pauses a moment and looks at RANDYLL and DICKON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Dracarys.

title: Eastwatch
Name: drogon
text: drogon: draws a deep breath and begins spewing dragonfire at the two men. They are instantly engulfed in flames. They both collapse into ash after a few seconds. There are two craters left where RANDYLL and DICKON stood. The Lannister men recoil in horror. Any Lannister soldier that was still standing kneels to the ground. DAENERYS silently turns and begins to walk off the battlefield.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: is quickly walking down the hall leading to CERSEI's room. As he approaches, QYBURN exits the queen's chambers.

title: Eastwatch
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: My Lord.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: passes by QYBURN without saying a word and barges into CERSEI's quarters. CERSEI stand and walks over to JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: How many men did we lose?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We haven't done a full counting.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It's armies that win wars. We have the Tyrell gold, we have the Iron Bank behind us. We can buy mercenaries.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: shakes his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: They're not the same as our men but they'll fight if they're well paid, which they will be.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I just saw the Dothraki fight. They'll beat any mercenary army. They'll beat any army I've ever seen. Killing our men wasn't war for them, it was sport. Her dragon burned a thousand wagons. Qyburn's scorpion fired bolts bigger than you. They couldn't stop it. And she has three of them. This isn't a war we can win.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: So what do we do? Sue for peace? I sit on her father's throne, the father you betrayed and murdered. And in her mind she's winning. What sort of offer do you think she'd make?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: turns and walks away from JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Maybe we can count on Tyrion to intercede on our behalf by way of apology for murdering our father and our son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: He didn't.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You saw the crossbow, you saw his body.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: walks across the room to where CERSEI is standing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I'm not talking about father. Tyrion didn't kill Joffrey. He had nothing to do with it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: After all this time it still amazes me --

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It was Olenna. She confessed before she died.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And this was before or after she drank the poison you so kindly provided her?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: After.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And you believed her?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: If you were Olenna would you rather have seen your granddaughter married to Joffrey or Tommen? Which one would Margerey been better able to control? Which one would have made Olenna the true ruler of the Seven Kingdoms? She was telling the truth.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: looks away, then sits down.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I shouldn't have listened to you. She should have died screaming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: She's dead like her son, her grandchildren, her whole house. And if we don't find a way out of this war we'll follow them.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: So we fight and die or we submit and die. I know my choice. A soldier should know his.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: SNOW is standing on the edge of a cliff looking towards the ocean. DROGON roars and flies over him with DAENERYS on his back. DROGON lands next to JON and charges towards him. DROGON opens his jaws and roars in JON's face. DROGON creeps closer until he is inches from JON. JON removes his glove and slowly extends his hand toward DROGON. DROGON lowers his head and allows JON to touch him. DAENERYS looks surprised and steps down from her mount. DROGON turns and flies away.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They're beautiful, aren't they?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: That wasn't the word I was thinking of, but, yes, they are. Gorgeous beasts.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: They're not beasts to me. No matter how big they get, how terrifying to everyone else, they're my children.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: turns to look at her three dragons as they fly over Dragonstone in the distance.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: You weren't gone long.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: turns back to JON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: No.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: And?

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And I have fewer enemies today than I did yesterday.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: pauses and doesn't say anything.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You're not sure how you feel about that?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: No, I'm not.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: turns and starts walking towards the castle, JON follows.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: How many men did your army kill taking Winterfell back from the Boltons?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Thousands.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We both want to help people. We can only help them from a position of strength. Sometimes strength is terrible. When you first came here Ser Davos said you took a knife in the heart for your people.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Ser Davos gets carried away.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: So it was a figure of speech?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: doesn't say anything. A group of Dothraki guards approach DAENERYS and speak in their native tongue.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: This man says he is your friend, Khaleesi.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: He is my friend.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: kneels before DAENERYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Your Grace.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: stands.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Jon Snow, this is Ser Jorah Mormont, an old friend.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: I served with your father. He was a great man.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: nods to JON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You look strong. You found a cure?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I wouldn't be here if I hadn't. I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: It would be my honor.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: steps forward and hugs JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bran
text: bran: s eyes are pure white. They wash back to their normal color. He is sitting in front of the Weirwood. Maester Wolkan stands next to him.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bran
text: bran: Ravens. We need to send ravens.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: nods his head to BRAN.

title: Eastwatch
Name: archmaester
text: archmaester: MARWYN and other citadel maesters are seated at a council table. MARWYN has a raven scroll in his hand and the maesters are discussing the contents. SAMWELL enters the room carrying a large stock of books and scrolls. MARWYN points SAM to a nearby table to offload the books.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: I put very little stock in it myself. Prophecies of doom are never in short supply, especially when winter comes.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: I remember Wolkan. A bit timid but a sharp mind.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: The north has dulled many good maester's wits. I'm not sure if it's the cold, the drink, or the company.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: A crippled boy claims to have seen dead men on the march beyond the wall thanks to the magical help of a raven with three eyes.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: stops working and turns around.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: It is a bit much. Still we ought to --

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: Brandon Stark --

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: the crippled boy.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Do you know him?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: I let him through the Wall years ago. I saw him go beyond the wall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: And?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: Somehow a crippled boy survived for years beyond the wall when no one else could. Not the Night's Watch, not the Wildlings, no one. Perhaps we ought to listen to what he has to say.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: Perhaps you need more scribing work to discipline your mind.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: I sense a more detailed proposal is forthcoming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: steps forward and clears his throat.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: Everyone in Westeros trusts and respects you. If you tell people the threat is real they'll believe it. If you advise all the lords to send their men north to hold the wall they'll do it. And if you tell every maester in the Citadel to search every word of every faded scroll about the long night, they may find something that lets us defeat the Army of the Dead for good.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: It could be done. And this news could be authentic. It's possible. It's also possible this message is part of a ploy by the dragon queen to lure southern armies away from the lands they are currently defending to open those lands to easy conquest.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: That does seem far more likely than magic birds talking to cripples.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: Archmaester, please. It's real. I've seen it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: We will write to Maester Wolkan at Winterfell for clarification. I promise you we will get to the truth of it one way or another.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: Archmaester --

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: That will be all, Tarley.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: turns to collect his work and leave. The maesters begin talking to one another.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: It brings to mind the work of Davy Moonstone, the charlatan who claimed to see the children of the forest.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: Don't forget the Prophet Lodock that promised the Drowned God would rise up and destroy Aegon the Conquerer.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: Is he the one whose father and brother were just burned alive?

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: I'm afraid so.

title: Eastwatch
Name: maester
text: maester: Horrible business.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: I don't have the heart to tell him yet. He's a good lad.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: crumples the raven scroll and throws it dismissevely on the table.

title: Eastwatch
Name: marwyn
text: marwyn: Right. The ravenry was falling apart last time I checked...

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: and TYRION are sitting on the stairs of the Throne Room alone. VARYS has a sealed raven scroll in his hand tapping it on the stone. TYRION is drinking a glass of wine having a discussion with VARYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: All rulers demand that people bend the knee. It's why they're rulers. She gave Tarley a choice. A man who had taken up arms against her. What else could she do?

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: Not burn him alive alongside his son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I am her hand, not her head. I can't make her decisions for her.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: That's what I used to tell myself about her father. I found the traitors but I wasn't the one burning them alive. I was only a purveyor of information.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: reaches over to TYRION's cup of wine, picks it up and begins to drink from it. He grimaces as he drinks.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: It's what I told myself when I watched them beg for mercy, "I'm not the one doing it." As the pitch of their screams rose higher, "I'm not the one doing it." When their hair caught fire and the smell of the burning flesh filled the Thone Room, "I'm not the one doing it."

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: drinks again and sets the cup down next to TYRION. TYRION picks it up.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Daenerys is not her father.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: And she never will be... with the right counsel. You need to find a way to make her listen.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: looks down at the note in VARYS's hand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Who is that for?

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: Jon Snow.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Did you read it?

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: It's a sealed scroll for the King in the North.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: pauses and drinks from his cup of wine.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What's it say?

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: Nothing good.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: and VARYS are seated at the painted table. TYRION and JORAH stand near the queen. DAVOS and JON SNOW are standing on the other end of the table. JON is holding a raven scroll and reading it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: I thought Arya was dead. I thought Bran was dead.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'm happy for you. You don't look happy.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Bran saw the Night King and his army marching towards Eastwatch. If they make it past the wall --

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: The Wall has kept them out for thousands of years. Presumably --

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: interrupts VARYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: I need to go home.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You said you don't have enough men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: We'll fight with the men we have. Unless you'll join us.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And give the country to Cersei? As soon as I march away she marches in.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Perhaps not. Cersei thinks the Army of the Dead is nothing but a story made up by wet nurses to frighten children. What if we prove her wrong?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: I don't think she'll come see the dead at my invitation.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: begins walking around the table closer to JON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: So bring the dead to her.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I thought that was what we are trying to avoid.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We don't have to bring the whole army. Only one soldier.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Is that possible?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: The first White I ever saw was brought into Castle Black from beyond the Wall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Bring one of these things down to King's Landing and show her the truth.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: Anything you bring back will be useless unless Cersei grants us an audience and is somehow convinced not to murder us the moment we set foot in the capital.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: The only person she listens to is Jaime. He may listen to me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And how would you get into King's Landing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I can smuggle you in, but if the Goldcloaks were to recognize you, I'm warning you, I'm not a fighter.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: nods his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Well, it will all be for nothing if we don't have one of these dead men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: varys
text: varys: Fair point. How do you propose to find one?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: pauses and stares at the ground. JORAH breaks the silence.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: turns to look at JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you. Allow me to serve you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: The free folk will help us. They know the real north better than anyone.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: They won't follow Ser Jorah.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: They won't have to.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: You can't lead a raid beyond the wall. You're not in the Night's Watch anymore. You're King in the North.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm the only one here whose fought them. I'm the only one here who knows them.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I haven't given you permission to leave.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: With respect, Your Grace, I don't need your permission. I am a king. And I came here knowing that you could have your men behead me or your dragons burn me alive. I put my trust in you, a stranger, because I knew it was the best chance for my people, for all our people. Now I'm asking you to trust in a stranger because it's our best chance.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: pauses for a moment then nods her head in agreement.

title: Eastwatch
Name: robett
text: robett: The King in the North should stay in the north. We did not choose you to rule us, My Lady, but perhaps we should have.

title: Eastwatch
Name: yohn
text: yohn: The Knights of the Vale came here for you, Lady Stark.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're very kind, my lords, but Jon is our king. He is doing what he thinks is best.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: and ARYA are walking through the hall to SANSA's quarters having a discussion.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I warned Jon this would happen. He can't leave the north and expect it to just sit and wait for him like Ghost.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: He didn't. He trusted you to hold it for him.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Well, he's not making it easy. The northern lords are proud.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: These are mother and father's chambers.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And?

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: Nothing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Don't do that.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: turns around to face ARYA.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: What?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Say what you mean.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: You always liked nice things. It made you feel better than everyone.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: drops the papers in her hand on a table and looks at ARYA.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Are you angry with me?

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: They were insulting Jon and you sat there and listened.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I listened to their complaints, which is my responsibility as Lady of Winterfell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: Their opinions are important to you?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Glover has 500 men. Royce has 2,000. Offend them and Jon loses his army.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: Not if they lose their heads first.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Winterfell didn't just fall into our hands. We took it back, and the Mormonts and the Hornwoods and the Wildlings and the Vale, all of us working together. Now, I'm sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that's not the way you get people to work together.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: And if Jon doesn't come back, you'll need their support, so you can work together to give you what you really want.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: How can you even think such a horrible thing?

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: You're thinking it right now. You don't want to be, but the thought just won't go away.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: and ARYA stare at each in silence for a moment.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I have work to do.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sansa
text: sansa: turns and walks away from ARYA.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: My lady.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: exits the room.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: and TYRION are standing on the beach of King's Landing. DAVOS is securing a small row boat. TYRION is looking up towards the city walls.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Last time I was here I killed my father with a crossbow.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Last time I was here you killed my son with wildfire.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: turns to look at DAVOS. DAVOS walks next to TYRION and stakes the boat anchor into the sand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: There's a path to the left that hugs the cliff. The guards hardly ever patrol it. Too many steps.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: begins walking towards the path. DAVOS follows him and quickly takes the lead. TYRION stops and looks back towards the unattended boat.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're not staying here?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I've got my own business in Flea Bottom.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: What if someone takes the boat?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Then we're fucked. Best hurry.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: and JAIME are walking by the dragon skulls. Both men have sparring swords in their hand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We don't have time for this. We should be preparing the city for a siege. The Dothraki are coming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: All the more reason for you to train. Unless you plan on fighting Dothraki 12 year olds.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I seem to recall them giving you a bit of trouble as well.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: And here I am ready to train.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Why down here?

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I don't think you want people to see how you look swinging that thing yet.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Today might be the day I kill you by accident.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Oh, you won't be swinging it at me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: stops walking and holds his torch out. TYRION steps from around a pillar and looks at JAIME. JAIME looks angrily at BRONN.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'll leave you to it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: bronn
text: bronn: turns and walks away leaving JAIME and TYRION alone.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I needed to see you and I knew you'd never agree to meet.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: remains silent and stares at TYRION.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You made me look like a complete fool. I thought I'd surprise you by hitting Casterly Rock, but you were three steps ahead of me. You abandoned the family home. Completely unsentimental. Father would have been proud.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Don't talk about our father.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Listen to me --

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I once told Bronn that if I ever saw you again I'd cut you in half.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: glances down at the sword in JAIME's hand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It would take you awhile with a sparring sword.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: shakes his head and says nothing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: He was going to execute me. He knew I was innocent. He didn't hate me because of anything I did, he hated me because of what I am. The little monster sent to punish him. Do you think I wanted to be born this way? Did he think I chose --

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: What do you want?

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Daenerys will win this war. You're a military man. You must know there is no way around it. Daenerys is not her father. She's even willing to suspend hostilities if Cersei agrees to certain terms.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You want Cersei to bend the knee you can ask her yourself.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I -- I don't. Daenerys doesn't. Not right now anyway. She has a more important request.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I wasn't sure I'd find you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I thought you might still be rowing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: chuckles and DAVOS smiles.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I looked in shops, taverns, brothels. I should have known to come straight to the Street of Steel.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Weren't you worried about the Goldcloaks?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I haven't been here in years. Why should they recognize me? Sometimes I hardly do. Nothing fucks you harder than time.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: walks to the side of the shop and inspects a rack of swords. He pulls one, nods in approval and puts it back in its place. He turns back to GENDRY.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Anybody give you any trouble?

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Here I am arming Lannisters. I never get a second look. You were right. Safest place for me was right under the queen's nose.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Don't be so sure. Safety is never a permanent state of affairs. Bad things are coming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: nods.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You came to get me. You want me to come with you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I think you need to understand --

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I'm ready. Let's go.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: You should know what you're heading into.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Don't you think I've been thinking about it every swing of the hammer... how happy I am making weapons for the family that killed my father? They tried to kill me.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: is tossing his tools and apron to the side. He picks up a satchel and swings it over his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I've been getting ready. I never knew what for, but I've always known I'd know it when it comes.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: You might want to bring one of those swords.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: smiles at DAVOS and begins walking towards the weapons.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I don't know much about swinging swords, but this --

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: removes a giant war hammer from the wall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: this I know.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: and DAVOS turn and walk out of the shop.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: and GENDRY are walking towards the boat DAVOS left on the beach.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Keep your father's name to yourself. The situation is complicated enough already.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: and DAVOS arrive at the boat. GENDRY lays his hammer on top of the boat cargo. DAVOS is gathering the anchor and rope. Two Goldcloaks begin walking down the beach towards the boat unnoticed by DAVOS and GENDRY.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Who should I say I am?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: turns and notices the two guards approaching the boat. He turns and loudly addresses GENDRY.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I told you, Clovis, if we don't get out of here soon someone is going to --

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: You there.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: No weapons, friends. I promise. What can I do for you?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Is that your boat?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: It is.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: looks down into the boat and sees his weapon in plain view.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: The docks are that way.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: That they are. I try to stay away from them to avoid good men such as yourselves.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Still five gold dragons?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Are you joking?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: You must be even older than you look. 15.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: 15?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Apiece.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: angrily reaches into his pouch and pays the men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I can't say it was a pleasure doing business with you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: turns and begins walking back to his boat.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: What's in the boat?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: pauses and turns back to the guards.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Not more gold.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Wine?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Mmm.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: I like wine.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Or hams.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Come and have a look.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Fermented crab.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: What?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Fermented crab. One bucket of this triples the brothel's earnings for the week. A man thinks he's done, he's ready to go back to his loving family, but before he gets his britches up his lady of the hour pops a tiny spoon of that into his mouth. Five minutes later, he's back in the race. Here, have a taste.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: scoops up a bit of fermented crab and offers it to the guards. Both men reach out and take a pinch. The guards sniff the crab and put it in their mouth. They both recoil from the taste and look at each other.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I'd hurry to your favorite establishment or you'll put a whole in that chainmail.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Oi, Dwarf!

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: quickly walks to cut the guards off.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I really wouldn't try anymore until you see how the first bite hits you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: That dwarf --

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Where did you get that scar?

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Fish hook. Some men you just can't teach.

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: We was looking for a dwarf with a scar like that awhile back.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: is still standing behind the guards. He retrieves his gold pouch again and holds it up shaking it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Perhaps there's some arrangement?

title: Eastwatch
Name: guard
text: guard: Arrangement? You gonna arrange to pay us more than Queen Cersei?

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: can be seen behind the backs of the guards. He slowly retrieves his hammer and creeps up behind GUARD 2. He swings his hammer and connects with the side of the guardo s head. The man drops. As GENDRY transitions onto the second guard and swings his hammer, GUARD 1 turns to look and catches a hammer blow to the face.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: is looking at TYRION and motions towards GENDRY.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: This is Gendry.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: He'll do.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: opens the door and step into the queen's room. CERSEI is seated near a window speaking to QYBURN.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That won't be necessary.

title: Eastwatch
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: bows his head and walks to leave the room. As he passes by JAIME he addresses him.

title: Eastwatch
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Ser Jaime.

title: Eastwatch
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: closes the door as he leaves. JAIME and CERSEI are alone. CERSEI begins walking over to a chair in front of JAIME and sits.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Why was QYBURN here?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He's Hand of the Queen. Why are you here?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I met with Tyrion.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: pauses for a moment making JAIME uncomfortable.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What did our brother have to say?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Daenerys wants to meet.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: To discuss a surrender?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: To discuss an armistice.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: She just won a great victory. Why would she want a truce now?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Because an army of dead men is marching on the Seven Kingdoms. Tyrion claims he'll have proof.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: smirks and looks away from JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Are you going to punish him?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
