text: jaime: Tyrion?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Bronn.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: looks confused.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He betrayed you. He set up a meeting without your knowledge or consent. Do you think anything of importance happens in this city without me knowing?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You let it happen. Why?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I've come to believe that accomodation with the Dragon Queen could be in our immediate interest. She has the numbers. If we want to beat her we have to be clever. We have to fight her like father would have. Dead men, dragons and Dragon Queens, whatever stands in our way we will defeat it ourselves for our house. For this.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: lifts her hands from the chair and places them both on her stomach indicating she's pregnant. JAIME looks shocked.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Who will you say is the father?

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: People won't like that.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: stands from her chair and walks in front of JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you remember what father used to say about people?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jaime
text: jaime: reaches forward and takes CERSEI and kisses her. While they embrace CERSEI speaks to JAIME.

title: Eastwatch
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Never betray me again.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: and DAVOS are walking down the beach near the Dragonglass cave. Groups of men are carrying boxes filled with Dragonglass out of the cave. DAVOS and GENDRY are having a discussion.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: We're leaving today. The king's got a lot on his mind.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I understand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: He doesn't need to be thinking about harboring the bastard of a dead king.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You don't have to worry.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: You're just Clovis, a smith who's come to pay his respects before he heads off to work at the Winterfell forges.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Understood.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: and GENDRY enter the mouth of the cave. JON is walking along the corridor.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Begging your pardon, Your Grace.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: stops and turns around to face DAVOS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: You survived King's Landing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Yet again.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Your Grace, this is --

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: steps forward in front of DAVOS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: It's Gendry, Your Grace. I'm Robert Baratheon's son. Bastard son.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: looks to DAVOS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: He was meant to keep that to himself.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Our fathers trusted each other. Why shouldn't we?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: I saw your father once at Winterfell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I met yours in my shop.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: You're a lot leaner.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You're a lot shorter.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: stops smiling and pauses a moment. Then he chuckles.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: I grew up on stories about them.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: All I ever knew was they fought together and won. Ser Davos told me where you're going, Your Grace, and why. Let me come with you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Don't be a fool. You're not a soldier.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: No, but I'm a fighter. And he won't be needing a smith with a sword like that.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Do you know how to use one?

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: shakes his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Well, that's a problem.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I prefer a hammer.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: looks to DAVOS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: He can handle himself.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: nods.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: We could use the help.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: As my father used to say, it's better to be a coward for a minute than dead for the rest of your life.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I owe you my life. Twice over. But if what you said is true about what's out there, I can't wait out this war.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Yeah. Nobody mind me. All I've ever done is live to a ripe old age.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You may not believe it, but I've missed you Mormont. Nobody glowers quite like you. Not even Grey Worm.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: retrieves a gold coin from his pocket and turns it in his hands.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: This is the coin the slaver gave me when I suggested he free us and pay us. Remember?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: smiles and hands the coin to JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Take it with you. You'll bring it back. Our queen needs you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: nods to TYRION. DAENERYS appears and walks up to JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: We should be better at saying farewell by now.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Your Grace, I --

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: reaches forward and takes JORAH by his hands. JON SNOW, DAVOS and GENDRY exit the cave and walk towards the boats. JORAH bends and kisses DAENERY's hand. He turns and continues readying the boat. JON stands in front of DAENERYS.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: If I don't return at least you won't have to deal with the King in the North anymore.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: smiles.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: But I've grown used to him.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: I wish you good fortune in the wars to come, Your Grace.

title: Eastwatch
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: nods to JON. JON turns and walks to the head of the boat. The men take hold of it.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Heave!

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: is seated at a table surround by papers and candles. He is writing notes into a book. Gilly is seated across from him reading aloud from a tome. SAM JR. is playing on the bed.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Do you know how many steps there are in the Citadel?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: No.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: looks up from his work annoyed. He remains silent and continues working.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Guess how many windows are in the Great Sept of Baelor.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: looks away and pauses.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: None anymore.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly: That's true. This High Septon Meynard, he recorded everything. He even recorded his own bowel movements. What does "annulment" mean?

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: It's when a man sets asside his lawful wife.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Meynard says here that he issued an anullment for Prince Rhaegar and remarried him to someone else at the same time in a secret ceremony in Dorne. Is that a common thing --

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: isn't paying much attention to GILLY. He loudly interrupts her.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: These maesters, they set me to the task of preserving that man's window counting and anullments and bowel movements for all eternity while the secret to defeating the Night King's probably sitting on some dusty shelf somewhere completely ignored. But that's all right, isn't it. We could all become slavering, murderous imbecils enthralled to evil incarnate as long as we can have access to the full records of High Septon Meynardo s 15,782 shits.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Steps. That number was steps.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: is dismayed. He sets his quill down and grabs the book he was writing in and hands it to SAM Jr. He retrieves his cloak and walks out the door.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: is walking through a dark library. He heads to the restricted section and unlocks the barred gate. He begins removing books and scrolls from shelfs and stuff them in his satchel. After retrieving what he needs, SAM quickly walks to the exit of the library. He pauses before he leaves and turns around. He glances back at the library. It is many stories tall lined with countless shelves of books. SAMWELL looks at the library one last time, turns and walks out of the door.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: is loading a wagon with his things. He walks around to the driver seat. GILLY and SAM JR. are already in the wagon dressed for the road. SAM climbs aboard and takes the reins in his hand.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gilly
text: gilly: Are you sure you want to do this? You always wanted to be a maester.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sam
text: sam: I'm tired of reading about the achievements of better men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: is in the kennels observing PETER BAELISH and a Winterfell servant having a conversation. The servent is whispering in BAELISH's ear. ARYA can't hear the conversation. ARYA sees BAELISH hand the servant a raven scroll. The servant turns to leave. BAELISH senses someone is watching him and he looks to where ARYA stood but she has already vanished. BAELISH turns and leaves the kennels.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: is on the upper level looking down at BAELISH. He is having a conversation with ROBETT GLOVER and YOHN ROYCE. She can't hear what's being said. BAELISH finishes his conversation and walks away from the men. ARYA disappears behind the corner and continues following BAELISH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: arya
text: arya: is walking down the hallway. She pauses, peers around a corner and looks towards the door of BAELISH's quarters. BAELISH appears and unlocks his door. Before he walks in MAESTER WOLKAN approaches him. She continues watching the men.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: I found it, my Lord.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: hands BAELISH a raven scroll.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: It took some searching. Maester Llewyn's archives are thorough.

title: Eastwatch
Name: petyr
text: petyr: reads the note then looks at WOLKAN.

title: Eastwatch
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Are you sure this is the only copy at Winterfell?

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: Yes, my Lord.

title: Eastwatch
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Lady Stark thanks you for your service.

title: Eastwatch
Name: wolkan
text: wolkan: turns and walks away. BAELISH enters his room and shuts the door. ARYA continues watching. A moment later BAELISH opens the door and exits the room, locking the door as he leaves. After he is gone ARYA walks to the door and produces a lockpick from her sleeve. She enters the room and begins searching for the raven scroll. She opens a cabinet but finds nothing of value. She checks another cabinet, then looks in the fireplace and above the mantle finding nothing. She lifts up the mattress and finds a small hole cut into the bedding. She reaches in and retrives the raven scroll. She unrolls it and reads the contents.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: and the raiding party land on the Beach of Eastwatch. JON looks up at the castle. The men collect their equipment and make for the castle.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: JON, DAVOS, GENDRY, and JORAH sit at a table having a conversation.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Isn't it your job to talk him out of stupid fucking ideas like this?

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I've been failing at that job of late.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: How many queens are there now?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Two.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: And you need to convince the one with the dragons or the one who fucks her brother?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Both.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: How many men did you bring?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: looks around the table.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: Not enough.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: The big woman?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: smiles and shakes his head. TORMUND is disappointed.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: We were hoping some of your men could help.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: I'll be staying behind. I'm a liability out there as you well know.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: nods his head.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You are.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: turns to look at JON.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You really want to go out there again?

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You're not the only ones.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: My scouts found them a mile south of the Wall. Said they were on their way here.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: You're The Hound. I saw you once at Winterfell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: sandor
text: sandor: pulls a blanket tight around himself and sits up from the table he was laying on.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: They want to go beyond the Wall too.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric: We don't want to go beyond the Wall, we have to. Our lord told us the great war is coming.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Don't trust them. Don't trust any of them.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: They're the Brotherhood. And the last thing their Lord told them to do was sell me to a Red Witch to be murdered.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Thoros?

title: Eastwatch
Name: thoros
text: thoros: sits up from a dark corner.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I hardly recognized you.

title: Eastwatch
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Ser Jorah Mormont --

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: turns and angrily looks at JORAH.

title: Eastwatch
Name: thoros
text: thoros: They won't give me anything to drink down here. I haven't been feeling like myself.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You're a fucking Mormont? Like the last Lord Commander?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He was my father.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: He hunted us like animals.

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: You returned the favor, as I recall.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric: Here we all are at the edge of the world at the same moment heading in the same direction for the same reason.

title: Eastwatch
Name: davos
text: davos: Our reasons aren't your reasons.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric: It doesn't matter what we think our reasons are.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric: stands up and walks towards the bars of the cell.

title: Eastwatch
Name: beric
text: beric: There's a greater purpose at work and we serve it together whether we know it or not. We may take the steps but the Lord of Light --

title: Eastwatch
Name: sandor
text: sandor: For fuck's sake, will you shut your hole. Are we coming with you or not?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Don't you want to know what we're doing?

title: Eastwatch
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Is it worse than sitting in a freezing cell waiting to die?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: He's right. We're all on the same side.

title: Eastwatch
Name: gendry
text: gendry: How can we be?

title: Eastwatch
Name: jon
text: jon: We're all breathing.

title: Eastwatch
Name: tormund
text: tormund: hands the cell keys to JON. JON opens the door and let the men out.

title: Eastwatch
Name: end
text: end: CREDITS

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: Are you all right?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: faces JON and grunts.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: Ever been north before?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Never seen snow before.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Beautiful, eh? I can breath again. Down south the air smells like pig shit.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: You've never been down south.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I've been to Winterfell.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: That's the north.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: How do you live up here? How do you keep your balls from freezing off?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You have to keep moving. That's the secret. Walking is good, fighting is better, fucking is best.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: There's not another woman within 100 miles of here.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: turns to look at JON and GENDRY.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: We have to make due with what we've got.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: glances at GENDRY. GENDRY backs away from JON and TORMUND.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: This one is maybe not so smart.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: Davos says he is a strong fighter.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Good. That's more important than being smart.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: looks at JON as they continue to walk.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Smart people don't come up here looking for the dead. So, you met this Dragon Queen, huh? And?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: She'll only fight beside us if I bend the knee.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You spent too much time with the free folk and now you don't like kneeling. Mance Rayder was a great man, a proud man. The king beyond the wall never bent the knee. How many of his people died for his pride?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Are you still mad at us, boy?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: You sold me to a witch.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Priestess. I'll admit, it is a subtle distinction.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: We're fighting a great war. Wars cost money.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I wanted to be one of you. I wanted to join the Brotherhood but you sold me off like a slave. Do you know what she did to me? She strapped me down on a bed, she stripped me naked --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Sounds all right so far.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: and put leeches on me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Was she naked too?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros: She needed your blood.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: Yes. Thank you. I know that.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: steps in front of GENDRY to halt him.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: It could have been worse.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: She wanted to kill me. They would have killed me if it wasn't for Davos --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: But they didn't, did they? So what you whinging about?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: gendry
text: gendry: I'm not whinging.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Your lips are moving and you're complaining about something. That's whinging.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: motions to BERIC.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: This one's been killed six times. You don't hear him bitching about it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: walks away to join the group. BERIC and THOROS smile to each other. THOROS holds his wine flask out to GENDRY who takes a large gulp and hands it back to THOROS.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Good lad.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: The first time I went north of the wall was with your father.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He was a good man. He deserved a better son. Were you with him at the end?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: I was a prisoner of the Wildlings. But we avenged him. I want you to know that every mutineer found justice.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I can't think of a worse way for him to go. The Night's Watch was his life. He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: I hate that he died that way. My father was the most honorable man I ever met. He was good all the way through. And he died on the executioner's block.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Your father wanted to execute me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: I heard.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He was in the right of course. It didn't make me hate him any less.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: and JON glance at each other.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm glad he didn't capture you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Me too.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: stops walking and loosens the belt holding his sword.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: Your father gave me this sword. He changed the pommel from a bear to a wolf, but it's still Long Claw.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: hands the sword to JORAH. JORAH slowly takes the sword and looks it over in his hands.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: Lord Commander Mormont thought you'd never come back to Westeros.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: stops examining the sword and looks up to JON.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: But you are back and it's been in your family for centuries. It's not right for me to have it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: pauses, then nods at JON.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: He gave it to you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm not his son.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: pulls the sword halfway out of the sheath and inspects the blade, turning it in his hands.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I brought shame to my house. I broke my father's heart.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: resheaths the blade and hands it back to JON.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jorah
text: jorah: I forfeited the right to claim this sword. It's yours. May it serve you well and your children after you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: Father used to watch us from up here. He wouldn't say much. You probably don't remember. You were inside knitting all the time.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I remember.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: One time the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrick. I came out here after and Bran had left his bow behind just lying on the ground. Ser Rodrick would have cuffed him if he saw. There was one arrow in the target. There was no one around, just like now. No one to stop me. So I started shooting. And every shot I had to go out there and get my one arrow and walk back and shoot it again. I wasn't very good. Finally I hit the bullseye. It could have been the 20th shot or the 50th. I don't remember. But I hit the bullseye and I heard this.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: starts a slow clap.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: I looked up and he's standing right here smiling down at me. I knew what I was doing was against the rules. But he was smiling so I knew it wasn't wrong. The rules were wrong. I was doing what I was meant to be doing and he knew it. Now he's dead. Killed by the Lannisters with your help.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: turns to look at ARYA.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: retrieves a raven scroll from her pocket and unrolls it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: That's your pretty handwriting. Septa Mordane used to crack my knuckles because I couldn't write as well as you. "Robb, I write to you today with heavy heart. Our good King Robert is dead. Killed from wounds he took in a boar hunt --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You don't have to read it. I remember.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: Father has been charged with treason. He conspired with Robert's brothers against my beloved Joffrey and tried to steal his throne. The Lannisters are treating me well and providing me with every comfort. I beg you, come to King's Landing, swear fealty to King Joffrey and prevent any strife between the great houses of Lannister and Stark. Your faithful sister, Sansa.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: They forced me to do it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: Did they. With a knife at your throat? Did they put you on a rack and stretch you until your bones started to pop?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You don't know what it was like. I was a child.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: So was I. I would have let them kill me before I betrayed my family.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: They told me it was the only way to save father.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: And you were stupid enough to believe them. I remember you standing on that platform with Joffrey and Cersei when they dragged father too the block. I remember the pretty dress you were wearing. I remember the fancy way you did your hair.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You were there?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: I was there standing in the crowd near Baelor's statue.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And what did you do? Did you come running to the rescue? Did you fight off the Lannisters and save father?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: I wanted to.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: But you didn't. Just like me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: I didn't betray him. I didn't betray Robb. I didn't betray our entire family for my beloved Joffrey.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You should be on your knees thanking me. We're standing in Winterfell again because of me. You didn't win it back. Jon didn't win it back. He lost the Battle of the Bastards. The Knight's of the Vale won the battle and they rode north for me while you were off where, traveling the world?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: I was training.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Training. Well, while you were training I suffered things you can never imagine.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: Oh, I don't know about that. I can imagine quite a lot.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You never would have survived what I survived.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: I guess we'll never know.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What are you doing to do with that letter.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: I don't know yet.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Who did you show it to? Where did you find it?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: You're scared, aren't you? What are you scared of? You didn't commit any crimes. No one's going to hang you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Arya --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: Are you scared I'll show it to Jon and he'll be angry? No. That's not Jon. He'll understand. You were just a scared little girl all alone with the wicked Lannisters.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Do you know how happy Cersei would be if she saw us fighting? This is exactly what she wants. This is what she's always wanted, to tear us apart --

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: The northern lords will read it. They wouldn't think much of Lady Sansa if they knew how she did Cersei's bidding. What would little Lyanna Mormont say? She's younger than you were when you wrote this. Are you going to say, "But I was just a child"?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You're angry. Sometimes anger makes people do unfortunate things.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: Sometimes fear makes them do unfortunate things. I'll go with anger.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: arya
text: arya: turns and walks away.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You're the one they call the dog.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Fuck off.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: They told me you were mean. Were you born mean or you just hate Wildlings?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I don't give two shits about Wildlings.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: looks up at TORMUND.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Gingers I hate.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Gingers are beautiful. We are kissed by fire. Just like you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: points and motions to SANDOR's burned face. SANDOR slaps his hand away.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Don't point your fucking finger at me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: walks away to rejoin the group. TORMUND begins smiling and walks after him.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Did you trip into the fire when you were a baby?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I didn't trip. I was pushed.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Ever since you've been mean.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Will you fuck off?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I don't think you're truly mean. You have sad eyes.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: stops and turns to TORMUND.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Do you want to suck my dick? Is that it?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Dick?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Cock.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Ah. Dick. I like it.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I bet you do.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: turns and begins walking, TORMUND follows.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Nope. It's pussy for me. I have a beauty waiting for me back at Winterfell. If I ever get back there. Yellow hair. Blue eyes. Tallest woman you've ever seen. Almost as tall as you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: stops and glances at TORMUND.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Brienne of Tarth.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You know her?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You're with Brienne of fucking Tarth?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: Well, not with her yet, but I see the way she looks at me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: How does she look at you? Like she wants to carve you up and eat your liver?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: nods.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: You do know her.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: We've met.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: and TORMUND begin walking.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I want to make babies with her. Think of the great big monsters. They'd conquer the world.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: How did a mad fucker like you live this long?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tormund
text: tormund: I'm good at killing people.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: You don't much look like him.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: Who's that?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: Your father. I suppose you favor your mother.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: You knew him?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: Of course I did. When he was Hand he sent me off hunting for The Mountain. Your Wildling friend told me the red woman brought you back. Thoros has brought me back six times. We both serve the same lord.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: I serve the north.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: The north didn't raise you from the dead.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: The lord of light never spoke to me. I don't know anything about him. I don't know what he wants from me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: He wants you alive.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: Why?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: I don't know.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: That's all anyone can tell me, I don't know. So what's the point in serving a god that none of us knows what he wants.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: I think about that all the time. I don't think it's our purpose to understand except one thing. We're soldiers. We have to know what we're fighting for. I'm not fighting so some man or woman I barely know can sit on a throne made of swords.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: So what are you fighting for?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: Life. Death is the enemy. The first enemy and the last.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: But we all die.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: The enemy always wins. And we still need to fight him. That's all I know. You and I wont find much joy while we're here. But we can keep others alive. We can defend those who can't defend themselves.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: I am the shield that guards the realms of men.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: beric
text: beric: Maybe we don't need to understand any more than that. Maybe that's enough.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: jon
text: jon: Aye. Maybe that's enough.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: stops and looks into the distance. There is a steep mountain ascending into the clouds in the distance.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: That's what I saw in the fire.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: points towards the mountain.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: A mountain like an arrowhead.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: thoros
text: thoros: Are you sure?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: turns to THOROS and nods his head.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: sandor
text: sandor: We're getting close.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: is sitting in a chair staring into the fire. DAENERYS stands across the room next to the painted table.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Do you know what I like about you?

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: turns to look at DAENERYS.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I honestly don't.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You're not a hero.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh. I've been heroic on occasion.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: walks over to the fire and sits in the chair opposite from TYRION.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I once charged through the mud gate of King's Landing.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I don't want you to be a hero. Heroes do stupid things and they die. Drogo, Jorah, Dario, even this Jon Snow, they all try to outdo each other of who can do the stupidist, bravest thing.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's interesting these heroes you name. Drogo, Jorah, Dario, even this Jon Snow, they all fell in love with you.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Jon Snow's not in love with me.

title: Beyond the Wall
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Oh, my mistake. I suppose he stares at you longingly because he's hopeful for a successful military alliance.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Oil?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Pitch, my lord.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: How many barrels?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: soldier
text: soldier: 500, my lord.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Get 500 more.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: soldier
text: soldier: Yes, my lord.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I still enjoy it when they call me "my lord."

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The thrill will fade.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: If we live that long. Men without cocks. You wouldn't find me fighting in an army if I had no cock. What's left to fight for?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Gold?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I spent my life around soldiers. What do you think they spend that gold on?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Not without a cock, you don't.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Maybe it really is all cocks in the end.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Yet, your brother--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Yes, he's always been a champion of the downtrodden.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I think we're about to be the downtrodden.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man: Archers, stand tall!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man: Cover that wall!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: How many people live here?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A million, give or take.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: That's more people than the entire North crammed into that. Why would anyone want to live that way?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There's more work in the city. And the brothels are far superior.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Why isn't she with them?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: I'm afraid I don't know, Your Grace. No one has seen her.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And the rest of them?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: They're on their way to the dragon pit now.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Including our brother.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: qyburn
text: qyburn: Yes, Your Grace.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: If anything goes wrong, kill the silver-haired bitch first, then our brother, then the bastard who calls himself king.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: missandei
text: missandei: Why did they build it?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Dragons don't understand the difference between what is theirs and what isn't. Land, livestock, children... Letting them roam free around a city was a problem.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I imagine it was a sad joke at the end. An entire arena for a few sickly creatures smaller than dogs. But in the beginning, when it was home to Balerion the Dread, it must have been the most dangerous place in the world.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: davos
text: davos: Maybe it still is.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Welcome, my lords. Your friends arrived before you did.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I've been sent to escort you all to the meeting.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A pleasant surprise in an unpleasant situation.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: podrick
text: podrick: I never thought I'd see you again, my lord.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Supporting the enemy, no less.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: podrick
text: podrick: Hard to blame you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Cersei will anyway.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: podrick
text: podrick: I'm glad you're alive.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Come on! You can suck his magic cock later.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: soldier
text: soldier: What's in there?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Fuck off.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I thought you were dead.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Not yet. You came pretty close.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: I was only trying to protect her.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: You and me both.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: She's alive. Arya.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Where?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Winterfell.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Who's protecting her if you're here?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: The only one that needs protecting is the one that gets in her way.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: It won't be me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Here we are the heroes of Blackwater Bay. Strange place for a reunion.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: podrick
text: podrick: It is, my lord.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't think I'm anyone's lord anymore, Podrick. Save the titles for Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I'm sure your new queen--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You've been thinking about our new queen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: varys
text: varys: And that would be double what now, exactly?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Don't you worry about me. I'm doing all right. Looking after myself.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Are you? Helping me to arrange this meeting wasn't exactly looking after yourself, was it? You put yourself at risk.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: I put yourself at risk. Important difference. It's your head Queen Cersei's offered a bag of gold for, it's not mine. Now, thanks to me, she's got two traitors' heads coming right through her door. She can lop them both off as soon as she gets tired of the clever words that pour out their pieholes. All thanks to Ser Bronn of the fucking Blackwater. If that's not looking after myself, I don't know what is.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: It's good to see you again.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Yeah, you, too.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Anyone touches it, I'll kill you first.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bronn
text: bronn: Come on, Pod. Let's you and me go have a drink while the fancy folks talk, eh?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: I left this shit city because I didn't want to die in it. Am I going to die in this shit city?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You might.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: And this is all your idea. Seems every bad idea has some Lannister cunt behind it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: And some Clegane cunt to help them see it through.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sandor
text: sandor: Remember me? Yeah, you do. You're even fucking uglier than I am now. What did they do to you? Doesn't matter. That's not how it ends for you, brother.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Where is she?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She'll be here soon.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Didn't travel with you?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: No.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: We've been here for some time.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: My apologies.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We are all facing a unique

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron: Theon! I have your sister

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I think we ought to begin with larger concerns.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron: Then why are you talking? You're the smallest concern here.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Do you remember when we discussed dwarf jokes? His wasn't even good. He explained it at the end. Never explain. It always ruins it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron: We don't even let your kind live in the Iron Islands, you know? We kill you at birth. An act of mercy for the parents.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Perhaps you ought to sit down.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron: Why?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Sit down or leave.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We are a group of people who do not like one another, as this recent demonstration has shown. We have suffered at each other's hands. We have lost people we love at each other's hands. If all we wanted was more of the same, there would be no need for this gathering. We are entirely capable of waging war against each other without meeting face-to-face.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: So instead, we should settle our differences and live together in harmony for the rest of our days?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: We all know that will never happen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Then why are we here?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: This isn't about living in harmony. It's just about living. The same thing is coming for all of us. A general you can't negotiate with. An army that doesn't leave corpses behind on the battlefield. Lord Tyrion tells me a million people live in this city. They're about to become a million more soldiers in the Army of the Dead.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I imagine for most of them it would be an improvement.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: This is serious. I wouldn't be here if it weren't.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I don't think it's serious at all. I think it's another bad joke. If my brother Jaime has informed me correctly, you're asking me for a truce.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Yes. That's all.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's all? Pull back my armies and stand down while you go on your monster hunt. Or while you solidify and expand your position. Hard for me to know which it is with my armies pulled back until you return and march on my capital with four times the men.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Your capital will be safe until the northern threat is dealt with. You have my word.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The word of a would-be usurper.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: There is no conversation that will erase the last 50 years. We have something to show you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: We can destroy them by burning them.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: And we can destroy them with dragonglass. If we don't win this fight, then that is the fate of every person in the world.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: There is only one war that matters the Great War. And it is here.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I didn't believe it until I saw them. I saw them all.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: How many?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: A hundred thousand, at least.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron: Can they swim?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: No.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron: Good. I'm taking the Iron Fleet back to the Iron Islands.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What are you talking about?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron: I've been around the world. I've seen everything, things you couldn't imagine, and this this is the only thing I've ever seen that terrifies me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: euron
text: euron: I'm going back to my island. You should go back to yours. When winter's over, we'll be the only ones left alive.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: He's right to be afraid. And a coward to run. If those things come for us, there will be no kingdoms to rule. Everything we suffered will have been for nothing. Everything we lost will have been for nothing. The crown accepts your truce. Until the dead are defeated, they are the true enemy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: In return, the King

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: Just the King

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I would never ask it of you. You would never agree to it. And if you did, I would trust you even less than I do now. I ask it only of Ned Stark's son. I know Ned Stark's son.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: I am true to my word. Or I try to be. That is why I cannot give you what you ask. I cannot serve two queens. And I have already pledged myself to Queen Daenerys of House Targaryen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Then there is nothing left to discuss. The dead will come north first. Enjoy dealing with them. We will deal with whatever is left of you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Ser Jaime.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: It's been good to see you. I imagine the next time will be across a battlefield.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: We both saw what just happened. We both saw that thing.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Yes, and I'm not looking forward to seeing more of them. But I'm loyal to the queen and you're loyal to Sansa and her dolt brother.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: Oh, fuck loyalty!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Fuck loyalty?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: brienne
text: brienne: This goes beyond houses and honor and oaths. Talk to the queen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: And tell her what?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: davos
text: davos: I wish you hadn't done that.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I'm grateful for your loyalty, but my dragon died so that we could be here. If it's all for nothing, then he died for nothing.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: I know!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm pleased you bent the knee to our queen

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: I'm not going to swear an oath I can't uphold. Talk about my father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: That is indeed a problem. The more immediate problem is that we're fucked.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: davos
text: davos: Any ideas as to how we might change that state of affairs?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Only one. Everyone stays here, and I go and talk to my sister.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I didn't come all this way to have my Hand

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't want Cersei to murder me either. I could have stayed in my cell and saved a great deal of trouble.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: I did this. I should go.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She'll definitely murder you. I go see my sister.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You spoke with her?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: At her until she kicked me out. She thinks I was an idiot to trust you. A lot of people seem to think that, actually.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I'm about to step into a room with the most murderous woman in the world who's already tried to kill me twice, that I know of. Who's an idiot?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I suppose we should say goodbye, one idiot to another.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I shouldn't be surprised, I suppose. She's your kind of woman a foreign whore who doesn't know her place.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: A foreign whore you can't abduct, beat, or intimidate. That must be difficult for you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: So you bring her here with her pet Northerner, whom you've convinced to bow down before her.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I didn't know about that.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And now you've got them both working towards the same goal, the goal you've worked towards your entire life.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Cersei, I didn't know.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: the destruction of this family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I am the one preventing that from happening. Daenerys didn't want to debate and negotiate. She didn't want to bring you words. She wanted to bring you fire and blood until I advised her otherwise. I don't want to destroy our family. I never have.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You killed our father

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: After he sentenced me to death for a crime I didn't commit, yes, I killed him. Hate me for it if you want. I hate myself for it in spite of what he was, in spite of what he did to me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Oh, poor little man. Your papa was mean to you. Do you have any idea what you did when you fired that crossbow? You left us open. You laid us bare for the vultures, and the vultures came and tore us apart. You may not have killed Joffrey, but you killed Myrcella, you killed Tommen. No one wouldo ve touched them if Father--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I have never been more sorry about anything.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I will not hear it, not from you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I will not hear it!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: All right. You love your family, and I have destroyed it. I will always be a threat. So put an end to me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If it weren't for me, you'd have a motherIf it weren't for me, you'd have a father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I am more sorry about the children than you could ever know.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I will not

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: I don't care. I loved them. You know I did. You know it in your heart if there's anything left of it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: It doesn't matter. Your love doesn't matter. Your feelings don't matter. I don't care why you did what you did. I only care what it cost us. It cost us our future.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: If there's no future, then why are we here? Why did you allow me to come?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Not to help my enemies collaborate in my destruction.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes, no, not what you hoped for, but you must have hoped for something.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What did you hope for? To make Jon Snow submit to your queen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Mm, not like this.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: But eventually, you want everyone to bend the knee to her.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Yes.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Why?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: Because I think she will make the world a better place.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You said she'd destroy King's Landing.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: She knows herself. She chose an advisor who would check her worst impulses instead of feeding them.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That's the difference between you. I don't care about checking my worst impulses. I don't care about making the world a better place. Hang the world.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: That thing you dragged here, I know what it is, I know what it means. And when it came at me, I didn't think about the world. Not at all. As soon as it opened its mouth, the world disappeared for me, right down its black throat. All I could think about was keeping those gnashing teeth away from the ones who matter most, away from my family. Maybe Euron Greyjoy had the right idea. Get on a boat, take those who matter.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: tyrion
text: tyrion: You're pregnant.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: No one is less happy about this than I am.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I know. I respect what you did. Wish you hadn't done it, but I respect it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: This place was the beginning of the end for my family. A dragon is not a slave. They were terrifying. Extraordinary. They filled people with wonder and awe, and we locked them in here. They wasted away. They grew small. And we grew small as well. We weren't extraordinary without them. We were just like everyone else.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: You're not like everyone else. And your family hasn't seen its end. You're still here.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I can't have children.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: Who told you that?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: The witch who murdered my husband.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: Has it occurred to you she might not have been a reliable source of information?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: You were right from the beginning. If I had trusted you, everything would be different.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: So, what now?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I can't forget what I saw north of the Wall. And I can't pretend that Cersei won't take back half the country the moment I march north.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: It appears Tyrion's assessment was correct. We're fucked.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My armies will not stand down. I will not pull them back to the capital. I will march them north to fight alongside you in the Great War. The darkness is coming for us all. We'll face it together. And when the Great War is over, perhaps you'll remember I chose to help with no promises or assurances from any of you. I expect not. Call our banners. All of them.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: It's not easy for ravens to fly in these storms. Perhaps Jon tried to send word earlier.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: No, this is the way he is, the way he's always been. He never asked for my opinion. Why would he start now?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I can't believe he'd surrender the Northern crown without consulting you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: This is his writing, his signature. He pledged to fight for Daenerys Targaryen. He's bent the knee.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I've heard gossip that the Dragon Queen is quite beautiful.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: What does that have to do with anything?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Jon is young and unmarried. Daenerys is young and unmarried.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You think he wants to marry her?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: An alliance makes sense. Together, they'd be difficult to defeat. He was named King.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Even if I wanted to, Arya would never go along. She always loved Jon far more than she ever loved me, and she'd kill anyone who betrayed her family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: You are family, too. Would Arya really murder her own sister?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Do you know what she is now? Do you know what the Faceless Men are?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Only by reputation. They worship the God of Death, I believe. I never trust godly men.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: They're killers. And Arya was one of them. What do you think she's after?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: She's your sister

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: She could want me dead because she thinks I wronged my family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Why did she come to Winterfell?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: To kill me for marrying our enemies and betraying my family.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Why did she unearth the letter Cersei made you write?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: To provide proof of my betrayals. To provide justification after she murders me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: And after she murders you, what does she become?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Lady

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: If we have the Dothraki ride hard on the kingsroad, they'll arrive at Winterfell within the fortnight.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: And the Unsullied? We can sail with them to White Harbor, meet the Dothraki here on the kingsroad, then ride together to Winterfell.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jorah
text: jorah: Perhaps you should fly to Winterfell, Your Grace. You have many enemies in the North. Thousands fell fighting your fatherAll it takes is one angry man with a crossbow. He'll see your silver hair on the kingsroad and know that one well-placed bolt will make him a hero. The man who killed the conqueror.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: It's your decision, Your Grace. But if we're going to be allies in this war, it's important for the Northerners to see us as allies. If we sail to White Harbor together, I think it sends a better message.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: daenerys
text: daenerys: I've not come to conquer the North. I'm coming to save the North. We sail together.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: Jon.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: Can I speak with you?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: All right.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: What you did in King's Landing, what you said... You couldo ve lied to Cersei about bending the knee to Daenerys. You risked everything to tell an enemy the truth.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: We went down there to make peace. And it seems to me we need to be honest with each other if we're going to fight together.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: You've always known what was right. Even when we were all young and stupid, you always knew. Every step you take it's always the right step.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: It's not. It may seem that way from the outside, but I promise you, it's not true. I've done plenty of things that I regret.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: Not compared to me, you haven't.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: No. Not compared to you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: I always wanted to do the right thing. Be the right kind of person. But I never knew what that meant. It always seemed like there's like there was an impossible choice I had to make. Stark or Greyjoy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: Our father was more of a father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: He was.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: And you betrayed him. Betrayed his memory.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: I did.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: But you never lost him. He's a part of you. Just like he's a part of me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: But the things I've done.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: It's not my place to forgive you for all of it. But what I can forgive, I do. You don't need to choose. You're a Greyjoy and you're a Stark.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: When I was Ramsay's prisoner, Yara tried to save me. She's the only one who tried to save me. She needs me now.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jon
text: jon: So, why are you still talking to me?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: Load up. Load up, lads. Go on. Tide's coming in.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: All of us chose to follow Yara. We left the Iron Islands for Yara. She would never leave one of us behind. We're not leaving her behind.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: Your sister--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: She's not dead.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: She's dead. Even if Euron hasn't cut her throat yet, she's dead.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: She's our queen

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: She's your sister

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: I did. I ran from my uncle.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: So, why in fuck's name should we listen to you? They say the dead can't swim. We're going to sail east, find a nice, quiet island, kill all the men, and take their wives for ourselves.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: We're done with all that.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: Who says we are?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: Yara did. She made a pledge. We're going to find her, and we're going to set her free.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: Run away, little Theon. It's what you do best.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man: He needs to shut his mouth.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man: Hey!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man: Oh, yes!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man: That's more like it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: Stay down or I'll kill you!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: harrag
text: harrag: I said stay down or I'll kill you!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: theon
text: theon: Not for me. For Yara!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: men
text: men: Yara!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Have my sister

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya: Are you sure you want to do this?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: It's not what I want. It's what honor demands.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya: And what does honor demand?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: That I defend my family from those who would harm us. That I defend the North from those who would betray us.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya: All right, then. Get on with it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You stand accused of murder. You stand accused of treason. How do you answer these charges Lord Baelish?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya: My sister asked you a question.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Lady Sansa, forgive me I'm a bit confused.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Which charges confuse you? Let's start with the simplest one you murdered our aunt, Lysa Arryn. You pushed her through the Moon Door and watched her fall. Do you deny it?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I did it to protect you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You did it to take power in the Vale. Earlier, you conspired to murder Jon.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Whatever your aunt

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You had Aunt Lysa send a letter to our parents telling them it was the Lannisters who murdered Jon.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I know of no such letter.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: You conspired with Cersei Lannister and Joffrey Baratheon to betray our father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I deny it! None of you were there to see what happened. None of you knows the truth.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran: You held a knife to his throat.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran: You said, "I did warn you not the trust me."

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: arya
text: arya: You told our mother

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Lady Sansa, I have known you since you were a girl. I've protected you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Protected me? By selling me to the Boltons?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: If we could speak alone, I can explain everything.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: Sometimes when I'm trying to understand a person's motives, I play a little game. I assume the worst. What's the worst reason you have for turning me against my sisterThat's what you do, isn't it? That's what you've always done turn family against family, turn sister against sister. That's what you did to our mother.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Sansa, please.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: I'm a slow learner, it's true. But I learn.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Give me a chance to defend myself. I deserve that.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I am Lord Protector of the Vale and I command you to escort me safely back to the Eyrie.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: john
text: john: I think not.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Sansa, I beg you! I loved your mother since the time I was a boy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And yet, you betrayed her.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: I loved you. More than anyone.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: And yet, you betrayed me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sansa
text: sansa: When you brought me back to Winterfell, you told me there's no justice in the world, not unless we make it. Thank you for all your many lessons, Lord Baelish. I will never forget them.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: petyr
text: petyr: Sansa! I--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Our men in King's Landing will march north in three days' time.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: man
text: man: It'll take us a fortnight just to gather supplies for the train.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We don't have a fortnight. If the North falls, we fall. Three days. The remaining forces in the Westerlands will take the river road east. We'll meet at Lord Harroway's Town and march together to Winterfell.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Ser Jaime.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Your Grace.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: My lords, I need a moment with my brother.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: men
text: men: Your Grace.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What are you doing?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Preparing the expedition north.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Expedition north? I always knew you were the stupidest Lannister. The Starks and Targaryens have united against us, and you want to fight alongside them? Are you a traitor or an idiot?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You pledged our forces to fight our common enemy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I'll say whatever I need to say to ensure the survival of our house. You expect me to trust the man who murdered our father.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You saw it with your own eyes. You saw a dead man trying to kill us.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I saw it burn. If dragons can't stop them, if Dothraki and Unsullied and Northmen can't stop them, how will our armies make a difference?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: This isn't about noble houses, this is about the living and the dead!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And I intend to stay amongst the living. Let the Stark boy and his new queen--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I made a promise.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Our child will rule Westeros.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Our child will never be born if the dead come south.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The monsters are real. The white walkers, the dragons, the Dothraki screamers all the frightening stories we heard when we were young, they're all real. So be it. Let the monsters kill each other. And while they battle in the North, we take back the lands that belong to us.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: And then what?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And then we rule.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: When the fighting in the North is over, someone wins. You understand that, don't you? If the dead win, they march south and kill us all. If the living win, and we've betrayed them, they march south and kill us all!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: The Targaryens and the Starks already want to kill us all. Most of them will die in the North.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I faced them in the field. We can't beat them. We can't beat their dragons.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: How many dragons did you see at the pit?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Two.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: What happened to the third?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: For all we know, it's guarding her fleet!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: She came here with her dragons and her Dothraki and her Unsullied. She came here to show us all her power. No, something happened.The dragons are vulnerable.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: We can't beat the Dothraki. We don't have the numbers. We don't have the support of the other houses!

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: No, we have something better. We have the Iron Bank. You shouldo ve listened more when Father--

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: The Golden Company is not here. They're in Essos. How is a mercenary company in Essos going to help us?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Do you really think Euron Greyjoy turned tail and sailed back to the Iron Islands? Do you think he abandoned the chance to marry the queen?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: You plotted with Euron Greyjoy without telling me, the commander.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And you conspired with Tyrion, the man who murdered our father without telling me, your queen.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I didn't conspire with him.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: You met with him in secret without my consent. You planned to promote my enemies' interests. That is the definition of conspiracy.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I pledged to ride north. I intend to honor that pledge.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: And that will be treason.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Treason?

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: Disobeying your queen

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Doesn't matter what I'd call it.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: I told you no one walks away from me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Are you going to order him to kill me? I'm the only one you have left. Our children are gone, our father

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: cersei
text: cersei: There's one more yet to come.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: Give the order, then.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: jaime
text: jaime: I don't believe you.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran: Come in.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran: Samwell Tarly.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: sam
text: sam: I wasn't sure if you'd remember me.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran: I remember everything.

title: The Dragon and the Wolf
Name: bran
text: bran: You helped us get beyond the Wall. You're a good man.
